column3: Je' re' k'uru' chac'ax tak take c'acharel eh je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak haj wilic rinimal ric'axbal i Dios xic'uhtaj i Jesus . Haj wilic rinimal i c'axo̱j re're' ? Re' rinimal c'axo̱j re're' , re' chi re' Jesus xiyew ri̱b pan quimic chi kajelow-bal i hoj . Ru'um aj re' je' wo' re' naka'nam i hoj cu̱c' take kas kacha̱k' . Ru'um chi je' re' , kak'ahsaj wo' tak i kac'acharic pan k'ab i Dios chi quitobjic ru̱c' quic'axquilal pan quic'acharic .

Re' ric'axbal i Jesus chi kana̱ i hoj raj tahkanel ma' xa ta re' chiwach take k'i̱j nok cu suk pe nak c'acharic riban ayu' wach ac'al xc'uhtunic wach ku̱c' je' la' wo' re' xiban chiwach take k'i̱j pan cohlsbal chic wach ric'acharic . Chi je' aj re' ric'axbal ric'uhtaj chi kana̱ , pan jenaj k'i̱j nok p'uhtic nak chic reh i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa ribihnal , re' Jesus ximol kawach reh chi naka'nam kawa' kaha̱' rich'i̱l ru'um nok reht'alim nak chic chi xponic chic i rik'ijil chi narelic je china̱ ac'al wili reh chi narojic wo' chic johtok ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios .

Hab wach aj china̱ xwih'ic ric'a̱ i Dios chiwach ca'winak ( 40 ) ha̱b ar pan chik yu̱k' ? Chi quina̱ wo' take kama̱m kati't je' ru̱c' ximahcanic cho chiwach i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' xca'n , xiquimibic ar pan chik yu̱k' , xha'bic quiti'jolal chipam yu̱k' q'uixca̱b re're' .

Je' re' nok ru'um chi hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios , curman chi na̱banam tak je' ricab riban i ac'unbe̱s re' rinimej i raja̱w . Til nipahkaj aweh tak k'uru' chi ma̱yew ac'ux tak chiri̱j ribanaric i c'ahbilal je' ricab xa'n tak cho najtir k'i̱j ru'um chi ma' ana'bem ta nak tak chiri̱j ribiral i Dios .

Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' nc'uluric nak ku̱c' chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel , nkarak chiri̱j i ribanam i Dios wili : Re're' xiyew k'ab chi ric'uhtjic chi re' hoj chi'nchel c'acharel je' hoj quicab take c'acharel tz'apalque̱b take pan che̱' . Je' re' nik'or maj chi kunchelal i hoj ric'ul nak chi keh chi nariye'eric ti'c'axic chi kana̱ ru'um chi ma' nkabiraj ta nak k'oric chiwach i Dios . Xa re' la' ru' re' Dios ma' je' ta re' xiban keh eh je' re' xiban reh chi ewo' nc'uhtunic wach chi chi'nchel hoj c'acharel riquetelej aj wo' kawach .

Re' tz'uklic nah cawa̱y wili je' wili xk'ormojic cho reh ru'um i tz'uklic pan quiyejal take quejeb chi c'acharel wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach : « Re' hat na̱banam chi q'uih naric'ayjic wi̱' ixi̱m ch'i̱l riximal caxlan wi'c . Je' re' nok quib pajbal chi ixi̱m on waki̱b pajbal chi riximal caxlan wi'c , narilok'oric ru̱c' ritz'akil i jenaj k'i̱j chi camanic . Je' wo' na̱banam chi ma' eta nc'uhlic i yolic laj ik'o̱m ch'i̱l cak wach ha' nxohc'sonic , nqui xk'ormojic reh na xo̱j .
Je' re' ajic chach'ubsaj wach ano'jbal tak chiwach i kAja̱w eh re're' erijohsaj wach awa'ric tak .

maj tiklic chic wach i k'i̱j chi re' c'acharel re' Pahbamaj ru'um i Dios chi Ch'ukul wach K'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel , til narich'ukum wach quimahc . Re' Pahbamaj re're' coric wach ch'ukuj k'oric naribanam maj til coric wach rino'jbal je' ricab xc'uhtunic chi quiwach chi'nchel c'acharel ar Jerusalen chiwach i rik'ijil ric'acharic . Ru'um chi je' re' riwi̱' rino'jbal , re' Dios xucsaj cho chi quixilac take camnak , nqui xik'or ma' Lu̱' .

Je' re' k'uru' re' take sol cha'jem reh Jesus naxquitz'uhumej je' ricab tak'amaj rik'ormojic queh ru'um i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to , xquipach'ej eh xquicotej wach jenaj ku̱l q'ui̱x reh chi naquicojom wach na̱ i Jesus . Chiri̱j chic re' xquicoj chiri̱j i Jesus jenaj cak moyic tz'ih je' ricab ncojoric reh jenaj k'atal k'oric eh je' re' xca'n chi xa se'lbal reh .

Ru'um aj reh chi'nchel re're' , re' hin yu'na nik'or je aweh chi re' take ixok camnak quibahi̱l eh cu ja'xta queh oxc'ahl ( 60 ) ha̱b , sakbih nak chi ewo' chic nca'n caxarahil . Chiri̱j chic ru' , jarub pa' chic quiha'lac'u̱n nariwih'ic , quiq'uihsaj lok pa ricorquil eh quicamanej pa̱m quipa̱t chi coric reh chi je' re' ma' hab ta wach queh take quik'etbic wach kac'uhtunic enk'oric chiri̱j chi ma' holohic ta i niminic wilco̱j wi̱' .

« Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak chacoj tak wach chi re' hin xa jenaj niwi̱' ch'i̱l i wAja̱w . Ma' nacoj tak wach xa ru̱c' take chaj bih nik'or , chawilow tak take camanic niban eh chacoj tak wach ru̱c' re're' .

Ar aj ru' naxch'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ take c'acharel re're' , xi'elic lok chipam i ye'a̱b “ Ha̱res ” ribihnal re' xi'o̱j cahnok wi̱' naxiquimic je eh xicuturic jok chipam i ye'a̱b re' xa ntenic chic cho rik'ak'il . Re' ti'c'axic naric'ulmujic ar ribihnej wo' chi “ Ricab Quimic ” .

Wi curman ta nak chi re' i Jesus chi q'uih pech xoquic ar , raj nak rik'orom chi xa re' wo' nak rip'uhtic cho c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al cu rehtal rik'ijil yu'na , curman nak chi re' Jesus q'uih pech nak c'ahchi' ricansjic . Ra̱j i wili keht'alim chi xa re' wo' p'uhtunak riq'uic lok rik'ijil ricux'ic wi̱' i c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al , re' Jesus xa junpech wo' xc'ulic ayu' wach ac'al eh ru̱c' riquimic xic'ul naxc'ulic ayu' , re're' xiban chi q'uihal keh hoj c'acharel xcuyuric kamahc .

Chiri̱j chic ru' nok esemaj chic take cho ar , xquicora̱' je chipam ye'a̱b chik yu̱k' re' ma'xta wi̱' patanel . Ar ma' xcanabjic ta quiliric ru'um i Dios chiwach i ca'winak ( 40 ) ha̱b xibehic chipam ye'a̱b re're' , to̱b ta cow take chi ribirmijic k'oric chiwach i Dios .

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel je' ricab nachamol awi̱b tak chi wi'c re' na'n tak wi̱' rinimjic wach ric'ulic pan ac'ux tak i riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus , chapuhcaj tak chawach take wi'c namol tak wach eh chawuy'ej wo' awi̱b tak chi je' re' hat-tak junwa'ic .

Chiri̱j chic wili , xwilow chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' xich'ep lok i riwa̱k t'uhr chi k'olbal k'olomaj wi̱' chi̱' i botomaj wach hu̱j re're' . Ar ajic naxiban chi je' re' xwilow chi xic'uluric take wili : Pe̱t , xchalic jenaj rinimal hihc . Chiri̱j chic ru' ar pan taxa̱j , xk'ekomric wach i k'i̱j eh je' ricab rik'ekil quiso' nquicoj take c'acharel nanquimic je jeno' hab wach je' wo' re' k'ekil xcahnic wach i k'i̱j . Je' wo' re' i poh cakbic wach xponic xa je' chic quic' .

Je' wo' chic , wilic take ixok xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh ru'um re' xquilow wach pan quic'acharic chi re' take quiha'lac'u̱n camnak nak chic take je , xic'acharic wo' chic rica'pech . To̱b ta wo' wilic take je' re' xquic'ul cho , wilic wo' take c'acharel xiquimic je chi c'ahchi' quic'ulum ti'c'axic . To̱b ta xye'eric wo' nak queh chi enquico'lej qui̱b chiwach i ti'c'axic wi xquimay quiniminic , re' take c'acharel re're' ma' xca̱j ta chi hab wach xco'lonic queh . Chi je' re' k'uru' xquik'ahsaj qui̱b pan quimic eh re' wili riwi̱' chi je' re' xca'n : Chi re' take re' queht'alim chi to̱b ta quiquimok je nariye'eric queh chi nacuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak eh nariye'eric wo' queh chi re' quic'acharic k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal naribanam nacuctok wo' chic cho .

Re' ma' Lu̱' naxibiraj k'oric re're' , je' wili xik'or queh take sol xic'ambic cho reh k'oric : « To̱b ta hoj wo' nak aj Ro̱ma i hoj , re' take aj nahsil ma' xquich'uk ta wach kamahc xquitak'a̱' la' katz'uhumjic chi quiwach i tinamit eh xquitak'a̱' wo' kacojoric pan che̱' . Re' aj chic yu'na nca̱j kojquesam je pan c'olic xa re' la' hoj ma' eta koj-elic je chi je' re' . Kojc'olok pe quesaj take nahsil re're' cu re' aj ekoj-elic je , nqui ma' Lu̱' queh .

Re' take tak'anic c'ahchi' nik'oric chiri̱j re're' , re' take wili : Ma̱ban i c'oyomal , ma̱ban i cansanic , ma̱ban ilek' , ma̱tz'ak k'oric chiri̱j awas acha̱k' . Je' wo' ma̱ban chi xa ji̱k' chic ac'ux chi relk'jic pa' bih nac'ax wach reh jeno' chic c'acharel . Chi'nchel take tak'anic re're' ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic tak'anic no̱j riban chi n-nimjic wo' wi nc'amaric na̱ i tak'anic rik'or chi je' wili : “ Chac'ax awas acha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n i hat ” .
Je' re' ajic hab wach ch'iclic ric'ux chi narilom wach i kAja̱w Jesus curman chi reh chi ma'xta chic ribanam i c'ahbilal je' ricab nok re' Jesus ma' re' ta pan c'ahbilal wilic .
maj to̱b ta nak re' hoj xa suk chic pan ka̱mna nkacoj pan kacapew-bal chi tare̱t rik'or i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ,

Nok nipahkam chic re're' , re' chic take wili toco̱m pahkanic niban je aweh tak : Xa suk ok wo' ac'ux tak chi junelic ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios wilic awu̱c' tak eh re' hin ma' eta quinch'i'tjic chi rica'pechjic rik'ororic wo' chic je aweh tak chi narisukbic ac'ux tak .
Naxinsolq'uij je wi̱b chi riliric je hab wach nk'o'ronic cho wi̱n , xwilow wach jenaj nim laj pa'a̱b cante̱la wuku̱b chi tz'ukunbal cante̱la wilic reh , re' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' .

Je' wo' , hab wach aj chiri̱j xik'or i Dios chi wilic jenaj juntuhm reh c'acharel re' ma' jaruj ta naquirakam quihi'lbal ru̱c' ? Re' take k'oric re're' xk'ormojic chiqui̱j take kama̱m kati't je' ru̱c' ma' xquic'am ta na̱ i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios .

Nok ja' quinc'ulic ta lok hin ayu' wach ac'al , q'uihal take xic'ulic chi c'ahchi' quik'orom chi tak'amaj take cho ru'um i Dios eh chi ma' je ta wo' re' . Re' take re' xa je quicab aj lek' me̱' nok wilque̱b . Ru'um aj re' je' ricab xc'uluric cu̱c' take me̱' re're' je' wo' re' xc'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel maj je' ricab nok re' take me̱' ma' nquitahkej ta take aj lek' nanquibiraj chi ma' re' ta rik'orbal i caj ilo̱l , re' take c'acharel naxquibiraj wo' nak i c'uhbalanic nca'n nahsil aj c'uhbalanel , ma' xquitahkej ta wo' take .

Yu'na aweh hat-tak je' ru̱c' wilca̱t tak chi mosahic chiwach jeno' ajabe̱s ehcham camanic , nik'or chi tiniminok tak chiwach eh wilic ok riwa'ric chawach tak , re' cok ru' ma' xa chi quiwach ta take ajabe̱s holohic quino'jbal eh ch'ublic ti wach quic'ux chi quetelenic na̱banam tak je' re' , je' la' wo' re' cu̱c' take k'e̱' josk' laj ajabe̱s .

Ar aj ru' re' take xitojmojic chi naquiyeb quichi̱' chi chucuj k'oric je' wili xquik'or cok : « Re' winak wili ma' ricana̱' ta so' ribanaric ma' holohic ta laj k'oric rik'or lok chiri̱j Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios je' wo' chiri̱j i C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses .

Nic' wach nanc'uluric i wili ? Nc'uluric ru'um reh ricamaj xiban i Dios naxojricoj wo' chic ru̱c' chi nakacahnic pan jenaj wo' chic suk laj c'uxlis xa ru'um reh chi xquimic chiki̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Chi aj je' re' , re' wo' Dios xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiki̱j i hoj aj k'orol riC'uhbal chi nakak'orom queh toco̱m chic c'acharel chi naquic'u'lem na̱ i quiyuk'unjic riban i Dios chi naquicahnic wo' pan sukquil c'uxlis ru̱c' .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , cha'n wo' tak aweh je' ricab i no'jbal xca'n cho take aj k'orol c'uhbal najtir k'i̱j re' xik'oric cho reh take k'oric rik'orom cho i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s . Je' re' cha'n tak maj re' take re' ru̱c' k'uni̱l xquicuy ransil ti'c'axic xchalic chi quina̱ .

Chipam aj i k'i̱j nac'ulurok take wili , re' xa hab pa' wach queh aj niminel reh Lok' laj Ajabe̱s eripahkaj reh pan ti̱j chi enco'ljic , xa re' wo' re' narirakam rico'lbal , nqui Dios , nqui rik'orom cho ma' Johel .

Je' aj wili lok'onic xca'n : “ Til aj coric i k'oric wili chawi̱j i hat : Chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom xa re' wo' hat til rira'il rinimal wach ajawric , rira'il no'jbal , rira'il cuse'sbal , rira'il ansil eh re' wo' hat manlic wach k'atoj k'oric na'n . Ru'um reh chi'nchel re're' , chac'ul alok'il , chac'ul alok'onjic eh je' wo' chac'ul atioxjic . Chi'nchel take k'oric chawi̱j wili , til coric take , nqui take .

Je' wo' chic hat-tak chi'nchel ehq'uenbe̱s aj niminel reh Jesus til nik'or wo' aweh tak chi re' axoyba̱l nacoj tak , ma' riban nchel chi xa chawi̱j tak wilic lok chi xa xoybal reh ati'jolal tak je' ricab chi xa holohic chic ritik'injic rixihiric wach ana̱ tak , re' ricojoric chawalak tak je' wo' ricojoric chaxiquin tak take k'an woric laj ch'ihch' tik'imaj chi xoybal eh je' wo' re' ricojoric take holohic laj tz'ih xa q'uih chic quitz'akil ,

Je' re' nok ru'um chi wilic awu̱c' rUxlabal i Dios ma' tiq'uix'ic chi rik'ormojic ribiral ric'uhbal i Jesus . Je' wo' , ma' tiq'uix'ic chi k'oric chiwi̱j i hin chi wilqui̱n pan che̱' ru'um reh rik'ormojic rik'orbal i Jesus . Wi xc'ulic wo' nchel lok i ti'c'axic chana̱ , ma' tiyo'jic wo' chiwach , ticholok la' ricuyuric je' wo' ricab ricuyuric ti'c'axic c'ahchi' nibanam i hin ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus . Re' Dios wilic rajawric eh ru̱c' rajawric re're' riban chi re' hat enacuy ransil i ti'c'axic .

eh chi to'bal queh , re' hin c'ahchi' wo' nik'ahsam wi̱b chi rinimjic i lok' laj camanic xayew wi̱n reh chi re' take c'acharel re're' ewo' nquik'ahsaj qui̱b chi rinimjic i lok' laj camanic re' naquik'orom wi̱' ricorquilal queh take toco̱m chic c'acharel .

Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi c'achlic ok awach tak eh ticowjok wo' tak pan animinic tak maj re' Dios ma' nponic ta chiwach nic' wach i c'acharic c'ahchi' abanam tak . Je' re' k'uru' re' animinic tak re' nc'utunic chi xa quimic chic reh , chayew tak ricowil chi manlic .
Chiri̱j aj ru' , re' ro̱x raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xo̱j richihca̱j i wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc china̱ take ro̱k ha' , je' wo' chi quina̱ take rasbal ha' eh chi'nchel re're' ximikric quic' .

Je' wo' chic ru'um reh rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j chaj bih rik'orom cho i Dios , re' Jesus xic'uhtaj keh nic' wach ric'uluric rato'bil i Dios naka'nam eh chi wilic chi kana̱ i rato'bil re' cow ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux , re' hoj yu'na chi xa suk chic kac'ux c'ahchi' kuy'em i k'i̱j nakehtric wi̱' rinimal wach rilok'il i Dios .

Re' riwi̱' chi xnik'or je aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak i c'oyomal , on yibel wach no'jbal ru'um chi re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak chi xa hab wach c'acharel re' riban xa chi'nchel wach c'oyomal ch'i̱l wo' ribanaric take yibel wach laj no'jbal , ma'xta rehtric wih'ic chi ri'sil rajawric i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , re' til Dios wo' nok wilic . Re' aj c'axol wach bihomal je' wo' re' naric'ulum ru'um nok re' pa' bih ric'ax wach , ricoj chiwach chi je' na chic ritiyo̱x maj re' chic re' rich'ica̱' wi̱' ric'ux .

Je' wo' chic , re' ma' Awraham til wo' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios . Ru'um aj re' naxk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios chi narojic c'acharok chipam jenaj ye'a̱b re' nariye'eric reh chi rico̱ch , re're' xic'u'lej na̱ ojic eh xelic je chipam ritinami̱t to̱b ta ma' reht'alim ta haj c'ahchi' rojic .

Je' wo' chic , ma̱xohc'saj awi̱b tak ru'um nok re're' etiric'am tak je pan rehreh wach c'ahbilal , re' la' hat-tak chayew awi̱b tak chirehquen rajawric i Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi re're' enbehsenic reh ac'acharic tak .

Cu'um queh aj tijinel re're' q'uih wo' take c'acharel naquik'ahsam qui̱b chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal re' enquilow chi nca'n take aj tijinel re're' eh ru'um reh ribanaric take c'ahbilal , narik'ormojic take i ma' holohic ta laj k'oric chiri̱j i coric laj tijbal k'oro̱j chiri̱j ric'uhbal i Jesus .

Re' rehtalil chi re' Jesus xiban chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' , re' i wili : Re' hoj ca'ch'uk nak chi tinamit kawi̱' , yu'na echic riban chi ekojk'oric ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chi kawach xa ru'um reh i Lok' laj rUxlabal .

Chiri̱j ru' je' wo' chic wili xquik'or reh ma' Lu̱' : « Re' hat ma' ticapewenic chiqui̱j take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xiniminic reh Jesus maj re' hoj xkatz'ihmbaj chic je queh re' tik'inic wach no'jbal xka'n wili : ‹ To̱b ta ma'xta animem tak chi'nchel i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , re' hoj nka̱j chi xa re' ti take wili chanimej tak : Ma̱wuq'uej tak chic riquiq'ue̱l jeno' chicop , on ma̱c'ux chic tak ritibquilal jeno' chicop k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach tiyo̱x , on jeno' chicop xa biyo̱j chi ralak . Je' wo' , ma̱ban tak chic c'oyomal , nqui xkatz'ihmbaj je , nqui take reh ma' Lu̱' .

Je' re' k'uru' naxik'ahsaj cok i tumi̱n re're' je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um ma' Luch : « Anani̱yas , k'e̱' c'ahbil ano'jbal . Re' hat xayew riye'a̱b aj Yahm pan awa̱mna ru̱c' chi xachuc k'oric chiwach i Lok' laj Uxlabal eh je' wo' chi c'ahchi' achucum k'oric yu'na ru̱c' ricanabjic cho awu̱c' i nic' pa' q'uihal i tumi̱n xawesaj lok ru̱c' ritz'akil aye'a̱b xac'ayej je . Re' xa'n re're' ma' holohic ta

Je' aj re' ritik'a̱b cho wach i Dios reh chi re' hoj aj niminel ma'eta chic koj-jot'oric ru̱c' toco̱m chic chucuj laj tijbal je' ricab nbanaric cu̱c' take ha'lac'un chi xa suk ti naquijot'oric , on reh chi ma' xa ta e̱ enkak'or ru̱c' ric'uluric take chucuj laj c'uhbal nquik'or take chucul aj c'uhbalanel re' xa ch'u̱b chic wach i k'oric nca'n chi jot'oj tak capew-bal .

Haj xayew aweh tak i k'oric k'oro̱j cho aweh tak chi re' take ma' coric ta wach quino'jbal ma'xta coquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric ? Xiq'uic na ti pan ac'ux tak ? Til c'olok pan ac'ux tak k'uru' i k'oro̱j chic cho aweh tak re're' eh ma̱coj tak wach chaj bih chic jeno' toco̱m laj c'uhbal chiwach i c'uhtumaj aweh tak . Je' re' nik'or je aweh tak maj aweht'alim tak chic chi coric chi ma'xta coquic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric re' take c'acharel re' je' wili quiwi̱' : Re' c'oyomal riban ru'um chi xa tunlic chi c'acharic , re' aj ye'ol quilok'il take tiyo̱x , re' rich'uwa'rsaj wach ricaxa̱ra ru̱c' banoj c'oyomal , re' take nca'n i c'oyomal chi quich winak qui̱b on chi quich ixok qui̱b .

Je' wo' , re' take kamoloj i̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios ma' nacana̱' tak ribanaric . Je' re' nik'or maj wilic chic take c'ahchi' quicana̱b qui̱b , raj i hoj ma' nka'n tak keh je' ricab nca'n ru' , kayew la' tak ricowil kac'ux chi kibil ki̱b chi ritikiric ju' kaniminic . Til je' re' ra̱j banaric maj yu'na xa ma' naht ta chic wilic rik'ijil ric'ulic lok i kAja̱w .

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um nok chi ri'sil chic rajawric i Jesus c'acharic na'n tak , til nik'or je aweh chi chawesaj tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux c'ahbil laj no'jbal je' ricab take wili : Re' c'oyomal , re' ch'uwa'rsanic i̱b ru̱c' c'ahbil laj capew-bal , re' suksunic i̱b ru̱c' ribanaric on ric'axaric wach take ra̱j ma' ra̱j banaric , re' ribanaric i chaj bih ric'ax wach kati'jolal , ch'i̱l wo' i ric'axaric wach bihomal re' no̱j cahnok chi je' na ricab i mahc chi lok'onic tiyo̱x maj ma' re' ta chic chiri̱j i Dios wilic ca̱mna .

Re' hoj k'uru' re' sakom wach kojbanic , ma' nka'n je' ricab nca'n take nkajic quiwiric nok c'ahchi' que̱b chi cha'janic , xa uyunic la' ok wo' riban kacapew-bal chiri̱j i k'i̱j k'oro̱j lok re're' maj xa chi je' re' nakawih'ic chi tikilco̱j ru̱c' ric'ulic lok i k'i̱j re're' je' ricab ritik'a̱' ri̱b jeno' sol naricoj i ch'ihch' laj tz'ih chi' ric'ux co'lbal reh riti'jolal , on je' ricab naricoj ripune̱t ch'ihch' chi co'lbal reh rina̱ . Je' re' k'uru' wi ch'iclic chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus , je' wo' re' katik tak ju' ric'axaric take kas kacha̱k' eh chi katik wo' ju' ruyu'njic chi ch'iclic kac'ux i kaco'lbal nariyeb keh Jesus maj wi je' re' nka'n ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hoj tikilco̱j chic ru̱c' ric'ulic lok i k'i̱j re're' .

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi wilic chic ku̱c' rUxlabal i Dios ma' riban ta chi enwih'ic yo'jic pan ka̱mna . Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' nik'or reh chi re' kAja̱w Dios xiyew cho keh rUxlabal reh chi re' hoj ma'xta bih nakayo'jic wi̱' . Je' wo' , re' rUxlabal i Dios xye'eric wo' cho keh reh chi nariwih'ic kajawric , reh chi nakac'axam wo' ki̱b cu̱c' take kich aj niminel eh chi nariwih'ic kano'jbal reh chi je' re' nkarak chiri̱j nic' wach c'acharic naka'nam .

Je' re' nok wi hab wach rik'or chi re're' reht'alim rino'jbal i Jesus eh ma' ric'am ta na̱ chi'nchel haj wilic rik'or riC'uhbal i Dios chi naribanaric , re' aj k'orol re're' ncahnic chi xa aj chucul k'oric . Ru̱c' re're' ma' c'ahchi' ta wo' ribanam je' ricab rik'or i coric laj c'uhbal .

Ru'um aj chi'nchel re're' , re' hin k'e̱' nansukbic nic'ux awu̱c' tak , xa re' la' reh chi enmanlajic wach risukquil nic'ux nipahkaj aweh tak chi ticapewenok tak chiri̱j animinic chi xa jenaj wach riwi̱' acapew-bal tak . Je' wo' , nipahkaj aweh tak chi chac'ax awi̱b tak chi xa jenaj c'axoj i̱b wilic cho pan awa̱mna tak . Reh aj chi na̱banam tak i pahkanic niban je aweh tak curman chi na̱wih'ic tak chi xa jenaj wach riwi̱' acapew-bal tak eh chi xa jenaj wach ac'ux tak .
Naxik'or i Jesus take k'oric re're' wilic take c'acharel xca̱j nak quichopom chi naquicansam nak , xa re' la' ma' hab ta wo' wach xchopbic reh ru'um nok ja' nponic ta rik'ijil chi naricansjic je .

Je' wo' , chak'or queh take niminel wilic quibihomal re're' chi ca'n i coric eh nic' pa' wach nok chi wilic quibihomal je' ok wo' re' take chi ribanaric i holohic laj to'bonic . Chak'or wo' queh chi chak'lam ok take cu̱c' cas quicha̱k' eh xa ye'lic ok quik'ab ru̱c' i pa' bih wilic queh
Re' take re' je' wili xquic'u'lej wi̱' : « Re' winak wili mahc xiban . Wi ta nak ma' re' ru̱c' ma' holohic ta wach ribano̱j , ma' xkak'ahsaj ta nak aweh , nqui take .

Je' re' nik'or maj re' ncapewenic chi k'e̱' lo̱k' jeno' k'i̱j chiwach take toco̱m chic k'i̱j , pa ricapew-bal wilic cho riye'eric rilok'il i Dios chipam i k'i̱j re're' . Tz'a̱b ru' re' ncapewenic reh chi chi'nchel i k'i̱j jenaj wach quilok'il , chi'nchel wo' k'i̱j riyew rilok'il i Dios . Je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel re' ricapaj chi ma' nmahcanic ta ru̱c' i xa pa' jaric c'uxbal nye'eric reh , re're' riye'eric wo' rilok'il i Dios wilic cho pa ricapew-bal on ru̱c' i c'acharel re' ricapaj chi wilic take c'uxbal ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric , re're' ritioxej wo' johtok i Dios nok ma' ric'ux ta i c'uxbal ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric chi reh .

Nok nchalic ti'c'axic chana̱ tak , niyew tak ano'jbal chi ticuyunok tak chipam eh xa suk ok wo' ac'ux tak chi ritikiric ju' ruyu'njic i holonquilal bano̱j naribanam i Dios awu̱c' tak . Xa eli̱c ok wo' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ti̱j .

Chi je' re' , xik'or wo' reh c'amol quibe̱h take sol chi naricha'jaljic wo' chic i ma' Lu̱' chipam i pa̱t xesmejic cho wi̱' , xa re' la' je' wili wo' xk'ormojic je reh c'amol quibe̱h sol re're' : « Re' ma' Lu̱' chayew tak k'ab reh chi naric'ulic k'o'rjok cu'um take ti' qui'ic'rinic reh . Je' wo' , naquic'olok lok take rula̱' re're' chayew wo' tak k'ab queh chi naquic'amam cok pa' bih reh , reh chi enwih'ic chi suk , nqui xik'or .

Je' re' k'uru' re' wilic i c'axoj i̱b pa ra̱mna ricuy ransil take pa' bih ti' nbanaric reh , ricoj wach i k'oric riban i Dios , xa ch'iclic wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i ras richa̱k' chi naribanam i coric eh xa wilic wo' rik'uni̱l chi ricuyuric take c'axquilal .

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta wilic ti'c'axic chi kana̱ , re' hoj xa nkatik wo' ju' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh ru'um re' ma' nkacana̱' ta rik'ormojic ric'uhbal . Re' kacapew-bal wili riban jenaj wach ch'i̱l i tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chi je' wili : “ Re' hin til niyew nic'ux chi rinimjic i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' niban re' hin ma' nicana̱' ta rik'ormojic ribiral , nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho .

Je' wo' chic , nkapahkaj wo' je aweh tak chi chak'il tak take xa k'eboj k'i̱j nca'n , chayew tak quino'jbal chi coric eh re' take nyoj quic'ux chi niminic chayew wo' tak ricowil quic'ux . Je' wo' , chato'bej tak take ma' cow ta quic'ux pan niminic , re' cok ru' wilic ok ak'unil tak chi ribanaric take k'ilo̱j na̱banam tak cu̱c' take awich aj niminel tak re're' .

Je' re' k'uru' re' ro̱' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xo̱j richihca̱j i wilic chipam ch'ihch' culc ar china̱ i tz'uka̱b re' wilic wi̱' chi tak'anic i ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal eh nok re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch je' re' xiban , re' take c'acharel re' quic'ulum chic i ma' laj chicop re're' chi quik'atal k'oric xicahnic pan k'ekom . Ru'um reh ti'c'axic re're' , re' take c'acharel xiban chi xa nquitiw chic nah ca̱k' ru'um riti'quil c'ahchi' quic'ulum .

Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak re' c'acharic chic na'n tak je' ricab rik'or i k'oric xnik'or lok wili , re' ok i sukquil c'uxlis ch'i̱l i riquetelbal i Dios wih'ok chana̱ hat-tak , re' hat-tak chic yuk'umaj chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios je' ricab nok wilque̱b wo' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel .

Re' Apo̱los wili , to̱b ta xa cu re' pe ti kahsanic ha' je' ricab rik'orom i Wa̱n reht'alim , xa ji̱k' chic pa ric'ux chi c'uhtunic , p'uht ric'uhbalem chi coric i nic' pa' nimal c'uhtumaj reh chiri̱j Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Nc'ambic je Be̱h ru̱c' i Dios .

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak yu'na , wi re' hat-tak na̱banam awa' aha̱' tak on xa pa' bih jeno' bano̱j nawa̱j abanam tak , cha'n tak chi'nchel reh ok chi nariye'eric rilok'il i Dios ru̱c' quik'orbal take qui'ilbic aweh tak .

Re' take re' til nca̱j nak ajot'oric chipam animinic tak xa re' la' hin ch'iclic nic'ux chi re' hat-tak ma' eta tijot'oric tak chipam animinic tak maj re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios ye'o̱j aweh tak wilic pan awa̱mna tak chi awaj tijinel tak eh chi je' re' ma' curman ta chic chaweh tak chi hab ta nak wach jeno' chucul aj tijinel entijinic aweh tak . Chi je' aj re' nik'or je aweh tak , chatik tak ju' ric'amaric na̱ haj wilic i tiritijej tak wi̱' i Lok' laj Uxlabal maj re' Lok' laj Uxlabal , re're' nk'oric aweh tak nic' pa' nimal take tijinic naricamanic reh animinic tak eh chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal ric'uhtaj aweh tak , til coric ma' re' ta nchel xa chucuj k'oric .

Je' re' ajic ru̱c' take k'oric wili , re' hin nwa̱j nicohlam wach nik'orbal chiri̱j xnik'or lok re're' : Je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel nquimic je ma'xta chic camaj chi wilic cho riti'jolal ribakil nok ma' wilic ta chic i uxlabal ru̱c' , je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel re' rik'or chi aj niminel reh Jesus . Je' re' nik'or maj wi ma' ric'uhtaj lok ru̱c' ribano̱j chi til coric chi je' re' , xa ma'xta bih camanel reh i rik'ormojic riban .
Nok rik'orom chic re're' , re' ma' Lu̱' xichop johtok riwa' riha̱' eh xitioxej johtok reh i Dios . Nok rich'akam chic yejal , p'uht ric'uxum chi quiwach chi'nchel take wilque̱b ar .

re' la' ka'n tak katz'ihmbaj je jeno' hu̱j re' enkak'or je wi̱' queh chi je' wili : ‹ Ma̱ban tak chic aweh take xa je' na ricab jeno' mahc chi quiwach take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab ribanaric take wili : Re' ruc'jic riquiq'ue̱l jeno' chicop , on re' ric'uxuric ritibquilal jeno' chicop k'ahsamaj chiwach tiyo̱x , on re' ric'uxuric jeno' chicop biyo̱j chi ralak . Je' wo' ma̱ban tak chic ribanaric i c'oyomal , nqui katz'ihmbaj je queh pan hu̱j .

Re' ma' Lu̱' je' wo' chic wili xik'or : « Re' hat ajabe̱s re' cojo̱j chi rich'ukuric k'oric chi nina̱ ru̱c' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , re' hat je' acab tz'ak reh jeno' pa̱t xa chu̱n chic npoybic wach chi xa q'uisi̱n ma' nk'ehbic je . Je' re' awi̱' chi niwach maj ru̱c' chi xatak'a̱' cho ripereric wach we̱ c'ahchi' apoyom wach chi re' hat ma' nanimej ta i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses . Je' ricab nantuhyjic cok i tz'ak reh jeno' pa̱t nesmejic lok wach sakom chi xa q'uisi̱n po' nak chic ma' nk'ehbic je , re' ok wo' i Dios esenok lok wach sakom chi re' hat ma' c'ahchi' ta animem i c'uhbal re're' , nqui reh nahsil aj k'ahsem si̱ .

Ru'um chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi kaK'atal K'oric nco'lonic keh , re' wo' wili nik'or aweh tak yu'na chi nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj raj tahkanel : Ru'um chi kojc'acharic chi ma' chopo̱j ta kana̱ ru'um i no'jbal re' wilic wi̱' i ritutil i mahc re' la' chic i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' chic re' nchopbic kana̱ , re' hoj ma' wilic ta chic i ti'c'axic chi kana̱ re' narichalic nak chi kana̱ ru'um kamahc .

Ma' xa re' ta re' , je' la' wo' ma' eta chic kojyo'jic chiwach i k'i̱j re're' maj keht'alim chic chi re' Dios xitik'a̱' wach chi ma' re' ta hoj nakac'ulbic reh i ti'c'axic naritak'a̱b cho ru'um reh rijosk'il china̱ quimahc take aj mahc . Chiri̱j chic lok re're' , re' hoj keht'alim chic chi re' Dios xitik'a̱' wach chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , xco'lonic keh chiwach i ti'c'axic re're' .

Ar aj ru' re're' narojic chi ribanaric riman quijot'oric take c'acharel ma' re' ta take aj niminel reh chi ma' eta nquicoj wach i coric eh chi je' re' , re' take re' ch'i̱l i jenaj k'atal k'oric “ C'ow ” ribihnal re' nk'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ aj Mac'ow naquimolom qui̱b chi k'ak'anic ru̱c' i Jesus eh til wo' chic k'e̱' q'uihal take sol naquiwih'ic cu̱c' chi naca'nam chi xa je' chic ricab riq'uihal nak' wach sani̱b chi chi̱' i ma' laj ha' .

Najtir cho k'i̱j nok cu ja' nanimej ta tak i kAja̱w Jesus , wilic aweh tak re' nak re' no'jbal na'n tak cho ribanaric xa re' la' yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' c'acharic na'n tak ru'um nok re' kAja̱w Dios xitz'aj chic wach awa̱mna tak je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel re' xiban chic riti̱n sak chic riban . Je' wo' chic , re' Dios xatricoj tak jenaj chi quixilac take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n re' sak chic wach quic'acharic eh re' tojbal wach mahc wilic nak chana̱ tak ru'um i mahc na'n tak xesaj chic chana̱ tak . Chi'nchel re're' xiban i kaDios ru'um chi hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban je' la' wo' xitak'a̱' cho i Lok' laj rUxlabal ku̱c' reh chi narisaksam wach i kacapew-bal eh chi je' re' enponic chiwach i c'acharic enka'n .

Ru'um aj re' yu'na re' hin c'ahchi' nic'ulum take xa chi'nchel wach ti'c'axic . Je' ricab yu'na re' hin wilqui̱n pan che̱' , xa re' la' ma' quinq'uix'ic ta so' chi rik'ormojic chaj wa'ric nok wilqui̱n ayu' ru'um nok weht'alim hab wach aj u̱c' choplic nic'ux eh chi re' choplic wi̱' nic'ux re're' til wilic rajawric chi manlic . Ru̱c' re're' , til weht'alim wo' chi cu rehtal rirak cho rik'ijil ric'ulic lok i kAja̱w Jesus , re're' naricholic wo' ric'oloric ri̱j i pa' bih xwokxo'nej pan k'ab .

Je' wo' ati̱j tak camanok aweh tak chi peletenic eh chi behsemaj acapew-bal tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal , xa c'ahchi' ok wo' ca̱t-tak chi ti̱j chiwach i Dios eh chipam ati̱j tak re're' chapahkaj tak reh chi etirito'bej tak cho . Xa ic'lic ok wo' ana̱ tak chi ti̱j chiwach i Dios k'uru' eh ma̱cana̱' wo' tak ti̱j chiqui̱j take chi'nchel kich aj niminel .

Re' hin ma' Lu̱' chi c'ahchi'qui̱n quihch'ilem i ma' Si̱las ch'i̱l i Timote̱yo , c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak comonil aj niminel aj Tesalo̱nica re' choplic ac'ux tak ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios je' wo' chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Nok c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili , nipahkaj johtok pa niti̱j chi re' ta wo' nak kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Jesus to'bonok cho aweh tak eh chiyew ta wo' nak cho rinimal suk laj c'uxlis pan awa̱mna tak .
Je' wo' , til c'uhtunok wo' lok ru̱c' ano'jbal tak chi hat-tak chak'lam cu̱c' chi'nchel , ru'um chi re' Jesus xa wilic wo' ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel .

Ru̱c' take k'oric wilic k'uru' re' hin nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi jarpech pa' na̱c'uxum tak i caxlan wi'c eh na̱wuq'uem tak i ri̱s u̱wa chi lok'onbal wach i Dios , ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' rik'ormojic awu'um tak queh take c'acharel ribiral riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus eh je' re' riwi̱' chaweh tak chi na̱banam tak cu rehtal nasoljok wo' chic cho rica'pech .

Til nik'or aweh tak , chi re're' naribanam chi re' yowa̱b enuctic cho chi ma'xta chic riya'bilal , re' cok ru' reh chi je' re' enc'uluric ru̱c' i yowa̱b re're' , curman chi re' take aj nahsil enca'n quiti̱j chi ch'iclic quic'ux chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s wilic rajawric chi resmejic riya'bilal i c'acharel re're' . Wi je' re' enca'n , ma' xa ta re're' enc'uluric ru̱c' i yowa̱b re're' , je' la' wo' wi re're' ribanam jeno' mahc , ewo' ncuyuric rimahc wi chipam i junc'am re're' eripahkaj wo' ricuybal .

Re' Dios xquilok'ej cho wach take kama̱m kati't re' wo' re' i nilok'ej wach i hin chi ma'xta bih jeno' encojbic nimahc pa nicapew-bal . Chiwach aj i Dios re're' , re' hin xa eli̱c wo' k'i̱j ak'ab niban johtok niti̱j eh xa c'ahchi' wo' nitioxonic johtok chiwach chawi̱j i hat re' xa wilca̱t wo' pa nic'ux naniban niti̱j .

Re' take c'acharel re're' je' wili nquik'or chi cow nok c'ahchi' quisiq'uim nic' wach rico'ljic qui̱b naca'nam : « Re' ta nak take abaj wili camanok chi c'olbal keh reh chi ma' eta kojrilow i tz'uklic chipam i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric eh reh wo' chi re' C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' ma' eta kojrirak chi riye'eric ti'c'axic chi kana̱ re' nariyeb cho ru'um reh chi kojrixowej chi hoj aj mahc . Je' aj re' nkapahkaj

Re' xk'oric wu̱c' wili , re' wo' re' nk'oric reh chi xa hab wach enbirinic reh take k'oric wili curman wo' chi reh chi ericoj rehtal chi coric i k'oro̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal queh take ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios . Re're' rik'or wo' chi re' c'acharel re' riyew pa ro̱k ribanaric i c'ahbilal , enye'eric reh chi naric'uxum reh i wi'c c'olo̱j cho re' “ Manah ” ribihnal eh na wo' riye'eric reh i jenaj t'uch sak laj abaj tz'ihmbimaj jenaj ac' laj bihnal chiwach re' ma' hab ta wach neht'alanic reh , xa re' la' wo' naric'ulbic reh nareht'alanic reh .

Je' wo' chic , re' take aj tijinel re're' xa aj sahc' tumi̱n take eh ru'um re' enquik'or aweh tak take k'oric re' xa miksimaj cho wach pan quicapew-bal reh chi nanabiraj hat-tak nayew tak atz'a̱k queh . Ru'um reh nic' nimal nca'n ribanjic , re' take aj tijinel re're' narichalic rinimal ti'c'axic chi quina̱ re' k'oro̱j wo' chic cho ribiral ru'um i Dios najtir k'i̱j

Je' re' nok ru'um reh quino'jbal take tinamit re're' , re' Dios nariyeb k'ab chi jenaj chic ma' tob laj uxlabal k'e̱' nimal rajawric narichalic chi jot'o̱l quicapew-bal take c'acharel re' naribanam chi q'uihal take tinamit re're' nacoquic chi ricojoric wach take chucuj laj c'uhbal nquibiraj .

Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak na'n tak je' ricab rik'or chipam i hu̱j tz'ihmbaj cahnok ru'um raj k'orol i Dios re' Isayi̱yas ribihnal re' rik'or wi̱' chi je' wili : « Awu'um aweh hat-tak , re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa c'ahbil laj k'oric chic nquik'or chiri̱j i Dios nanquibiraj ribiral , nqui rik'or .

Re' la' chic nquic'u'lej na̱ i quic'uhtunic take c'acharel re're' , re' ma' c'ulu̱j ta chic take ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t take eh moysomaj chic pa̱m i quino'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j i riC'uhbal i Dios . Til nik'or aweh chi re' take c'acharel re're' ru'um chi nquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i kac'uhbal , nca'n queh je' ricab xca'n take quib chi winak aj war je' wili quibihnal : Re' Ja̱nes ch'i̱l i Ja̱mres . Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re're' xquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i Moyses najtir k'i̱j naxik'oric ru̱c' i quik'atal k'oric aj Eji̱pto chi ma' ric'u'lej na̱ rino'jbal i Moyses .

Re' hin naniyeb cho aweh tak take no'jbal re're' ru'um i wili : Wi re' take c'acharel re' k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj take ma' nquijal ta wach quino'jbal , re' hin ninak take eh nik'il wo' take ru̱c' ti'c'axic . Je' re' k'uru' reh chi ma' eta niban ti'c'axic aweh tak nipahkaj aweh tak chi chajal wach ano'jbal tak eh chiri̱j ok chic i Dios chayew ac'ux tak chi manlic .

Chi ribanam chic i Dios chi kojc'acharic chi cuyu̱j chic kamahc ru'um reh rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i xik'or ru' , re' Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric riban chi enwih'ic sukquilal pan ka̱mna chiwach i Dios .

Ma' xa re' ta re're' , ticuyunok la' wo' chipam chi'nchel xnik'or aweh reh chi re' hat ch'i̱l wo' take nic' pa' nimal naquibirinic aweh etico'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic riyew i Dios ru'um reh mahc . Ru'um aj re' nik'or wo' aweh chi chacoj rehtal i wili : Re' pa' bih c'uhtunic na'n je' ok wo' re' c'acharic c'ahchi'ca̱t .

Je' wo' , q'uih pech xniban chi xbanjic ti'c'axic queh aj niminel quirakmajic take pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh je' re' xniban maj re' nak nwa̱j chiqui̱j chi xquicana̱' ta nak rinimjic i Jesus . « Chi je' re' ajic nok xnip'ut chic ojic pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit chi quichoporic take aj niminel ru'um reh rinimal nic'a̱ xjohtic cho chiqui̱j ,

Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chi re' take wili quic'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi chopo̱j kana̱ ru'um i mahc : Re' ch'uwa'rsanic wach caxarahil ru̱c' c'oyomal , re' tununic i̱b chi ma' re' ta pan caxarahil , re' tununic i̱b chi quich winak qui̱b , on chi quich ixok qui̱b , re' yibel wach no'jbal chi itowonic tak ixok on itowonic tak winak .

Je' aj re' nik'or maj re' c'acharel np'utbic reh c'uhbal ch'i̱l re' ntikbic ju' rik'ormojic c'uhbal ma'xta cajawric chi equiniminic take c'acharel , re' la' nbanic chi re' take c'acharel quiniminic , re' i kAja̱w Dios ru'um nok re' wilic rajawric chi ribanaric re're' .

Je' wo' , re' Dios xiban chi re' take bano̱j riban i Lok' laj Uxlabal , ma'xta chic jeno' queh ma' ta nak xye'eric wo' aweh tak chi ribanaric . Chi aweht'alim tak chic chi'nchel re're' , re' hat-tak yu'na wilca̱t tak chi ic'lic ana̱ tak chi ruyu'njic nachic'uhtaj wo' chic cho ri̱b i kAja̱w Jesus , re' Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱ .

Chiri̱j chic re' xnibiraj jenaj ahnic ar pan taxa̱j . Re' ahnic re're' xa je' chic ricab cowil ahnic riban i ha' nank'ehbic cho wach sak rehp on xa je' chic ricab nk'oric cho jenaj cow laj cohok . Re' ahnic xnibiraj wili xa je' chic ricab take tz'uyunic riban i a̱rpa nank'ojmojic cu'um take aj k'ojonel reh .

re' aj re' xk'ormojic cahnok ribiral cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios najtir cho k'i̱j naxquik'or cho chi re' ye'o̱j cho rajawric chi K'atal K'oric , re're' naricuybic wo' rimahc i xa hab wach narich'ica̱b ric'ux chiri̱j , nqui rik'or i c'uhbal re're' , nqui ma' Luch .

« Re' take wili quic'acharok chi junelic , nqui narik'orom . Je' aj re' narik'orom queh c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' xquicana̱' ta ribanaric i coric wach c'acharic . Re' take c'acharel re' je' re' xca'n , xa re' chic c'ahchi' quicapam chiri̱j i quiwih'ic ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' ma' jaruj ta chic nariwih'ic wi̱' quimic . Je' wo' , xa c'ahchi' wo' quicapewenic chiri̱j i quiwih'ic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios chi sutumaj ri̱j ru̱c' risakomil rilok'il . Je' wo' , quicapewenic nca'n chiri̱j ribirmijic take holohic laj k'oric rik'or cho i Dios queh take quic'acharic pan holonquilal .

Re' hin ma' Wa̱n c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je hu̱j wili aweh hat-tak re' wuku̱b ch'uk chi aj niminel re' namola̱' awi̱b tak chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios ar pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya . Tinic'alenej tak je ru̱c' niti̱j niban chi je' wili : Re' hat Ajabe̱s Dios , re' hat Ajabe̱s Jesus eh hat Ajabe̱s Lok' laj Uxlabal , nipahkaj aweh tak chi ena'n tak chi re' awato'bil tak ch'i̱l i sukquil c'uxlis nayew tak re' ta nak re' wih'ok pan quic'acharic i ju'jun ch'uk chi aj niminel re're' . Re' hat kAja̱w Dios nok ma' ja' natik'a̱' ta cho wach ac'al wili , xa wilca̱t wo' cho , xa wilca̱t wo' yu'na eh xa na wo' awih'ic chi junelic c'acharic . Re' hat Lok' laj Uxlabal re' wilca̱t chi junelic chiwach i kAja̱w Dios re' nk'atbic k'oric china̱ chi'nchel nic' nimal wilic , k'e̱' wo' chic manlic wach ano'jbal wilic , chi wilic wo' awu̱c' i wuku̱b chi manlic wach no'jbal wilic reh i Dios .

re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or queh : « Naxiban cho kahsanic ha' i Wa̱n , je' wili xik'or queh tinamit xquikahsaj quiha̱' naxquijal wach quino'jbal : ‹ Chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i c'uhbalanel c'ulic lok reh chiwi̱j i hin , nqui queh . « Re' c'uhbalanel re're' , re' aj wo' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Chiri̱j aj re' curman chi re' take c'acharel naquich'ica̱b quic'ux , nqui ma' Lu̱' .

Je' aj re' k'uru' chi'nchel take wili riyew rehtal keh chi xa pa' jaric ti'c'axic nc'ulic lok chi quina̱ take quiniminic reh , re' Ajabe̱s Dios til rico'lej take chiwach chi'nchel re're' , ra̱j la' take c'acharel ma' quiniminic ta reh , re' Dios c'ahchi' chic riyeb ti'c'axic chi quina̱ cu rehtal riyew risasil ti'c'axic chi quina̱ chipam i k'i̱j nachik'at k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel take aj mahc .

Xa re' la' ye'a̱b re're' , re' k'e̱' nak xca̱j wi̱' wih'ic k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal chiwach xa pa' tinamit wilic ayu' wach ac'al . Til je' re' riwi̱' maj til ar wilic ru̱c' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j . Je' re' nok re' take c'acharel re're' wilic quiye'a̱b ar chipam i xitik'a̱' i Dios ar pan taxa̱j chi naquic'acharic ru̱c' . Je' re' xiban ru'um chi k'e̱' suk ric'ux nok wilic cu̱c' ru'um nok re' take re' ma' xquicana̱' ta rik'ormojic chi re' aj re' i Dios nquilok'ej wach .

Chiri̱j lok wili ma̱coj ru̱c' acapew-bal take xa pa' bih take c'uhtunic chiri̱j i xa tik'imaj wach ribiral on xa memil laj no'jbal , re' la' hat xa chiri̱j ok wo' no'jbal nye'bic rilok'il i Dios chayew ac'ux reh chi je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ayeb ac'ux chi rik'ochjic wach ati'jolal , enatik ju' awih'ic chi cow ac'ux pan niminic .

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take c'acharel re're' , xquinuksaj wach ac'al eh naxichalic ar Jerusalen re' tinamit k'e̱' ti' nic'rinjic ru'um i Dios xquisutej ri̱j eh je' wo' re' xbanjic queh take lok' laj aj niminel wilque̱b chipam , xa re' la' ru' na xca'n chi je' re' xkajic cho chi quina̱ jenaj k'a̱k' ar pan taxa̱j eh xic'atjic take raj ixowonel i Dios re're' .

Chi je' re' xpahkaljic queh chi naquikahsam quiha̱' chi naca'nam chi raj tahkanel chic Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' aj re' ru' nok kajanak chic quiha̱' , re' take ac' aj niminel re're' xquipahkaj reh ma' Luch chi naricahnic quib xib ok k'i̱j chi quixilac chi ula'anic ch'i̱l take rich'i̱l .

til cow na̱pahba̱b ac'ux tak chi ricapewjic chi je' ricab nok re' take sot' curman chi wilic jeno' nc'ambic je quibe̱h , re' hat-tak nacapaj wo' tak chi wilca̱t tak chi c'amol quibe̱h take ja' nquitijej ta qui̱b chiri̱j i Dios . Je' wo' chic , re' hat-tak nacapaj tak chi je' ricab nok re' sakom ncamanic reh chi naquibehic chi coric take wilque̱b pan k'ekom , re' hat-tak wilca̱t wo' tak chi sakomonel pa̱m quino'jbal take c'acharel ru̱c' i tijinic na'n tak .
Ma' xa ta re're' , wi la' xatniminic tak chi coric chipam i c'uhbal re're' na̱c'acharic wo' tak chi junelic ar pan taxa̱j maj je' re' rik'orbal riyeb cahnok i Jesus .

Raj la' xa hab wach c'acharel re' ar ru̱c' i Dios nchalic rino'jbal , re' take wili no'jbal nc'uhtunic ru̱c' : Wilic jenaj sak wach no'jbal ru̱c' , c'acharic riban pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take rich c'acharel , wilic richak'lamil eh ma' cow ta wo' na̱ reh take pa' bih . Je' wo' , re're' k'e̱' riquetelej quiwach take rich c'acharel eh q'uihal take riholohic laj bano̱j wilic . Je' wo' chic , re're' xa jenaj wach ric'ux eh til coric wach rino'jbal .
Ma' xa re' ta re' xye'eric reh , ru'um la' wo' chi til k'e̱' ti' nic'rijic ru'um i Ajabe̱s Dios , xye'eric wo' reh chi nariwih'ic rajawric china̱ chi'nchel .

Coric ru' , re' k'oro̱j cahnok ru'um i Dios chiri̱j ric'ulic lok rica'pech i Jesus ma' ja' nc'uluric ta eh ru'um re' wilic take quicapewenic reh chi re' Dios k'e̱' k'u̱n no̱j elok wach i rik'orom cho ribiral chi naribanam . Xa re' la' re' richahmic cho ric'ulic lok rica'pech i Jesus ma' re' ta re' riwi̱' chi je' re' c'ahchi' ric'uluric , c'ahchi' la' ric'uluric chi je' re' ru'um reh rinimal cho rik'uni̱l cu̱c' take je' ru̱c' c'ahbil quino'jbal . Je' re' nik'or maj re' wili riwi̱' chi ma' ja' nc'uluric ta ric'ulic lok rica'pech i Jesus : Re're' ra̱j chi ma' jeno' c'acharel chiri̱j nok camnak chic je ma' eta no̱j pan tojbal wach mahc chi junelic eh ru'um aj wo' re' c'ahchi' ruy'em chi chi'nchel take c'acharel naquiyot'om quic'ux eh naquijalam wach quic'acharic chi naquicana̱b ribanaric i c'ahbil laj no'jbal .

Re' hin wilic jenaj nicapew-bal nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chiri̱j i wih'ic chi utquel i̱b on chiri̱j i c'amoj i̱b . Til pa ricorquil re' hin til k'e̱' nak nwa̱j chi chi'nchel take winak equicahnic chi ma' eta nquisic' quehq'ue̱n je' ricab nok wilqui̱n i hin chi xawutquel wi̱b c'ahchi' nic'acharic , xa re' la' chic nbanic reh chi ju'junal chi c'acharel chi winak chi ixok ye'o̱j cho reh ru'um i Dios i riwi̱' ric'acharic haj wilic tare̱t chi reh nic' wach nac'acharok pan suk laj capew-bal . Ru'um re' , nok jeno' winak on jeno' ixok ra̱j ribanam caxa̱ra re' wo' Dios ncojbic pa ra̱mna chi je' re' naribanam eh re' ma' ra̱j ta risiq'uim rehq'ue̱n re' wo' Dios ncojbic pa ra̱mna chi je' re' naribanam .

Til k'e̱' curman chaweh tak k'uru' chi ma̱cana̱' tak ribanaric i c'axoj i̱b . Je' wo' , til wo' chic chiban ji̱k' ac'ux tak chiri̱j ribanaric take bano̱j re' riyew i Lok' laj Uxlabal keh hoj aj niminel chi naka'nam . Je' wo' , til k'e̱' wo' chic nwa̱j chi chiban ji̱k' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i rik'ormojic take k'oric riyew i Dios chi nareht'aljic cu'um take c'acharel .

Je' re' ajic re' hoj c'ahchi' kak'orom aweh tak i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , ru'um nok re' Dios re' xk'oric cho chi nariwih'ic i sakom re' narisakomonic wo' pan k'ekom , re' wo' re' xsakomsjic pan kacapew-bal i hoj . Je' aj re' k'uru' re' hoj xsakomsjic pa̱m kacapew-bal reh chi re' hoj enkasakomej lok wach i rinimal wach rilok'il i Dios re' xc'uhtunic wo' ru̱c' i Jesus .

Chiwach aj wo' take k'i̱j nok re' ma' Lu̱' xelic je Antiyoqui̱ya , xponic ar pan tinamit E̱peso jenaj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel asjanak ar Alejantri̱ya Apo̱los ribihnal . Re're' ma' ahl ta nech' ok chi̱' chi rik'ormojic i k'oric wilic chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios re' reht'alim pa̱m chi coric .

Je' re' nok je' ricab chi cu ar lok chiri̱j i lok' laj pa̱t re're' nesmejic lok i riti'jolal i chicop ye'o̱j chi si̱ , curman wo' cho chi re' Jesus ar lok chiri̱j i tinamit Jerusalen xichihcaj i riquiq'ue̱l naxquimic chi ribanaric chi hoj chic ritinami̱t i Dios .

Chiri̱j chic take xnik'or lok aweh re're' , yu'na k'uru' nic' pa' nimal xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh chac'uhtaj wo' queh take aj niminel ar Cre̱ta . Chak'or wo' queh chi curman chi re' nic' pa' nimal xquitijej , ca'n wo' ribanaric pan quic'acharic . Hab pa' wach take aj niminel ma' tica̱j ta quibiram , chak'or wo' queh chi curman chi naquijalam wach quino'jbal . Re' hat Ti̱to wilic awajawric chi c'amol quibe̱h take aj niminel ar eh ru'um aj re' nik'or wo' aweh chi cha'n acamaj chi coric reh chi ma' hab ta wach erirak jeno' k'etbal pan abe̱h reh acamaj .

Nic' wach nanc'uhtunic chi re' Dios wilic cho ric'axbal chi kana̱ ? Re' wili nc'utunic wi̱' : Chi re're' xitak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al i Lok' laj rAc'u̱n re' xa jenaj wo' ti chiwach eh je' re' xiban reh chi re' hoj nakac'acharic ru̱c' i Dios chi junelic .

« Yu'na k'uru' wAja̱w Dios , re' chic wili nwa̱j nipahkam aweh : Re' take c'acharel re' xayew take wi̱n chi naqui̱nquihch'ilem , chayew queh chi equiwih'ic wu̱c' ar re' naniwih'ic wo' chic wi̱' i hin . Nipahkaj aj aweh re're' reh chi re' take re' enquilow i rinimal nilok'il xayew wi̱n eh chi cu pa ri'sil wo' cho nok ja' ntik'injic ta wach ac'al wili , xa ti' wo' quinawic'raj cho cu yu'na chi k'i̱j .
Ru'um chi xa pa' ye'a̱b wilque̱b take je' re' c'acharic nca'n , xa chasachlom quicapew-bal take toco̱m chic c'acharel nca'n on nquicojlom ti'quil c'uxlis pan ca̱mna take c'acharel .

Re' hin nik'orom wo' chic aweh tak chi re' Jesus re' rAc'u̱n i Dios xoquic chic chipam ricamaj chi Pe̱t Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ eh chiki̱j i hoj c'ahchi' ribanam i camanic re're' . Je' re' nik'or maj xa re' wo' riponic i Jesus ru̱c' i Dios , re' nim wach i camanic re're' c'ahchi' ribanam chiki̱j . Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi cow kach'ica̱' tak kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus .

Je' re' xc'uluric junpech . Re' hoj xkilow nic' wach nok re' Ajabe̱s Dios xiyew rilok'il i Jesus naxsutjic ri̱j ru̱c' rinimal wach risakomil i Ajabe̱s Dios . Re' wili xk'ormojic reh Jesus ru'um Ajabe̱s Dios re' wilic pa rilok'il chi sutumaj ri̱j ru'um rinimal wach risakomil : « Re' Jesus wili til k'e̱' ti' nwic'raj maj re're' i wAc'u̱n . Je' wo' chic re' wAc'u̱n wili k'e̱' wo' riyew risukquil nic'ux , nqui k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios .

Je' aj re' ru' yohbal wach take bano̱j wilic xa re' la' xa ru̱c' wo' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nchalic ribanaric chi'nchel re're' to̱b ta rehreh wach maj re're' nye'bic reh ju'jun chi c'acharel re' k'orel nic' pa' wach ra̱j riyeb ru' .

Nok re' ricaj aj tz'e' wa̱ch xupej pa̱m rich'ihch' laj su̱b , re' quisakomil i k'i̱j ch'i̱l i poh ch'i̱l wo' take ch'imi̱l xijot' ri̱b . Je' re' xc'uluric cu rehtal re' jenaj reh ro̱x k'at reh rinimal quisakomil i ju'jun queh xichuhpic . Ru'um i re' ma' xc'uhtunic ta chic chi'nchel risakomil i k'i̱j ch'i̱l i poh ch'i̱l wo' take ch'imi̱l pan k'i̱j ak'ab eh chi je' re' xa re' chic jenaj reh ro̱x k'at risakomil riyew i k'i̱j ch'i̱l i poh ch'i̱l wo' take ch'imi̱l riyew cho risakomil chipam k'i̱j ak'ab .

xa re' la' xa ma'xta wo' bih xik'or naxilow chi re' take tinamit re' xquimol qui̱b chiwach i ye'a̱b rik'atbal k'oric , xa junchalic chic take chi richoporic je' wo' chi rich'eyeric i So̱stenes re' rijelow-bal i c'amol be̱h chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses .
Ru'um take k'oric xik'or i Jesus , re' take nahsil re're' xa xca̱j nak chic quichopom xa re' la' ma' xca'n ta canar ru'um xelic je chi quiwach .

Ru'um aj re' , re' hoj ma' nkapoh'aj ta kac'ux eh to̱b ta wo' nchel c'ahchi' roquic cho rirejbic i kati'jolal ru̱c' i camanic c'ahchi'co̱j , wilic jenaj chic ac' c'acharic pan ka̱mna eh re' c'acharic re're' eli̱c i k'i̱j c'ahchi' ri'acsjic wach .

Nok tz'uklic aj chic i Jesus chi wi'c , chalic i Mari̱ya re' richa̱k' i Ma̱rta xo̱j ric'ahmaj junpa̱j je' ru̱c' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m q'uih ritz'akil ru'um tik'imaj ru̱c' rihtz'uba̱l i tic Na̱rto ribihnal eh naxichihcaj ri̱j ro̱k i Jesus xichiksaj wo' chic ru̱c' rismal na̱ . Ru'um aj ik'o̱m re're' , re' pa̱m i pa̱t xiban xa nbukunic chic reh ric'ohonquil .

Je' wo' ar naxwih'ic chipam i ye'a̱b k'oro̱j reh chi nariye'eric reh chi rico̱ch , re' ma' Awraham til xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh ru'um re' xc'acharic ar chi xa iq'ue̱l ti chipam ye'a̱b re're' . Je' re' nik'or maj ma' xitik'a̱' ta jenaj pa̱t re' naricahnic wi̱' chi junpech , xc'acharic la' chipam i perpat re' tik'imaj chi xa tz'ih ri̱j je' ricab wo' c'acharic xitik ju' ribanaric i rac'u̱n re' Isahac ribihnal . Je' wo' chic , re' ma' Isahac ch'i̱l wo' i ma' Jacow , aj c'ulul wo' take reh i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios chi re' ye'a̱b nariponic wi̱' chi c'acharic i ma' Awraham , re' wo' re' nariye'eric queh chi quico̱ch .

Je' re' ajic hat-tak wich aj niminel , chac'am tak tz'eht reh i no'jbal xniban cho chaxilac tak eh chatijej wo' aweh tak i quino'jbal take awich aj niminel tak c'ahchi'que̱b chi c'acharic je' ricab c'acharic xniban cho chaxilac tak . Je' re' nok nipahkam aweh tak chi ma' riban acapew-bal tak je' ricab quino'jbal take chucul laj aj niminel .

Je' wo' , nik'or aweh tak chi c'ul chato'bej awi̱b chawach tak ru̱c' xa chajaric c'axquilal nchalic china̱ jeno' xa hab wach aweh tak maj xa chi je' re' enamimej tak i c'uhbal k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi naric'amaric na̱ .

Je' re' nok ru̱c' ribiral i ma' Awraham , re' hat-tak enarak tak chiri̱j yu'na chi ru̱c' take quibano̱j take c'acharel quicahnic chi sak wach quic'acharic eh chi coric wo' chic wach quic'ux chiwach . Ru'um aj re' ma' manlic ta ti ru̱c' chi re' take c'acharel enquik'or chi aj niminel take reh Jesus xa re' la' ru' ma' nc'uhtunic ta ru̱c' quibano̱j chi je' re' quiwi̱' .

Ha̱' , ru'um xnik'or chi ma' chi kunchelal ta hoj ra̱' ri'sil wo' cho i ma' Awraham wilco̱j chi hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios , wilic take equik'oric chi ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic re're' , re' hin xa je' na nchel c'ahchi' nik'orom chi re' Dios ma' coric ta wach ric'ux . Ma'xta , ma' jaruj eriban chi je' re' enik'or .

Je' re' k'uru' , wi wilic jeno' awich aj niminel tak rehreh wach ricapew-bal chiri̱j i kaniminic ru'um chi cu ja' cow ta ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus , nipahkaj aweh tak chi chac'ul chaxilac tak , ma' toquic tak chi wolic ru̱c' chiri̱j i ricapew-bal .

Chiri̱j chic wili , cu re' chic wi̱n xwilow chi ar pan taxa̱j xtohk'ic jenaj k'ak'anic . Xwilow chi re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' Que̱l ribihnal rich'i̱l take rich aj tz'e' wach xi'oquic chi k'ak'anic ru̱c' i ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' rich'i̱l wo' take aj tz'e' wach quitahkanic reh ru'

Ru'um aj wo' re' nik'or wi hab wach jeno' aweh tak xchalic ric'a̱ , ma' ricana̱' chi re' ric'a̱ enminbic reh pan mahc , chic'raj la' ri̱b chi ma' ric'saj i k'i̱j chi xa cu wilic wo' cho i c'a̱ pa ra̱mna ,

Wi nchel pa' bih jeno' ma' coric ta laj bano̱j xbanaric aweh tak on wi xatsihtjic tak , re' hat-tak ma̱ban tak chic jelow-bal , re' la' cha'n tak chapahkaj tak i cuse'sbal chi quina̱ . Je' wo' , wi la' xat-tz'ujuric tak ma̱ban tak jenaj wach cu̱c' , tipahkanok la' tak pan ati̱j chiqui̱j take c'ahchi' quibanic aweh tak , reh chi naquicuse'sjic cho maj wi je' re' na'n tak re' wo' Dios naricuse'senic aweh hat-tak .
Re' hin xiritak'a̱' cho i wAja̱w eh xa wilic wo' wu̱c' , ma' jaruj ta quiricana̱' chi wutquel maj k'e̱' nponic chiwach take nibano̱j niban , nqui Jesus queh .

Reh aj chi xa tikilca̱t ok wo' tak chi peletenic , curman chi coric ok wach i c'acharic cha'n tak maj re're' naribanic chi ena'n tak ricamaj i Dios chi coric chi ma'xta bih enk'etbic aweh tak je' ricab jeno' sol naribac' ripa̱m chi coric , ma'xta bih enk'etbic reh chi peletenic . Je' wo' , xa re' wo' i coric cha'n tak maj re' ribanaric i wili , re're' nco'lonic aweh tak chi quiwach take ma' tob laj uxlabal je' ricab nok re' tz'ih laj ch'ihch' ncamanic chi co'lbal reh i riti'jolal ribakil i sol .

Re' hat xawilow i wuku̱b chi ch'imi̱l choplic wu'um ru̱c' risec'a̱j nik'ab eh xawilow wo' i pa'a̱b cante̱la wuku̱b ritz'ukunbal cante̱la wilic reh je' ru̱c' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' xa re' la' ma' xarak ta chiri̱j chaj bih ra̱j rik'orom re're' . Re' ma' xarak ta chiri̱j re're' je' wili nelic wi̱' : Re' take wuku̱b chi ch'imi̱l rijalwachej i ju'jun queh wuku̱b chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch quic'ambic quibe̱h take ju'jun queh i wukch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios . Je' wo' re' i ma' laj pa'a̱b cante̱la re' wuku̱b chi tz'ukunbal cante̱la wilic reh , ju'jun queh tz'ukunbal re're' rijalwachej i ju'jun queh wukch'uk chi aj niminel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios , nqui wi̱n .

Re' cok ru' nkarak chiri̱j i no'jbal re're' ru̱c' xkilow wili chi xc'uluric ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus : Nok re' Dios xiban chi xkajic wach junc'am ok riwa'ric chi quiwach take raj tz'e' wa̱ch , xiban wo' chi xcansjic i Jesus pan kajelow-bal i hoj c'acharel . Je' re' xiban ru'um reh rinimal wach richak'lamil chi kana̱ , reh chi je' re' ma'xta kacahnic chi hoj camnak chi junpech . Re' cok ru' chiri̱j chi camnak chic i Jesus , xiban wo' chi xic'ul rinimal wach rilok'il eh je' wo' rinimal wach rajawric naxsoljic wo' chic johtok ar pan taxa̱j .

Je' re' nik'or aweh chi na̱banam tak maj xa re' wo' cho naxatco'ljic tak re' Dios c'ahchi' ricamanic pan awa̱mna tak reh chi ru̱c' i rito'bal riyew cho chana̱ tak ena'n tak eh enawa̱j tak ribanaric i nic' pa' nimal ra̱j i Dios chi na̱banam tak .

« Re' hin k'e̱' nwa̱j chi je' ricab i sukquil c'uxlis wilic pan wa̱mna i hin , wih'ok wo' pan awa̱mna hat-tak jenaj suk laj c'uxlis re' narisuksam ac'ux tak chi manlic . Ru'um aj re' , re're' i tak'anic niban aweh tak

Re' c'ahchi' ritz'ihminic je reh hu̱j wili , re' hin ma' Lu̱' . Re' hin naxinpahbabjic chi aj k'orol ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , ar xchalic rik'ormojic ru̱c' i Dios re' aj co'lonel keh eh je' wo' ar xchalic rik'ormojic ru̱c' i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' nkarak wi̱' ch'iquinbal kac'ux .

Je' wo' chic , nwa̱j chi re' take kana̱b pan niminic xa coric ok wo' ti wach ritik'injic qui̱b ca'n ru̱c' quiso' ma' ok nquitik'a̱' qui̱b xa ru'um quiyusquil . Re' wili ra̱j rik'orom chi ma' curman ta chi naquitik'a̱b qui̱b ru̱c' q'uih tz'a̱k laj tz'ih , on chi naquixoyem wach quina̱ ru̱c' take nworwotic laj ch'ihch' , on nworwotic laj abaj . Til nipahkaj je k'uru' chi quic'uhtaj lok coric wach no'jbal

Naxilow aj chi je' re' c'ahchi'que̱b ar , re' Jesus xitik'a̱' jenaj tz'uhumbal eh xesaj take lok chi tz'uhu̱m chi'nchel take aj c'a̱y wilque̱b ar . Je' wo' xesaj je take chicop c'ahchi' ric'ayjic ar eh xihilej je quitz'a̱k take aj ch'akol wach tumi̱n naxitahch'aj je quime̱xa quiwih'ic wi̱' .

Nik'or chi je' re' maj til re' Dios ac'sanic reh kac'acharic eh yu'na chi wilco̱j chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis rich'i̱l i kAja̱w Jesus , re' Dios xiyew keh jenaj ac' laj c'acharic reh chi naka'nam take holohic laj bano̱j nponic chiwach ru' je' ricab ritik'a̱b wo' cho wach pa ric'ux najtir k'i̱j chi naka'nam i hoj c'acharel .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , nik'or aweh tak chi ma' nsahchic nchel ac'ux tak nok re' ransil riti'quilal i pajaric nchalic chana̱ tak chi xa je' nchel xa re' hat-tak c'ahchi' ac'ulbic tak reh .

Kalok'ej aj tak wach i Dios k'uru' eh sukbok kac'ux maj yu'na re' chiho̱j wach chi naribanam chi ehq'uenbe̱s , tiklic chic chi naribanam chic caxa̱ra ru'um chi xponic chic rik'ijil i caxarahil ru̱c' i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' .

Je' wo' chic , re' rinabjic chi coric i co'lbal i̱b xiyew aweh tak i Jesus , re're' camanok aweh tak chi co'lbal awi̱b tak chi quiwach take ma' tob laj uxlabal je' ricab riban i sol chi ricoj i ripune̱t ch'ihch' chi co'lbal rina̱ . Je' wo' , re' riC'uhbal i Dios re' riyew cho aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal camanok aweh tak chi peletenic je' ricab nok re' sol nc'u'lunic ru̱c' k'as nah re̱ ch'ihch' .

Nok wilic chic ponok i Moyses chi rilmijic take rich tinamit , xilow chi jenaj aj Eji̱pto c'ahchi' rik'ojom jenaj rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh ru'um re' xoquic chi rico'ljic i ras richa̱k' re're' , xa re' la' chic ru' naxiban nak ti rijelow-bal reh , xa quimic xiban aj Eji̱pto pan k'ab .

Re' hat-tak kich aj niminel re' c'ahchi' abanam tak i haj wilic tare̱t chi banaric , nkapahkaj wo' je aweh tak chi ma' nkajic ac'ux tak chi ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal chi camanic xa ru'um nawilow tak chi wilic take c'acharel ma' nca̱j ta camanic .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , xa ic'lic ok ana̱ tak chiwach take xa pa' bih erijot' animinic tak eh ru̱c' cowil c'uxlis chatik tak ju' rinimjic i coric laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus . Je' wo' , ma' chi bih nayohlej tak eh chapahba̱' wo' awi̱b tak chi coric ru̱c' animinic tak .

Je' aj wo' re' yu'na chi c'acharic chic na'n tak chipam i ye'a̱b wili , ma' re' ta hin quinalok'ej tak , re' la' chic take xacoj tak chi atiyo̱x nayew tak quilok'il je' ricab nanatehlaj tak rijalwachil rich'imilal atiyo̱x tak “ Renpan ” ribihnal , on nanatehlaj tak i ripatil atiyo̱x tak “ Moloc ” ribihnal . Ru'um chi je' re' na'n tak , re' hin Dios naca̱t wesam tak je chipam ye'a̱b wili eh cu ma' wili chic ponok chiri̱j quiyuk'ul aj Wawilo̱nya na̱wojic awic'ram awi̱b tak , nqui rik'or Hu̱j re're' , nqui Te̱wan . Je' re' xik'or i Te̱wan chi rico'ljic ri̱b chiri̱j i k'oric nquitz'ak chiri̱j ru̱c' C'uhbal ye'o̱j reh Moyses .

Ru'um aj re' hat-tak wich aj niminel , ru'um nok xatyuk'unjic tak reh chi xatco'ljic tak , re' aj re' riban chi nipahkaj aweh tak yu'na chi chatik tak ju' richoporic ac'ux tak chi cow chiri̱j take c'uhtunic re' xabiraj tak ku̱c' on xatijej tak ru̱c' riliric wach i pe̱t hu̱j xkatak'a̱' je aweh tak .

Til ta wo' naric'uluric je' ricab c'ahchi' nik'orom chi re' kati'jolal narijalaric wach ? Na̱c , maj re' i Dios re' aj re' xitik'a̱' chic cho wach chi re' hoj narijahlic wach kati'jolal pan jenaj k'i̱j eh keht'alim chi til je' re' naric'uluric ru'um nok re' Dios xiyew keh i Lok' laj rUxlabal re' ncamanic keh chi rehtalil chi nakac'ulum take pa' bih k'oro̱j cho ru'um .

Ch'i̱l i k'oro̱j lok re're' , nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh i wili chiqui̱j take kana̱b pan niminic : Nanquimol qui̱b i comonil aj niminel chi ritijiljic ri̱j rik'orbal i Dios , tare̱t chi re' take ixok equiwih'ic chi quixilac take winak xa re' la' quiwih'ok ar chi xa aj birinel ok take eh quibiraj wo' k'oric ru̱c' chaj bih nk'ormojic chi quina̱ .

Re' wili jenaj chic no'jbal niyew je aweh chiqui̱j take nahsil chipam acomonil hat-tak aj niminel : Wi hab wach jeno' c'ahchi' ricojom jeno' mahc chiri̱j jeno' c'amol be̱h pan acomonil , ma̱cohjaj pe ti wach chaj bih c'ahchi' rik'ormojic aweh . Cu chabiraj la' pe pan quichi̱' quib xib ok chi c'acharel wi til coric chi wilic jeno' rimahc i c'amol be̱h re're' . Wi xabiraj cu̱c' take c'acharel chi til coric chi wilic rimahc , cu re' aj ru' chacoj wach eh chak'il wo' ti pa ricorquilal .

Yu'na hat-tak aj niminel wilca̱t tak ar Ro̱ma , nok awilom tak chic wach i hu̱j wili nwa̱j chi chayew wo' tak risukquil ac'ux tak chawibil awi̱b tak ru̱c' i chak'lamil nelic cho cu pan awa̱mna tak . Je' wo' nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak yu'na chi re' take aj niminel reh Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' nquimol qui̱b ayu' chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios , nquiyew wo' je risukquil ac'ux tak .

« Chi rehtalil aj chi wilic jenaj rinimal ti'quil c'uxlis cu̱c' take c'acharel re're' , naquipokem poklaj pan quina̱ eh nacoquic chi ok'ic chi xa je' chic wili naquik'orom : ‹ K'e̱' je quetal wach i ma' laj tinamit wili maj to̱b ta xa ru̱c' ribihomal xibihomric take aj ehcham nimak tak cano̱wa china̱ rinimal ha' , xa chi junc'am wo' ti xsahchic wach ribihomal , nqui naquik'orom .

Je' re' k'uru' , sahchok aj kac'ux ru̱c' i rik'orom i Dios chi re' take quiniminic reh re' cok take re' til rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n take . Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' rik'orom cho kAja̱w Dios ru'um chi k'e̱' kojric'ax . Je' re' ajic re' hoj yu'na , hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios eh wi coric chi je' re' , chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi wilic take tinamit china̱ ac'al wili re' nquik'or chi ma' coric ta chi je' re' ? Re' aj wili riwi̱' : Re' take tinamit re're' ma' nquicoj ta wach re're' ru'um nok chi queh ma' coric ta wo' chi re' Jesus re're' i rAc'u̱n i Dios .

Yu'na aweh hat-tak q'uijolak ch'i̱l hat-tak k'ahxokak , enik'or i wili : Tiniminok tak chiwach quik'orbal anahsil hat-tak aj niminel eh chawunchelal i hat-tak c'ul chanimej awi̱b tak ru̱c' ch'ublic wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak maj je' wili rik'or chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios : “ Ru'um reh quino'jbal take c'acharel re' xa nquinimsaj chic qui̱b re' Dios ricoj ri̱b chi caj ixowonel , ra̱j take c'acharel re' xa ch'u̱b ti wach quic'ux , re' rito'bal i Dios wilic cho chi quina̱ , nqui rik'or .

« Re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma'xta . Re' Dios ma' jaruj ta eriban chi je' re' . Haj cok wilic riban i Dios , re' ric'uhtjic chi re're' xa coric wo' wach ric'ux to̱b ta re' hoj chi'nchel c'acharel kojkajic chipam i chucuj k'oric . Ru'um aj re' , re' ma' Tawiy naxk'oric chiri̱j mahc xiban je' wili xik'or chipam i hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj ru'um : « Re' hat Dios til na'n wo' ribanaric re' nak'or chi na̱banam . Je' wo' chic nok hab wach ncojbic jeno' amahc , re' hat xatelic wo' coric ru̱c' ak'orbal chi rico'ljic awi̱b , nqui xik'or .

Je' wo' chic , ma' xa ta re' ar Jerusalen wilic rajawric ye'o̱j reh cu'um take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios , je' la' wo' chipam i tinamit wili ye'o̱j wo' rajawric chi quichoporic je take nic' pa' q'uihal aj niminel re' nquik'or abihnal pan quiti̱j , nqui Anani̱yas .

Najtir cho k'i̱j xiwih'ic take cho chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel . Je' wo' re' yu'na naquiwih'ic wo' chaxilac tak take chucul aj tijinel re' xa chucuj laj c'uhbal naquik'orom chi xa re' wo' take re' queht'alanic reh chi xa chucuj k'oric c'ahchi'que̱b . Ru'um reh chucuj laj c'uhbal naca'nam take aj tijinel re're' , narijot'om ri̱b quino'jbal take naquibirinic reh quic'uhbal eh narisahchic wo' wach quiniminic . Je' wo' re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' take aj tijinel re're' ma' nquic'ul ta i Jesus chi Ajabe̱s chi quina̱ , to̱b ta re're' xtojbic ri̱j quic'acharic chi wilque̱b nak chic chi ritinami̱t . Ru'um chi je' re' nca'n , re' take re' xa nic' yu' nquiyuk'ej wach quina̱ take ti'c'axic re' narisachbic quiwach .

Ru'um reh k'oric xiban re're' , re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel riman chic p'uht quisiq'uim ri̱j nic' wach ricansjic i Jesus naca'nam ru'um nok chi quiwach ru' , re' Jesus c'ahchi' ribanam i ma' ye'o̱j ta k'ab chi banaric pan hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel . Ma' xa re' ta re' riban i Jesus rik'or la' wo' chi re' Dios i rAja̱w eh ru̱c' i k'oric rik'or re're' , chi queh ru' c'ahchi' rijunehtem ri̱b ru̱c' i Dios .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , re' hin til nik'or chi k'e̱' tare̱t c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ma' niq'uic ta pan ac'ux tak take no'jbal xatnitijej tak wi̱' naxinwih'ic cho chaxilac tak eh xa c'ahchi' wo' ca̱t tak chi ribanaric take no'jbal re're' .

Je' re' nik'or maj je' re' xitz'ihmbaj cho i ma' Tawiy chiri̱j i Jesus naxik'or chi je' wili : “ Re' hin xa nwilow wo' chi re' hat lok' laj wAja̱w xa wilca̱t wo' wu̱c' chi nitobjic . Ru'um aj re' ma'xta bih equinyo'jic so' wi̱' chiwach i quimic .

Re' hin niban i tak'anic re're' maj je' ricab nanasjic jeno' t'uch ha'lac'un np'uhtic jenaj chic c'acharic , je' wo' re' hat-tak xye'eric wo' aweh tak jenaj chic ac' ac'acharic tak . Re' c'acharic re're' ma' je' ta ricab i c'acharic re' xa nic' yu' ensahchic wach ru'um chi xa tiwic wo' ti take katu̱t kaja̱w re' xiye'bic kac'acharic , ra̱j la' i c'acharic re're' ma' jaruj ta sahchel wach maj re' Dios xye'bic aweh naxacoj tak wach rik'orbal eh chiwach ru' re' pa' bih rik'orbal riyeb xa ewo' nwih'ic eh xa ewo' nc'acharic chi junelic

Je' re' ajic til curman chi chayew tak chi eht'aljic chawach tak chaj bih xatmahcanic tak wi̱' eh je' wo' cha'n wo' tak ati̱j . Wi re' hat-tak c'ul na'n tak ati̱j chawi̱j chawibil awi̱b tak , wi wilic jeno' hab wach wilic riya'bilal chaxilac tak encowjic . Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok re' quiti̱j take aj niminel coric wach quic'ux k'e̱' wo' chic nim wach camanic riban .
« Yu'na chacoj tak rehtal i ricorquilal k'oric wili : Hab wach ncojbic niwach i hin , eniyew reh chi naric'acharic chi junelic .

« Nok jeno' ajabe̱s nquimic je eh ma' nilmijic ta chic wach ru'um i rac'u̱n ru'um chi re' ajabe̱s re're' ma' nsoljic ta chic cho , nk'ormojic chi re' ac'un re're' ncahnic chi niba'jel chic . Re' hin to̱b ta quinojok ma'xta ca̱t tak nicana̱b chi je' hat-tak niba'jel maj nanichalic wo' chic awu̱c' tak .

Til pa ricorquil , re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi k'e̱' wo' chic ncamanic aweh tak re're' . Pe̱t k'oric , enik'or aweh tak chi re' take kama̱m kati't xic'ulbic cho reh take k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios chi narimahsam wach ku̱c' .

Je' wo' chic , re' hat-tak re' wilca̱t tak cok chipam mino̱j wach camanic ru̱c' jeno' ajabe̱s ayu' wach ac'al , tibirinok tak k'oric chiwach ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux tak eh chayew wo' tak rilok'il je' ricab chi re' ta nak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , c'ahchi' ayeb tak rilok'il .

Wi je' re' nacapaj tak ru'um reh rinimal richak'lamil i Dios , on ru'um reh riquetelbal wilic cho ku̱c' i hoj c'acharel , on ru'um reh ricuybal xa wilic wo' cho chi kana̱ , nik'or aweh tak chi ma' c'ahchi' ta acapewenic tak chi manlic maj curman wo' chi na̱capam tak chi re' Dios ru'um reh rinimal wach richak'lamil , c'ahchi' wo' riyeb cho aweh tak chi na̱jalam wach ano'jbal tak .

Ru'um chi kach'ica̱b chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus yu'na ch'iclic chic kac'ux chi re' Dios xa kojribiraj wo' cho ru̱c' kapahkanic nka'n johtok chiwach , re' cok ru' wi re' pahkanic nka'n johtok reh je' ru̱c' tare̱t chiwach i Dios chi naka'nam .

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i k'oro̱j ru'um i ma' Isayi̱yas , re' hin nipahkaj johtok pa niti̱j chiwach i Dios re' xbanic chi wilic awuyu'nbal chi ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus , chi re' ok wo' re' ye'bok aweh tak jenaj tuklic laj c'uxlis ch'i̱l wo' rinimal sukquil laj c'uxlis eh chi wilic ok wo' awu̱c' tak i rajawric re' ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi ru̱c' re're' riman chic enwih'ic awuyu'nbal tak chi ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus .

Chipam i ye'a̱b re' xquimic wi̱' i Jesus naxquiyew wach curu̱s , wilic jenaj ye'a̱b tic pa̱m eh chipam i ye'a̱b re're' wilic jenaj muk'unbal ma' ja' cojo̱j ta , re' tik'imaj ar pan jenaj ma' laj abaj .

Xa re' la' re' tz'uklic china̱ i sak ri̱j cawa̱y xbanic canar i k'ak'anic eh chi je' re' xchoporic wo' i ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal . Naxchoporic ru' , xchoporic wo' i chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios . Re' aj k'orol wili ar nak ric'ul rajawric ru̱c' i ma' laj chicop chi ribanaric take sahchbal c'uxlis eh chi ru̱c' take sachbal c'uxlis re're' k'e̱' take c'acharel xijot' . Chi jot'o̱j chic quicapew-bal , re' take re' xquic'ul i rehtalil ribihnal i ma' laj chicop eh xquilok'ej wo' wach i tiyo̱x re' tik'imaj ru̱c' rijalwachil i ma' laj chicop re're' . Naxichoporic aj take quib re're' , re' ma' laj chicop ch'i̱l i raj k'orol , xicuturic chi c'acha̱ch take ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' xa ntenic chic cho rik'ak'il eh xa sute̱n chic pa̱m chi asu̱pra re' xa nquihic chic richuhil .

Je' re' ajic cu̱c' take quixowonic awach tak , cha'n tak cu̱c' je' ricab i no'jbal ye'o̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios , re' rik'or chi je' wili : « Wi re' nxowonic wach ric'ahric , chayew riwa' eh wila' chiki̱j chi̱' chayew wo' riha̱' . Ru̱c' ribanaric chi je' re' , re' awaj ixowonel re're' enchalic jenaj rinimal riq'uix'ic , nqui rik'or .

Je' wo' , nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi re' lok' laj ric'uhbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , xa wilic ta wo' nak pan awa̱mna tak reh chi ma' pajoj ta enwih'ic ano'jbal tak maj curman chi ru̱c' t'ulic laj no'jbal na̱c'uhbalem on na̱k'ilim awi̱b tak chaxilac hat-tak . Je' wo' chic nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi wilic ta nak tioxonic pan awa̱mna tak chi etibichinic tak johtok chiwach i Dios ru̱c' take bi̱ch tik'imaj ru̱c' take k'oric wilic chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios , on ru̱c' take bi̱ch ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal , on ru̱c' take bi̱ch tz'ihmbimaj chi riye'eric rilok'il i kAja̱w Jesus .
Hat-tak bahilbe̱s , re' wili nipahkaj aweh tak chi na̱banam tak : Chac'ax awehq'ue̱n tak eh ma̱banlom tak cow laj k'oric chi quina̱ .

Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic lok wili nik'or wo' chic aweh , wi chi quixilac take raj pan pa̱t jeno' aj niminel wilic jeno' ixok camnak chic je ribahi̱l je' ru̱c' ja'xta reh oxc'ahl ( 60 ) ha̱b , curman chi narito'bem reh chi re' ritobjic ixok re're' ma' eta ncahnic pan quik'ab take moloj wach aj niminel eh chi je' re' , re' to'bal moloj wach ma' eta nmak'aric queh take ixok camnak chic je quibahi̱l re' til ma' hab ta chic wach ta̱j queh .
Je' re' ajic re' k'oric xik'or i Dios chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n , re' wili : “ Re' hin Dios xniban chi re' junelic c'acharic xniyew aweh hat-tak , xa pa rik'ab wo' i wAc'u̱n wilic riye'eric , nqui xik'or .

Ru'um aj re' nik'or wo' aweh tak chi wi jeno' c'acharel ric'ulum chic rAc'u̱n i Dios pa ric'acharic , re're' ye'o̱j wo' reh i junelic c'acharic . Tz'a̱b ru' re' ma' ja' ric'ulum ta pa ra̱mna , re're' ma'xta wo' riye'eric reh i junelic c'acharic .

Nic' nimal k'oro̱j cho chiqui̱j take c'acharel re're' je' wo' re' k'oro̱j cho chawi̱j tak . Ru'um aj re' , re' hin nik'or aweh tak i wili : Re' hat-tak ma' c'ahchi' ta tak ac'acharic chi tehlic awi̱j tak . Til na̱c'acharic la' tak chi je' re' wi re' hin re' rAc'u̱n i Dios equinbanic chi enteh awi̱j tak .

Chi je' aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak yu'na chi ma̱yoj ac'ux tak ru'um take ti'c'axic c'ahchi' nic'ulum ru'um reh rik'ormojic i c'uhbal aweh tak maj re' take ti'c'axic re're' nicuy ransil reh chi nariwih'ic rinimal sukquil ac'ux tak .

eh nipahkaj chi je' re' maj re' take re' ma' re' ta chiri̱j i camanic chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric nquiyew quic'ux , chiri̱j la' chic rik'ormojic chaj bih ra̱j on ma' ra̱j c'uxuric nquiyew quic'ux . Chi je' re' quino'jbal , xa je' na nchel holohic chic eh xa ch'ublic chic wach i k'oric nca'n chi rijot'oric quicapew-bal take quibirinic queh .

Chi je' aj re' quicapew-bal , yohbal wach take riman chic c'ahbilal nca'n je' ricab take wili : Re' ribanaric c'oyomal , re' ribanaric i balc'uxquilal , re' ric'axaric wach i bihomal , re' ma' suk ta rilmijic jeno' hab wach ric'ul ricuse'sbal i Dios . Nca'n wo' ribanaric i cansanic , ribanaric i wolic , ribanaric i chucuj k'oric eh re' pa' chic bih nca'n , nca'n ru̱c' ma' holohic ta laj capew-bal .

Re' lok' laj tijinic re're' , okxa'njic pan ak'ab reh chi na̱banam i c'uhtunic chi manlic . Je' re' nok til nipahkaj aweh chi chac'ol ri̱j reh chi ma' eta no̱j yojok wach . Re' ok i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios wilic pan awa̱mna to'bonok aweh chi ribanaric re're' .

Je' re' k'uru' xa hab pa' wach aweh tak riban take no'jbal pa ric'acharic chi chopo̱j na̱ ru'um i mahc , ma' re' ta junelic laj c'acharic naruy'em naquimok je . Tz'a̱b ru' hab wach riban ribanaric take holonquilal laj no'jbal ncojoric pa ra̱mna ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal , junelic laj c'acharic wo' naruy'em ru̱c' i Dios naquimok je .

Je' wo' chic , ma̱yew tak chi pajaric i Lok' Laj Ajabe̱s chi ribanaric i mahc je' ricab xca'n take cho kama̱m kati't maj wi je' re' nka'n i hoj , ewo' nkac'ul kac'axquilal je' ricab xquic'ul cho ru' chi xiti'iric cu'um take a̱k' eh chi je' re' xiquimic je .

Re' wilic i c'axoj i̱b pa ra̱mna ma' eta riban i ra̱j ma' ra̱j banaric ru̱c' i ras richa̱k' . Ma' eta wo' risic' ribanaric take no'jbal ma' nponic ta chi quiwach take ras richa̱k' , re' la' haj wilic nponic wo' chi quiwach ru' riban ribanaric . Je' wo' , ma' ncakcatic ta cu̱c' take ras richa̱k' eh ma' ric'ol ta c'a̱ pa ra̱mna .

Je' wo' , re' quiti'jolal c'olo̱j take ru̱c' jenaj ch'ihch' laj tz'ih reh k'ak'anic eh nanquic'uyu'saj quixi̱c' xa quijup'lunic chic xa je' chic ricab i ahnic nca'n riq'uihal cawa̱y nok ojic nca'n pan k'ak'anic chi quikerem je behsbal queh aj k'ak'anel .

Je' re' k'uru' re' take c'acharel re're' pan mahc wilque̱b . Wi re' hin ma' ta nak xinc'ulic china̱ ac'al wili chi rik'ormojic queh chi aj mahc take ewo' nak riban chi re' take re' enquik'or chi ma' eta nk'ormojic chiqui̱j chi aj mahc take , xa re' la' ru' re' hin yu'na c'ahchi' nik'orom queh chi pan mahc wilque̱b eh chi je' re' ma' eta chic riban chi enquik'or chi ma' c'ahchi' ta quimahcanic

Chi je' re' pahkanic niban chawach tak , nipahkaj wo' chic aweh tak i wili : Wi xirak achi̱' tak rik'ormojic i Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios queh take ja' queht'alim ta wach i Dios , chak'or tak queh , ma̱k'eb tak i junc'am re're' chi k'oric chiri̱j . Re' cok ru' ma' ok xa re' ti re' na'n tak , til la' ok c'uhtunok lok ano'jbal tak chi toco̱m chic riwi̱' c'acharic na'n tak .

Je' re' nkeht'alij maj re' Jesus naxik'ahsaj ric'acharic pan quimic ar wach curu̱s xiban wo' chi re' najtir c'acharic ma'eta chic riban chi cu ewo' chic nka'n chi je' re' . Je' re' xiban reh chi je' ricab nok nsahchic wach riti'jolal ribakil jeno' c'acharel nanquimic je , je' wo' re' i nc'uluric ru̱c' i xa pa' jaric nbanic chi nkotowej ribanaric i mahc , nsahchic wo' wach eh chi je' re' ma' tanlic ta chic chi keh chi xa cu ewo' nka'n i bano̱j re' xkanimej wo' nak cho ribanaric najtir je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' aj camanom chi xa rinimej wo' k'oric chiwach i rajabe̱s .

Nic' wach nanc'uhtunic lok chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ? Re' wili nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' : Wi hab wach jeno' ma' ritahkej ta i coric eh ma' ric'ax ta wo' take ras richa̱k' ra̱j rik'orom chi re're' rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n aj Yahm eh ma' re' ta rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios . Re' aj re' nc'utunic lok wi̱' chi jeno' c'acharel ma' re' ta rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios .

Je' re' nik'or chi nc'uluric ru'um nc'ulmujic wo' wili cu̱c' take c'acharel c'ahchi'que̱b chi c'ahbilal ru'um chi ma' riban ta chi queh chi nquiyew qui̱b pan k'ab i Dios : Re' take c'acharel re're' qui'o̱j mikrok chi ra̱j ixowonel chic i Dios take ru'um reh quicapew-bal re're' .

K'e̱' chic risukquil i wa̱mna nchalic chi quinbichinic chi suk ru̱c' nichi̱' . Je' wo' , ru'um chi re' hat lok' laj wAja̱w xa wilca̱t wo' wu̱c' chi nitobjic naric'uluric chi chiwach i junc'am reh nic'acharic chi quixilac take camnak , re' hin naniwih'ic chi ch'iclic nic'ux chawi̱j i hat

Chi je' aj re' nwa̱j wo' nik'orom ricorquil aweh tak wili : Nank'ahsjic jeno' si̱ chiwach jeno' tiyo̱x cu'um take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , ma' xa re' ta take tiyo̱x nlok'onjic quiwach ar je' la' wo' take ma' tob laj uxlabal eh ma' re' ta nchel i manlic Dios . Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱ban juneht awi̱b tak cu̱c' take ma' tob laj uxlabal re' nye'eric quilok'il nanlok'onjic quiwach take tiyo̱x .

Chiwach aj wo' take cho k'i̱j nok re' take aj niminel c'ahchi' riq'uihbic wach quicomonil , re' rik'orbal i Dios xa xk'ormojic wo' eh xa xc'uhtjic wo' queh take aj niminel nquimol qui̱b ar Antiyoqui̱ya . Re' take quik'oric reh riC'uhbal i Dios , re' take je' wili quibihnal : Re' ma' Wernaweh , re' ma' Simon re' K'ek Winak nquik'or reh ru'um k'ek rilbal , re' ma' Lu̱syo aj Sire̱ne , re' ma' Sa̱wlo ch'i̱l i ma' Manahen re' rich q'uihic cho i k'atal k'oric Hero̱res .

Xa hab wach jeno' c'acharel k'uru' ra̱j ca̱t-tak rijot'om ru̱c' rik'ormojic aweh tak chi re' ribanaric take no'jbal re're' ma'xta bih jeno' c'axquilal eric'am cho chana̱ tak , til ma̱cana̱' awi̱b tak chi jot'oric . Je' re' nik'or je aweh tak maj riwi̱' chaweh tak chi na̱weht'alim tak chi re' rijosk'il i Dios nchalic chi quina̱ take c'acharel ma' quibirinic ta k'oric chi rinabjic ribanaric take no'jbal re're' .

Re' aj take aj c'uhbalanel re're' , curman chi naquipitiric reh chi ma' eta chic nca'n jot'o̱j queh take aj niminel . Je' re' nik'or maj nanhamaric pan quina̱ take toco̱m chic c'uhtunic re' ma' tare̱t ta chi tijiljic , ar pan tak pa̱t re' wilque̱b wi̱' take aj niminel q'uihal take ma' nquic'ul ta chic i c'uhtunic chiri̱j i Jesus xa ru'um reh quik'orbal take aj c'uhbalanel re're' .
Je' re' xik'or maj reht'alim nak chic hab wach i narik'ahsanic reh pan quimic . Ru'um aj re' xik'or keh k'oric chi ma' kunchelal ta saksamaj chic kawach .

Chiri̱j chic ru' , re' Jesus xik'or wo' chic queh nahsil chi je' wili : « Chabiraj tak chi coric i ricorquil nanik'orom wili : Wilic riwi̱' reh chi nareht'aljic hab wach i til aj ilo̱l queh me̱' . Je' ricab wi jeno' c'acharel ma' re' ta chipam ritz'ahpil i ye'a̱b c'olbal queh me̱' noquic , xa haj la' chic risic' cok rocbal , re' c'acharel re're' xa aj lek' me̱' nok wilic .

Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' take re' ru̱c' ricanabjic i coric laj c'uhbal re' nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus no̱j riban je' ricab xiban cho najtir k'i̱j re' rac'u̱n i ma' Wosor , re' Walaham ribihnal . Chawil ru' re' Walaham re're' ru'um risahq'uil tumi̱n chi ric'axaric wach ribihomal xicut ri̱b chi ribanaric c'ahbilal chi xipahkaj reh Dios sihtbal queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel .

Chi je' aj re' wilque̱b wi̱' take c'acharel re're' , re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquitik'a̱' wach quino'jbal ch'i̱l take quinahsil chi naquitz'ujum je' wo' chi naquicansam chi abaj ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh .

Chiri̱j chic ru' , re' Jesus roxpech chic pahkanic reh ru̱c' i Simon je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh : « Hat Simon , rac'u̱n i Jonas til na k'e̱' ti' quinawic'raj ? nqui wo' chic reh . Ar ajic naxibiraj i roxpech pahkanic xiban i Jesus , re' ma' Luch xoquic cho ntz'iric pa ric'ux eh je' wili i c'u'lunic xiban reh : « Ha̱w , re' hat til aweht'alim chi'nchel . Ru'um aj re' , re' hat aweht'alim wo' chi re' hin k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj , nqui reh . Re' Jesus k'uru' je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh Simon : « Til nipahkaj aweh chi cu̱c' take qui'oquic chi waj tahkanel , cha'n queh je' ricab i quiliric take cu̱c' me̱' nbanjic ru'um jeno' aj cha'jem me̱' , nqui reh . Chiri̱j chic re' je' wili xik'or reh :

re' cok ru' , xa re' wach take tz'ihmbimaj quibihnal chipam i hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal take ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom ru'um i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' , xa re' wach take re' nacoquic chipam take ritz'ahpil i ye'a̱b re're' . Ru'um aj re' ma' jeno' queh take aj banol reh i yibel wach no'jbal nacoquic cok ar , je' ricab take aj chucul k'oric . Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' wilque̱b chi quixilac take nca'n xa pa' jaric chic jeno' c'ahbilal eh chi je' re' quiwi̱' ma' jaruj ta nacoquic chipam i ye'a̱b re're' .

re' tiklic ru̱c' riso' chi cak laj tz'ih ch'i̱l k'ekmoyic ricakil laj tz'ih . Re' ixok wilic xa nrepretic chic riholonquil ritik'injic ri̱b ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' riban , je' wo' re' ru̱c' take holohic laj abaj q'uih tz'a̱k on ru̱c' holohic laj abaj “ Pe̱rla ” ribihnal . Re're' wilic wo' jenaj culc pan k'ab tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' nujunak ru̱c' c'ah laj ha' nxohc'sonic eh ru̱c' re're' rijalwachej i c'ahbilal riban ru̱c' ric'oyomal .

Ru̱c' aj i no'jbal ena'n tak re're' curman wo' chi nariwih'ic c'axoj i̱b chaxilac tak maj ru̱c' re're' na̱banam tak chi xa jenaj wach awi̱' etiwih'ic tak pan niminic tak eh chi na̱wih'ic tak pan manlic jenaj wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak .

Ar ajic re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh take quib chi kich raj tahkanel re're' : « Yu'na aj ru' ponic rik'ijil chi naric'uhtunic chi re' hin re' Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel nanic'ulum wo' chic nilok'il ar pan taxa̱j .

Chaj wo' wa'ric re' hat re' tik'oric chi re' caxa̱ra chic take ma' riban ta chi enca'n i c'oyomal , xa re' la' ru' re' hat na'n wo' tak i banoj c'oyomal ? Je' wo' chic , chaj wa'ric chi ch'i'c nawilow take tiyo̱x xa re' la' ru' re' hat to̱j chi quelk'jic take tiyo̱x chipam take pa̱t wilque̱b take wi̱' ?
