Re' cok ru' je' ricab nok pan jeno' k'ak'anic wilic jenaj ye'a̱b re' np'uhtic je wi̱' , je' aj wo' re' reht'aljic i kamahc nka'n , ar np'uhtic cho ru̱c' take tak'anic ye'o̱j cho ru'um i Dios najtir k'i̱j . Ru'um aj re' keht'alim chi re' ritutil i mahc wilic pan ka̱mna nbanic chi k'e̱' wo' chic nkotowej ribanaric chi'nchel wach c'ahbilal . Re're' nkana'bej ru'um chi wilic ku̱c' i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses maj je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel nanquimic je chi ma' nkeht'alij ta chic i chaj bih c'ahchi' ribanam , je' wo' re' i hoj ma' nkana'bej ta wo' nak i k'oro̱j wili chiri̱j i ritutil i mahc ma' ta nak wilic ku̱c' i c'uhbal re're' .

« Chi je' aj re' i camanic na̱banam k'uru' , re' hin naca̱t nico'lem chi quiwach take c'acharel naca̱t nitak'a̱b je wi̱' . Je' re' nanibanam nok wilca̱t chic cu̱c' take awich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel on cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel

Je' wo' , chak'or wo' queh chi ma' niq'uic pan quic'ux chi je' ricab nok wilque̱b take c'acharel yu'na chi ma' nquibiraj ta k'oric chiwach i Dios , re' hoj chi'nchel aj niminel je' wo' nak cho re' riwi̱' kac'acharic najtir cho k'i̱j . Je' re' nik'or maj ma'xta nak cho kano'jbal chi risiq'uiric ri̱j i coric , nkak'ihtaj nak cho ki̱b chiwach i Dios , hoj nak cho sahchel chipam ric'ahbilal kano'jbal eh chukulco̱j nak cho chi ribanaric xa rehreh wach yibel wach no'jbal nkac'ax wach ribanaric . Til coric , re' hoj xojc'acharic cho chi xa chiri̱j nak chic i c'ahbilal wilic kacapew-bal , je' wo' xa ti' chic kac'ux chiqui̱j take suk wilque̱b chi kawach eh xa na̱ ru' , ru'um nok nkixowej quiwach take toco̱m je' wo' chic re' nca'n keh ru' .

Timote̱yo , re' chi'nchel nic' nimal xnik'or je aweh wili til nipahkaj je aweh chi chac'am na̱ chi manlic . Re' hin til wilic wajawric chi ripahkaljic je aweh re're' maj re' kAja̱w Dios ch'i̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , ch'i̱l wo' take lok' laj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios wilque̱b johtok pan taxa̱j c'ahchi' wo' quiyeb rajawric i k'oric c'ahchi' nibanam je aweh yu'na . Chi je' re' ajic nipahkaj wo' je aweh chi nacha'n acamaj chi quiwach take c'acharel , cha'n ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux , ma' xa ta reh chi re' take c'acharel naquicahnic chi suk quic'ux awu̱c' .

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi wilic jenaj abihomal re' nariye'eric aweh tak ru'um reh abano̱j tak , yu'na nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱cana̱' tak chi re' c'axquilal eriban chi nkajic acapew-bal tak on chi enyoj ac'ux tak chipam i niminic ,

Je' re' k'uru' chi aweht'alim tak chic chi je' re' kawi̱' chawach tak , re' hoj aj tijinel nakacojom rehtal i wili : Je' ricab nok jeno' ajabe̱s rich'ica̱b ric'ux chiri̱j jeno' aj ilol reh ricamaj nuyu'njic wo' chi re' aj camanom re're' naribanam ricamaj chi coric re' k'orel nic' pa' wach k'oro̱j reh ru'um ajabe̱s , je' wo' re' ku̱c' i hoj pahbamaj chi aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios , curman wo' chi naka'nam kacamaj ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis .
Ar pan tinamit Jo̱pe cu xcahnic pe chic so' q'uih k'i̱j i ma' Luch chi patanic ru̱c' jenaj winak aj jotzol wach tz'uhu̱m , Simon ribihnal .

Yu'na re' chic wili nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak : Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi re' Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios xwih'ic ar Jerusalen , til ar wih'ic i Dios naxwih'ic cho cu̱c' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh nic' pa' wach i wih'ic xiban ar , yu'na je' wo' re' i wih'ic riban awu̱c' i hat-tak aj niminel . Je' re' nik'or maj re' Lok' laj rUxlabal til wilic wo' pan awa̱mna tak .

Was tak nicha̱k' , cu ayu' lok yu'na , re' wili k'oro̱j lok chiri̱j i Jesus : Pe̱t k'oric , je' ricab nok Pe̱t aj K'ahsem Si̱ nok ye'o̱j chic k'ab reh chi oquic cok chipam i ye'a̱b re' ribihnej “ K'e̱' wo' chic nim rilok'il ” , je' wo' re' i Jesus , ru̱c' i riquiq'ue̱l xichihcaj naxquimic je , xiban wo' chi re' hoj ekoj-oquic ar chipam i ye'a̱b re' til wilic wi̱' i Lok' laj Dios .

Chipam take c'uhtunic xiban i Jesus , re're' xik'or wo' chi je' wili : « Narirakam i k'i̱j chi nawojic wo' chic , cu re' nak chic ru' naquinasiq'uim tak xa re' la' ru'um chi ma' eta tiponic tak chipam i ye'a̱b nawojic wi̱' , ma' eta wo' quinarak tak eh chi je' re' na̱quimic tak je chi ma' cuyu̱j ta wo' amahc tak , nqui Jesus .

Chi je' aj re' i toco̱m chic c'acharic wilca̱t tak wi̱' , re' hat-tak xatrichih tak i Dios chi xa'n tak chi ritinami̱t xisakbej wach ac'acharic tak eh ti' wo' tiric'raj tak cho . Ru'um aj re' je' ricab nok re' hat-tak toco̱m chic tz'ih nacoj tak chi rijalaric awi̱b tak , curman wo' chi toco̱m chic no'jbal wih'ok awu̱c' tak chi c'acharic chi coric . Re're' ra̱j rik'orom jenaj c'acharic ru̱c' quetelenic wachi̱s , ru̱c' chak'lamquil eh ru̱c' ch'ublic wach c'uxlis .

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi hab wach ra̱j ribanam nicamaj , curman chi wih'ok chi rehquen i wajawric maj xa chi je' re' , narojic wo' wih'ok ar re' nawojic wo' wih'ok wi̱' hin eh nok wilic chic ar naric'ulum wo' rilok'il nye'eric ru'um wAja̱w Dios queh take c'acharel quibanic nicamaj , nqui xik'or .
Je' wo' chic , re' c'acharel re're' curman chi naricholic rilmijic take raj pan pa̱t maj xa chi je' re' enye'jic rilok'il cu'um take riha'lac'u̱n eh ewo' quibirinic k'oric chiwach .
Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi keht'alim re're' , nkak'or aweh tak chi chayew tak ricowil ac'ux chawibil awi̱b tak eh c'ul ok wo' chato'bej awi̱b tak je' ricab c'ahchi'ca̱t tak cu yu'na chi k'i̱j .

Je' wo' chic nik'or chi ma' re' ta rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios maj ma' c'ahchi' ta ric'amam na̱ i tijbal kabiram cho pan p'uhtbal reh kaniminic re' je' wili rik'or : « C'ul chac'ax awi̱b chawach tak , nqui rik'or .

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um reh take c'axquilal naric'uluric johtok chiwach take k'i̱j wili , re' wili no'jbal nik'or aweh tak : K'e̱' tare̱t chi re' take k'ahxokak ch'i̱l take q'uijolak re' xa cu cutquel pe equicahnic chi ma' eta nquisic' quibahi̱l on chi ma' eta nquisic' quehq'ue̱n .

Wih'ic jenaj winak je' ru̱c' quicomonil take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , Nicore̱mo ribihnal . Re' Nicore̱mo re're' nim riwa'ric chi quixilac take c'amol kabe̱h i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel .

Chi re' Dios rilow cho kabano̱j chi ajwal wach chiwach , ar nc'utunic ru̱c' ribiral i ti' ixok Rahaw ribihnal . Ru̱c' re're' nkilow chi to̱b ta nak pan c'oyomal laj c'acharic nak wilic , pa ricapew-bal i Dios re' ixok re're' xcahnic chi jenaj c'acharel sak wach ric'acharic eh coric wo' wach ric'ux . Je' re' riwi̱' xcahnic ixok re're' chiwach i Dios ru'um chi xiyew quiwarbal take aj tz'e' wa̱ch re' tak'amaj take je ru'um i Joswe . Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban , xic'uhtaj wo' queh jenaj chic be̱h reh chi ma' xichoporic cu'um take caj ixowonel .

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' je' re' xiban , xa xehtric wo' co'lbal ru'um reh Ac'unbe̱s xasjic . Je' wo' re' nc'uluric cu̱c' take ixok yu'na chi qui'ehtric wo' co'lbal , re' cok ru' wi re' take re' xa c'ahchi' chic quich'ubsam qui̱b enquik'ahsaj quicapew-bal chi naquich'ica̱b quic'ux chiri̱j Jesus , chi equic'acharic pan c'axoj i̱b eh je' wo' chi equiwih'ic pan tz'iro̱j wach c'acharic .

Re' Dios nkalok'ej wach i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa nok wo' richihim cho quiwach take kama̱m kati't chi quiwach toco̱m tinamit chi naquilok'em wach . Re' aj i Dios re're' k'e̱' nimal rajawric xic'uhtaj cho chiqui̱j take kama̱m kati't naxesaj take cho chi xa yohbalamaj chic quiwach chipam ponok i toco̱m tinamit Eji̱pto ribihnal . Chipam i tinamit re're' , re' take kama̱m kati't xic'acharic cho chi xa iq'ue̱l take ar .

Je' wo' , xniyew wo' aweh tak chi eht'aljic chi re' Dios re' nilbic reh pa̱m i ka̱mna chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel , xik'or chiqui̱j take ju'jun c'acharel xiniminic re're' chi coric chic wach i ca̱mna eh xic'uhtaj wo' chi til je' re' , naxitak'a̱' cho queh i Lok' laj rUxlabal tak'amaj chic cho keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' kojniminic reh Jesus .

Je' re' nik'or ru'um nok xa jenaj wach rilok'il i chi'nchel take tak'anic wilic chipam i lok' laj hu̱j re're' maj ar re' Dios je' wili rik'or : “ Ma̱ban i c'oyomal , nqui rik'or . Je' wo' , rik'or wo' chic chi je' wili : “ Ma̱ban tak i cansanic , nqui rik'or . Ru'um aj re' to̱b ta wo' ma' na'n ta tak i c'oyomal xa re' ok ti cansanic na'n tak , ra̱j rik'orom chi xatiq'uic tak chic k'e̱' china̱ chaj bih rik'or i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios .

Re' aj take nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiwi̱j , niyew chic queh chi naquic'acharic chi junelic eh ru'um re' , naquiquimok je ma' eta quicahnic chi camnak take chi junpech maj pa nik'ab c'ololque̱b . Nok chi je' re' wilque̱b wu̱c' , ma' hab ta wach jeno' wilic rajawric chi eta nak rimak' take pa nik'ab .

Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic aweh tak re're' , nik'or wo' aweh tak chi xa nic' yu' chi kawach narichalic rik'ijil nok re' Dios re' aj ye'ol reh sukquil c'uxlis narisacham wach chi junpech i rajawric i aj Yahm re' Satanas wo' ribihnal eh ru̱c' re're' nakayak'abem pan ko̱k chi junpech i rajawric wilic . Je re' k'uru' re' hin niban johtok niti̱j chi re' Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chiyew cho rinimal wach rato'bil chana̱ hat-tak wich aj niminel .

Chi je' re' riwi̱' quino'jbal naca'nam , re' take c'acharel re're' na wo' ca'nam qui̱b chi je' wo' ti chic aj niminel take xa re' la' pan ca̱mna ma' nquiyew ta k'ab reh Dios reh chi ru̱c' rajawric erijal i quino'jbal . Ru'um aj chi'nchel re're' nik'or aweh chi cu̱c' aj take c'acharel re're' ma̱min awi̱b .

Nic' pa' wach nc'uluric ru̱c' i kati'jolal je' aj wo' re' ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus . Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi k'e̱' hoj q'uihal chipam rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , q'uihleh wo' wach i camanic nka'n chi'nchel i hoj . Re' cok ru' to̱b ta q'uihleh wach take camanic nka'n , xa jenaj wo' kawi̱' pan suk laj c'uxlis chi rinimjic i Jesus , je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' take ric'u'lej wi̱' ri̱b kati'jolal chi xa jenaj wo' quiwi̱' nok wilque̱b .

Je' re' k'uru' Ti̱to , nic' pa' nimal take k'oric nitz'ihmbam je aweh , chac'ul take maj til coric laj k'oric take . Ru'um aj chi re' take coric laj k'oric re're' , re' wo' re' nto'bonic queh pan quic'acharic take nic' pa' nimal quic'ulbic reh pan ca̱mna eh chi re' wo' re' nrakmajic wi̱' chiri̱j nic' wach nakato'bej take kas kacha̱k' , til nipahkaj aweh chi re' wo' take k'oric re're' chachop wi̱' ac'ux chi rik'ormojic queh niminel aj Cre̱ta . Je' re' cha'n reh chi re' take re' ar chic eno̱j quicapew-bal chi risiq'uiric ri̱j nic' wach ritobjic cas quicha̱k' naca'nam .

Je' re' ajic re' ribano̱j i ma' Awraham xc'uhtunic wi̱' chi re're' xicoj wach rik'orbal i Dios eh re' ricorquil ribiral re're' nc'utunic wach chi manlic ru'um i k'oro̱j ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios . Ar rik'or chi re' ma' Awraham xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' xiban , re' Dios xipahba̱' chi jenaj c'acharel coric wach ric'ux . Ma' xa ta re're' , je' la' wo' re' Dios xicoj i ma' Awraham til rich k'orom chic !
Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel chic reh lok'omaj wach Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi chi'nchel take c'acharel xa jenaj ok wach quilok'il chayew tak .

Re' take k'oric qui'elic cho pan kachi̱' nakojk'oric , xa je' na ricab richuhquil nelic cho pan jeno' muk'unbal nanteheric cok na̱ . Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' i k'oric nka'n re' take quibirinic keh quicahnic chi ma' suk ta quic'ux . Je' wo' , re' hoj xa chucuj k'oric nka'n nakojk'oric . Je' ricab i riti'quilal ncojoric jeno' c'acharel ru'um i riqui̱ ti'o̱j riban jeno' a̱k' , re' take k'oric qui'elic cho pan kachi̱' nquicoj riti'quil ca̱mna take quibirinic keh .

Je' aj re' ru' re' hat-tak bahilbe̱s , tanlic chaweh chi chac'ax awehq'ue̱n tak eh cha'n tak je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n tak maj re' bahilbe̱s re' ric'ax i rehq'ue̱n til chi ribil wo' ri̱b c'ahchi' ric'axam ri̱b .

Re' chic i rik'ormojic xniban lok chi re' Dios riyew reh c'acharel re' rich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j chi enc'acharic chi coric chic wach ric'ux , chaj bih enik'or k'uru' chi xc'uluric cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh je' wo' ku̱c' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ? Re' wili nik'or : To̱b ta nak ma' queht'alim ta chi re' Dios naribanam cu̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi equic'acharic chi coric chic wach quic'ux , re' take re' je' re' xbanaric ru̱c' quic'acharic ,

Je' wo' , curman chi re' take re' chi sak pa̱m quicapew-bal ru'um chi ma'xta chic quimahc chiwach i Dios , naquic'amam na̱ chi coric haj wilic i c'uhbal ma' keht'alim ta nak ru'um chi ma' ja' nquich'ica̱' ta nak quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus .

Je' ricab jeno' c'acharel xa quich aj niminel ok qui̱b ch'i̱l aj ehcham camanic , ma' ra̱j ta rik'orom chi xa ru'um chi aj niminel re' ncamanic cok wi̱' , eta nak riban chi ma' eta riyew riwa'ric . Ma'xta , naricamanic la' cok chiwach chi coric ru'um i c'axo̱j wilic pa ra̱mna chiri̱j re' ncamanic cok wi̱' eh til wo' chic k'e̱' naric'uhtunic rino'jbal chi coric ru'um nok re' ncamanic cok wi̱' xa cas quicha̱k' qui̱b pan niminic . Re' aj no'jbal wili chac'uhtaj eh chak'or queh take aj niminel reh chi naquirakam chiri̱j nic' wach i camanic naca'nam chi quiwach take quicamanic cok wi̱' .

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta re' Dios xa rinimej wo' i haj wilic i rik'or , ma' chi'nchel ta keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquinimej je' ricab xquik'or chi naca'nam . Ru'um chi je' re' wilic aweh tak je' wili naquik'orom : « A̱ , wi wilic take je' re' xca'n chi kaxilac , ra̱j na rik'orom k'uru' chi ru̱c' re're' , re' take c'acharel c'ahchi' ca'nam chi re' Dios ma' rinimej ta wo' chic take k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um ? nqui naquik'orom .

Je' aj re' ma' xquitok ta chic ritu̱k i Jesus xa re' la' jenaj queh take sol xihop cok pa rijojol i Jesus ru̱c' jenaj k'as ju' ch'ihch' eh naxiban chi je' re' , chi junc'am ti xelic cho riquiq'ue̱l ch'i̱l i riha'quil .
eh yu'na niyew wo' chic rik'ormojic aweh tak i jenaj chic tak'anic wili : K'e̱' ti' chawic'raj awi̱b tak chawach je' wo' ricab niban hin awu̱c' tak chi k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak .

Je' wo' chic nipahkaj aweh tak chi je' ricab riban jenaj sol chi nchalic chiwach i rinahsi̱l eh ricoj ri̱b chi rehquen i pa' bih tak'anic bano̱j reh , je' wo' re' hat-tak chak'ahsaj awi̱b tak chiwach i Dios chi ribanaric i holohic laj bano̱j eh ma̱k'ahsaj tak chic awi̱b chi mahcanic on chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal . Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak toco̱m chic riwi̱' ac'acharic tak je' chic ricab riwi̱' ric'acharic i c'acharel re' uctunak chic chi quixilac take camnak .

Je' aj re' tz'ihmbimaj chiqui̱j take nquicana̱' quiniminic , ra̱j i hoj ma' je' ta kacab take ma' nquitik ta ju' quiniminic . Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' xa risacharic quiwach ru'um i Dios c'ahchi' quipahkam chi quina̱ ru̱c' i quino'jbal re're' . Ra̱j nchel i hoj xa ch'iclic wo' kac'ux chiri̱j i kAja̱w reh chi re're' ekojrico'lej chiwach i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱ take aj mahc .

chi kawach johtok cu wilic rik'ijil nok re' co'lbal i̱b riyew i Dios narichalic chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel . Re' ric'uluric i wili xa nok wo' tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam i lok laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios . Chipam aj i hu̱j re're' je' wili k'oro̱j cho : “ Naribanam chi naructic cho jenaj aj co'lonel eh ar narichalic rira'il chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel . Re' aj co'lonel re're' naribanam chi ma'xta chic ca'nam i c'ahbilal nca'n take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Jacow re' ribihnej wo' chi Israhel .

je' ru̱c' ma' nca'n ta ribanaric re' haj wili nponic chiwach i kAja̱w Dios . Re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel re're' , junch'uk queh xicansanic cho queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios . Junch'uk chic take xicansanic cho reh kAja̱w Jesus re' Ajabe̱s cho chi kana̱ yu'na . Junch'uk wo' xi'esenic cho keh chipam atinamital tak .

Re' hoj keht'alim chic eh kac'ulum wo' chic i coric laj tijinic re' c'uhtumaj keh chiri̱j i Jesus . Wi re' hoj kojmahcanic ru̱c' kano'jbal chi ma' nka̱j ta chic katikim ju' kawih'ic chipam i tijinic re're' , ma' wo' re' chic rik'ahsjic ri̱b i Jesus pan quimic chi je' ricab jeno' si̱ enbanic chi encuyuric kamahc .

Je' re' ajic je' ricab xic'ul i kAja̱w Jesus chi ru̱c' rucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak xic'ul jenaj ac' la' c'acharic , je' wo' chic re' xc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj naxiquetelej cho kawach i Dios . Ma' xa ta re're' xiban je' la' wo' re' i Dios xiban je' ricab nbanaric reh jeno' c'acharel chi nye'eric rilok'il nancojoric cok pa risec'a̱j jeno' k'atal k'oric eh je' re' nik'or maj je' wo' re' xiban ku̱c' i hoj naxiyew wo' cok riye'a̱b i Jesus chipam i ye'a̱b k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach rilok'il ar pan taxa̱j .

Chi je' chic re' ano'jbal tak , nik'or wo' aweh tak chi chawesaj tak lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak i chucuj laj k'oric eh xa coric ok wo' tik'orok tak cu̱c' take awich aj niminel tak . Je' re' cha'n tak ru'um chi xa jenaj chic wach kac'ux wilco̱j wi̱' .

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' xojquitolej chi ric'amaric na̱ i c'uhbal re're' , re' hoj je' wili xkak'or queh : « Ma'xta , re' hoj ma' jaruj ta eriban wo' chic chi enkac'am na̱ i c'uhbal re' cow nak'or tak keh chi rinimjic , kojqui queh . Je' aj re' xkak'or queh ru'um nok xka̱j chi re' holohic laj c'uhbal re' nk'oric keh ricorquilal nic' wach nakarak kaco'lbal , ma' eta nacana̱' tak rinimjic hat-tak .

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak i wili : Wi jeno' hab wach nk'oric pan toco̱m chic k'oric re' ma' nrakmajic ta wo' chiri̱j cu'um take quibirinic reh , chipahkaj reh kAja̱w Dios chi ye'erok ta nak wo' reh chi nchol risakomsjic wach ru' queh take ras richa̱k' c'ahchi' quibirinic reh .

Chipam take k'i̱j re're' , re' Sa̱wlo xchalic ric'a̱ eh xiyo'slom take quiniminic reh kAja̱w Jesus ru̱c' rik'ororic queh chi naricansam take . Pan jenaj queh take k'i̱j re're' , xo̱j ru̱c' i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios

Je' re' ajic re' hin xnico'lej take c'acharel re' ayeb take wi̱n chi naqui̱nquihch'ilem eh yu'na xnik'or wili chi cu wilqui̱n pe ayu' wach ac'al maj nwa̱j chi re' take re' enquibiraj re're' . Ru̱c' re're' ensukbic quic'ux chi manlic je' ricab nok nsukbic wo' nic'ux i hin to̱b ta q'uisi̱n chic ma' nicana̱' take cahnok ru'um chi nanisoljic wo' chic johtok awu̱c' .

Re' la' hat-tak sukbok ac'ux tak ru'um chi hat-tak chic jenaj chipam ricuyuric take ti'c'axic xic'ul wo' cho kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' re' cha'n tak reh chi nachirak cho rik'ijil chi naric'uhtam wo' chic ri̱b ru̱c' i rinimal i rilok'il , yohbal wo' wach nasukbok ac'ux tak .

Naxwilow chi je' re' xnitz'ehtaj chi coric eh xwilow chipam i xa je' ricab ma' laj tz'ih re're' wilque̱b take q'uih ch'uk wach chicop quic'acharic wach ac'al je' ru̱c' take quejeb cok ch'i̱l take josk' laj chicop , ch'i̱l take chicop xa nquijuquej qui̱b wach ac'al , ch'i̱l wo' take quirupunic wa taxa̱j .

xa re' la' yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' c'acharic na'n tak . Ru'um aj re' ma' eta wo' chic riban chi enbanjic take wili : Re' c'ahanic i̱b , re' josk'il , re' ma' tob laj capew-bal chi ribanaric c'ahbilal , re' tz'uju̱j i̱b ch'i̱l i c'ahbil laj k'oric nelic xak achi̱' tak .

xa cahnic xo̱j riban cu̱c' chi patanic ru'um chi re' ricamaj ru' jenaj wach ch'i̱l ricamaj i Aqui̱la . Re' quicamaj take re' , aj p'ojol pi̱m laj tz'ih je' ru̱c' nquicoj chi quipa̱t take aj behel . Je' re' ajic pan tak xilac k'i̱j reh xama̱na , re' ma' Lu̱' riban ricamaj ch'i̱l Aqui̱la

Ru'um chi re' riwi̱' i c'acharic naka'nam curman chi je' ok ricab riwi̱' ric'acharic i Jesus , re' hin til nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' ok chic re' i mahc wilic rajawric chana̱ tak , je' ricab nok jeno' k'atal k'oric wilic rajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel choplic quina̱ ru'um . Je' re' k'uru' ma' riban chic chi re' mahc enwih'ic rajawric chana̱ tak . Je' re' cha'n tak reh chi re' ati'jolal abakil tak ewo' ricana̱' ribanaric i ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j .

Queh take jarub pa' take chi aj niminel je' re' nca'n chaxilac tak , nkapahkaj je queh wili je' ricab chi re' ta nak i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric c'ahchi' ripahkanic je queh : « Chacuy , ma' tiwih'ic tak chic pan siquilal ticamanok la' tak rakbal ritz'akil awa' aha̱' tak , nqui nkak'or je queh .

« Chi quixilac take pe̱t lajeb rac'u̱n i Jacow xoquic cho ch'i'c pan ca̱mna chiri̱j i quicha̱k' Chep . Ru'um aj re' xquic'ayej je quicha̱k' queh take ju'jun aj yaco̱l re' xic'ayanic wo' chic reh chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch ar pan tinamit Eji̱pto . Re' cok ru' , re' Dios ma' xicana̱' ta chi rutquel i Chep ar Eji̱pto ,

Pan jenaj k'i̱j nok quimolom qui̱b take aj niminel , jenaj queh aj k'orol re're' Aca̱wo ribihnal , xpa'lajic johtok chi quiwach take wilque̱b ar eh je' wili take k'oric xik'or queh chi ye'o̱j reh ru'um Lok' laj Uxlabal : « Chi junsut riyuk'ul Jure̱ya narichalic jenaj rinimal wi'jalel , nqui xik'or queh . Re' wi'jalel c'ahchi' rik'oric chiri̱j , re' aj wo' re' xc'uluric pa rik'ijil rik'atoj k'oric ma' Cala̱wyo .
Nok ricohlam chic take k'oric re're' , re' ma' Lu̱' xixuc'a̱' ri̱b , xiban riti̱j ch'i̱l take chi'nchel rich c'amol be̱h re're'

Ru̱c' aj re're' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak i wili nic' pa' q'uihal hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Jesus : Je' ricab nok re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xcansjic ar wach curu̱s , je' wo' na re' xa'n hat-tak ru̱c' take pa' bih no'jbal no̱j wi̱' ac'ux tak ch'i̱l wo' i na'n tak ru'um chi chopo̱j ana̱ tak ru'um i mahc chi je' na wa'ric xacansaj wo' tak wach ar wach curu̱s ru̱c' riquimic i Jesus .
Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , sukbok ac'ux tak nanac'ul tak rehreh wach ti'c'axic re' riyew k'ab i Dios chi enchalic chana̱ tak ilbal reh nic' wach wilic animinic tak chiwach .

Ru'um chi je' re' rik'or i c'uhbal re're' wilic take c'acharel nquik'or aweh tak chi je' wili : « Re' hoj wilco̱j pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Dios . Ru'um aj re' ma' re' ta k'orel to̱b ta pa rik'ekomil i mahc c'acharic nka'n , nqui nquik'or . Re' take c'acharel re're' ma' coric ta laj k'oric c'ahchi' quik'orom , ma' wo' c'ahchi' ta quic'acharic so' je' ricab rik'or i coric laj tijbal c'uhtumaj ru'um Jesus .
Ar ajic xilow chi re' pan taxa̱j xteh cok pa̱m eh xkajic cho wach ac'al i xa je' jenaj ma' laj tz'ih pixo̱j cho chi ju'jun reh ricajtz'u'c ,
chi kunchelal i hoj re' je' wili ribihnal katinamital ? Re' hoj aj Pa̱rtiya , aj Me̱rya , aj Elam , aj pa riyuk'ul Mesopota̱mya ch'i̱l Jure̱ya , aj Caparo̱sya , aj Po̱nto , aj A̱sya ,

Je' re' pahkanic nka'n pan kati̱j reh chi etic'acharic tak chiwach i Dios je' ricab riwi̱' chaweh tak chi etic'acharic tak chi ana'bem tak chic wach i Dios . Je' wo' pan kati̱j , kojpahkanic wo' reh chi xa ewo' nponic chiwach i Dios ano'jbal ena'n tak chiwach . Je' wo' chic , naniban niti̱j chawi̱j tak nipahkaj wo' johtok chi re' ribanaric holohic laj camanic chiwach i Dios q'uihok ta nak wach awu̱c' tak je' ricab nca'n take che̱' chi quiq'uihic johtok cu rehtal quiwachanic . Je' wo' , nipahkaj wo' chi nimbok ta nak wach awu̱c' tak i no'jbal chi reht'aljic wach i Dios chi coric .

Re' hat Timote̱yo re' xa'n chi til je' hat wac'u̱n ru̱c' rinimjic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus , nik'or aweh chi chanimej take k'oric wili re' ric'u'lej ri̱b ch'i̱l i k'oro̱j cho najtir k'i̱j ru'um i rUxlabal i Dios chawi̱j i hat . Re' aj wili take k'oric na̱nimem : Je' ricab nca'n take sol nquiyew quic'ux chi manlic chi k'ak'anic je' wo' re' hat chayew ac'ux chi manlic chi rik'eteric quiwach take aj c'uhbalanel re' ma' coric ta quic'uhtunic nca'n .

Chiri̱j chic ric'uhtjic wi̱n nic' wach risahchic wach i tinamit Wawilo̱nya , re' hin xnibiraj chi xa cow chic k'oric xca'n cho juntuhm chi tinamit ar pan taxa̱j eh je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom : « Ye'erok rilok'il i Dios maj xa re' wo' re' nco'lonic keh eh xa re' wo' re' k'e̱' nimal wach rajawric . Je' wo' , xa re' wo' re' sutumaj ri̱j ru'um i riholonquilal i sakom wilic wi̱' .

Najtir cho k'i̱j nok xa re' nak i mahc na'n tak cho ribanaric , re' hat-tak je' nak acab tak cho camnak ru̱c' ano'jbal tak . Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel camnak ma' nbirinic ta chic , je' wo' re' hat-tak ma' tibirinic ta wo' nak tak k'oric chiwach i Dios .

Re' hin enik'or aweh tak chi ma' eta riban chi etoquic tak jenaj chipam rinimjic kawa' kaha̱' nka'n chi c'ahchi' ric'ulic cho pan kac'ux i riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus eh ewo' chic toquic tak jenaj chipam take nink'i̱j nbanjic chi riye'eric quilok'il take ma' tob laj uxlabal . Je' re' k'uru' ma' eta riban chi je' ta nak ena'n awa' aha̱' tak nah rime̱xa i kAja̱w Jesus eh ewo' chic na'n awa' aha̱' tak chipam jeno' nink'i̱j re' c'ahchi' rilok'onjic wi̱' quiwach take ma' tob laj uxlabal ru̱c' quilok'onjic take tiyo̱x .

Je' wo' , ru'um chi re' hat-tak , hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios , ma'xta bih aweh tak chi enelic cho abiral tak chi c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ribanaric take wili : Re' take ribanaric xa chi'nchel wach c'oyomal ch'i̱l ribanaric take yibel wach no'jbal eh ch'i̱l wo' c'axo̱j tak wach bihomal .

Je' re' k'uru' Ti̱to , re' k'oric wili chac'uhtaj queh take aj niminel : Chi queh take quisakbem chic wach i ca̱mna ru̱c' rinimjic i Jesus , re' ric'uxuric take nic' pa' q'uihal c'uxbal rik'or chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j cho reh i Moyses chi ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric , ma' ricoj ta kamahc chiwach i Dios . Pa ricorquilal , wilic take aj c'uhbalanel nujunak pan ca̱mna reh c'ahbilal eh quicowsam chic i ca̱mna chi ma'xta quicojom wach ribiral i Jesus . Re' take re' , to̱b ta re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j cho reh Moyses rik'or chi wilic take c'uxbal tare̱t chi c'uxuric , nquik'or chi re' ric'uxuric take c'uxbal re're' ricoj quimahc take c'acharel chiwach i Dios . Til coric , re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' xa chiri̱j chic ribanaric i c'ahbilal no̱j i quicapew-bal eh wi xca'n jeno' c'ahbilal ma' nquic'raj ta qui̱b chi wilic ta nak quimahc .

Ru̱c' aj c'uhbalanic riban Sa̱wlo , re' nic' pa' q'uihal take quibirinic reh je' wili nquik'or chi quiwach chi xa nsahchic chic quic'ux : « Re' winak wili re' nak re' nbanic ti'c'axic ar Jerusalen queh take quik'oric ribihnal i Jesus pan quiti̱j , maje' ? nqui nquik'or . Je' wo' , wilic wo' nquik'or chi je' wili chiri̱j : « Re' winak re're' xc'ulic lok ayu' chi quichoporic take aj niminel chi naric'amam je take chi quiwach take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios , nqui nquik'or . Je' re' nok nanquibiraj chi re' Sa̱wlo c'ahchi' rik'orom ribiral i Jesus , wilic take c'acharel xquicapaj chi xa jot'o̱l queh take aj niminel reh Jesus no̱j c'olok pan tak pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ,

Je' re' nok , re' ricamaj i Jesus ar pan taxa̱j chi nahsil aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios , k'e̱' wo' chic riwa'ric chiwach i camanic xca'n take aj k'ahsem si̱ ayu' wach ac'al . Je' re' nik'or maj re're' i pahbamaj chi eno̱j elok wach i tik'inic re' k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chiwach i tik'inic bano̱j cho cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't eh nik'or chi je' re' ru'um nok naxiban i ac' laj tik'inic ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel , re' take k'oric xik'or cahnok ribiral i Dios chi naribanam ku̱c' hoj k'e̱' wo' chic holonquil chiwach take k'oric rik'orom cho ribiral queh take kama̱m kati't .

Ru'um aj chi ma' weht'alim ta wi ayu' pan che̱' wilqui̱n naquinquimok je , re' wili nik'or aweh tak : Chi wi̱n hin , re' nye'bic reh nic'acharic re' wo' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' re' nok wi xinquimic je , k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chi wi̱n maj naniwih'ic ru̱c' i Jesus chi junpech .

Re' holohic laj camanic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak re're' , re' hin til ch'iclic nic'ux chi re' Dios re' xye'bic ano'jbal tak chi rip'uturic i camanic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak , re' wo' re' narito'bonic aweh tak chi ritikiric ju' re're' cu rehtal cho i k'i̱j nac'olok cho rica'pech i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

ma' hab ta wach keh hoj narijot'om kacapew-bal maj re' hoj keht'alim chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh rAc'u̱n wo' i Dios , xc'ulic lok ayu' wach ac'al chi riye'eric keh chi eht'aljic wach i Dios re' ma' hab ta chic jeno' wach coric wach chiwach ru' . Ru'um aj re' , re' hoj yu'na nkarak chic chiri̱j chi wilco̱j ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i coric wach Dios maj wilco̱j wo' chic pan k'ab i Jesus re' manlic wo' Dios chi kana̱ eh manlic aj Ye'ol Junelic C'acharic .

Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak chayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j ribanaric chi'nchel i pa' bih holohic laj no'jbal re' nbanic chi etiwih'ic tak pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take chi'nchel c'acharel . Til ru̱c' wo' chi'nchel awansil cha'n tak re're' chi xa je' na nchel ricab hat-tak k'orel china̱ risukquilal quic'acharic take ru' .

Jenaj chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom . Chiri̱j i rik'ormojic chi c'ahchi' kuy'em chi re' Jesus naco̱j rico'lem chi junelic , re' hin nwa̱j nipahkam aweh tak chi re' take k'oric re're' ma̱cana̱' tak ricojoric wach , til la' chacowsaj ac'ux tak chiri̱j maj keht'alim chi re' Dios wi rik'orom chi re' Jesus je' re' naribanam , til naribanam chi narimanlajic wach i k'oro̱j cho re're' .

« Re' hin nik'orom chic lok aweh tak chi ma' re' ta ayu' wach ac'al nancahnic . Re' take c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al ma'xta cajawric chi riye'eric cahnok sukquil c'uxlis queh take quicahnic cahnok , raj i hin ma' je' ta nicab take c'acharel re're' . Ru'um aj re' , chi cu wilqui̱n pe chaxilac tak niyew aweh tak i suk laj c'uxlis eh niyew aweh tak take tak'anic wili : Chi ma' chi bih nyot'ic wi̱' ac'ux tak eh chi ma' chi bih wo' noquic cho wi̱' ayo'jic tak .

Je' aj re' ru'um chi re' Dios xiyew keh i Lok' laj rUxlabal , re' hoj til cow ch'iclic kac'ux ru̱c' i Dios chi re're' narijalam wach i kati'jolal eh nok chi cu wilco̱j pe ayu' wach ac'al ru̱c' i kati'jolal wili re' hoj keht'alim chi cu ja' wilco̱j ta pe johtok ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus ar pan taxa̱j .

Chi je' re' camaj naxinc'ulic lok ayu' wach ac'al , wi wilic ta nak jeno' c'acharel ma' ric'am ta na̱ i niC'uhbal ribiraj wu̱c' , ma' re' ta hin equink'oric reh chi re' c'acharel re're' ric'ul chi reh ric'uluric i ti'c'axic ru'um reh rino'jbal maj ma' re' ta re' riwi̱' naxinchalic ayu' wach ac'al , xinchalic la' chi quico'ljic take c'acharel chiwach i ti'c'axic .

Ru̱c' aj re' , re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi c'ul kac'ax tak ki̱b chi kawach ma' ok nkixowej wach jeno' kas kacha̱k' je' ricab xiban i Cayin re' xicansaj i richa̱k' ru'um reh c'ahbilal xcojoric pa ra̱mna ru'um aj Yahm . Chaj bih riwi̱' naxicansaj i richa̱k' ? Xa ru'um chi rixowej wach i richa̱k' maj re' take ribano̱j i Cayin ma' holohic ta take eh tz'a̱b ru' i richa̱k' , holohic take ribano̱j eh xa coric wo' wach ric'ux chiwach i Dios .
Naxchalic i ti'c'axic re're' , chi'nchel take ye'a̱b sutumaj qui̱j ru'um ha' , ch'i̱l take nimak tak yu̱k' sahchic quiwach , ma' cu ta chic xic'utunic take .

Chi je' aj re' , xa ru̱c' jenaj chi winak re' ma' Awraham ch'i̱l i rehq'ue̱n , xp'uhtic cho re' xc'uluric wili : Xa re' wo' chawil take riq'uihal ch'imi̱l ar pan taxa̱j on xa re' wo' chawil riq'uihal i sani̱b chi chi̱' rinimal ha' , re' take riq'uihal rihrima̱m i ma' Awraham ma' hab ta wach eriban canar cajlajic ru'um chi k'e̱' q'uihal take . Ma' xa ta wo' xc'uluric re're' , til pe' wo' xq'uihbic wach take ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Awraham xa ru̱c' ti i jenaj chi rac'u̱n re' xasjic nok johtonak chic rihabil eh xa q'uisi̱n nak chic ma' nponic rik'ijil riquimic .

Ru'um aj re' chi til wo' coric take k'oric nik'or , je' wili ti̱j niban : Xa jenaj wo' Dios wilic re' nkalok'ej wach eh xa re' wach re' til manlic aj no'jbal . Re' kaDios re're' til manlic K'atal K'oric chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom , ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al rilom wach eh ma' quimic ta wo' ri̱j . Til k'ormojok chi junelic k'i̱j sakom chi re're' k'e̱' rinimal rilok'il wilic eh k'e̱' wo' nimal wach rajawric , nqui ti̱j niban .

Re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom chi cow : « Chayohbalej tak wach i kAja̱w Dios eh chayew tak rilok'il maj xponic chic rik'ijil chi narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit . Chalok'ej tak wach maj re're' xtik'inic reh taxa̱j ac'al , re' xtik'inic reh rinimal ha' eh je' wo' take chi'nchel rasbal ha' , nqui xik'or .

Chipam aj wo' take cho k'i̱j nok c'ahchi' rijohtic wach riq'uihal aj niminel , re' take aj niminel quik'oric pan criye̱co xo̱j quik'or cu̱c' cablaj chi nahsil c'amol be̱h chaj bih c'ahchi'que̱b take aj niminel quik'oric pan hewre̱yo . Je' aj wili xo̱j quik'or : « Re' take cahnel ixok quik'oric pan kak'orbal ma' c'ahchi' ta quic'ulum i to'bal npuhcjic kalakal cu'um take niminel quik'oric pan hewre̱yo . Ru'um aj re' , re' ok chic hat-tak tipuhcunok tak reh to'bal nye'eric , nqui take cok .

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta nchel enac'ul tak i ti'c'axic , re' hat-tak cha'n tak i coric maj til re' wili riwi̱' chi xatyuk'unjic tak chi rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Re're' ru'um chi xiban i coric , xic'ul i ti'c'axic eh ru̱c' re're' xic'uhtaj aweh tak chaj bih ra̱j chi na̱banam tak . Cha'n aj tak k'uru' je' ricab xiban ru'

Ma' xa re' ta re' xka'n , xkak'or la' aweh tak chi na̱nimem tak i no'jbal wili naxojwih'ic wo' cho chaxilac tak : « Ma' hab ta wach jeno' c'acharel tanlic chiri̱j chi eriyew riwa' riha̱' jeno' c'acharel ma' raj ta camanic , nqui xkak'or cho aweh tak .

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic kojric'ax cho chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel , re're' xitak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al i xa jenaj wo' ti chi rAc'u̱n chiwach , reh chi xa hab wach i c'acharel erich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j ma' eta chic nquimic chi junpech naric'acharic la' chi junelic ar ru̱c' i Dios .

je' pe wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um ma' tob laj uxlabal : « Re' hin weht'alim nic' wach rajawric i Jesus , je' wo' i rajawric ma' Lu̱' , raj nchel hat-tak ma'xta nech' ok awajawric tak chi equinawesaj tak lok , nqui xk'ormojic queh .

Chiri̱j chic ru' re' hin xwilow wach i ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal , ch'i̱l wo' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al eh ch'i̱l wo' take q'uih tuhm chi sol quimolom qui̱b chi k'ak'anic ru̱c' i tz'uklic nah sak ri̱j cawa̱y chi rich'i̱l wo' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch re' quihch'ilinic reh chi riso̱l .

chi kich'i̱l je Arista̱rco aj Tesalo̱nica re' wilic pa riyuk'ul Masero̱nya , xoj-oquic je chipam jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa re' xchalic pan tinamit Atrami̱to ribihnal eh iq'uic nak ponok reh pan tak tinamit wilque̱b chi chi̱' ha' pa riyuk'ul i A̱sya eh chipam i cano̱wa re're' xoj-elic je chipam i tinamit re're' , re' Sesare̱ya ribihnal .

Je' wo' c'olok pan ac'ux tak quitobjic take c'acharel re' tz'apalque̱b take pan che̱' ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral riC'uhbal i kAja̱w Jesus . Nic' pa' wach nawa̱j tak chi ti' etic'rinjic tak je' ricab wi ta nak tz'apalca̱t tak pan che̱' quich'i̱l , je' wo' re' ti'quilal chawic'raj tak take ru' . Je' wo' re' cha'n tak chi quitobjic take toco̱m chic c'acharel re' nquic'ul ti'c'axic maj nic' ok pa' chic , re' chic hat-tak etiq'uic tak pan jeno' c'axquilal re' enye'eric wo' wi̱' chi ti' ati'jolal abakil tak .

Ru̱c' take nipahkaj je aweh tak re're' , nwa̱j wo' nipahkam aweh tak chi xa pa' jaric ra̱j k'ormojic on xa pa' jaric camanic ra̱j banaric , chi'nchel re're' chak'or tak eh cha'n tak chi c'ahchi' ac'uhtam tak lok chi hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus eh ru̱c' re're' nacha'n tak johtok ritioxjic i Jesus ru'um reh rajawric , nariye'eric wo' ritioxjic i Dios re' rAja̱w i Jesus .
Re' hat-tak re' c'ahchi' ac'uhbaljic tak ru'um jeno' aj c'uhbalanel , tanlic chana̱ tak chi na̱to'bem tak awaj c'uhbalanel tak ru̱c' xa pa' bih suk ato̱b riyew cho aweh tak i kAja̱w Dios .

To̱b ta wo' re' Dios je' re' xik'or reh ma' Awraham , xa ta nak xye'eric junseht ok riye'a̱b ru'um i Dios naxc'ulic lok chi c'acharic ayu' . Re' cok ru' re' Dios xiyew rik'orbal reh chi je' wili : ‹ Til niyew nik'orbal aweh chi re' take awa̱' awi'sil naquehcham i ye'a̱b wili . Je' re' naric'uluric reh chi naquilok'em niwach ayu' , nqui cho reh . « Yu'na chacoj tak rehtal i wili : To̱b ta wo' re' ma' Awraham ja'xta nak cho riha'lac'u̱n chipam take cho k'i̱j re're' , re' Dios til wo' xik'or cho reh chi je' re' naribanam ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil .

Re' k'atal k'oric re're' xoquic chi quijot'oric take kaj najtir k'i̱j ru̱c' riye'eric cow laj camanic chi quina̱ reh chi ma'xta chic quitiquim qui̱b . Ma' xa ta re're' xquic'ul pan k'ab , k'e̱' la' wo' ti'quilal xquilow wach maj naxk'ormojic queh chi ma'xta chic quic'a'chsam take cuc' cac'u̱n , tok'lic npon quicana̱' cho quiha'lac'u̱n pan jeno' ye'a̱b reh chi ar naquiquimic chi cutquel .
Xa chiwach wo' ti junc'am re're' , re' ma' Luch ch'i̱l i hin re' kich aj tahkanel ki̱b , xoj-o̱j ilo̱l rimuk'unbal .
« Chi je' aj re' nicamaj chiwach i Dios , re' hin xa nicowej wo' wi̱b reh chi ma' jaruj ta encojoric rimahquilal wo̱k nik'ab chiwach i Dios , on chi quiwach take wich c'acharel ,

Ma' xa re' ta re' nik'or chiqui̱j take aj tijinel re're' , je' la' wo' nik'or chi xa je' na ricab nok re' nimak tak ribohl ha' xa pan ansil chic nc'ulic ricut lok chi' ha' take xa pa' bih jaric rimol cho , re' take aj tijinel re're' ru̱c' i c'ahbil laj quik'orbal ch'i̱l c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n nquesaj lok wach sakom chaj bih take ma' holohic ta laj capew-bal wilic cho pan ca̱mna . Chiri̱j lok chi'nchel wili , til nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak chi je' ricab take behel laj ch'imi̱l nok quichopom chic je quibe̱h qui'o̱j sahchok xa pa' pan k'ekom ak'ab , re' take aj tijinel re're' naquiye'eric wo' ru'um i Dios pa rinimal k'ekom ak'ab re' naquic'ulum wi̱' ti'c'axic

maj re' hin ma' re' ta ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel xnic'ul rik'ormojic . Xa ta wo' nak jeno' c'acharel xc'uhtunic wi̱n i c'uhbalanic , re' la' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xc'uhtunic wi̱n rinabjic pa̱m i c'uhbal re're' .

ra̱j najtir cho k'i̱j ma' je' ta re' xka'n cho . Nok cu hoj nak aj mahc re' hoj xa eli̱c wo' k'e̱' xkotowej ribanaric i mahc eh riman chic xiban i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses chi xkotowej ribanaric take bano̱j re' xa nca'n chi re' take c'acharel nca'n re're' ma' eta quic'acharic ru̱c' i Dios chiri̱j quiquimic .

eh reh chi naribirmijic i haj wilic ra̱j i Dios , re' Jesus xiripahba̱' chi aj k'orol ribiral ric'acharic . Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom wili ma' chucuj k'oric ta , til la' coric chiwach Jesus . Ma' xa re' ta re' xiban wu̱c' i Jesus , xiripahba̱' la' wo' chi hin aj tijinel je' wo' chi aj c'uhbalanel queh take tinamit ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel reh chi nanik'orom queh ricorquilal i c'uhbal re're' , re' ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux i hoj aj niminel reh Jesus .

Ru'um aj re' hab wach ric'am na̱ take riC'uhbal i Dios , re're' pan k'ab i Dios wilic ric'acharic eh re' wo' re' wilic ru̱c' chi junelic . Nic' aj wach nok re' hoj enkeht'alij chi re' Dios wilic pan kac'acharic ? Re' hoj enkeht'alij re're' ru'um reh Lok' laj Uxlabal xiyew keh .
Ru'um aj re' , re' hoj aj niminel riwi̱' chi keh chi nakac'acharic chi c'ahchi' kacapam ri̱j haj wilic i tare̱t chi banaric , ma' xa ta keh i hoj je' la' wo' chi tare̱t wo' chi queh i kas kacha̱k' .

Jenaj chic no'jbal niyew chawach tak eh re' no'jbal re're' chi tic'acharok tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak . Ma' hab wach aweh tak ncapewenic chi k'e̱' wo' chic rino'jbal chi quiwach take toco̱m ras richa̱k' eh ma̱ban wo' tak chi xa hat-tak k'itk'it . Je' re' ajic wi wilic jeno' je' ru̱c' xa ma'xta ti riwa'ric chaxilac tak ma̱ban tak chi ma' eta chic natuna̱' awi̱b tak ru̱c' , tiwih'ok la' ch'i̱l pan junwachil chi xa ch'ublic ti ac'ux tak .

Je' wo' chic , til nik'or aweh tak chi chawesaj tak lok pan awa̱mna tak chi'nchel i c'ahbilal je' ricab take wili : Re' cakcatil , re' c'ahanic i̱b , re' josk'il , re' wolonic i̱b , re' tz'akoj tak wach c'uta̱j chiri̱j awas acha̱k' tak ch'i̱l chi'nchel nic' pa' nimal take toco̱m chic yibel wach no'jbal .

Re' aj nipahbabjic chi ac'uhbaljic hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios , re' wo' Dios xtik'inic wach . Je' re' nik'or maj re' aj re' xye'bic wo' nicamaj chi aj ilo̱l reh ac'acharic hat-tak aj niminel . Je' re' ajic re' hin , hin pahbamaj ru'um i Dios reh chi ru̱c' lok' laj riC'uhbal enisakomej wach aweh tak chi manlic i no'jbal wili :
Re' rismal na̱ xa sak chic , xa je' chic ricab risakil i sak laj no̱k' on xa je' chic ricab i risakil i sak laj su̱tz' . Re' take nak' wach xa nworwotic chic xa je' chic ricab xak i k'a̱k' .

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta wilic ti'c'axic chi kana̱ ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus , re' hoj nkacuy chi'nchel re're' ru'um chi ti' tikic'raj tak . Je' re' nka'n reh chi equiq'uihbic take c'acharel enquirak chiri̱j i rinimal wach ric'axbal i Dios . Ru̱c' re're' ewo' quiq'uihbic take c'acharel equiye'bic ritioxjic i Dios eh chi je' re' ewo' ric'ul rilok'il .

Je' re' ajic je' ricab nok re' c'acharel re' nehtric ru̱c' ric'uxuric ritibquilal i me̱' ch'i̱l ruc'jic i ha' tik'imaj ru̱c' i ri̱s u̱wa nehtric wo' ru̱c' ricuse'sbal i Dios , je' wo' re' i c'acharel re' nehtric ru̱c' niti'quil nehtric wo' ru̱c' nic'acharic eh ru̱c' re' , re' wo' hin quinc'acharic chipam ric'acharic i c'acharel re're' .
Re' Ma̱rta je' wili xik'or : « Ho̱' Ha̱w , nicoj wach chi'nchel xak'or maj weht'alim chi re' hat i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric tak'amaj cho ayu' wach ac'al eh hat wo' rAc'u̱n , nqui reh .

eh chi xa jenaj chic wach quic'ux , xa eli̱c wo' xquimol qui̱b chi ribirmijic i c'uhbalanic nca'n take aj nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus , je' wo' xa eli̱c wo' xquimol qui̱b chi ric'uxuric i caxlan wi'c rehtalil riquimic i Jesus je' wo' chi ribanaric quiti̱j chiwach i Dios .

Je' wo' , k'e̱' nponic chawach chi naribanaric i coric wach no'jbal , raj i c'ahbil laj no'jbal ch'i'c nawilow . Je' wo' chic , je' ricab nanchihiric wach i c'acharel noquic chi k'atal k'oric cu nbuch'uric i wach na̱ ru̱c' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m , je' wo' re' xniban aweh i hin Dios , xatnichih wo' chi quixilac take awich k'atal k'oric eh xniyew aweh jenaj nim laj sukquil c'uxlis ma' jaruj ta c'uhlel wach , nqui xik'or .
Chipam aj take k'i̱j re're' , re' Hero̱res xitak'a̱' ricansjic i Jaco̱wo re' richa̱k' i Wa̱n , chi c'ul k'as re̱ mache̱t .

Je' wo' , chipam i camanic wilca̱t wi̱' ma̱min awi̱b ru̱c' take k'oric wi ma' re' ye'bal rilok'il i Dios eh ma' to'bonel ta wo' queh take quibirinic reh . Je' re' nik'or aweh maj re' take nquimin qui̱b ru̱c' take k'oric je' re' riman chic nquimin qui̱b chipam i no'jbal je' ru̱c' ma' riyew ta rilok'il Dios .

Til coric nik'or aweh tak xa hab wach rixowej wach i ras richa̱k' , re're' xa je' na ricab jeno' aj cansanel ras richa̱k' nok wilic chiwach i Dios eh re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi ma' jeno' aj cansanel erirak i junelic c'acharic ru̱c' i Dios wi ma' xicana̱' ribanaric i mahc .

Nok ka'nam chic kawa' , re' Jesus je' wili xik'or reh Simon re' ribihnej wo' chi Luch : « Simon , rac'u̱n i Jonas , til na k'e̱' ti' quinawic'raj i hat chiwach acamaj chi banol car ? nqui reh . Re' ma' Luch je' wili xik'or reh : « Ho̱' , Ha̱w re' hin k'e̱' wo' chic ti' tiwic'raj eh re' hat aweht'alim chi je' re' , nqui reh . Ru̱c' re're' , re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or reh : « Cu̱c' take qui'oquic chi waj tahkanel cha'n queh je' ricab i quiliric take cu̱c' me̱' nbanjic ru'um jeno' aj cha'jem me̱' , nqui reh .

Je' re' nok wilic take aj niminel xye'eric queh ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi ru̱c' t'ulic laj no'jbal enquik'or i c'uhbal ar nchalic rik'ormojic ru̱c' i Dios . Wilic wo' take xye'eric queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi naquisakomem wach i k'oric ye'o̱j queh ru'um i Dios .

cu re' la' chic pa rica'pech nok re' Chep xik'or ri̱b queh take ras , cu re' chic ar xquirak chiri̱j chi re' po' nchel quicha̱k' wilic ar chi raj to'o̱l i k'atal k'oric . Je' wo' , xiyew wo' chi eht'aljic reh k'atal k'oric hab wach i raja̱w , hab wach take ras je' wo' hab wach i richa̱k' .

Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak cha'n tak i coric maj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios je' wili rik'or : “ Wi jeno' c'acharel ra̱j c'acharic chi suk ric'ux eh ra̱j wo' chi enwih'ic sukquilal pa ric'acharic chiwach johtok take k'i̱j pa ric'acharic , re' c'acharel re're' curman chi naricana̱b rik'ormojic take chuh laj k'oric eh je' wo' curman chi ma'xta chic relic cho xak chi̱' rik'ormojic i chucuj laj k'oric .

Nic' pa' q'uihal take quiniminic reh riC'uhbal i Dios xiban xa jenaj chic wach quic'ux , xa jenaj chic wach ca̱mna quicapew-bal . Je' wo' , ma' hab ta wo' wach chi quixilac xik'or ta nak chi re' pa' bih wilic reh , xa reh ta nak chi rutquel , xiban la' chi queh chi quiwach pan comonil .

Re' take pe̱t k'oric xnik'or aweh tak chiri̱j i ribiral xnic'ul re're' ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus , re' take wili : Re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , xquimic reh chi xcuyuric kamahc . Je' wo' , chi re're' xquimic re' k'orel nic' pa' wo' wach je' tz'ihmbimaj cho chiri̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios .

Je' aj re' riwi̱' k'uru' , xinwilow i hin nok china̱ i ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya til chalic reh i rinimal ti'c'axic eh je' re' naric'uluric ru̱c' maj chipam ru' wilque̱b take c'acharel re' xicansanic queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios eh queh take aj niminel reh Dios re' take lok' laj ritinami̱t . Je' wo' chic ru'um reh take aj Wawilo̱nya wili xicansjic take riq'uihal c'acharel reh toco̱m chik yu̱k' q'uixca̱b ayu' wach ac'al .

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel birinic nca'n cok ar , xa suk chic quic'ux p'uht quitioxem johtok reh Dios ru'um i C'uhbal chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus c'ahchi' rik'ormojic queh . Je' re' nok , chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're' , re' ch'uku̱j wo' cho qui̱j ru'um i Dios chi naquico'ljic , yohbal wach q'uihal take xiniminic reh c'uhbal chiri̱j Jesus re' xiban i ma' Lu̱' .

Junpech aj wo' chic , re' Jesus re' nk'oric ricorquil i chi'nchel wili , rik'or wo' chic chi je' wili : « Til coric , xa loq'uil ti chalic wi̱n , nqui rik'or . Chi je' re' , re' hin xnic'u'lej johtok chi je' wili : « Quim kAja̱w Jesus . Tichalen ! quinqui reh .

Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak chatik tak ju' ribanaric je' ricab rik'or i tijinic c'uhtumaj aweh tak wu'um , re' ma' xa re' ta xnic'uhtaj aweh tak ru̱c' k'oric je' la' wo' xawilow tak ru̱c' nino'jbal naxinwih'ic chaxilac tak . Ru̱c' chi je' re' ena'n tak , re' Dios re' nye'bic cho sukquil c'uxlis nariwih'ic awu̱c' tak chi junelic .

Ru̱c' ripahkaljic aweh tak chi ma'xta chic atuna̱b awi̱b tak ru̱c' aj niminel re're' , nkapahkaj wo' aweh tak ma̱ban tak chi ma' nawa̱j ta tak chic wach , chacoj la' tak rino'jbal chi coric je' ricab na'n tak queh awich aj niminel tak re' take sukquil awu̱c' tak .

Hat-tak wich aj niminel , ma̱cana̱' awi̱b tak chi hab wach etirijot' tak ru̱c' take tijinic chiri̱j i Dios je' ru̱c' xa pan quicapew-bal take c'acharel nchalic eh ma'xta bih jeno' to'bonic ric'am cho aweh tak ru'um nok ma' ricorquilal ta nk'oric chiri̱j i Dios . Re' take tijinic re're' ma' re' ta ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xchalic rik'ormojic xa cu̱c' la' take c'acharel xchalic chi naca'nam ric'uhtjic on xa cu̱c' take ma' tob laj uxlabal re' wilic cajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel ma' quiniminic ta reh i Dios .

Je' re' ajic je' ricab riban jeno' aj ajamanel nanoquic je chi ajamanic xa re' chic i ye'a̱b haj nariponic wi̱' wilic pa ric'ux ru'um ra̱j ribanam canar jeno' risi̱ , je' wo' re' niban i hin . Yu'na xa re' chic risiq'uiric i no'jbal je' ricab ra̱j i Jesus xa re' chic re' wilic pa nic'ux maj re' riwi̱' chi xinyuk'unjic cho ru'um i Dios je' wo' chi xinco'ljic ru'um i Jesus , re' chi nanic'ulum i no'jbal re're' je' ricab jeno' si̱ .

Chiri̱j aj i Jesus re're' , re' hin nik'or wo' aweh tak chi xa pa ric'ux xchalic naxiyew ri̱b pan quimic re' nak tanlic chi kana̱ chi nakac'ulum i hoj chi ja' hoj ta nak aj niminel . Chaj camaj naxiban i Jesus chi je' re' ? Reh chi ekoj-esmejic cho chi ri'sil rajawric aj Yahm eh chi je' re' ma' eta chic nkaca'pechej i c'ahbil laj no'jbal ka'nam cho . Je' wo' chic , re're' xiban chi je' re' reh wo' chi re're' naricuyuj eh narisachoj reh kamahc chi'nchel i hoj xojniminic reh . Ru̱c' aj re' , xojricoj chi hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n reh chi naka'nam chi xa ic'lic chic kana̱ chi ribanaric i holohic laj camanic chiwach .

« Chabiraj tak chi coric i ricorquil nanik'orom wili : Xa hab pa' wach nariniminic reh niC'uhbal eh rich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i wAja̱w Dios re' xtak'anic cho wi̱n , re're' xye'eric chic reh chi enc'acharic chi junelic eh chi je' re' naquimok je ma' eta chic nk'ormojic reh chi naric'ulum i ti'c'axic ru'um reh rimahc eh ma' xa quimic ta naribanam chi junpech , naric'acharic la' wo' chic chi junelic .

Nok c'ahchi' wilom i c'uhtumaj wi̱n chiri̱j i tinamit Jerusalen , re' hin xwilow wo' chi re' raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios c'ahchi' chi k'oric wu̱c' wilic jenaj ripajbal pa rik'ab tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' . Re're' naricamanic reh chi ripajaric i tinamit Jerusalen ch'i̱l i ritz'ahpil eh ch'i̱l wo' ma' laj tz'ak sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i tinamit re're' .

Chi je' aj re' quino'jbal i take c'acharel re're' , pan junelic ti'c'axic c'ahchi' quicora̱b je . Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi wilic take nquicoj quitiyo̱x chi quiwach eh nquiyew quic'ux chi rilok'onjic wach , re' take chucul laj niminel re' nquiyew wo' quic'ux chiri̱j i xa pa' jaric i mahc ripahkaj cho i co̱k quik'ab . Ru̱c' i c'ahbilal nca'n , q'uix'ic la' nak chic naroquic cho queh xa re' la' chi rijelow-bal re're' , riq'uihsjic chic qui̱b nca'n ru̱c' i ma' holohic ta laj quibano̱j . Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi re' take chucul laj niminel re're' , xa re' i no'jbal nca'n ribanaric take c'acharel china̱ ac'al wili , xa re' wach re' nca'n ribanaric

Je' wo' , curman chi ma' re' ta cu ac'nel chipam i niminic maj wi cu ac'nel enchopbic reh camanic re're' , ma' rinimslom nchel ri̱b eh chi je' re' narich'ukuric wach rimahc ru'um i Dios ru'um reh rino'jbal je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' aj Yahm naxinimsaj ri̱b chiwach i Dios .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , re' hin k'e̱' nak xwa̱j ritz'ihmjic je aweh tak chiri̱j i kaco'lbal ye'o̱j keh hoj chi'nchel aj niminel , xa re' la' ma' re' ta chic chiri̱j re're' c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i hu̱j wili ru'um nok xwic'raj pan wa̱mna chi curman chi nanitz'ihmbam je aweh tak chiri̱j take c'uhtunic ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux re' ma' jalo̱j ta cho wach nok xa re' wo' rip'uhtic cho ric'uhtjic keh hoj aj niminel chiho̱j cho kawach chi ritinami̱t i Dios . Chiri̱j aj i c'uhtunic re're' tinik'il tak je reh chi til enayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j chi coric .
Je' re' ajic yohbal wach naxicakric take winak re're' ru'um chi re' take qui̱b re're' c'ahchi' quik'orom reh tinamit ru̱c' i c'uhtunic nca'n , chi re' Jesus xuctic wo' chic chi quixilac take camnak .

Re' quimahc i tinamit wili k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal chi eta nak ntusuric wach chi'nchel , cu enak rirak i rinahtil johtok na̱ taxa̱j . Ru'um aj re' chalic reh i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ maj re' Dios ma' iq'uinak ta pa ric'ux nic' pa' nimal i ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j xca'n , nqui wi̱n .

Nok pa riyuk'ul chic Calile̱ya wilic , re' Jesus xo̱j wo' chic wih'ok chipam i tinamit Canah re' xic'uhtaj wi̱' i pe̱t lok' laj nawa̱l ru̱c' rimiksjic i ha' chi ri̱s u̱wa . Nok wilic i Jesus ar , jenaj winak c'acharic riban ar pan tinamit Capernahum re' wilic wi̱' jenaj nim wach ricamaj ru̱c' i k'atal k'oric , xyowabjic cho rac'u̱n .

Chiri̱j take camanic ye'o̱j chana̱ tak , re' wili i nino'jbal niyew aweh tak chiri̱j : Ma̱siquilej wach acamaj tak cha'n la' tak ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak ru'um nok wi nanimej tak , chiwach wo' i Jesus c'ahchi' animem tak .

Coric ru' , re' Jesus ma' janc'al ta awilom tak wach xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta wo' cu yu'na chi k'i̱j ma' janc'al ta awilom tak wach , re' hat-tak xach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j eh k'e̱' wo' ti' nawic'raj tak . Ma' xa ta re're' , pan awa̱mna la' hat-tak yu'na nawic'raj tak i sukquil c'uxlis re' ma' pajoj ta wo' chic rik'ormojic . Je' re' nawic'raj tak
Re' hoj aj niminel keht'alim chi re' Dios wilic pan kac'acharic eh chi re' hoj wilco̱j wo' pan k'ab maj re' Dios xiyew cho keh i Lok' laj rUxlabal .

Ru'um reh k'oric xik'or i Jesus , re' take sol naxquilow chi ma' naht ta cok cu̱c' wilic jenaj culc nujunak chi ch'amsamaj laj ri̱s u̱wa , xquimuhba̱' cho pan ha' re're' jenaj potzpotz laj mi̱x , xquicoj chi ju' jenaj k'ab che̱' je' caxlan a̱j “ iso̱po ” ribihnal eh xquiyew cok i mi̱x re're' pan chi̱' i Jesus .

Ru'um aj re' katioxej johtok reh Dios maj re're' xojrico'lej chiwach aj Yahm naximak' i rajawric wilic nak chi kana̱ i hoj chi c'achalco̱j nak pa rik'ekomil i c'ahbilal . Je' wo' chic , chi kunchelal i hoj aj niminel xojriyew i Dios chi ri'sil rajawric i rAc'u̱n re' k'e̱' ti' ric'raj .

Je' wo' chic , til nwa̱j nipahkam aweh hat-tak was nicha̱k' aj niminel i wili : Chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi quiwach take c'acharel quicojbic ch'akoj i̱b chi quixilac take aj niminel eh ru̱c' re're' nquipit chi re' take aj niminel cow enquipahba̱' quic'ux chiri̱j take tijinic tijimaj take wi̱' . Chi je' re' k'uru' nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi ma' junehtej awi̱b tak cu̱c'
Je' wo' chic , re' aj niminel re' nye'eric reh ru'um i Dios chi nchol quitobjic take ras richa̱k' tanlic china̱ chi re' aj re' naribanam .

« Naponok aj i k'i̱j re're' , ma' re' ta chic wi̱n na̱banam tak take pahkanic na'n tak wi̱n yu'na reh la' chic i wAja̱w na̱banam tak eh re're' naric'u'lem cho nic' pa' nimal apahkanic na'n tak johtok reh chi aweht'alim tak chic chi re' hin til wilic chic wajawric .

Re' take cablaj chi abaj ch'iquimaj wi̱' i tusuj abaj sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i tinamit , xoyomaj take ru̱c' holohak laj abaj chi je' wili : Re' pe̱t abaj ch'iquinbal tz'ak xoyomaj ru̱c' i abaj “ Ja̱spe ” ribihnal . Re' chic ricab , xoyomaj ru̱c' abaj “ Sapi̱ro ” ribihnal re' rex taxa̱j nca'yic . Re' ro̱x , xoyomaj ru̱c' abaj “ A̱kata ” ribihnal rex nca'yic . Re' ricaj , xoyomaj ru̱c' abaj “ Esmera̱lta ” ribihnal rex nca'yic .

Je' re' ajic cha'n tak i coric wach no'jbal maj re' xa hab wach c'acharel re' reht'alim ribanaric haj wilic i coric laj no'jbal , xa re' la' ru' ma' riban ta i haj wilic reht'al chi coric chi banaric , re' c'acharel re're' nmahcanic chiwach i kAja̱w .

Chiri̱j chic re' , ar re' wilic wi̱' i tz'uka̱b reh k'atbal k'oric , ar xk'oric cho jenaj chi je' wili xik'or cho : « Re' hat-tak re' tiniminic tak reh take tak'anic ribanam i Dios chi na̱camanic tak wi̱' , chalok'ej tak wach i Dios to̱b ta nchel xa nim chic awa'ric on xa ma'xta ti awa'ric tak , nqui .

Ru'um aj re' xa re' wo' kap'utum cho ric'uluric i ti'c'axic ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil , re' hoj xa ji̱k' chic kac'ux ru̱c' i kAja̱w Dios chi eta nak ti riyeh'aj keh chi erisoc i ka̱mna ru̱c' jenaj chic ac' laj kati'jolal nchalic ar pan taxa̱j .

Je' re' nok hab pa' wach narik'ilim i ras richa̱k' , chic'raj pe ri̱b chi pe̱t nic' wach wilic ric'acharic on ricapew-bal . Wi la' ric'raj ri̱b chi ma'xta so' rimahc , ric'ul chi reh chi sukbok ric'ux chiwach i Dios xa re' cok ru' wi ric'raj ri̱b chi je' re' ma' riq'uihsaj ri̱b chiwach i ras richa̱k' .

Yu'na awu̱c' tak chic hat-tak ajabe̱s re' xa'n tak cho birinic chiqui̱j take awixk'u̱n tak re' ma' ja'xta quibahi̱l nwa̱j nik'orom i wili : Wi jeno' ajabe̱s ric'raj chi c'ahchi' rimahcanic ru̱c' ripitiric i rixk'u̱n chi narisiq'uim ribahi̱l , chiyew wo' k'ab reh rixk'u̱n chi eriban caxa̱ra wi c'ahchi' rik'ororic reh chi narisiq'uim ribahi̱l . Ru̱c' re're' , re' hat-tak ajabe̱s ma' c'ahchi' ta amahcanic tak .

Re' aj wo' wili na̱c'ulum tak ru'um chi hat-tak waj tahkanel : Re' take nahsil chipam take pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' eta chic tiquic'ul tak chipam take moloj i̱b nca'n chipam take pa̱t re're' eh ja' re' ta ti re' maj nariponic rik'ijil chi re' take c'acharel re're' naquicapam chi c'ahchi' ca'nam jenaj holohic laj camanic chiwach i Dios wi xatquicansaj tak je .

Chiri̱j chic wili re' hin xwilow ar pan taxa̱j jenaj wo' chic rinimal ehtalil sahchbal c'uxlis je' wili riwi̱' : Ar pan taxa̱j wilque̱b wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios eh chi quiju'junal ye'o̱j cajawric chi ribanjic jenaj queh i ti'c'axic narichalic ayu' wach ac'al pan cohlsbal wach chi'nchel . Ru̱c' re're' narimanlajic wach ric'uluric take ti'c'axic re' nariyeb cho i Dios ru'um i rinimal rijosk'il chiri̱j quimahc take c'acharel .

Re' Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban : « Wi la' wilic i ma' holohic ta laj k'oric xnik'or , nwa̱j chi enak'or wi̱n haj wilic i k'oric re're' eh wi la' tare̱t take k'oric xnik'or , chaj bih riwi̱' chi c'ahchi'qui̱n ach'eyem ? nqui Jesus reh .

Ru'um aj wo' re're' nipahkaj aweh hat wich aj niminel ma' Si̱sico re' til manlic hat waj to'o̱l chi rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus , chi chato'bej take wi̱n i quib chi wich aj niminel re're' chi naca'nam wo' chic chi xa jenaj wach quic'ux maj nok ja' quincojoric ta nak pan che̱' , re' take quib aj niminel re're' xa cow chic xquiyew quic'ux chi camanic chi rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios chi wich'i̱l take . Ma' xa wich'i̱l ta i hin xca'n chi je' re' , je' la' wo' re' xca'n quich'i̱l take kich aj niminel wilic chic quibihnal chipam rihu̱j i Dios re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' quibihnal take nic' pa' nimal take c'acharel ye'o̱j chiqui̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic . Je' re' ajic re' take quib kana̱b re're' cow xicamanic chi rik'ormojic ric'uhbal i Dios ch'i̱l i kasbe̱s ma' Quelme̱nte eh ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic wich aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios . Ru'um aj chi je' re' ca'nam cho , re' hin nipahkaj aweh chi chato'bej take quib kana̱b re're' .
maj re' take re' xicansanic queh take aj niminel je' wo' take xik'oric aC'uhbal eh ru'um re' chi tojbal wach quimahc ric'ul wo' chi queh chi encuq'uej i quic' laj ha' re're' , nqui xik'or .

Je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel re' ricana̱' c'acharic chi junpech china̱ ac'al wili nanquimic je , je' wo' re' i hoj naxkacana̱' chi junpech i c'acharic wilco̱j nak wi̱' najtir chi hoj nak aj mahc , ma' eta chic riban chi ewo' chic kojc'acharic chi je' re' . Ru'um chi je' re' rik'or i nic'uhtunic re're' ,

Je' wo' , re' ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop wih'inak cho najtir k'i̱j re' ma' wilic ta chic yu'na ru'um chi camnak chic , re're' rijalwachej i riwahxak k'atal k'oric nariwih'ic . Re' jenaj chic k'atal k'oric wili , re' wo' jenaj chi quixilac take wuku̱b eh c'ahchi' rojic chipam i ye'a̱b narisahchic wi̱' wach chi junpech .

Xa re' la' chaj bih rik'or i tz'ihmbimaj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chiri̱j je' ricab xc'uluric cho chi quixilac take quib chi ac'un re're' ? Ar rik'or chi re' Sa̱ra je' wili xik'or reh ma' Awraham : “ Chat'erej je kaj chipoh ch'i̱l i rac'u̱n maj ma' riwi̱' ta chi re' rac'u̱n ixok re're' enehtric ru̱c' ac'axbal na̱yeb reh i wac'u̱n i hin re' til hin awehq'ue̱n , nqui Sa̱ra , nqui rik'or i c'uhbal re're' .

Ma̱ban aweh je' ricab enca'n take c'acharel re' xa re' wach ric'axaric wach bihomal nca'n . Je' re' nik'or aweh maj re' take je' re' quino'jbal quikajic chipam i c'ahbilal laj no'jbal je' ricab ric'ul jeno' chicop nok nkajic pan jeno' xirab . Chi je' aj re' quino'jbal ma' nquicapaj ta chic ri̱j chi ru̱c' ribihomsjic qui̱b nca̱j ca'nam , xa naricamanic chi jot'bal reh quic'acharic . Re' take c'acharel re're' ru̱c' ribihomsjic qui̱b nca̱j ca'nam , enquisach wach i quic'acharic chi junpech je' ricab nansahchic wach jeno' ma' laj cano̱wa nanbut'lujic jok ri'sil ha' .

Re' ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop ch'i̱l take lajeb chi ruc'a' xawilow wach naribanam chi naquixowem wach i aj c'oyo̱m eh je' ricab nok jeno' ixok ncanabjic chi ma'xta chic riso' , je' wo' re' naca'nam ru' , naquicana̱b wo' i tinamit re're' chi ma'xta chic so' ribihomal eh xa ta wo' nak hab chic wach nariwih'ic chipam i tinamit re're' . Je' wo' chic , je' ricab nok re' c'uch ric'ux i camnak chicop cu rehtal risach wach je' wo' re' naca'nam ru̱c' i tinamit wili , naquisacham wo' wach chi junpech naquicut pan k'a̱k' .
maj re' Dios ru' neht'alanic reh chi'nchel chi manlic . Ru'um aj re' rehtalil wo' chi re' hoj aj nimimel til ti' wo' nkic'raj ru' .

Re' cok ru' naniban i c'uhtunic , quink'oric chiki̱j i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh chaj bih k'oric niban chiki̱j i hoj ? Nik'or na chi xa re' wach i hoj nka'n i holonquilal eh ru'um re' k'e̱' wo' chic coric wach kac'ux chi quiwach take ma' re' ta take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ? Ma'xta , ma' jaruj ta eriban chi je' re' enic'uhtaj maj nik'orom chic chi re' hoj chi'nchel ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel kojmahcanic eh je' wo' re' chi'nchel take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel .

« Chi je' aj re' k'uru' ru̱c' i to'bonic xiban ma' A̱ron , xtik'injic jenaj quitiyo̱x je' nca'yic rac'u̱n wacax xca'n reh . Chiwach aj chic i tiyo̱x re're' xquitok qui̱b chi riye'eric quisi̱ chiwach naxi'oquic chi rinimjic wach ru'um risukquil quic'ux chi xtihkic .

Je' re' ajic q'uihal take c'acharel ma' quiniminic ta reh i Dios xiquimibic ru'um take ti'c'axic banaric ru̱c' quichi̱' ch'i̱l ju' quije̱ take cawa̱y re're' , xa re' la' q'uihal wo' take ma' xiquimic ta . Re' take c'acharel wili to̱b ta xquilow i ti'c'axic c'ulu̱j lok re're' , ma' xquicana̱' ta ribanaric i c'ahbilal laj quibano̱j , ma' xquicana̱' ta wo' rilok'onjic wach take ma' tob laj uxlabal on take tiyo̱x re' tik'imaj take ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' on ru̱c' sak woric laj ch'ihch' on ru̱c' cak c'atoj wach ch'ihch' , on ru̱c' abaj on ru̱c' che̱' eh chi je' re' riwi̱' ma' qui'ilbic ta , ma' wo' quibirinic ta eh xa ta wo' quibehic .

Ru'um aj reh chi xkeht'alij chi re' kAja̱w Jesus narich'ukum k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel c'acharel , re' hoj c'ahchi' kachopom kac'ux chi rich'ukjic i ca̱mna take c'acharel chi naquiniminic eh re' Dios reht'alim chi re' hoj c'ahchi' ka'nam ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis eh nwuy'ej wo' chi re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak chi je' re' .

Je' nak re' cho kac'acharic chi'nchel i hoj najtir k'i̱j , tz'akalco̱j nak cho chipam i mahc nkotowej ribanaric ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil , xa re' nak haj wilic rotowej cho i kati'jolal ch'i̱l kacapew-bal nka'n ribanaric . Je' re' ajic ru'um chi xa jenaj wo' nak kawach quich'i̱l take c'ahbil quino'jbal , re' rijosk'il i Dios wilic chi quina̱ ru' , re' wo' nak re' wilic chi kana̱ i hoj .

Ru̱c' take k'oric xik'or re're' ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic k'oric xiban , re' ma' Luch xik'or ribiral i Jesus eh xik'il wo' take tinamit chi je' wili : « Re' quino'jbal take kich ti'jolal ma' holohic ta . Ru'um aj re' , re' hat-tak chajal wach ano'jbal tak reh chi etico'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱ kich ti'jolal , nqui k'ilo̱j xiban queh .

Je' re' nik'or maj wi cu je' re' c'acharic na'n tak , ma'xta ac'acharic tak ru̱c' i Dios chi junpech natiquimok tak je . Ra̱j nchel wi nayew tak k'ab reh Lok' laj Uxlabal chi eribehsaj ac'acharic tak eh chi je' re' ma'xta chic riwih'ic pan ac'acharic tak i c'ahbilal xa'n tak cho naxatc'acharic tak cho pan mahc , re' hat-tak na̱c'acharic tak ru̱c' i Dios chi junpech
Chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi je' wili : “ Xa hab wach narich'ica̱b ric'ux chiri̱j ru' ma' jaruj ta narojic chi k'e̱b i riniminic , nqui rik'or .

Ru̱c' i pe̱t k'oric nwa̱j nitok'a̱b wi̱' nihu̱j wili , nwa̱j nik'orom chi awu'um aweh hat-tak wilic tioxonic pan wa̱mna naniban johtok niti̱j eh re' nbanic chi quintioxonic johtok chiwach i Dios re' nilok'ej wach , re' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' re' niban maj xa haj tinamit nelic lok abiral tak , nk'ormojic chiri̱j nic' wach rich'iquinjic ac'ux na'n tak chiri̱j i Jesus .

Je' re' k'uru' hat-tak wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' tiric'ax tak i Dios , re' hoj k'e̱' nkatioxej johtok reh i Dios chawi̱j tak eh nka'n wo' kati̱j chawi̱j tak maj keht'alim chi re' kAja̱w Dios xchihbic cho awach tak chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n .
Je' wo' chic til k'e̱' curman chi chawunchelal tak chatik tak ju' ribanaric i c'axoj i̱b maj re' no'jbal re're' eriban chi enacuy nic' pa' nimal amahc tak chawibil awi̱b tak .

Nok wilic chic k'i̱j rik'oric cho ma' Lu̱' chi rico'ljic ri̱b , xtik'injic wach chi re' ma' Lu̱' re' nanwihch'ilem je hin Cax , naritak'abjic je ar Ro̱ma re' wilic pa riyuk'ul Ita̱lya . Chi je' re' xk'ahsjic pan k'ab jenaj winak Ju̱lyo ribihnal , re' c'amol quibe̱h juntuhm chi sol Awu̱sto ribihnal chi naricha'jaljic cu rehtal rojic ar Ro̱ma . Naxponic i k'i̱j chi nakojic ar Ro̱ma ,

re' xcamanic queh chi ribichjic wach i bi̱ch nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' . Re' bi̱ch re're' , xa je' chic ricab bi̱ch xiban cho najtir k'i̱j i Moyses re' raj camanom i Dios . Re' bi̱ch re're' je' wili rik'or : “ Re' hat kAja̱w Dios , re' k'e̱' rinimal wach awajawric wilic , k'e̱' wo' chic coric awach eh coric wo' take k'oric na'n . Re' aC'uhbal til wo' manlic wach ricorquil xa je' na ricab jeno' be̱h xa coric chic wach . Re' hat k'uru' hat k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit

Je' wo' chic , je' ricab chi re' jeno' t'uch ha'lac'un re' cu re' ti xasjic cho , xa re' wach ri̱s ch'u̱ch' re' ma' cojo̱j ta ha' ru̱c' rotowej cho , je' wo' re' cha'n hat-tak chawotowej tak ritijiljic ri̱j i riC'uhbal i Dios je' ricab riban i t'uch ha'lac'un ru̱c' i ri̱s rich'u̱ch' i ritu̱t . Re' cok ru' curman chi re' c'uhbal re're' ma' hab wach njopbic wach reh chi yu'na johtok chi kawach cu rehtal rimanlajic wach aco'ljic tak chi junpech xa c'ahchi' ok wo' atikim tak ju' ricowsjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios .

Wilic jenaj xk'oric cho ar pan taxa̱j chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom cho wi̱n : « Chatz'ihmbaj take wili : Re' take quiniminic reh kAja̱w Dios k'e̱' ato̱b queh . Chi quiwach johtok yu'na , naquiquimok je , k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal naquic'ulum , nqui cho . Chiri̱j i k'oro̱j lok wili xnibiraj wo' chi je' wili rik'or i Lok' laj Uxlabal : « Coric i k'oro̱j lok re're' . Re' take quiniminic reh kAja̱w Dios narisukbic quic'ux chi hi'lic ru'um chi cux'ic chic wach chi queh i camanic ayu' wach ac'al . Yu'na re' chic i quisi̱ naquic'ulum re' nariye'eric queh ru'um take i holohic laj bano̱j xca'n , nqui Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios .

maj re' ribano̱j ma' coric ta wach . Re' aj wili take bano̱j nponic chiwach i Dios chi nariban i aj niminel : Tz'iro̱j ok wach rino'jbal chi manlic , ma' ricana̱' chi re' rino'jbal eriban jenaj wach ch'i̱l quino'jbal take aj mahc china̱ eh chito'bej wo' take wilque̱b pan ti'c'axic je' ricab take ha'lac'un ma'xta quitu̱t caja̱w on re' take cahnel ixok chic take .
Re' no'jbal re're' , re' aj wo' re' nik'or je aweh tak reh chi je' re' ma' hab ta wach enjot'bic aweh tak ru̱c' take ma' coric ta wach c'uhbalanic nca'n to̱b ta la' xa suk chic rik'ormojic nca'n .

Nok k'oro̱j aj chic re're' , re' hin xnibiraj chi chi'nchel take c'acharel je' chi wilque̱b pan taxa̱j , je' chi wilque̱b wach ac'al ch'i̱l wo' take camnak chic je take je' ricab take ximuhkic pan ac'al eh ch'i̱l wo' take xmuhkic quina̱ pan ma' laj ha' , xi'oquic chi bichinic chi je' wili : « Hat Dios re' tz'ukulca̱t chipam i tz'uka̱b k'atbal k'oric ch'i̱l wo' i hat re' ajalwachem awi̱b chi je' ricab jenaj q'uijol me̱' , chi junelic k'i̱j sakom ye'erok alok'il tak . Naye'erok alok'onjic tak , banjok ribichjic awach tak eh k'ormojok wo' chi re' hat-tak xa manlic wo' wach i k'atoj k'oric na'n tak , nqui take .

Nok re' ricab aj tz'e' wa̱ch xupej pa̱m rich'ihch' laj su̱b , xcuturic cho pan tak rinimal moloj wach ha' i xa je' jenaj yu̱k' xa ntenic chic rik'ak'il re' xbanic chi k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal i moloj wach ha' xik'atej je na̱ chi cu rehtal jenaj reh ro̱x seht chi rinimal moloj wach ha' xmikric chi quic'

Ar ajic nok wilque̱b chic chiri̱j lok i tinamit , re' take winak cojo̱j take chi ritz'akaric wach rimahc i Te̱wan , xipahbabjic cu'um nahsil reh chi naquicansam i Te̱wan eh chi je' re' xquesaj lok i quijuc ro̱k tz'ih roxlo̱c' lok quiso' , reh chi suk cutuj abaj enca'n chi ricansjic i Te̱wan . Je' re' k'uru' naxquituba̱' take su't re're' chiwach i jenaj q'uijol Sa̱wlo ribihnal re' naricha'janic reh , p'uht quicansam i Te̱wan chi abaj .

Je' wo' , ar chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re're' rik'or chi je' wili : “ Hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , hat-tak chi'nchel c'acharel wilca̱t tak xa haj pa' yu̱k' q'uixca̱b china̱ ac'al wili , chayew tak rilok'il i kAja̱w Dios , nqui rik'or .

Je' re' ajic re' Dios nye'bic reh chi'nchel eh re' wo' re' xtik'inic reh chi'nchel . Je' wo' chic , re're' tanlic chiri̱j chi narilok'onjic wach cu'um take chi'nchel ritik'inic . Ru'um aj re' je' wili nik'or chi lok'onbal wach : Lok'omaj ok wach i Dios chi junelic k'i̱j sakom cu'um take chi'nchel c'acharel . Je' ta nak re' banarok , nqui nik'or .

Je' chic ikal naxilow chi re' Jesus c'ahchi' roquic cho ru̱c' , re' Wa̱n je' wili xik'or queh tinamit : « Chacoj aj tak rehtal : Re' wili i tak'amaj cho ru'um i Dios eh ru̱c' i c'acharel re're' naric'uluric je' ricab ric'ul jeno' me̱' nanc'atjic ru'um aj k'ahsem si̱ chi cuybal mahc .

Re' chic ar Jericoh xwih'ic wo' jenaj chic c'acharel re' xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios , Rahaw ribihnal re' c'oyo̱m laj ixok . Ru'um aj chi xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios , re're' xic'ul pan sukquil c'uxlis take aj ju'jun kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' xiponic cho sutunel ye'a̱b Jericoh xa pan c'olic .

Re' hin ma' je ta nicab aj lek' me̱' maj re' aj lek' nanponic re' wilque̱b wi̱' take me̱' , xa ra̱j relk'am je take on xa ra̱j ricansam take . Raj nchel i hin xinc'ulic ayu' wach ac'al reh chi re' quic'acharic take c'acharel holohic ok chic naribanam eh je' wo' chi wilic ok junelic quic'acharic .

ra̱j la' hoj re' kanimem i Jesus ma' re' ta chic hoj reh na̱ ac'al wili , xojricoj la' i Dios chi hoj ritinami̱t chi nakawih'ic ar pan taxa̱j . Ru'um aj chi hoj chic ritinami̱t i Dios , yu'na c'ahchi' kuy'em risoljic cho pan taxa̱j i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s eh kajco'lonel Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Ru'um chi re' nawa̱j nak tak ribanaric ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic curman chiwach chi enquicowsaj quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus take awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel , nipahkaj ato'bil aweh tak chi chac'ul tak pan sukquil c'uxlis take awich aj niminel tak je' ricab ac'uluric tak xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' re' nik'or maj re're' xojric'ul ru̱c' reh chi chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel enkayew rilok'il i Dios .

Re' take re' chac'am take je chawi̱j ar cu̱c' aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios eh chawitinej awi̱b tak chi saksbal awach tak . Chi je' re' nok re' take aj k'ahsem si̱ enquik'or aweh tak chi ta chic re̱t chi enak'ahsaj asi̱ tak , re' hat titojbok reh ritz'akil i johybal lok wach quina̱ take quejeb chi aj niminel re're' . Nacha'n chi je' re' , re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enquicoj wach chi ma' coric ta i k'oro̱j queh chawi̱j eh je' wo' chi re' hat ma' c'ahchi' ta ayak'abem pan awo̱k i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , nqui take reh ma' Lu̱' .

Je' re' nok re' ma' Awraham xmikric chi c'amol kabe̱h i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' kojc'ambic na̱ i tak'anic bano̱j cho chi nakayoc'om lok ritz'uhmal na̱ kac'achanbal . Ma' xa ta wilic chi c'amol kabe̱h i hoj chi riyoc'oric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ kac'achanbal , wilic la' wo' chi c'amol kabe̱h chi nkatahkej ri̱j i no'jbal xiban cho nok cu ja' riyoc'om ta nak lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal . Re' no'jbal re' , re' i wili : Chi re're' til xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios .

Je' re' nok naxquisic' ri̱j hab wach naricahnic pa rijelow-bal i Ju̱ras , tz'eht xkajic china̱ i ma' Mati̱yas . Je' aj re' ru' , re' ma' Mati̱yas xoquic chi quiman take i junlaj chi nahsil take raj tahkanel i Jesus .
Je' aj wili xik'or i ma' Tawiy : “ K'e̱' rinimal risukquil c'uxlis wilic pan ca̱mna take c'acharel re' xcuyuric eh xsacharic wach quimahc ru'um i Dios .

Re' take quib chi aj k'orol c'uhbal re're' , re' wo' take quib chi c'acharel jalwachamaj take ru'um i quib chi k'ab i che̱' “ Oli̱wo ” ribihnal ch'i̱l i quib chi pa'a̱b cante̱la re' wilque̱b cok chiwach Dios re' c'uhtjic cho najtir k'i̱j reh jenaj raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios .

Je' wo' , re' hat-tak aj mahc ch'i̱l xa quib wach ac'ux tak , chapahkaj cuybal amahc tak chi c'ahchi' ayot'om ac'ux tak ru'um amahc tak . Ti'bok ac'ux tak eh chayot' wo' ac'ux tak ru̱c' ok'ic . Re' awih'ic tak chi xa se'el awach tak mikrok ta nak chi ok'ic eh re' risukquil ac'ux tak mikrok ta nak chi ntz'iric laj c'uxlis .

Wasbe̱s ma' Ca̱yo re' ti' tiwic'raj pan niminic , re' wili nwa̱j chawi̱j ru̱c' i k'oric niban je aweh yu'na : Ma̱tijej aweh i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal je' ricab riban i Tiyo̱trepes re' la' chatijej riman aweh ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal nca'n take toco̱m chic aj niminel eh chi je' re' xa naric'uhtunic wo' lok chi re' hat , hat chic rac'u̱n i Dios . Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi re're' ma' riban ta holohic laj no'jbal ric'uhtaj lok chi ma' rina'bem ta wach i Dios chi coric , je' wo' re' hab wach riban i holohic laj no'jbal ric'uhtaj wo' lok chi re're' rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chic .

Je' aj re' cu chiri̱j chi rich'ica̱b chic ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios , re' ma' Awraham xbanjic reh jenaj tak'anic chi naricojom jenaj rehtalil reh riti'jolal c'uhtbal reh chi re' Dios xicoj chic jenaj chi quixilac take ritinami̱t . Ru̱c' riyoc'oric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal xiban i ma' Awraham re' xcamanic wo' chi jenaj rehtalil , re' Dios c'ahchi' wo' rik'orom chi re' ribanam nak chic lok wili coric wo' wach : Cu chipam i rik'ijil nok re' ma' Awraham ma' ja' riyoc'om ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ric'achanbal , re' Dios xipahba̱' chic chi re're' jenaj c'acharel coric wach ric'ux xa ru'um chi xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j k'oro̱j cho reh ru'um . Ru̱c' aj xiban re're' , re' Dios xiban wo' chi re' ma' Awraham xmikric chi aj c'amol quibe̱h take c'acharel nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i rik'or i Dios to̱b ta ma' nquiyoc' ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal . Nic' pa' wach ripahba̱bjic banaric i aj c'amol quibe̱h re're' je' wo' re' quipahbabjic xbanaric ru' xa ru'um rich'iquinjic quic'ux chiri̱j chaj bih rik'or i Dios .
Je' re' nok ru'um chi keht'alim chic re're' , re' hoj je' ok kacab i c'acharel re' nok camnak chic ncahnic chi tehlic wo' chic ri̱j ric'acharic chiwach ajawric nchopbic nak na̱ .

Je' re' k'uru' xa pa' yu̱k' koj-o̱j wi̱' , re' hoj nkac'ul i ti'c'axic ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil chi xa pan quimic chic wilco̱j je je' ricab wo' cho nok cu wilic nak i Jesus china̱ ac'al wili xic'ul wo' take ti'c'axic . To̱b ta wo' je' re' nkac'ul re' hoj nkacuy ransil i ti'c'axic nbanaric keh reh chi re' ric'acharic i Jesus enc'utunic lok ku̱c' i hoj .

re're' ma' je' ta ricab take toco̱m chic waj to'o̱l re' xquitik'a̱' wach pan quic'ux chi ma'xta cojic ar Pili̱po . Chi'nchel take re're' xa re' wach risiq'uiric haj wilic nponic chi quiwach nca̱j ca'nam , ma' re' ta nchel i haj wilic ra̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Je' wo' chic , ru'um rich'iquinjic ric'ux i ma' Awraham chiri̱j i Dios re' rehq'ue̱n re' ti' Sa̱ra ribihnal , to̱b ta nak ojonak chic rihabil chi enwih'ic riha'lac'u̱n , xa cu xwih'ic wo' jenaj rac'u̱n . Je' re' ajic , re' ti' Sa̱ra xye'eric wo' ricowil chi xasjic riha'lac'u̱n ru'um chi re' ma' Awraham xich'ica̱' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi re're' eriban chi enmanlajic wach i xik'or reh chi naribanam .

Re' wAja̱w Dios re' xtak'anic cho wi̱n , re' wili ra̱j chi eniban : Pan cohlsbal wach take k'i̱j , re' nic' pa' q'uihal take xye'jic queh ru'um i wAja̱w Dios chi naca'nam chi waj tahkanel , nacuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak eh chi je' re' ma'xta quik'ehbic lok je' wulu' chipam i k'i̱j naqui'ucsjok take cho camnak .

Je' re' ru' nquik'or take tinamit ma' re' ta take aj niminel , xa re' la' i hoj aj niminel til keht'alim chi xa jenaj wo' Dios wilic eh re're' Ajabe̱s cho chi kana̱ . Re' Dios re're' , re' aj tik'inel reh chi'nchel nic' pa' q'uihal nkilow wach china̱ ac'al wili chi wilco̱j wo' i hoj pa riman , re're' xiyew kac'acharic reh chi nakalok'em wach . Je' wo' chic xa jenaj wo' i Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi kana̱ , re' Jesus . Xa ru'um wo' reh ru' tikilque̱b take chi'nchel nic' pa' q'uihal nkilow wach china̱ ac'al wili chi wilco̱j wo' cok pa riman i hoj .

Naxsoljic aj wo' chic cho ku̱c' i Timote̱yo , re're' xc'ulic rik'or keh i holohic laj ribiral chiri̱j nic' wach ricowil ac'ux tak chipam rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus , je' wo' chiri̱j i c'axoj i̱b c'ul na'n tak chawibil awi̱b tak . Je' wo' chic , re're' xik'or wo' keh chi re' hat-tak xa eli̱c wo' kojc'ulic cho pan ac'ux tak ru'um chi k'e̱' ti' koj-awic'raj tak cho eh ru'um re're' , re' hat-tak xa nawa̱j wo' nak chic awilom tak kawach je' ricab wo' nka'n je hoj chawi̱j hat-tak .

Cha'n tak acamaj chi coric k'uru' reh chi naponok wo' i rik'ijil chi naric'uhtam ri̱b i Jesus re' Aj Nahsil keh hoj chi'nchel je' ru̱c' wilco̱j chi aj ilol reh ritinami̱t i Dios na̱c'ulum wo' tak jenaj aco̱ch tak je' ricab nye'eric queh take aj ajamanel quic'ulbic reh jenaj coten k'an woric laj ch'ihch' re' ncojoric wach quina̱ . Xa re' la' ru' re' co̱ch na̱c'ulum tak re're' ma' jaruj c'uhlel sahchel wach i rilok'il .
Ru'um aj chi ch'iclic kac'ux ru̱c' i Ac' laj Tik'inic xiban i Dios re're' , re' hoj ma' kojyo'jic ta chi k'oric awu̱c' tak

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' tz'uju̱j nca'n chiqui̱j take aj tz'e' wa̱ch chi ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j riwi̱' re' c'ahchi' quitz'ujum . Ru'um chi je' re' nca'n , re' take re' no̱j riban chi je' quicab take chicop re' ma'xta quino'jbal . Je' wo' nca'n chi xa je' quicab take aj q'uiche̱' chicop re' xa nic' yu' quicansjic pan xirab . Je' re' nok nic' pa' wach nc'uluric cu̱c' i chicop re're' , je' wo' re' naric'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel re're' nariponic wo' rik'ijil chi narisacharic quiwach ayu' wach ac'al .

Je' re' ru' xik'or i Ju̱ras xa re' la' naxik'or chi je' re' , ma' xik'or ta ru'um chi til ra̱j ta nak rito'bem take c'acharel re' c'axic ti nca'n eh chi til ti' ta wo' nak ric'raj take . Xik'or la' chi je' re' ru'um chi re're' aj c'olol tumi̱n chi kaxilac eh nic' pa' nimal tumi̱n nkayew chipam i c'ola̱b rihkam , resaj lok ru̱c' . Je' aj re' k'oric xik'or ru'um k'e̱' suk reh relk'jic i tumi̱n .

Je' aj re' nc'uhtunic wi̱' i c'acharel c'acharic riban pan c'axoj i̱b eh til wo' je' re' naribanam je' ricab ric'ul chi keh hoj aj niminel reh Jesus chi je' re' c'acharic naka'nam ru'um chi nkeht'alij chi xa re' wo' Dios til manlic aj c'axo̱l . Je' aj re' riwi̱' c'acharic nka'n ru'um chi keht'alim chic eh nkach'ica̱' wo' kac'ux chiri̱j i ricorquilal chi re' Dios aj c'axol cho keh .

To̱b ta chiwach take k'i̱j re're' , re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xchalic chi quina̱ juntuhm chi c'acharel je' ru̱c' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , re' take aj niminel reh Jesus wilque̱b ar Jerusalen re' xquipuhcaj qui̱b ru'um i ti'c'axic tohk'ic cho ru̱c' ricansjic i Te̱wan , ma'xta nquik'or c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naxiponic chipam take tinamit Peni̱sya , Chi̱pire ch'i̱l Antiyoqui̱ya . Xa queh la' ti take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquik'or i c'uhbal re're' .

Chiri̱j nok nik'orom chic lok re're' chiri̱j take bihomal , yu'na nik'or wo' aweh i wili : Wi la' re' hat wilca̱t chi suk ac'ux pan rinimjic i Jesus to̱b ta xa nic' pa' ti nimal wilic aweh , k'e̱' wo' chic ricuse'sbal i Dios wilic cho chana̱ .

Je' wo' chic , re' ma' laj chicop wili xye'eric wo' k'ab reh chi naripajam ri̱b cu̱c' take lok' laj ritinami̱t i kAja̱w Dios eh je' wo' chi nariyeb take pan ac'al . Je' wo' xye'eric wo' k'ab reh chi nariwih'ic riwa'ric chi quina̱ take ju'jun seht chi tinamit wach ac'al xa nic' pa' wach quitinamital quic'acharic wi̱' eh xa nic' pa' wach quik'orbal quik'oric wi̱' .

Raj la' i c'acharel nmahcanic ma' je' ta re' naric'ulum . Nik'or chi je' re' maj pa rimahc wo' naric'ulum i ti'c'axic . Je' re' nok to̱b ta nak chicuy i ti'c'axic , re' c'acharel re're' xa ma' eta wo' ric'ul ricuse'sbal i Dios , re' la' naric'ulbic reh , re' i c'acharel re' ric'ul i ti'c'axic ru'um chi coric wach nbanic .

Ru'um reh quimic xic'ul cho i Jesus chi ricuyuric kamahc ka'nam cho nok re' pe̱t tik'inic cu wilic nak cho rajawric chi kana̱ hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , xcojoric i Jesus nahanel reh i ac' laj tik'inic ribanam cho Dios chiki̱j i hoj c'acharel . Re' riwi̱' chi re' Dios xiyew reh Jesus i camanic re're' , re' ra̱j chiri̱j chi re' take quic'ulbic reh yuk'unic riban chi naca'nam chi ritinami̱t narimanlajic wach cu̱c' i k'oric k'oro̱j cho najtir k'i̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom .

Ha̱' , ru'um chi xnik'or lok chi k'e̱' wo' chic rato'bil i Dios wilic cho chi kana̱ , wilic take equik'oric chi je' wili nik'or pa nic'uhbalanic : « Xa eli̱c ok wo' kojmahcanok tak eh chi je' re' k'e̱' wo' chic rato'bil i Dios narichalic chi kana̱ , nqui enquik'or . Ma'xta , re' hin ma' je' ta re' nik'or maj re' c'uhtunic niban re' i wili :

Je' wo' , ma' ric'ul ta chaweh tak chi cu ena'n tak ribanaric take wili : Re' take q'uixbilal laj k'oric , re' horhor laj k'oric ch'i̱l take ma' to̱b ta laj balak'il . Re' chi'nchel re're' ma' riwi̱' ta chaweh tak chi cu ena'n tak maj chi hat-tak chic aj niminel , ma' ric'ul ta chaweh tak chi cu je' re' ak'orbal tak , re' la' achi̱' tak camanok aweh tak chi tioxbal johtok i Dios .
