Ar aj ru' xwilow jenaj cawa̱y k'an moyic ri̱j eh re' jenaj tz'uklic china̱ , “ Cansanel ” ribihnal . Re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're' xye'eric rajawric chi narik'orom chi naquiquimic take c'acharel junsut wach ac'al . K'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal c'acharel naquiquimic chi cu rehtal junseht reh ricaj seht chi c'acharel chi junsut wach ac'al nariponic quiq'uihal take naquiquimic . Wilic take naquiquimic ru'um banoj k'ak'anic , wilic take ru'um wi'jalel , wilic take ru'um ya'bilal eh wilic wo' naquiquimic cu'um take josk' laj chicop . Je' re' ajic re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're' xo̱j eh xtahkaljic wo' je ru'um jenaj chic tz'uklic wo' nah cawa̱y “ Ha̱res ” ribihnal eh re' “ Ha̱res ” wili re' wo' re' ribihnal i jenaj ye'a̱b re' no̱j ca'n wi̱' uyunic take camnak . Re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're' , re' “ Ha̱res ” ribihnal wilic rajawric china̱ i ye'a̱b “ Ha̱res ” re're' .

Ru'um aj reh re' , re' ric'amaric na̱ i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' ncamanic ta keh chi ric'uluric take cuse'sbal k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios . Xa re' wach haj wilic encamanic keh , re' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios re' xa ru'um reh rinimal ric'axbal wilic chi quina̱ take c'acharel xik'or chi naricuse'sam take cho . Ru'um reh ric'axbal re're' k'uru' , re' take cuse'sbal k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios til pa'lic rik'ormojic chi narichalic chi quina̱ take c'acharel re' wilic chi quiwach i ma' Awraham chi c'amol quibe̱h . Hab aj wach take c'acharel re're' ? Re' chi'nchel take nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios je' ricab xiban i ma' Awraham . Je' re' ajic kich'i̱l i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wilic chi kana̱ rinimjic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , wilic wo' queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilic i ma' Awraham chi c'amol quibe̱h .

Re' cok ru' re' take nimak cajawric aj Ro̱ma wilque̱b ar Jerusalen nok ca'nam chic i pech'oj wi̱n chi coric , xca̱j nak quincok'tam je ru'um chi ma' xquirak ta jeno' mahc chiwi̱j je' ru̱c' quimic ta nak ri̱j

Je' re' k'uru' re' wili tijinic niban : Re' riqueteljic quiwach take c'acharel chi equiwih'ic chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ma' re' ta jeno' c'acharel nbanic to̱b ta la' nak xa cow chic ra̱j chi nariqueteljic wach jeno' chic rich c'acharel , re' la' i quetelenic wachi̱s xa re' wach Dios nbanic maj re' cok re' til manlic quetelenel wachi̱s .

Chi je' aj re' , re' hoj aj niminel reh i Dios ma' riban ta chi enka'n keh i no'jbal je' ricab xca'n kama̱m kati't chi xca'n cho ribanaric i c'oyomal xa hab wach aj u̱c' eh ru'um reh i mahc re're' , re' Dios xiyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ cu rehtal ca'winak ik'ob wuklaj ik'ob lajc'ahl ( 23,000 ) chi c'acharel xiquimic je chiwach i jenaj k'i̱j .

ma' re' ta chic i c'uhbal re're' wilic rajawric chi kana̱ , nkarak la' chiri̱j chi toco̱m chic wilic rajawric chi kana̱ . Kak'or je' ricab jenaj aj camanom ma' ra̱j ta chic ribiram k'oric chiwach i wilic nak chi ajabe̱s china̱ , je' wo' re' i hoj nok toco̱m chic wilic rajawric chi kana̱ , ma' c'ahchi' ta chic kabiram k'oric chiwach i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses to̱b ta wo' nak keht'alim cho pan kacapew-bal chi tare̱t i k'oric riban . Re' nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj yu'na je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel nchoporic eh nc'amaric je reh chi toco̱m chic ajabe̱s enwih'ic rajawric china̱ . Je' re' nik'or maj re' mahc re' til k'e̱' nka̱j ka'nam ribanaric , re' aj re' nwih'ic rajawric chi kana̱ .

Ru'um aj re' katik tak ju' ritijiljic ri̱j ribiral i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric cu rehtal no̱j manlajok wach i kano'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j hab wach ru' . Je' re' ka'n tak re' cok ru' ma' kojcahnic tak xa ru̱c' take c'uhbal re' c'uhtumaj cho keh pan ch'iquinbal cho reh kaniminic on ru̱c' take pe̱t tijinic xkac'ul naxkapahba̱' cho kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus je' ricab take tijinic wili : Re' tijinic nc'uhtunic wi̱' chi nkajal wach i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal nka'n , re' tijinic nc'uhtunic wi̱' chi nkacana̱' ribanaric take bano̱j re' quibanic chi ma' eta kojc'acharic ru̱c' i Dios chiri̱j chi kojquimic je eh je wo' i tijinic chiri̱j i ch'iquinic c'uxlis chiri̱j i Dios .

Ma̱ban tak chi xa ri̱j wach ac'ux i rilmijic ena'n tak je' ricab wilic aweh tak je' re' nca'n wi̱n , chato'bej la' tak ru̱c' pa' bih reh , reh chi nachitik cho ju' richalic ayu' enchalic chi suk ric'ux . Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin c'ahchi' wuy'em chi naric'ulic lok ch'i̱l take ju'jun chic kich aj niminel c'ahchi' quibehic chiri̱j .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , jeno' c'acharel ma'eta nco'ljic xa ru'um ta nak erik'or chi aj niminel . Je' wo' , ma'xta bih eritik reh i c'acharel re're' chi erik'or chi aj niminel reh Jesus wi ru̱c' take ribano̱j ma' nc'uhtunic ta wo' chi coric chi til aj niminel .
Ar ajic chi quixilac take tinamit aj Jerusalen wilic take xquik'or chi je' wili : « Ma' re' ta na i Jesus wili re' c'ahchi' risiq'uiric chi naricansjic ?
Nok rik'orom chic re're' je' wili xiban : Xupej je wach kana̱ eh je' wili xik'or keh : « Chac'ul tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios .

Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' take re' ma' quicojom ta rehtal chi coric chaj bih camanic xiban i Dios chiqui̱j reh chi naquicahnic chi coric chic wach quic'ux . Chi queh ru' re' nbanic chi quicahnic chi coric wach quic'ux re' la' rinimjic take c'uhbal nquic'uhtaj eh ru'um re' ma' nca̱j ta quic'ulum i chaj bih xiban i Dios chi ricorsjic wach quic'ux .

Ru'um aj re' nanik'or chi xa hab wach ncojbic wach i Jesus chi re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios , re're' c'ahchi' wo' ricojom wach i Dios chi re're' ch'iquenel c'uxlis eh ru'um re' , re' rik'orbal i Dios rik'orom chiri̱j i Ac'unbe̱s til ric'ol pa ra̱mna i c'acharel re're' . Tz'a̱b ru' hab wach ma' ricoj ta wach rik'orbal i Dios re' xik'or chiri̱j i Ac'unbe̱s , re' c'acharel re're' c'ahchi' ribanam chi re' Dios re' aj ch'iquenel c'uxlis , xa aj chucul k'oric nok wilic ru'um nok ma' ricoj ta wo' wach i xik'or chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n .

Chabiraj tak chi coric i nanik'orom aweh tak wili : Xa hab wach ch'iclic ric'ux chiwi̱j , chi'nchel take camanic xniban hin ewo' riban ribanaric ru' eh ma' xa re' ta take re' eriban , k'e̱' la' chic q'uihal wach lok' laj nawa̱l naribanam ru'um reh rajawric naniyeb maj re' hin johtic wo' chic johtok wi̱n ru̱c' i wAja̱w ar pan taxa̱j .

Je' ricab i cojo̱j no'jbal na̱banam queh take toco̱m chic aj niminel ar Cre̱ta , je' wo' re' cojo̱j no'jbal na̱banam queh take aj niminel wilque̱b chi camanic ru̱c' jeno' aj ehcham reh camanic . Je' re' nwa̱j chi na̱banam reh chi re' take aj camanom re're' equiniminic eh enca'n haj wilic nponic chi quiwach take aj ehcham camanic , je' wo' chi ma' ok xa quichi̱' qui̱b chi c'u'lunic ru̱c' haj wilic quitak'abjic wi̱' .

Je' wo' nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' jeno' ok aweh tak encahnic chi ma' eta ric'ul i rato'bil i Dios . Je' wo' ma' nuctic chaxilac tak jeno' c'acharel c'ahbil rino'jbal re' eriyoj quicapew-bal take awich aj niminel tak je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i amche' nok q'uihinak chic i ra̱' riban chi nk'ahic quiti'jolal take c'acharel ru'um i ya'bilal ricoj .

Je' wo' chic , curman wo' chi holohic ok ribiral ric'acharic wilic lok chi quiwach take ma' ja' re' ta aj niminel take maj wi ma' holohic ribiral ric'acharic , ma' riban nchel chi re' aj Yahm ericoj cho take ch'i'c , on wolic re' enpitbic reh ricamaj chi c'amol be̱h .

Til Coric ru' chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' chi ritinami̱t i Dios xa re' la' ru' coric wo' chi kaju'junal i hoj rehreh wach c'axbal xiyew keh i Dios re' k'orel pa' bih camanic xa̱j riyeb keh i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi naka'nam

Chiri̱j i wili re' ricab raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xo̱j wo' richihca̱j i wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc , ar china̱ i rinimal ha' . Naxiban chi je' re' , re' rinimal ha' quic'ric wach eh xiban xa je' chic ricab ruxla̱b quic' . Je' re' k'uru' naxiban chi je' re' xiquimic take chi'nchel quic'acharic chipam rinimal ha' re're' .

Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' re' cok ru' ma' ok xa re' nok c'ahchi' awiliric tak cok ru'um aj ehcham camanic na̱banam tak acamaj je' ricab nca'n take re' xa banol quiwach c'uhtbal lok chi xa je' chic holohic laj aj camanom take . Ma'xta , re' la' hat-tak cha'n acamaj tak chi coric ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak je' ricab chiwach ta nak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , c'ahchi' acamanic tak . Je' re' cha'n tak maj re're' xa̱j i Dios chi na̱banam tak .

Je' re' ajic cha'n tak take holohic laj no'jbal re' aweht'alim tak chi coric wach bano̱j take , reh chi je' re' ru̱c' take k'oric c'ahchi' quik'orlom lok take quixowonic aweh tak enelic lok quiq'uixbilal ru'um reh wolic nca'n chiri̱j ac'acharic tak ru'um nok hat-tak chic aj niminel reh Jesus re' Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Je' re' k'uru' re' wAja̱w Dios re' xtak'anic cho wi̱n , re're' ra̱j chi naquic'acharic chi junelic take nic' pa' q'uihal quicojbic niwach nanquilow take lok' laj nawa̱l niban i hin rAc'u̱n i Dios . Ru'um chi je' re' ra̱j i wAja̱w Dios , re' hin nawucsam wo' take cho chi quixilac camnak pan cohlsbal wach take k'i̱j , nqui Jesus queh i tinamit .

Chiwach aj junc'am re're' nok je' re' c'ahchi' quik'orom take tinamit , jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic ar pan taxa̱j xc'ulic ricoj jenaj ya'bilal pa riti'jolal i Hero̱res xa ru'um chi ma' xiyew ta rilok'il i Dios chi je' wili : “ Re' Dios wilic cho pan taxa̱j , xa re' wo' re' i Dios , ma' nqui ta xik'or . Xa ru̱c' aj ya'bilal xcojoric pa riti'jolal , re' Hero̱res xa chi yu'na ti xquimic je eh chi je' re' xc'uxuric rak'sa̱' cu'um take sa'ha̱ .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus , kayew tak rinimal wach rilok'il i Ajabe̱s Dios re' rAja̱w i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Ka'n tak chi je' re' maj re' Dios , til wo' chic aj quetelenel wachi̱s eh til wo' aj ye'ol ricowil kac'ux nok re' hoj wilic ti'quil pan kac'ux .

Re' take chucul laj aj c'uhbalanel re're' ma' je' ta chic re' riwi̱' i c'axoj i̱b nca'n . Ru'um chi sahchanak chic quino'jbal xa c'ahchi' wo' que̱b chi c'uhbalanic re' ma'xta bih to'bonic riban queh c'acharel .

Re' hin xa quink'oric wo' chiri̱j take k'oric re're' chi ma' quinq'uix'ic ta so' eh je' re' niban maj re' take k'oric re're' , re' xquibiraj chi pe̱t be̱h take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh chiri̱j chic ru' xquibiraj wo' take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wo' re' nc'uhtunic wi̱' chi re' Dios wilic rajawric chi rico'ljic xa hab pa' wach ncojbic wach rik'orbal .

Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak je' ricab jeno' pa̱t xa jenaj chi tz'ak wilic chi ch'iquinbal reh eh xa china̱ wo' ru' ntik'mijic i pa̱t re're' , je' wo' re' ru̱c' i kaniminic ma' hab ta wo' chic wach jeno' eriban chi erik'or jeno' c'uhbal keh chiri̱j nic' wach riwi̱' nakojco'ljok ru'um i Dios maj xa jenaj wo' riwi̱' i co'lbal wilic eh re're' , xa re' wo' re' xnik'or aweh tak chi xa ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ekojco'ljic ru'um i Dios .

Je' wo' chic , ru̱c' take k'oric wili nwa̱j nik'orom chi aju'junal hat-tak bahilbe̱s chac'ax awehq'ue̱n tak je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b tak na'n hat-tak eh re' hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s chayohlej wo' wach i abahi̱l tak .

Coric aj ru' , najtir c'achalca̱t nak tak pan mahc eh ma' aweht'alim ta nak tak chi hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios , xa re' la' Dios xiyew aweh tak jenaj ac' laj c'acharic je' ricab xiban ru̱c' rucsjic cho Jesus eh je' wo' xicuy xisach rinimal amahc tak .

Je' wo' , nwa̱j nik'orom aweh i wili : Re' c'uhtunic ye'o̱j aweh ru'um i rUxlabal i Dios re' tichol lok ric'uhtjic , ma̱cana̱' lok ribanaric . C'olok pan ac'ux chi naxye'eric aweh i ribanaric re're' , pe̱t xk'ormojic cho ribiral ru'um i rUxlabal i Dios eh ru'um re' , re' take aj c'amol be̱h aj niminel xquicoj quik'ab chana̱ rehtalil chi xatpahbabjic chi hat aj c'uhtunel .
Chiri̱j chic ru' , xwilow wach jenaj ac' taxa̱j rich'i̱l jenaj ac' laj ac'al maj re' pe̱t taxa̱j rich'i̱l i pe̱t ac'al ma' xilmijic ta chic quiwach , ma' wo' re' rinimal ha' xilmijic chic wach .
Je' wo' chic , nkapahkaj aweh tak chi xa tiwi̱' wo' tak chi suk ac'ux tak ,

Ru'um i ti'quil naquiwih'ic wi̱' take c'acharel chipam take cho k'i̱j re're' , xa nacajwam nak chic chi chaj ta nak bih naricansanic queh xa re' la' ma' haj ta wo' chic charak cho quimic chi queh . Je' re' k'uru' xa rehreh nak chic wach rajmajic wach quiquimic naca'nam xa re' la' ma'xta chic bih narajwam chi naquiquimic .

Je' re' k'uru' je' wo' wili nik'or je aweh tak chiri̱j risoljic cho i Jesus : Re' hoj aj niminel til nkacoj wach chi je' ricab naxuctic wo' cho Jesus chi quixilac take camnak naxquimic je , je' wo' re' nachucsaj cho Dios take kich aj niminel camnak chic je take . Re're' naric'uluric nac'olok wo' chic lok i Jesus chiri̱j chi re' Dios ribanam chic cho tak'anic chi naric'amam johtok pan taxa̱j take aj niminel .

Ru'um chi til coric chi re' Dios xitak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al i Lok' laj rAc'u̱n , xa hab aj wach ricoj wach eh rik'or chi re' Jesus til rAc'u̱n i Dios re're' , til ric'uhtaj chi pa rik'ab i Dios wilic ric'acharic eh chi re' wo' Dios wilic pa ric'acharic .

Je' re' nok re' hat-tak xat-tijiljic wo' tak chiri̱j i rik'eb-eric lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak i najtir laj no'jbal re' xa'n tak cho ribanaric pan ac'acharic tak najtir . Re' no'jbal re're' xo̱j riban chi xa ma'xta chic so' ricorquil ru'um reh take c'ahbilal nawotowej cho pan ac'ux tak re' xjot'bic reh ac'acharic tak .

« Re' hin xnik'or chic lok , je' ricab chi wilic jenaj tz'ahp re' qui'oquic wi̱' take me̱' chipam i ye'a̱b quic'oloric wi̱' je' wo' re' i hin wilqui̱n wo' ayu' chi quitobjic take c'acharel reh chi equi'oquic eh equiwih'ic pa rik'ab i Dios . Xa hab wach k'uru' wilic pa rik'ab i Dios naric'acharic chi suk je' ricab nanwih'ic chi suk jeno' me̱' nanoquic cok chipam i ye'a̱b re' ye'o̱j wi̱' riwarbal on je' ricab nanwih'ic chi suk riwa' riha̱' nanesmejic wo' chic lok chipam i ye'a̱b re're' reh chi naric'amaric je chipam i ye'a̱b re' wilic wi̱' rex laj q'uim .

Chi quixilac take xicansjic re're' , wilic wo' chic take xicansjic chi abaj . Wilic take xicansjic ru̱c' k'as laj ch'ihch' naxyoc'oric wo' quiyejal . Wilic wo' take xicansjic ru̱c' c'ul k'as ju' ch'ihch' . Tz'a̱b ru' chi quixilac take ma' xicansjic ta , wilic take xicahnic chi ma'xta quipa̱t ru'um reh quiniminic eh chi je' re' xca'n xa qui'o̱j quichalic chic chi ma' xa jenaj ta chic quiye'a̱b . Je' wo' , wilic take xicahnic chi ma'xta chic nech' ok quiso' eh xa ri̱j me̱' chic ch'i̱l i ri̱j chi̱wa nquicoj chiqui̱j chi jelow-bal quiso' . Ru'um aj reh quiniminic , re' take re' til wo' xca'n chi xa niba̱' chic take chi junpech , xa ti' chic quic'ux eh xa ixowomaj wo' chic quiwach .

Je' wo' nik'or wo' aweh tak chi je' ricab chi re' rino'jbal i jenaj c'acharel ric'uhtaj lok hab wach i raja̱w , chaweht'alij wo' tak chi xa hab wach aweh hat-tak aj niminel ritahkej ribanaric i coric wach no'jbal ric'uhtaj wo' lok chi re're' manlic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios ru'um nok re' Dios til coric wach rino'jbal je' ricab wo' aweht'alim hat-tak .

maj re' tak'anic xiban keh i kAja̱w Jesus jenaj wach ch'i̱l je' ricab k'oro̱j cho reh raj k'orol C'uhbal i Dios Isayi̱yas ribihnal naxk'ormojic reh chi je' wili : “ Je' ricab nok jenaj sakombal cojo̱j chi quisakom take xa hab pa' wach c'acharel , re' hin Dios c'ahchi' wo' ca̱t nipahba̱b chi waj tz'e' wa̱ch aj sakomonel pa̱m quino'jbal take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel . Je' re' apahbabjic niban reh chi xa haj pa' yu̱k' q'uixca̱b wilque̱b wi̱' take c'acharel ewo' quico'ljic , nqui rik'or , nqui ma' Lu̱' queh .

re' la' chic nka'n nkak'eb lok ri̱j-kac'ux take c'ahbil laj no'jbal nbanaric pan c'olic re' nye'bic pan q'uixbilal . Je' re' nok re' hoj ma' kojk'oric ta ru̱c' chucuj k'oric reh chi ma' eta nwih'ic keh i pa' bih wilic queh take i quibirinic keh . Je' wo' ma' c'ahchi' ta kajalam wach ricorquilal riC'uhbal i Dios reh chi enponic chi quiwach i tinamit . Til la' nkak'or ricorquilal chi sakom wach reh chi je' re' enrakmajic chiri̱j chi re' kacapew-bal i hoj til coric wach chiwach i Dios .

« Je' wo' chic , re' hat-tak yu'na nawilow tak eh nabiraj wo' tak chi c'ahchi' kak'oric pan ak'orbal chi'nchel hat-tak eh re' wili xa ru'um reh rajawric i Jesus xc'ulmujic chi je' re' , maj naxye'eric wo' chic rilok'il chi xwih'ic wo' chic cok chi riche̱l i Dios , xitak'a̱' cho keh i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' k'oro̱j cho ribiral ru'um kAja̱w Dios chi nariyeb cho keh . Je' re' ajic re' Jesus xitak'a̱' cho keh Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi nakak'orom i riC'uhbal .

Ru'um aj re' yu'na re' hat-tak toco̱m chic riwi̱' ac'acharic tak je' ricab nok toco̱m chic tz'ih nacoj tak chawi̱j natelic tak cho reh kahsanic ha' . Chi toco̱m chic riwi̱' ac'acharic tak je' ricab tik'imaj wach ru'um i Dios chi hat-tak na̱c'uhtunic tak lok reh rino'jbal , curman wo' chi eli̱c ok c'ahchi' ricorjic wach ano'jbal tak maj xa chi je' re' na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi manlic i toco̱m laj c'acharic wilca̱t wi̱' .

Naxponic i k'oric re're' ru̱c' i Jesus , je' wili xik'or : « Re' ya'bilal nbanic reh La̱saro ma' re' ta cansbal reh chi junpech , naricamanic la' chi c'uhtbal reh rinimal wach rajawric i Dios je' wo' chi re' hin re' rAc'u̱n i Dios enc'utunic chi wilic wo' wajawric , nqui Jesus .

Je' re' nik'or maj re' take k'oric re're' nquiyew wo' chi eht'aljic i wili chiri̱j chaj bih riban i Dios : Chi re' take c'acharel nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus , quicahnic chi coric chic wach quic'ux . Re' xnik'or lok re're' no̱j elok wach chi til coric ru̱c' i tz'ihmbimaj cahnok ru'um jenaj raj k'oro̱l i Dios chi je' wili : « Re' c'acharel re' pahbamaj ru'um i Dios chi coric wach rino'jbal chi junelic k'i̱j sakom naric'acharic ru'um nok xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios , nqui xitz'ihmbaj cho .

Naxesmejic je Jesus chiwach i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to , re're' ritehlam chic je ro̱k ricuru̱s naxelic je ar reh chi narojic cansjok china̱ i yu̱k' “ Ribakil Na̱ Camnak ” ribihnal eh pan k'oric hewre̱yo re' jenaj queh kak'orbal i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , “ Co̱lcota ” nkabihnej .

Je' re' ajic ru̱c' i xik'or re're' nkilow chi re' Dios rehreh wach camanic xiyew keh hoj aj niminel reh Jesus eh re're' xiban chi ju'jun keh i hoj wilic chic kajawric chi narimanlajic wach xa pa' wilic camanic ye'o̱j keh . Ru'um aj re' , re' aj niminel nc'ulbic reh c'uhbal k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios , tanlic wo' china̱ chi narik'orom lok i k'oro̱j reh re're' , re' cok ru' curman chi re' ok i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j re' ch'iclic wi̱' kac'ux chik'or ribiral i aj niminel re're' .
Re' pe̱t c'acharel xa je' nilbic jenaj cakcoj . Re' chic ricab je' nilbic jenaj rac'u̱n wacax . Re' ro̱x xa je' nilbic jenaj winak eh re' ricaj je' chic nilbic jenaj xihc' xiq'uinic riban .
Je' re' k'uru' til wo' chawic'raj awi̱b tak chi ma' ok c'acharic na'n tak ru̱c' memil laj no'jbal , wilic la' ok ano'jbal tak chi c'acharic .

Ru'um chi je' re' rik'or , re' hin nik'or i c'uhbal ma' xa ta queh take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' la' wo' queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel . Je' re' niban maj chiwach i Dios re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa jenaj kawach quich'i̱l take junch'uk chic tinamit eh chi je' re' , re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ch'i̱l take junch'uk chic re're' xa jenaj wo' Ajabe̱s wilic chi kana̱ . Re' Ajabe̱s re're' til yohbal wach ricuse'sbal riyew cho chi kana̱ eh til rito'bej wo' take nic' pa' q'uihal c'acharel nca'n johtok quiti̱j chiwach .

Ru̱c' aj nca'n take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ja' qui'oquic ta chi rinimjic i Jesus , ja' nquirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih riwi̱' naxye'eric queh i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses . Je' re' nik'or maj re' riwi̱' chi xye'eric i c'uhbal re're' reh chi naquich'ica̱b nak quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' nok ye'o̱j cho i c'uhbal re're' , xa hab wach c'acharel re' erich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus nye'eric reh chi eriban chi coric chic wach ric'ux .

Je' wo' , nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' chi bih no̱j wi̱' acapew-bal tak chiri̱j xa pa' bih jaric china̱ wach ac'al wili , re' la' cha'n tak chak'or tak johtok reh Dios haj wilic ac'axquilal tak eh nacha'n tak johtok apahkanic tak xa wilic ok wo' tioxonic pan awa̱mna tak ru̱c' i Dios .

Nic' pa' nimal xc'uluric cho cu̱c' take kama̱m kati't , chi'nchel re're' xc'uluric cho chi c'uhtbal keh hoj chi ma' riban ta chi enkac'ax wach ribanaric i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal je' ricab xca'n ru' chi xa re' chic ribanaric i c'ahbilal xcotowej ribanaric eh ru'um re' xquic'ul i ti'c'axic .

Je' re' ajic naxiteh na̱ i ma' laj jul cahk re're' ru̱c' i ritehbal ye'o̱j , xa nbolic chic xelic cho jenaj rinimal sib xa je' chic ricab npokic cho risibil pan ac'al tu̱j . Je' re' xiban i rinimal sib re're' cu rehtal xik'ekomsaj wach risakomil i k'i̱j naxjohtic johtok pan te̱w . Je' re' nok , xcahnic chi muhlic wach chi'nchel .

Raj la' chaxilac hat-tak ma' ok je' re' no'jbal ena'n tak maj xkak'or chic aweh tak chi re' Dios nariyeb cho ti'c'axic tojbal wach rimahc i hab wach riban i c'oyomal . Ru'um aj re' nkak'or aweh tak i wili : Ma' hab wach aweh tak rimak' rehq'ue̱n jeno' chic c'acharel maj ru̱c' re're' , ma' xa re' ta c'ahchi' relk'am i ras richa̱k' je' la' wo' c'ahchi' rimahcanic chiwach i ras richa̱k' re're' .

Je' re' nik'or maj xa hab wach riban chi xa jenaj chic riwi̱' ch'i̱l i Jesus nmikric chi jenaj ac' c'acharel chic je' ricab nok ru̱c' ric'ulic wach k'i̱j sakom jeno' ha'lac'un np'uhtic johtok ric'acharic chi jenaj chic ac' c'acharel . Je' re' nok re' c'acharel re're' njahlic chic wach rino'jbal riban cho najtir eh til chacoj tak rehtal chi re' chic i no'jbal nchalic ru̱c' Jesus nwih'ic pa ra̱mna .

« Je' aj re' je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' ac'unbe̱s ncamanic chi rilahk' i raja̱w , re' wAja̱w Dios ric'uhtaj wi̱n chi'nchel chaj bih ricamaj ra̱j chi nanibanam eh je' re' riban wu̱c' ru'um chi k'e̱' wo' chic quiric'ax i hin rac'u̱n . Je' ricab nok re' wAja̱w Dios til re're' xc'uhtunic wi̱n chaj bih xa̱j ribanaric ru̱c' i winak xnicowsaj lok re're' , til re' wo' re' naric'uhtunic johtok wi̱n chi kawach i riq'uihal nimak tak wach camanic eh nanip'ut ribanaric take re' , narisahchic ac'ux nachawilow tak .

Je' wo' chic , wi wilic nchel jeno' hab wach chaxilac tak cu ricoj i k'ab chi lek' ma' riban chic ribanjic , chisic' la' ricamaj reh chi ru̱c' wo' ransil ritz'awumal enwih'ic pa' bih reh chi quitobjic take ras richa̱k' c'axic ti nca'n .

Chi cu c'ahchi' pe qui̱n chi ritz'ihmjic je aweh i hu̱j wili , nwa̱j wo' nipahkam je aweh jenaj chic ato'bil chi na̱tik'a̱b wi̱n jeno' niye'a̱b pan apa̱t re' equinwih'ic wi̱' . Je' re' ato'bil nipahkaj je aweh maj nwuy'ej ru̱c' i Dios chi ru̱c' ati̱j na'n tak johtok chiwach , re' hin equinesmejic je pan che̱' eh chi je' re' equino̱j awu̱c' tak chi ak'o'rjic tak ponok ar .

Je' re' nok ru'um chi je' re' riwi̱' i Jesus , ma̱cana̱' tak chi enjot'oric acapew-bal tak ru̱c' take toco̱m chic tijbal re' ma' xkayew ta aweh chi nabjic . Re' la' hat-tak chayew ac'ux tak chi ricowsjic acapew-bal tak re' cok ru' wilic ok pan awa̱mna tak i c'axoj i̱b ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios . Je' re' nik'or maj ma' ru̱c' ta nchel i tak'anic chiri̱j take c'uxbal ra̱j c'uxuric , on ma' ra̱j ta ric'uxuric naricowjic acapew-bal tak , to̱b ta wilic take je' re' nquik'or . Raj nchel i hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' take tak'anic re're' xa ma'xta wo' bih ricamanej queh take quic'ambic na̱ .

Je' wo' chic yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , til nka̱j kapahkam aweh tak jenaj ato'bil chiqui̱j take raj camanom i kAja̱w Jesus wilque̱b chaxilac tak re' xipahbabjic wo' ru'um i Jesus chi ric'amaric abe̱h tak , je' wo' chi ricojoric ano'jbal tak . Til aj nkapahkaj ato'bil aweh tak chi chalok'mej tak quiwach take aj camanom re're' .

Je' re' xquik'or ru'um chi xiyo'jic chi quiwach take nahsil re're' maj quesam chic ribiral chi xa hab wach c'acharel enk'oric chi re' Jesus , re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , naresmejic je on narit'ermejic je chipam i pa̱t ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses .

Je' wo' chic , re' take re' nquik'or chi ritinami̱t Dios take xa ru'um chi nquicoj quibihnal chi aj nimem take reh rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal . Coric chi wilic quibiral chi je' re' , xa re' la' ru' re' ricorquilal ma' je' ta re' maj re' hoj re' kojlok'onic reh Dios ru̱c' rito'bal i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' aj hoj wilco̱j chi manlic ritinami̱t . Ru'um aj re' ma' re' ta chic china̱ i pa' bih nbanaric china̱ ac'al wili nkach'ica̱' kac'ux , chiri̱j la' Jesus ch'iclic kac'ux chi suk kac'ux .

Re' c'uhbal re're' je' wili rik'or : « Chacoj tak wach i k'oro̱j chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios eh je' wo' chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Chac'ax wo' awi̱b chawach tak maj re're' i tak'anic xiban cho i Dios , nqui rik'or i c'uhbal re're' .

Chiri̱j chic ru' , xwilow wo' chi jenaj chic ma' laj chicop xelic cho pan ac'al . Re're' wilic quib ruc'a' je' ricab ruc'a' q'uijol laj me̱' , xa re' la' ma' jenaj ta wach rik'orbal ch'i̱l jeno' me̱' maj je' la' nk'oric ma' laj wacax a̱k' .

Chi je' aj wili k'uru' wich aj niminel , re' hat-tak ma' riban ta chi re' ano'jbal tak ma' ja' manlic ta wach je' ricab rino'jbal jeno' t'uch ha'lac'un , curman la' chi naribanam chi til manlic chic wach je' ricab rino'jbal jeno' rijeb laj winak chi ncapewenic chic chi coric . Haj ti cok wilic til eriban chi enac'am tak tz'eht reh rino'jbal i ha'lac'un , re' nok chi re're' ma' no̱j ta ricapew-bal china̱ ribanaric i c'ahbil laj no'jbal .
Xa hab wach aweh tak wilic ti'c'axic china̱ niyew rino'jbal chi chiban riti̱j chiwach i Dios eh xa hab wach xa suk chic pa ric'ux , niyew wo' rino'jbal chi chiyew johtok rilok'il i Dios ru̱c' bi̱ch .

Re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i c'acharel chi naric'raj chi ma'xta chic ransil riti'jolal ribakil ru'um i k'uhtic re're' ricowsaj riman ric'ux , je' aj wo' re' cha'n hat-tak pan animinic tak .

Ru'um chi re' hat-tak nana'n ati̱j tak nak'or tak johtok reh Dios chi re're' awAja̱w tak , re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi je' wili : Re' k'orel nic' pa' wach bano̱j ca'nam take c'acharel , re' wo' re' rich'ukuric quimahc naribanam chi quiju'junal maj re' Dios ma' richih ta quiwach take c'acharel narich'ukum k'oric china̱ quimahc . Ru'um aj re' curman chaweh tak chi cu rehtal riponic wach ac'acharic tak ayu' wach ac'al , chayohbalej wach i Dios chi c'ahchi' ayeb tak rilok'il chi coric pan ac'acharic tak .

re' la' curman chi ena'n tak chi enatik tak ju' ricuyuric take ti'c'axic chi cow ac'ux tak reh chi na̱banam tak haj wilic ra̱j i kAja̱w Dios eh chi je' re' na wo' ac'ulum tak haj wilic i k'oro̱j cahnok chi nariye'eric aweh tak .

Re' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios , ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hoj til keht'alim chi naric'uluric i k'oro̱j cho ru'um eh to̱b ta wo' yu'na ma' nkilow ta wach i rimahsjic wach i rik'orom cho re're' , re' hoj xa ch'iclic wo' kac'ux chi naric'uluric .

Was tak nicha̱k' yu'na nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak i wili : Ru'um chi re' Dios xpahbanic wi̱n chi raj k'oro̱l , re' hin cow nipahkaj aweh tak i wili : Ma̱ban tak chic aweh c'acharic je' ricab c'acharic nca'n chipam quimemil laj no'jbal take awich c'acharel tak re' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel take re' ja' ma' nquinimej ta wo' i Dios .

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' , ru'um chi xa re' wach i Jesus wilic rajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel , ma̱cana̱' tak chi hab wach erich'uk k'oric chana̱ tak chi rik'ormojic aweh tak haj wilic eriban on ma' eriban chi enac'ux on enawuq'uej tak . Je' wo' , ma̱cana̱' tak chi hab wach erich'uk k'oric chana̱ tak chi rik'ormojic aweh tak chi curman chi ena'n tak take ni̱m nka'n hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab take nka'n eli̱c ju'jun ha̱b , on eli̱c ju'jun poh nok riban xa coten chic i poh , on re' nka'n chiwach i hi'lbal k'i̱j reh ju'jun xama̱na .

Ru'um aj re' xye'eric k'ab queh chi xiwih'ic cok chiwach i Dios re' wilic chi k'atal k'oric china̱ chi'nchel . Je' wo' , xye'eric k'ab queh chi ayu' re' nlok'onjic wi̱' i Dios xquik'ahsaj qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i Dios chi ma'xta ri'orahil . Ma' xa re' ta re' , re' Dios re' k'atoj k'oric chic riban , xiyew k'ab queh chi xiwih'ic cok chipam i ye'a̱b nc'acharic wi̱' i Dios chi junelic i k'i̱j chi co'lomaj chic take .

re' ma' Lu̱' xkajic wo' cho nah oxtik pa̱t . Nok wilic chic re' wilic wi̱' i q'uijol a̱mna chic , re' ma' Lu̱' ximuc'a̱' jok ri̱b china̱ ac'un re're' , xiyew johtok wach teleb eh je' wili xik'or queh aj niminel : « Ma' yo'slom awi̱b tak . Re' q'uijol wili ma' camnak ta , nqui queh . Je' re' xik'or ru'um nok ribanam nak chic chi xc'acharic wo' chic cho .

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios re' hin c'ahchi' wo' nic'ulum ti'c'axic , xa re' la' ru' cu ewo' nicuy ransil take ti'c'axic reh chi re' take aj niminel re' chiho̱j take ru'um i Dios chi ritinami̱t enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chi manlic chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Ru'um chi je' re' enca'n , re' take re' equic'acharic wo' chi junelic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios chi sutumaj ri̱j ru̱c' rinimal wach sakom .

Chayew risukquil ac'ux tak chawibil awi̱b tak c'uhtbal reh i c'axoj i̱b wilic chaxilac tak . Re' ta nak Dios banok chi enwih'ic risukquil ac'ux hat-tak re' xa jenaj chic awi̱' tak rich'i̱l Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' ta nak re' .
Je' re' nok chi hat-tak chic behsemaj ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal , chabiraj wo' tak k'oric chawach tak maj nana'n tak chi je' re' nayew wo' tak rilok'il i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Je' aj re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , ru'um aj chi re' hat-tak ana'bem tak chic quino'jbal take c'acharel re're' , re' xa re' wo' i c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n pan quic'acharic , chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi ma' eta nacoj tak wach take chucuj laj tijinic nquic'uhtaj , maj wi re' hat-tak nac'am tak na̱ nquik'or , enacana̱' tak lok pa reh animinic tak re' pa'lic wi̱' ac'ux tak chi cow .
Hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s nipahkaj aweh tak chi tiwih'ok chi ri'sil rajawric abahi̱l tak ru'um nok je' re' riwi̱' ac'acharic tak ra̱j banjic yu'na chi wilca̱t tak chic chi ri'sil rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus .

Tz'a̱b ru' wi xa xitik wo' ju' wih'ic chipam rino'jbal re're' chiri̱j chi ak'ilim chic i hat , chi quiwach aj chic chi'nchel i comonil chak'il reh chi re' quich c'amol be̱h naquilow chi je' re' , enquiyohbalej qui̱b reh chi ma' eta nca'n jeno' c'ahbilal .

Je' re' k'uru' was nicha̱k' aj niminel , ru'um chi je' re' naribanam i Dios ma' koj-oquic chi rich'ukuric wach kacapew-bal nok rehreh wach capewenic nka'n chiri̱j i kaniminic . Haj cok wilic til k'e̱' ajwal wach chi ka'n , re' i wili : Cow kapahba̱' tak kacapew-bal eh ma' nka'n chi ru'um reh kano'jbal enk'ehbic pan mahc i kich aj niminel .

Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel enca'n i coric , k'e̱' wo' chic ricuse'sbal i Dios enchalic chi quina̱ chi naquiwih'ic ar re' wilic wi̱' i Dios chi sutumaj ri̱j ru̱c' risakomil rilok'il . Je' wo' , naquiwih'ic wo' pan sukquil c'uxlis eh naquibiram take holohic laj k'oric rik'orom cho i Dios queh take quic'acharic pan holonquil . Je' wo' re' , re' cuse'sbal re're' nchalic wo' chi quina̱ take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wi enca'n i coric pan quic'acharic .

Je' wo' chic , wilic wo' take ma' xic'ahtic ta naxicojoric chipam i k'a̱k' re' ma' hab ta wach noquic ru̱c' ritz'a'quilal . Wilic wo' take xico'ljic chiwach i quimic ru̱c' k'as laj ch'ihch' . Wilic wo' take xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios naxquic'raj chi ma' cow ta chic quic'ux . Ru'um reh rich'iquinjic quic'ux xca'n , re' take re' xquic'ul wo' quicowil eh ru̱c' quicowil re're' , xiponic wo' nimak tak aj k'ak'anel re' ma'xta bih xquiyohlej , xca'n la' resmejic je toco̱m chic tinamit quichalic chi k'ak'anic pan quitinami̱t .

Ru̱c' cohlsbal wach nik'orbal awu̱c' tak nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak chi yu'na johtok chi kawach ma' nwa̱j ta chic biram take k'oric chawi̱j tak maj ru̱c' re're' k'e̱' nacoj tak cho riti'quilal nic'ux . Je' re' nik'or maj re' hin wilic chic take rehtalil pa niti'jolal chaj bih take ti'c'axic nic'ulum lok ru'um chi hin aj k'orol reh c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus .

Chiri̱j chic ru' , c'uhtbal reh chi re' ti'c'axic narichalic china̱ i ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya , ar aj ru' jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' k'e̱' nimal wach rajawric xichop cho jenaj ma' laj abaj je' ricab nimal jenaj ma' laj que'bal ixi̱m eh xicut jok chipam rinimal ha' chi je' wili c'ahchi' rik'orom : « Je' ricab sahchic wach xiban abaj wili je' wo' re' narisahchic awach i hat-tak c'acharel reh ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya . Nachac'ul tak je' re' , ma' jaruj ta chic narilmijic awach tak

Raj la' hat-tak was nicha̱k' re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak wilic awu̱c' tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi ric'amaric abe̱h tak eh ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi re' niminic ach'ica̱b cho wi̱' ac'ux tak eli̱c ok c'ahchi' rijohtic wach . Je' wo' nipahkaj aweh tak chi re' ati̱j na̱banam tak chiwach i Dios re' ok i Lok' laj rUxlabal narik'oric aweh tak nic' wach ribanaric na̱banam tak .

Nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi chipam ac'acharic tak chatik tak ju' rijalaric wach ano'jbal tak , re' cok ru' cha'n tak re're' xa re' la' ma' ta chi c'ahchi' ac'acharic tak je' ricab nca'n take quixowonic wach i Dios , chacana̱' la' tak chi re' ok re' enjalbic wach ano'jbal tak maj chi je' re' na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi coric i ra̱j i Dios wili : Chi re' ano'jbal tak holohic ok , coric ok wach eh je' wo' nt'oric ok wach chi manlic .

re' la' chic i ti'c'axic xniban queh jarub pa' chi comonil moloj wach aj niminel reh Dios . Je' aj re' xinbanic cho i hin re' ma' nim ta ti niwach chi quiwach take pahbamaj chi nahsil c'amol quibe̱h raj tahkanel i kAja̱w Jesus eh ru'um reh take nic' nimal xniban cho re're' , til ma' ric'ul ta nak chi wi̱n chi narik'ormojic nibihnal chi hin wo' pahbamaj chi c'amol quibe̱h take aj niminel reh Jesus .

Ch'i̱l take k'oric c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak , nik'or wo' je aweh tak i wili : Ma̱yew tak chic ac'ux chiri̱j i c'ahbil laj no'jbal nbanaric china̱ ac'al wili , ma' wo' chiri̱j nca'n take i c'ahbil laj c'acharel wilic ayu' wach ac'al ma' holohic ta laj aj k'orol take . Wi hab wach riyew ric'ux chiri̱j ru' ra̱j rik'orom chi re' c'axoj i̱b nchalic ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios ma' ja'xta ru̱c' .

Chaxilac tak wilic take nquik'or chi je' wili : « A̱ , re' take c'acharel re're' ric'ul chi queh chi re' Dios eriyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ ru'um take c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n , nqui nquik'or . Aweh hat-tak je' ru̱c' tik'oric tak reh k'oric je' re' , nik'or aweh tak i wili : Ru̱c' take k'oric re're' c'ahchi' wo' ak'orom tak chi ric'ul wo' chaweh tak chi re' Dios eriyew cho ti'c'axic chana̱ tak . Je' re' nik'or maj re' hat-tak re' tik'oric tak chi je' re' na'n wo' tak je' ricab nca'n take toco̱m chic c'acharel re're' . Ru'um aj re' ma' riban ta chi nak'or tak chi je' wili : « Re' hoj ma' nka'n ta keh c'ahbil laj no'jbal , ma' tiqui tak .

Je' wo' , re' take wilque̱b chi nahsil c'amol be̱h chipam i k'ijil re're' , re' take xib wili : Re' ma' Jaco̱wo , re' ma' Se̱pas ch'i̱l wo' ma' Wa̱n , naxquicoj rehtal chi re' Dios xiyew wi̱n jenaj camanic chi rik'ormojic i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus , xojquic'ul pan sukquil c'uxlis chi hoj chic quich aj k'orol c'uhbal chi wich'i̱l i Wernaweh . Chiri̱j chic ru' kachi'nchelal xkatik'a̱' wach chi re' hin ch'i̱l i Wernaweh nakak'orom i c'uhbal queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh re' take re' naquitikim ju' rik'ormojic i c'uhbal queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' nquic'am na̱ i c'uhbal chi rik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal .

Nok re' take sol quiyeb chic cho wach curu̱s i Jesus , xquiwek i riso' , cajch'ak xquesaj reh chi ju'jun ch'ak naricahnic queh take sol wilque̱b ar . Je' aj re' xca'n reh riso' xa re' la' ma' je' ta re' xca'n reh i roxlo̱c' riso' re' ma'xta p'ojbal reh maj xa junpa'lic riquemjic bano̱j . Naxquesaj aj lok i tz'ih re're' ,

Ru'um aj chi je' re' nacapaj tak , re' hin niban aweh tak take pahkanic wili : Chaj wa'ric chi toco̱m chic take c'acharel natijej tak raj la' hat-tak ma' c'ahchi' ta atijem awi̱b chawibil awi̱b tak ? Chaj wo' wa'ric re' hat-tak nak'or tak ricorquil chi ma' holohic ta banoj lek' , xa re' la' ru' re' hat-tak na'n wo' tak i banoj lek' ?

C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' ati'jolal abakil tak wilic chi je' ricab jenaj pa̱t lok'onbal wi̱' wach i Dios re' nc'acharic wi̱' i Lok' laj Uxlabal xiyew aweh tak eh ru'um re're' yu'na hat-tak chic reh i Dios .

Chaj wa'ric nok re' hoj cow nkayew kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios eh je' wo' chi atobjic hat-tak ? Nkayew kac'ux ru'um reh richak'lamil ricoj pan ka̱mna i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' re' nka'n maj keht'alim i wili : Chi re' Jesus xiyew ri̱b chi quimic pan kajelow-bal chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel eh ru̱c' i quimic xic'ul re're' eriban chi enkak'or chi kunchelal i hoj c'acharel xojquimic rich'i̱l .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , re' richihim cho awach tak i Dios chi hat-tak ritinami̱t eh chi hat wo' tak yuk'umaj chi pan jenaj k'i̱j etiwih'ic tak ru̱c' ar pan taxa̱j , nipahkaj aweh tak chi chayew acapew-bal tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j chi manlic i k'oro̱j aweh tak wili chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh chi re're' xtak'abjic cho ru'um i Dios chi banol reh camanic chi Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach .

Yu'na nipahkaj aweh tak chi aju'junal tak chi chato'bej tak take c'axic ti nca'n , je' ricab xnic'uhtaj aweh tak chi ru̱c' kacamaj naka'nam nakato'bem wo' take kas kacha̱k' . Chi'nchel re're' xnik'or aweh tak chipam take c'uhbalanic xniban chaxilac tak re' xc'ulic wi̱' pa nic'ux riC'uhbal i Jesus re' rik'or chi je' wili : « K'e̱' wo' chic sukquil c'uxlis nchalic ru̱c' i c'acharel riban i to'bonic , chiwach i c'acharel re' nc'ulbic reh to'bonic , nqui rik'or i riC'uhbal i Jesus , nqui ma' Lu̱' queh c'amol be̱h re're' .

Je' wo' chic niban aweh tak i tak'anic wili : Chi'nchel hat-tak re' abanam tak chic caxa̱ra , chayew wo' tak rilok'il acaxarahil tak . Ma̱ch'uwa'rsaj wach acaxa̱ra tak ru̱c' ribanaric c'oyomal . Je' re' tak'anic niban maj nachich'uk k'oric i Dios , naribanam chi narichalic i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel re' nquich'uwa'rej wach i quicaxarahil eh je' wo' chi quina̱ take nca'n i c'oyomal .

To̱b ta wo' pe̱t xinponic i hin , ma' xinoquic ta ti cok pan muk'unbal xa pan ocbal la' ti xincahnic eh cu ar xwilow cok chi xa re' chic wach take tz'ih botomaj nak wi̱' riti'jolal ribakil i Jesus wilque̱b ar .

Xa re' aj wo' re' ru' , xic'uyu'jic take cho cohok eh xquirehpaj cho quisakomil . Je' wo' , wilic take k'oric xbirmijic cho cu pan taxa̱j eh xiban jenaj hihc yohbal wach cowil re' ma' wo' janc'al ta k'i̱j sakom ribanam cho cu rich'ihquic cho quic'acharic take c'acharel .

Ru'um re're' , re' hin xnixuc'a̱' wi̱b chiwach raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios eh nok oquic nak chic wi̱n chi rilok'onjic wach , re're' je' wili xik'or wi̱n : « Ma̱ban je' re' ! Ma̱lok'ej niwach i hin maj xa hin wo' ti raj camanom i Dios je' ricab nok wilca̱t i hat ch'i̱l wo' take awas acha̱k' aj niminel re' quiniminic reh c'uhtunic bano̱j take ru'um i Jesus eh re' take c'uhtunic re're' , re' wo' take xiyew i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi narik'ormojic cu'um take hab wach xye'eric k'oric queh chi naquik'orom . Je' re' ajic xa re' wo' Dios nariye'eric rilok'il , nqui xik'or wi̱n .

Je' re' ajic re' Dios xiyew keh hoj aj niminel reh Jesus chi nakana'bem nic' nimal re're' eh re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nto'bonic keh chi je' re' enka'n . Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta wilic take rino'jbal i Dios k'e̱' c'axic chi keh rirakmajic chiri̱j , re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xa ewo' risakomej wach keh ru'um chi reht'alim chi'nchel i nic' nimal wilic pa ricapew-bal i Dios

Chi je' wili k'uru' chacuy chac'ul tak i wich aj niminel re're' je' ricab ric'ul chi keh chi enka'n i hoj aj niminel reh kAja̱w Jesus chi ric'uluric jeno' kich aj niminel ru̱c' sukquil c'uxlis . Je' wo' nok wilic chic chaxilac tak chalok'mej tak i kich aj niminel wili je' wo' ricab na'n tak cu̱c' take c'acharel quitak'abjic je awu̱c' tak .

Re' hat-tak ac'unbe̱s ixk'unbe̱s , til tiniminok tak chiwach rik'orbal atu̱t awaja̱w tak ru̱c' chi'nchel je' ricab ric'ul chi queh take quiniminic chic reh kAja̱w ru'um nok je' re' ra̱j i Dios chi na̱banam tak yu'na chi wilca̱t tak chic chi ri'sil rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus , nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi wilic jenaj i til nye'bic sukquil kac'ux i hoj eh re' ricorquilal , re' i wili : Re' ka̱mna ricapaj cho eh rik'or keh chi re' Dios xiban chi re' hoj c'ahchi' kac'acharic chi quixilac take tinamit ayu' wach ac'al ru̱c' jenaj sak wach capew-bal , ru̱c' jenaj ch'ublic wach no'jbal eh je' wo' pa ricorquil laj c'acharic wilco̱j . Re' nik'or re're' til coric maj til awu̱c' hat-tak xc'utunic wach chi je' re' kano'jbal eh chi re' hoj ma' re' ta nchel ru̱c' xa tik'imaj wach no'jbal xojc'acharic ru̱c' sakil wach no'jbal . Ma'xta ! Je' la' re' c'acharic xka'n ru'um reh rinimal wach rato'bil i Dios riyew cho chi kana̱ .

« Hab wach ric'ol pa ra̱mna niC'uhbal eh rinimej haj wilic i rik'or , re're' ric'uhtaj chi til ti' quiric'raj . Re' je' re' nbanic , ti' wo' enic'rijic ru'um i wAja̱w eh ti' wo' nawic'ram i hin . Ma' xa re' ta re' naric'uluric ru̱c' maj nanic'uhtam wo' wi̱b reh , nqui Jesus .

Coric ru' chi ru'um reh take tak'anic re're' , wilic take wilic quibiral chi k'e̱' wo' chic quino'jbal xa ru'um ti ru' chi til nquiyew quic'ux chiri̱j i pa' bih nquilok'ej wach on ru'um chi k'e̱' wo' chic nquiyew chi ti' i quiti'jolal , xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta je' re' quibiral , re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' take tak'anic re're' ma'xta bih camanel aweh tak wi ta nak ru̱c' take re' nawa̱j ayeb pan awo̱k tak i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal ric'ax wach ati'jolal tak .

Re' take aj niminel re're' quik'orom chi quina̱ take kacomonil i hoj aj niminel re' wilqui̱n wi̱' ayu' chi re' hat k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal c'axo̱j abanam cho queh . Chi xa je' wo' re' na'n cu̱c' take kich aj niminel quiponic awu̱c' , yu'na k'uru' chi cu ja' qui'elic ta je pan apa̱t take aj niminel re' xi'o̱j c'olok awu̱c' til chacuy nipahkaj wo' je aweh chi enayew je pa' bih queh reh nah quibe̱h ru'um nok je' re' ra̱j i Dios chi naribanaric queh take quik'oric reh riC'uhbal .

Chiri̱j take memil laj no'jbal , re' hat aweht'alim wo' chi re're' xa wolinic i̱b rucsaj cho . Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh chi naqui'oquic chi k'oric chiri̱j take no'jbal ma' nrakmajic ta wo' chiri̱j , ma̱ban hat jenaj chi quixilac take c'acharel je' re' nca'n

Je' re' k'uru' xa re' wo' cho tehenak ki̱j chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel , ma'xta chic bih npoybic wach pan nak' kawach rilok'il i Dios . Yu'na til nc'utunic chic lok chi kawach i rilok'il re're' je' ricab jeno' lemuh ric'uhtaj chi coric i rilbal jeno' c'acharel . Je' re' ajic nok re' hoj c'ahchi' rijalmajic wach kano'jbal rehreh c'ahchi' koquic cok chipam i rinimal wach i rilok'il ru' eh re' nbanic i camanic re're' , re' i kAja̱w re' Lok' laj Uxlabal wo' riwi̱' .

re' ta na chic riquiq'ue̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ma' eriban chi ma' eta chic nwih'ic pan kacapew-bal ribanaric jeno' bano̱j re' enbanic chi enk'ehtic pa̱m kabe̱h chi nakac'acharic chi junelic ? On ma' eriban chi ma' ta nak eriyew kajawric chi ribanaric i xa pa' bih camanic ye'o̱j ru'um i Dios re' aj ye'ol reh c'acharic ? Re' riquiq'ue̱l i kAja̱w Jesus til je' re' eriban . Je' re' nik'or maj reh chi je' re' nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel , re' Jesus chi to'bomaj ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal xc'acharic chi ma'xta nech' ok rimahc chiwach i Dios eh chi je' re' riwi̱' ric'acharic , xik'ahsaj wo' ri̱b pan quimic .

« Je' aj re' ru' ru'um nok re' wo' kAja̱w Dios xye'bic cho Lok' laj rUxlabal chi jenaj si̱ queh take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ricab naxiyew wo' cho keh i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel naxkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , re' hin ma' xiban ta chi xnipit queh ric'uluric re're' maj chaj bih wajawric i hin chiwach i Dios chi je' re' eniban ? nqui ma' Luch queh .

Je' wo' chic , ma̱ban chi ru̱c' ak'orbal tak enati'saj tak ric'ux i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios re' xye'eric aweh tak chi cojbal awehtalil tak chi hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios re' na̱co'ljic tak chi manlic naponok i k'i̱j naricohlam wi̱' wach i Dios re' camanic rip'utum cho awu̱c' tak chi aco'ljic .

Chi je' re' na̱banam tak , nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi chacana̱' tak ribanaric i c'ahbilal na'n tak cu yu'na chi k'i̱j eh re' chic i wili cha'n tak chi jelow-bal : C'olok pan ac'ux tak i tijinic re' xac'ul tak pan awa̱mna tak naxk'ormojic aweh tak eh chanimej wo' tak chi coric i tijinic re're' . Je' re' nik'or maj wi ma' xatc'acharic tak chi c'ahchi' acowonic pan animinic tak , re' hin nanic'ulic lok chi riye'eric chana̱ tak i ti'c'axic chi ma' c'ahchi' ta ana'bem tak nic'ulic je' ricab nok jeno' aj lek' ma' riyew ta rehtalil chi xa nic' yu' nc'ulic lok chi lek' pan jeno' pa̱t .

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach , ma' hab wach njot'bic aweh tak , charak la' tak chiri̱j ribanaric i coric maj re' nbanic i coric ric'uhtaj lok chi re're' rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios eh chi je' re' coric wo' wach ric'ux je' ricab nok re' Jesus coric wach ric'ux .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , ru'um chi ayu' wach ac'al yohbal wach take chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xi'uctubic cho nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak i wili : Wi wilic jeno' rik'or chi re're' nk'oric chi sakomomaj pa̱m ricapew-bal ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios , ma' xa ru'um ta ti re' enanimej tak i c'uhbal rik'or . Ma' je' ta re' , re' la' hat-tak til cha'n tak ri̱j chajaric chi uxlabal nquimelenic reh i winak re're' , wi til re' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios on ma' re' ta .

« Je' aj re' ru' was tak nicha̱k' chana'bej tak chi xa ru'um i Jesus re' xc'a'chsjic cho ru'um i Dios chi quixilac camnak , re' hoj xkac'ul kajawric chi c'uhbalanic eh ru'um re' c'ahchi' kak'orom aweh tak yu'na chi wilic cuybal mahc pa ribihnal .

Hat-tak wich aj niminel , re' hin nik'orom chic aweh tak take k'oric chi ma' nti'bic pan ac'ux tak . To̱b ta c'olok lok pa' bih ti'c'axic chana̱ tak , re' la' hat-tak xa suk ok wo' ac'ux tak ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios wilic awu̱c' tak . Yu'na chi c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak take k'oric wili , nwa̱j wo' chic nik'orom je aweh tak jenaj chic k'oric . To̱b ta oxpech nanibanam rik'ormojic aweh tak ma' eta quinch'i'tjic chi ribanaric ru'um nok weht'alim chi til camanel aweh pan animinic tak .

Je' ricab wi wilic jeno' aweh tak til k'e̱' ric'ahric , sakbih chi chiban cho riwa' riha̱' pa ripa̱t reh chi re' kAja̱w Dios ma' eta riyew cho ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ru'um i re' nanamol awi̱b tak chi ric'ulic pan ac'ux tak riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus . Chiri̱j xnik'or je aweh tak re're' cu wilic nak ru' toco̱m chic k'oric nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak xa re' la' cu re' chic nanik'orom aweh tak naquinponok wo' chic awu̱c' tak .

Re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili xik'or queh : « Wi chiwach i C'uhbal nchopbic ana̱ tak mahc xiban i winak wili , chac'am tak je eh cha'n tak ru̱c' je' ricab rik'or i c'uhbal re're' , nqui queh . Naxquibiraj chi je' re' xik'or i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re're' je' wili xquik'or reh : « Wi chiwach i c'uhbal nk'atbic k'oric chi kana̱ i hoj , re' winak wili tanlic chiri̱j chi naricansjic , re' hoj ma'xta kajawric chi enkacansaj je ru'um nok ma' xye'eric ta kajawric chi ribanaric re're' awu'um hat-tak aj Ro̱ma , nqui take reh . Je' re' xquik'or reh chi ripahkaljic reh chi re' Jesus naricansjic wach curu̱s

Til pan coric til rehreh quiwach take bano̱j nye'eric keh hoj aj niminel chi naka'nam eh chi je' re' quiwi̱' , til cow chayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j i ribanaric i ju'jun queh take bano̱j re' nacapaj tak re're' , chi til naricamanic aweh hat eh je' wo' chi encamanic to'bal queh take awas acha̱k' tak aj niminel . Chi'nchel take re're' k'e̱' tare̱t take chi banaric xa re' la' nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak chi wilic jenaj chic no'jbal re' til k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t chiwach chi'nchel eh re're' nwa̱j nic'uhtam aweh tak yu'na .

Je' re' nok til curman chi keh hoj chi re' kAja̱w Jesus xwih'ic chi Pe̱t Nahsil C'amol quiBe̱h take aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios . Je' re' nik'or maj xa ru̱c' re're' nc'uhtunic take no'jbal wili : Re're' ma' janc'al ta mahcanak cho , ma' janc'al ta rich'uwa'rsam wach ricapew-bal ru̱c' take ma' to̱b ta laj capew-bal eh ma' xiban ta jenaj wach rino'jbal ku̱c' hoj aj mahc . Je' re' ajic ru'um rino'jbal re're' , re' kAja̱w Jesus til ric'ul chi xwih'ic chi Pe̱t Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ chiwach i Dios eh je' wo' ru'um chi re're' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal wach rilok'il wilic ar pan taxa̱j .

Chi je' aj re' riwi̱' nic'axaric niban , xa pa' bih npahkaljic wi̱n chi ribanaric ricamaj i Dios , chi'nchel niban canar ribanaric ru'um nok re' kAja̱w Jesus riyew wansil chi ribanaric haj wilic ra̱j i Dios .
Jenaj queh take c'uhtunic re're' rik'or chi re' Dios k'e̱' ra̱j chi xa sak ok chic wach ac'acharic tak eh ru'um re're' , re' Dios ra̱j chi ma̱min awi̱b tak chi c'acharic pan c'oyomal .

Yu'na , re' aj chic chiri̱j i banoj ti̱j chiwach i Dios , nipahkaj aweh chi chayew ac'ux tak chi junelic eh ma̱poh'aj ac'ux tak chi ti̱j , xa c'ahchi' la' ok wo' ca̱t tak chi tioxonic chiwach i Dios ru̱c' take pa' bih riban chawi̱j tak .

« Naxibiraj chi je' re' , re' Moyses xoquic cho riyo'jic ru'um chi xirak chiri̱j chi ma' xpohyic ta na̱ ribano̱j . Ru'um re' , xirupej je elic chipam i tinamit Eji̱pto eh xo̱j c'acharok pa riyuk'ul i Maryan chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ritinami̱t . Ar aj ru' xirak rehq'ue̱n eh xi'asjic quib quiha'lac'u̱n .

Tz'a̱b ru' i winak aj niminel ma' ric'ul ta chi eripoy wach na̱ chi tz'ih on chi ericoj ripune̱t nachiban riti̱j on nachik'or jeno' k'oric ric'ul ru̱c' i Dios eh nik'or chi je' re' maj re're' rijalwachil i Dios eh re're' nc'utunic wi̱' rilok'il i Dios . Ra̱j nchel ixok curman chi re're' naripoyom i wach na̱ chi tz'ih ru'um chi re' rilok'il i winak ar nc'utunic ru̱c' ixok

Ma' xa re' ta aj re' ra̱j banaric , ra̱j la' wo' chi re' sukquil c'uxlis ra̱j i Dios chi na̱c'acharic tak wi̱' wih'ok pan awa̱mna tak reh chi re're' behsenok aweh tak chi rich'ukuric wach pan chak'lamil i xa pa' jaric jeno' wolic enwih'ic chaxilac tak . Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab naxatriyuk'ej tak cho i Dios chi na̱banam tak chi ritinami̱t chi xa jenaj wach ac'ux tak chiwach , je' wo' re' xatriyuk'ej tak cho chi na̱wih'ic tak pan suk laj c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak . Ru̱c' ano'jbal tak chi je' re' , re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi xa wilic ta nak wo' atioxbal tak johtok ru̱c' i Dios ru'um reh yuk'unic xiban cho aweh tak .

Ru̱c' wili nkilow chi re' Dios re' aj re' xtik'inic reh chi'nchel eh chi re' chi'nchel i nic' pa' nimal tik'imaj cho ru'um , wilque̱b wo' ru'um reh riwa'ric wilic . Ma' xa ta re're' , xitik'a̱' la' wo' cho wach chi re' Jesus xic'ul i ti'c'axic reh chi je' re' xcahnic chi re're' i c'amol be̱h re' naric'uhtunic queh c'acharel nic' wach naquico'ljok chiwach i ti'c'axic nchalic ru'um i mahc . Je' re' xiban ru'um ra̱j chi q'uih take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n naquehtric wih'ic chipam ye'a̱b re' wilic wi̱' i Dios chi sutumaj ri̱j pan holohic laj sakom .

Yu'na re' chic i wili nwa̱j k'oric chiri̱j chi je' wili : Chaj wo' wa'ric wilic peletenic , je' wo' take k'ak'anic chaxilac tak nok nacapaj tak ? Re' take c'ahbilal laj no'jbal re're' ar nchalic pan awa̱mna tak re' wilic cho wi̱' i c'ahbilal nawotowej tak ribanaric .

Yu'na nwa̱j k'oric chiri̱j i wili : Wilic take c'ahchi' quic'ulic k'orok wi̱n chi chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel ar Cori̱nto wilic jenaj balc'uxquilal c'ahchi' ric'uluric re' xa ta nak chi quixilac take c'acharel ma' quilok'onic ta wach i kAja̱w Dios nbirmijic ribiral chi nbanaric . Je' re' ajic chaxilac hat-tak wilic jenaj i c'ahchi' rehq'uenem cok i ricab ritu̱t

Til c'olok pan ac'ux tak i wili : Re' hat-tak ja' c'ulunak ta lok chana̱ tak jeno' pajaric je' ru̱c' ma' ta nak xquicuy ransil toco̱m chic c'acharel . Xa re' la' nik'or wo' aweh tak i wili : Wi xc'ulic ok wo' nchel lok jeno' pajaric cow wach re' etiric'am tak je pan mahc , chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chi re' Dios ma' eta wo' riyew k'ab chi re' hat-tak enac'ul tak jeno' pajaric je' ru̱c' ma' eta nacuy tak ransil . Ru'um aj re' wi xchalic jeno' pajaric chana̱ tak , re' Dios ewo' riyew awajawric tak chi enacuy tak ransil i elic chipam xa pa' bih pajaric ncutbic je pan mahc .

Je' re' nik'or maj chiri̱j i welic je hin chaxilac tak weht'alim chi wilic take winak nacoquic cho chaxilac tak chi aj tijinel re' ma' ti' ta naquic'ram take moloj wach aj niminel chiri̱j i Jesus , naca'nam la' je' ricab nca'n take josk' laj q'uiche̱' tz'i' chi ma' nquiquetelej ta wach take me̱' .

Ru'um aj take nic' wach ric'uluric i ti'c'axic na'n tak ch'i̱l wo' i nic' wach nxowjic awach tak ru'um reh niminic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak , re' hoj nakojk'oric cu̱c' take ju'jun ch'uk chi moloj wach aj niminel reh Dios , nkak'or queh chi re' hoj keht'alim chi tare̱t i kacamaj xka'n chaxilac tak ru'um nok re' hat-tak cow c'ahchi' ach'ica̱b ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus .

Je' re' nik'or chi ka'n maj nok re' hoj nkac'ax take kas kacha̱k' ra̱j rik'orom chi re' Dios re' ma' nkilow ta wach til nic' wach je' riwi̱' ru'um nok ma' hab ta wach rilom wach riwi̱' i Dios , re're' til wilic ku̱c' eh re' ric'axbal wilic wo' pan ka̱mna chi manlic .

Re' hin ma' Lu̱' , hin pahbamaj chi aj k'orol c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Re' nicamaj ye'o̱j ma' re' ta jeno' winak xye'bic wi̱n , ma' wo' ritak'anic ta cho jeno' winak chi xye'eric wi̱n i camanic re're' , til re' la' i Jesus xpahbanic wi̱n chi aj k'orol reh riC'uhbal chi je' wo' re' cho pa ricapew-bal i Ajabe̱s Dios re' xucsunic cho reh Jesus chi quixilac take camnak .

Je' aj re' k'uru' reh chi ma' eta nyoj ac'ux tak eh chi ma' eta wo' nacana̱' tak rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios ru'um i ti'c'axic wilca̱t tak wi̱' , nipahkaj aweh tak chi chayew ac'ux tak chi ricapewjic ri̱j i xiban i Jesus chi je' wili : Re're' xicuy ransil i k'etoj wachi̱s xca'n take c'acharel c'ahbil quino'jbal .

Ru'um chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' ru̱c' i Jesus eh xkacana̱' chic i najtir laj c'acharic chi hoj nak aj mahc je' ricab xiban i Jesus chi xicana̱' wo' c'acharic china̱ ac'al wili naxquimic je , re' Dios xiban wo' chi xic'ul i Jesus chi toco̱m chic c'acharic xichop johtok chiri̱j chi ucsumaj chic cho chi quixilac take camnak , je' wo' re' c'uluric ru̱c' i kac'acharic i hoj toco̱m wo' chic xkachop johtok .

Chiri̱j riye'eric rilok'il i Dios cu'um take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilic wo' chic jenaj ribiral k'oro̱j cho pan Lok' laj Hu̱j chi je' wili : “ Re' hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chasuksaj ac'ux tak chi rilok'onjic i Dios je' ricab nca'n take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , nqui rik'or .

To̱b ta wo' je' re' rik'or keh tijbal re're' , wilic take aj niminel c'ahchi' quicana̱b rich'iquinjic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus je' ricab wo' k'oro̱j chic cho ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi je' re' naric'uluric chipam take k'i̱j c'ahchi' koquic cok wi̱' chi kawach ru'um chi re' chic take jot'o̱l laj c'uhbalanel re' quic'uhtunic reh i k'oric nye'eric queh cu'um ma' tob laj uxlabal , re' chic re' c'ahchi' quibiram .

Je' wo' , chawic'saj wo' chic rik'ormojic chi quixiquin take aj niminel chi quiniminok chiwach take k'atal k'oric je' wo' chi quiwach take wilic cajawric chi c'amoj be̱h . Chak'or wo' queh chi ma' chi bih nquik'ihtaj wi̱' qui̱b chi quiwach take re' , xa ic'lic la' ok quina̱ chi ribanaric chi coric haj wilic jeno' camanic npahkaljic queh .

Re' take k'oric re're' til rehtalil aj chi re' take c'acharel wili ma' nquirak chiri̱j rino'jbal i Dios re' nkilow ru̱c' take ribiral wili : Je' ricab , najtir cho k'i̱j pan p'utbal cho reh chi'nchel i tik'imaj , re' Dios xitik'a̱' i wach ac'al ch'i̱l i taxa̱j xa ru̱c' rik'orbal . Je' wo' , re're' xbanic chi ximol ri̱b pa reh i ha' eh cahnic wo' pa reh i cow laj ac'al . Je' wo' , re're' nbanic chi cu yu'na chi k'i̱j re' wach ac'al xtz'uhcric cho pan yejal ha' .

Je' aj re' nik'or maj je' wo' re' xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus re' Ajabe̱s re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi xic'ul i ti'c'axic naxquimic je to̱b ta nak til wo' coric wach ric'ux . Re' aj riquimic re' xa junpech wo' xic'ul ru'um reh kamahc , re're' xcamanic chi chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel re' ma' coric ta nak wach kac'ux ekojwih'ic chic ar chiwach i Dios . To̱b ta wo' xcansjic i Jesus , re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xiban chi xa cu xc'acharic wo'

Je' re' nok ru'um reh rinimal i ti'c'axic narichalic chi quina̱ ru'um riwi̱' quic'acharic wilque̱b wi̱' yu'na , nik'or aweh tak chi sakbih nak chi queh chi ma' ta nak xquina'bej wach i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i coric wach c'acharic . Je' re' nik'or maj k'e̱' je ti' queh ru'um chi re' take re' chiri̱j chi quina'bem chic wach i c'uhbal tak'amaj re're' ru'um i Dios xquicana̱' ric'amaric na̱ .

Chi je' aj re' k'uru' wich aj niminel , chi ye'o̱j kajawric chi tak'anic chana̱ tak ru'um Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak rinimjic i k'oric wili : Re' hat-tak ma̱junehtej awi̱b tak cu̱c' take aj niminel c'ahchi' que̱b chi c'acharic pan siquilal eh ma' c'ahchi' ta quic'amam na̱ i c'uhbal kak'orom cho aweh tak chiri̱j camanic .

Re' aj chic yu'na nwa̱j k'oric chiri̱j i wili : Naxp'uhtic cho banoj mahc ayu' wach ac'al xa ru̱c' jenaj chi c'acharel , re're' xcahnic wo' chi quimic chic ri̱j . Chiri̱j chic ru' nok mahcanak chic cho c'acharel re're' , xojcahnic wo' chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel chi pan quimic chic ki̱j maj chi'nchel i hoj xojmahcanic wo' .

Re' take xnik'or lok quibihnal wili ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m chic c'acharel , xca'n wo' rehreh wach bano̱j ru'um chi xquich'ica̱' wo' quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios . Re' aj wili quibiral chiri̱j chaj bih xca'n : Wilic take ma' xquik'eb ta k'ak'anic cu̱c' take nimak tak tinamit . Wilic wo' take xik'atbic cho k'oric chi coric . Wilic wo' take xi'ehtric ric'ulmujic chaj bih k'oro̱j cho ribiral queh ru'um i Dios eh wilic wo' take xquitz'ap richi̱' take cakcoj chi ma' xic'uxuric ta .

Wilic wo' pech nkac'ul chi re' take tinamit kojquitahkej chi ribanaric ti'c'axic keh xa re' la' re' rajawric i Dios xiban chi ma' xkic'raj tak ki̱b chi xakutquel ti ki̱b chipam i ti'c'axic . Wilic wo' pech xojquich'eylom take kaj ixowonel cu rehtal xa cuc'tak nak chic ma' kojquicansaj xa re' la' rajawric i Dios xojrito'bej wo' chi ma' xojquicansaj ta .

Re' hat-tak c'acharel re' ma' xa re' ta Dios wilic chawach tak je' ricab riban jeno' winak chi nkajic pan c'oyomal ru'um chi ma' xa re' ta i rehq'ue̱n wilic chiwach , chabiraj tak chi coric i nanik'orom wili : Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi coric chi nok nawa̱j tak ribanaric i no'jbal nca'n take c'acharel aj ayu' wach ac'al re' quixowonic reh i Dios , re' hat-tak nacoj wo' tak awi̱b chiwach i Dios chi raj ixowonel . Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi re' take c'acharel nca̱j ca'nam i no'jbal nca'n take aj ayu' wach ac'al re' quixowonic reh i Dios , re' take c'acharel re're' nquicoj qui̱b chi raj ixowonel i Dios take .

Nok elenak chic je ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Si̱las ch'i̱l Timote̱yo chipam riyuk'ul i Cala̱sya , re' aj wili xk'ormojic queh ru'um Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios naxi'oquic chic pa riyuk'ul i Pirji̱ya : « Ma̱ban tak c'uhbalanic chipam riyuk'ul i A̱sya , nqui xk'ormojic queh . Chi je' re' xca'n wo' je' ricab xk'ormojic queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal .

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta re're' xitz'ihmbaj chi je' re' , ma' jaruj ta riban chi coric chic wach ric'ux i c'acharel nc'ambic na̱ nic' pa' nimal rik'or chipam i c'uhbal re're' ru'um nok chi ma' jeno' nchol ric'amaric na̱ chi manlic i c'uhbal re're' . Haj cok wilic i til rik'or i c'uhbal re're' , re' chi xa re' wach i c'acharel re' rich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Jesus ncahnic chi coric chic wach ric'ux . Je' aj wili rik'or i c'uhbal re're' : “ Ma̱k'or tak chic pan acapew-bal tak , hab wach narojic johtok pan taxa̱j , nqui rik'or . Je' aj re' rik'or cu'um queh nquicapaj chi xa re' wach wi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric enchalic wo' chic c'acharok ayu' wach ac'al , cu re' aj nak ru' enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j .

Cu re' aj ru' re' pe̱t aj tz'e' wa̱ch xo̱j richihca̱j i wilic chipam i ch'ihch' culc , ar china̱ take yu̱k' q'uixca̱b eh naxiban chi je' re' chi'nchel take c'acharel quic'ulum rehtalil ribihnal i ma' laj chicop on nquilok'ej wach i tiyo̱x re' tik'imaj ru̱c' rijalwachil i ma' laj chicop re're' , xpok' cho jenaj ma' holohic ta laj k'a̱ chiqui̱j je' ru̱c' yohbal wach ti'quilal riban .

Ar aj ru' naxichop i hu̱j re're' , re' take quejeb chi c'acharel re' wilic nak' quiwach chiqui̱j chi quiwach quich'i̱l take quejeb rica'winak ( 24 ) chi c'acharel re' wilic quiwa'ric je' ricab quiwa'ric take rijeb tak winak , quipach'a̱' qui̱b chiwach i C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' chi rehtalil rilok'onjic wach xca'n . Re' take c'acharel re're' wilic ju'jun quiculc tik'imaj ru̱c' k'anworic laj ch'ihch' nujunak chi se̱nsa re' rijalwachej quiti̱j take aj niminel . Re' take culc re're' xquik'ahsaj chiwach i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' . Je' wo' , re' take re' wilic cu̱c' quik'ojbal reh banoj bi̱ch re' a̱rpa ribihnal

Je' wo' chic , ru'um chi re' Dios xye'bic reh i junelic c'acharic queh chi'nchel c'acharel nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , re' take re're' quic'axbic reh i Dios re' Ajabe̱s chi quina̱ take aj niminel riwi̱' chi queh chi naquic'axam wo' take quich aj niminel re' xye'eric wo' queh i junelic c'acharic ru'um i Dios je' ricab ric'axaric riban jeno' ajabe̱s ru̱c' take riha'lac'u̱n .

Je' wo' chic , ma' animslom awach tak ru̱c' take pa' bih wilic aweh tak . Je' wo' , ma' nchalic wo' riti'quilal ac'ux tak ru̱c' pa' bih i wilic reh awas acha̱k' tak ru'um nok wi je' re' na'n tak enuctic cho ixowonic i̱b chaxilac tak eh chi je' re' enayojlom ac'ux chi awibil awi̱b tak chipam rinimjic i Dios .

Timote̱yo , re' wili no'jbal niyew je aweh chiri̱j nic' wach i k'ilo̱j na̱banam : Nachak'il jeno' rijeb laj winak ma̱k'il pan eht laj k'oric xa pa ricorquil la' wo' ti chak'il je' ricab chi re' ta nak awaja̱w c'ahchi' ak'ilim . Nachak'il wo' take q'uijolak chak'il take chi je' ricab re' ta nak take awas on acha̱k' c'ahchi' ak'ilim .

Je' wo' , ru'um chi c'ahchi' ac'acharic tak chi quixilac take c'acharel re' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel reh Dios take , nipahkaj aweh tak chi xa coric ok wach tibanok tak to̱b ta yohbal wach take chucuj laj k'oric wilic take nquitz'ak chawi̱j tak maj chi queh ru' , re' hat-tak xa je nchel ma' to̱b ta tibanic tak nanquik'or . Wi je' re' xa'n tak , re' take re' naquik'orom wo' chi xa coric wo' na'n tak nachalok i Dios chi rik'ataric k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel i tinamit .

Re' wo' re' riwi̱' chi re' hin k'e̱' wo' chic xwa̱j chi re' take toco̱m chic c'acharel xquinimej ta nak i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh ru'um re' xwixowej cho quiwach eh xniban cho ti'c'axic queh take moloj wach aj niminel chiri̱j i Jesus ru'um nok xnicapaj chi re' take re' c'ahchi' quik'ihtam qui̱b chiwach i c'uhbal re're' . Je' re' ajic re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses re' xiyew cho Dios keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil ma' Israhel reh chi coric kawach chiwach , re' hin xninimej chi manlic eh ma' hab ta wach jeno' enk'oric wi̱n chi wilic ta nak xnik'ihtaj wi̱' wi̱b chiwach i c'uhbal re're' .
Je' re' k'uru' re' winak re're' xibiraj queh raj camanom nic' o̱ra xc'ulic ric'ux eh naxquik'or reh chi e̱w china̱ cablaj o̱ra c'ulunak ric'ux ,

Chipam i k'i̱j re're' nok re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nquitik'a̱' qui̱b chi ric'sjic i nink'i̱j Pa̱scuwa , re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' xic'ambic je reh Jesus chiwach i Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xquipahkaj wo' reh chi naritak'a̱b take riso̱l chi ritokoric cabchel quitu̱k take wilque̱b wach curu̱s , re' Jesus ch'i̱l take quib chic chi c'acharel . Je' re' xquipahkaj reh , reh chi je' re' equiquimic chi junpech chiwach i k'i̱j re're' . Je' wo' chic , ru'um chi narip'utum chic tok sawatu' k'i̱j re' k'e̱' lo̱k' chikawach i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , xquipahkaj wo' reh Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi naritak'a̱b resmejic riti'jolal i Jesus ch'i̱l take quib chic c'acharel re're' , reh chi ma' eta quicahnic wach curu̱s chiwach i hi'lbal k'i̱j chi keh hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel .

Ribiram chic re're' , re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to p'uht risiq'uim ri̱j nic' wach nachok'taj je i Jesus , xa re' la' re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xa cow chic nquiq'uer wo' chic quichi̱' chi je' wili c'ahchi' quik'orom : « Re' hat til aweht'alim i wili chi coric : Hab wach re' rik'or ri̱b chi k'atal k'oric , ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' rik'orom lok chi ma' ra̱j ta wach i hab wach wilic chi k'atal k'oric . Je' re' k'uru' wi re' hat nawok'tam je i Jesus wili , ra̱j rik'orom chi c'ahchi' ac'uhtam lok chi re' k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma ma' re' ta chic i k'atal k'oric , nqui take .

Chiri̱j wili xik'or wo' chic keh chi je' wili : « Re' hin xnik'or chic aweh tak chi nawojic , xa re' la' ma' riban ntz'iric pan ac'ux tak ru'um re're' . Re' hin weht'alim chi re' hat-tak ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios , xa re' la' je' ricab rich'iquinjic ac'ux na'n tak chiri̱j ru' je' wo' re' rich'iquinjic ac'ux cha'n tak yu'na chiwi̱j i hin

Re' hat-tak k'uru' c'ul chato'bej awi̱b tak eh ma̱yohbalej tak take quik'etbic pa̱m abe̱h tak maj re' ti'c'axic ncojoric cho chana̱ tak ncamanic xa c'uhtbal reh chi re' Dios narisacham quiwach take c'acharel re're' wi ma' nquijal wach quino'jbal . Ma' xa re' ta re' , re' la' wo' ti'c'axic ncojoric chana̱ tak ncamanic chi c'uhtbal reh chi re' hat-tak na̱co'ljic tak eh re' aco'lbal tak re're' til wo' re' Dios nariye'bic aweh tak .

Re' cok ru' c'olok pan ac'ux tak wili : Re' hat-tak tiwih'ic tak pan jenaj wach capew-bal wu̱c' i hin ru'um chi re' wo' hin xinchihbic cho awach tak , ma' ru'um ta nak chi re' ta nak hat-tak xatchihbic tak cho niwach hin . « Chi je' aj re' awih'ic tak wu̱c' pan jenaj wach capew-bal , re' hin nitik'a̱b chic cho wach chi natojok tak k'orol reh niC'uhbal , q'uihal take c'acharel naquiniminic reh eh enquicoj qui̱b chi junpech chi waj tahkanel chic take . Je' wo' chic , re' hin nitik'a̱b chic cho wach wili : Re' xa pa' bih pahkanic na'n tak johtok reh wAja̱w Dios , nariye'eric cho aweh tak wi xa'n ati̱j tak chi c'ahchi' acojom tak wach chi wilic wajawric .

Re' Awel jenaj queh take aj najtir k'i̱j xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios . Ru'um chi je' re' xiban re' Dios xik'or cho chi re're' coric wach ric'ux eh xic'ul cho i risi̱ chi c'ahchi' rik'orom chi k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t i si̱ re're' chiwach i si̱ xikahsaj i ras , re' Cayin ribihnal . Ru'um rich'iquinjic ric'ux xiban i Awel , cu yu'na chi k'i̱j to̱b ta camnak chic , xa cu c'ahchi' wo' katikim ju' ribirmijic chiri̱j i holohic laj rino'jbal xiban ru' .

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak je' ricab naticapewenok tak chiki̱j i hoj aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios , re' wili capewenic cha'n tak : « Re' take wili raj camanom take i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Re' take re' pahbamaj wo' take ru'um i Dios chi re' take re' naquibehsenic reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal chi risakomsjic wach take rino'jbal ru' re' ma' sakomomaj ta nak cho wach najtir k'i̱j , nqui capewenic cha'n tak chiki̱j .
Re' take ch'imi̱l xik'ehbic cho wach ac'al xa je' chic ricab quik'ehbic cho wach i che̱' naquipuh cho ru'um cow laj te̱w .

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , til nipahkaj aweh tak chi chak'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak take riye'eric quiwa'ric take xa pa' bih jaric nye'eric quilok'il chi jelow-bal i manlic Dios .

Chi je' re' i no'jbal riyew i Dios , re' hin niyew wo' aweh tak i no'jbal wili : Ma̱yew tak k'ab chi re' rajawric i aj banol reh c'ahbilal eriyew pan ac'al i holohic laj no'jbal wilic awu̱c' tak , re' la' cha'n tak chayew tak pan ac'al i rajawric i banol reh c'ahbilal ru̱c' ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal .

Re' hat wilic awajawric re' ye'o̱j aweh ru'um i Dios . Je' re' k'uru' re' take k'oric cu re' xnicohlaj lok rik'ormojic aweh chatik ju' rik'ormojic queh take aj niminel reh chi ma' eta niq'uic pan quic'ux . Je' wo' , chak'or queh chi ma' nquibanlom take k'oric chi xa ma'xta bih riwi̱' maj re're' xa ma'xta bih eritik queh , re' la' enca'n ru̱c' re're' xa riyojoric quic'ux take c'acharel re' equibirinic reh take k'oric re're' .

Je' wo' chic , chajunehtej awi̱b tak ru̱c' i Dios eh re're' erijunehtej wo' cho ri̱b awu̱c' tak . Raj nchel hat-tak aj mahc , chacoj tak rehtal i wili : Chacana̱' tak ribanjic i c'ahbilal . Re' hat-tak re' quib ac'ux tak , chawesaj tak lok pan awa̱mna tak i no'jbal re're' eh chasakbej wach awa̱mna tak .

Tz'a̱b ru' wi xa suk chic nawilow tak take bihomak eh re' take niba̱' xa ri̱j ti wach ac'ux nawil tak , ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' ac'uhtam tak chi ma' holohic ta c'ahchi'ca̱t tak , c'ahchi' la' amahcanic tak ra̱j rik'orom eh re' Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' i Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi tanlic chi enye'eric ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ru'um nok xatiq'uic tak k'e̱' china̱ chaj bih rik'or .

Chaj wa'ric nankak'or je aweh tak re're' ? Nkak'or aweh tak ru'um chi re' kAja̱w Dios ma' xojriyuk'ej ta ru̱c' chi nakac'acharic chipam i yibel wach no'jbal , xojriyuk'ej la' cho chi nakac'acharic pan jenaj tz'iro̱j wach c'acharic .

Queh take c'acharel je' ru̱c' c'ahbilal nca'n eh ma' coric ta wach quino'jbal , re' Dios riyeb cho chi eht'aljic cu ar pan taxa̱j chi ma' suk ta rilow cho re're' eh ru'um re' riyew cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ . Re' take c'acharel je' re' quiwi̱' ma' nquicana̱' ta wo' chi toco̱m c'acharel nquicoj wach i coric laj tijinic chiri̱j i Dios

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , re' c'axoj i̱b ar nchalic ru̱c' i Dios . Ru'um aj re' kac'ax tak ki̱b chi kawach rehtalil chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios . Je' re' nik'or chi cha'n tak maj xa hab wach ric'ax i ras richa̱k' ra̱j rik'orom chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n chic i Dios . Ma' xa re' ta re' , je' la' wo' wi je' re' riban re're' til c'ahchi' ric'uhtam chi reht'alim i rino'jbal i Dios chi coric .

Ru'um aj re' , hab wach nk'oric chi wilic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i Dios je' wo' quich'i̱l take quiniminic reh eh wi xa cu rixowej wo' wach i rich aj niminel , re' c'acharel re're' xa cu pan k'ekom laj no'jbal wo' c'acharic riban .

Je' wo' chic , k'e̱' wo' chic ato̱b chaweh tak nok nac'ul tak i tz'ujuric ru'um reh rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus re' Ajabe̱s Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Nik'or chi je' re' maj nanac'ul tak i ti' ru'um reh animinic tak , re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nwih'ic awu̱c' tak chi awaj to'o̱l tak . Coric aj ru' , re' take c'acharel re' ma' re' ta aj niminel take ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal nquik'or chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus xa re' la' hat-tak riye'eric chic rilok'il i na'n tak .

Ar aj ru' re' ma' Lu̱' xic'alenej take eh p'uht rik'orom queh chi chaklic chi̱' i nic' pa' nimal xiban i Dios chi quixilac take ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ru̱c' i c'uhbalanic xiban chi quixilac .

Chaj wa'ric k'uru' chi ma' nacoj ta tak niwach i hin wi xa coric wo' quink'oric ? Je' wo' chic , ma' eta riban chi enak'or tak chi ru'um reh nino'jbal i hin ma' nacoj ta tak wach niC'uhbal maj ma' jeno' aweh tak eric'uhtaj chi wilic ta nak jeno' mahc nibanam .
Chi rik'orom chic lok re're' , re' Dios xik'or wo' i wili : “ Re' hin ma' jaruj ta chic naric'ulic cho pa nic'ux chi hat-tak aj mahc , nqui xik'or .

Coric nik'or , ru'um chi xach'ica̱' ac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus , re' kAja̱w Dios xa je' na riyew aweh tak jenaj abihomal , xiyew chic aweh tak riq'uihal acuse'sbal tak je' ricab naxiyew wo' aweh tak chi wilic ano'jbal tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j riC'uhbal , on chi wilic awajawric tak chi rik'ormojic i riC'uhbal .

Hat-tak wich aj niminel , ru'um chi ar chic chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ch'iclic ac'ux tak eh chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nbanic chi wilic c'axoj i̱b awu̱c' tak , re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak i to'bonic wili chi tipahkanok tak pan ati̱j chi re' Dios equirito'bej cho .

Naxquibiraj take tinamit chi re' Jesus xik'or chi naquicansam , je' wili xquik'or reh : « Re' hat ma' suk ta pa̱m ana̱ ru'um i ma' tob laj uxlabal maj c'ahchi' ak'orom chi na̱cansjic eh ma' hab ta wo' wach c'ahchi' ribanic aweh , nqui tak reh .

Je' re' nok ru̱c' i quimic xic'ul i Jesus re' xwachjic je' ricab nok re' take c'acharel najtir k'i̱j nquiwachej ric'atjic i me̱' ncansjic ru'um reh quimahc , re' Dios xic'uhtaj chi re' Jesus re' aj re' ncuybic reh quimahc take c'acharel nok nquicoj wach chi re're' xquimic chiqui̱j chi quico'ljic . Ru̱c' xiban i Dios re're' , nc'uhtunic lok wach chi til riban i ch'ukuj k'oric china̱ i quimahc take c'acharel . Je' re' nik'or ru'um chi cu yu'na re' quimahc take aj najtir k'i̱j ma' ja' ch'uku̱j ta wo' wach ru'um i Dios ru'um nok chi cu c'ahchi' ruy'em rik'ijil naribanaric wi̱' re're' .

Chiri̱j wili re' ma' Luch xo̱j pah'ok cu̱c' take ju'jun c'acharel quicamanic chipam i pa̱t re're' , re' quich'i̱l qui̱b ch'i̱l take ju'jun take aj cha'janel wo' reh pa̱t re're' eh ar xcahnic chi k'ixinic maj chi'nchel take c'acharel re're' xquic'ula̱' lok quik'a̱k' ru'um reh c'uxic c'ahchi' ribanam eh ar c'ahchi' quik'ixinsam cok qui̱b .

maj je' ricab nok jeno' sol xa tiklic wo' ru̱c' take chi'nchel ritz'a'bal ncamanic reh chi k'ak'anic je' wo' re' i rito'bal i Dios , re're' camanok aweh tak chi peletenic ru̱c' aj Yahm nok re're' xa tok'-tok' cho chi ajot'oric tak .

Re' Luch k'uru' je' wili xik'or : « Ha̱w , chaj wa'ric ma' eta riban chi etinitahkej yu'na ? maj wi ta la' curman chi re' hin eniyew nic'acharic pan quimic awu'um aweh hat , re' hin enak niban re're' , nqui Luch .

Chapahkaj aj tak reh Dios atobjic tak eh re're' nariyeb cho aweh tak . Je' wo' , ru'um chi re' hat-tak ch'iclic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus , re' Dios nariyeb wo' cho aweh tak i sukquil c'uxlis re' nariwih'ic pan awa̱mna tak nok wilic ac'axquilal tak to̱b ta nchel ma' narak ta tak chiri̱j chaj bih riwi̱' nok re' Dios xiyew cho chana̱ tak re're' . Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' reh chi re' sukquil c'uxlis na̱c'ulum tak re're' narito'bonic aweh tak chi ench'ihquic awa̱mna tak eh chi ma' eta nyoj acapew-bal tak .

Je' wo' chic nok ar ru̱c' aj Yahm nchalic take k'oric riban jeno' c'acharel , wilic pech je' wili nc'uluric : Re' hoj ru̱c' i ka̱k' nkayew rilok'il i Ajabe̱s Dios eh je' wo' ru̱c' wo' i ka̱k' nkasihtaj take c'acharel re' ritik'inic i Dios take chi narilmijic i rino'jbal ru' .

Naxnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak re're' , ma' xink'oric ta chiri̱j chi re' hat-tak ma' eta chic riban chi enak'o'rej tak chi'nchel c'acharel ma' re' ta take aj niminel . Coric , chi quixilac take ru' wilic wo' nca'n ribanaric i c'oyomal . Wilic wo' take c'acharel re' ji̱k' quic'ux chiri̱j rirakmajic quibihomal . Wilic wo' take c'acharel re' k'e̱' suk queh relk'jic i cas quicha̱k' eh wilic wo' take c'acharel k'e̱' suk queh rilok'onjic wach take tiyo̱x . Raj la' hin ma' xink'oric ta chiqui̱j take c'acharel re're' maj wi til ta nak coric chi ma' eta chic nak'o'rej tak on enawilow tak quiwach take c'acharel aj mahc take , ra̱j nak rik'orom chi re' hat-tak curman nak chi na̱welic tak je china̱ ac'al .

Chiri̱j chic rik'ormojic lok re're' , re' ma' Lu̱' je' wili xik'or reh Acri̱pa : « Yu'na nanik'oric so' awu̱c' tak chiri̱j chic chaj bih take nibanam cho : Pan nic'ux i hin , riwi̱' la' nchel take xniban cho najtir chi ribanaric take nic' nimal ti'c'axic xniban cho queh take quiniminic reh Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret .

Ricab k'oric , re' take toco̱m chic mahc nca'n take c'acharel re're' , ric'am cho ti'c'axic chi quina̱ . Re' aj take wili i mahc nca'n : Xa ma' nquilow ti wach jeno' ixok , xa nok wo' ti nquic'ax wach ribanaric i c'oyomal ru̱c' . Je' wo' , xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi'que̱b chi mahcanic chi xa ma' quich'i'tjic ta chic chi banoj mahc . Je' wo' chic , xa ma' c'axic ta chi queh quik'eb-eric pan mahc take ja' cow ta quic'ux pan niminic reh chi naquimahcanic quich'i̱l . Je' wo' chic , re' take re' ocronak take chi ric'axaric wach i bihomal ru'um risahq'uil i tumi̱n . Ru'um aj chi'nchel re're' narichalic rinimal ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel re're' .

ra̱j ncha'janic queh me̱' chi xa ritojbal ric'ax eh ma' re' ta wo' re' nehchenic queh , re' c'acharel re're' narilow chi nc'ulic lok i josk' laj q'uiche̱' tz'i' , pe̱t nelic je eh ricana̱' cahnok take me̱' pan k'ab i chicop re're' . Chi je' re' wilic take me̱' quic'uxuric ru'um eh re' take ju'jun chic chi me̱' quicahnic xa haj nquipuhcaj qui̱b .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' ti' tiwic'raj tak , yu'na chacoj tak rehtal i nanik'orom wili : Curman chi hoj ok tak t'ulic chi ribirmijic rik'orbal i Dios eh je' wo' chi naka'nam ri̱j chi pe̱t chaj bih nakak'orom . Je' wo' , curman chi re' hoj ma' xa hoj ta ok ti mahnic' chi enchalic kajosk'il .

Ma' xa ta ar rik'or chi je' re' , je' la' wo' re' k'oric xitak'a̱' rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus queh nic' pa' q'uihal naquiniminic reh riC'uhbal . Re're' xik'or cho chi hab wach take narik'ormojic queh riC'uhbal , re' wo' take re' naquilbic reh take quik'oric reh c'uhbal ru̱c' pa' bih nca̱j pan quic'acharic .

Re' hin til quinsakomonic pa̱m i quicapew-bal take c'acharel eh re' riwi̱' i nichalic ayu' wach ac'al re' wili : Chi re' take c'acharel re' nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiwi̱j ma' eta chic quiwih'ic chi cu k'ekom pa̱m i quicapew-bal .

Chiri̱j chic chi'nchel i k'oric xca'n take c'amol quibe̱h take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ru̱c' i winak re're' , cu re' aj chic ru' xina'bej ribihnal i Jesus naxquirak qui̱b chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh ar je' wili xk'ormojic reh ru'um i Jesus : « Yu'na xc'ulic chic ac'ux ma' timahcanic chic k'uru' maj ma' nchalic nchel chana̱ jeno' ti'c'axic nim wach chiwach i xac'ul lok , nqui xk'ormojic reh .
Ma' xa ta re're' , chac'ax la' wo' awas acha̱k' tak ru̱c' xa pa' bih na̱banam tak .
« Ru'um chi re' hat-tak na̱banam tak haj wilic rik'or i niC'uhbal maj ti' quinawic'raj tak ,

Je' re' nok ru'um chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic chak'wachquil ricuse'sbal xiyew cho chi kana̱ , chacoj tak rehtal i wili : Ma̱cana̱' tak ribirmijic rik'orbal . Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' take kama̱m kati't ma'xta quico'ljic chiwach i ti'c'axic xye'eric chi quina̱ ru'um chi ma'xta chic nquinimej i xik'or i Dios nah yu̱k' Sinayih , ra̱j rik'orom chi k'e̱' wo' chic yohbalil wilco̱j wi̱' wi re' hoj enkacana̱' rinimjic rik'orbal i Jesus re' wilic chic tok ar pan taxa̱j .

Je' chic re' ru' riwi̱' ac'acharic tak yu'na xa re' la' til pa ricorquil , pan jenaj cho k'i̱j nok ja' nana'bej ta nak tak wach i Dios , re' hat-tak je' nak acab tak jeno' aj camanom cow chopo̱j na̱ chi camanic , cow nak chopolca̱t tak cho ru̱c' acapew-bal tak chi rinimjic wach take tz'akoj tiyo̱x eh chi ma' re' ta wo' coric dios take .

« Chi ric'ulmujic aj cuse'sbal re're' , re' Dios xiban chi re' rac'u̱n xq'uihic cho chi raj k'orol ric'uhbal eh chi je' re' xitak'a̱' cho awu̱c' tak chi pe̱t chi rik'ormojic aweh tak chi na̱cana̱b tak amahc , nqui ma' Luch .

« Re' hoj xkilow chi'nchel re' chaj bih xiban pan tinamit Jerusalen , je' wo' pan toco̱m chic tinamit reh riyuk'ul Jure̱ya eh ru'um re' nkayew kachi̱' chi je' re' xiban cho . Je' wo' nkayew kachi̱' chi re' Jesus re're' , re' xquich'ila̱' wach curu̱s chi ricansjic ,

Hat-tak wich aj niminel reh Jesus , ru'um nibiraj chi chaxilac hat-tak wilic c'axquilal , re' hin ru̱c' i wajawric ye'o̱j wi̱n ru'um i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric til nwa̱j nibanam aweh tak i tak'anic wili : Cha'n tak chi xa jenaj ok chic wach ak'orbal tak ru̱c' chaj bih nawa̱j ak'orom chawach tak . Ma' ok re' i ch'akoj i̱b ru̱c' take rehreh wach no'jbal eriyew rajawric chaxilac tak , re' la' hat-tak cha'n tak chi xa jenaj ok wach ano'jbal tak ru̱c' chaj bih nacapaj tak on chaj bih nak'or chawach tak . Ru̱c' chi je' re' c'acharic ena'n tak , etiwih'ic tak pan jenaj manlic wach c'uxlis chawunchelal tak .

je' ricab xiban cho awu̱c' hat-tak . Je' re' nik'or maj najtir cho re' hat-tak ma' wilca̱t ta nak tak pan suk laj wih'ic ru̱c' i Dios eh nawixowej nak tak wach ru' ru'um reh ano'jbal tak chi ribanaric i c'ahbilal . Raj yu'na ma' je' ta chic re' awi̱' tak , xatye'eric la' tak pan jenaj sukquil ch'i̱l i Dios

Re' aj re' riwi̱' k'uru' Timote̱yo , chi nik'orom chic aweh chi chak'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux chi'nchel c'ahbilal no̱j wi̱' quicapew-bal take q'uijolak . Re' la' cha'n chayew ac'ux chi c'acharic chi coric wach ano'jbal . Coric ok wo' wach ak'orbal , chac'am wo' na̱ pa' bih nk'ormojic aweh . Je' wo' , chac'ax i Dios eh tiwih'ok tak pan sukquil c'uxlis , je' ricab nca'n take xsaksjic chic wach i ca̱mna ru'um i Dios eh chi je' re' nquilok'ej wach .
