Ru'um chi re' hat-tak ac' laj c'acharic chic wilic aweh tak je' ricab chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xic'ul jenaj ac' laj c'acharic naxuctic cho chi quixilac take camnak , re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi chayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j rirakmajic chiri̱j take tijinic nchalic rik'ormojic ar pan taxa̱j , re' ye'o̱j wi̱' rilok'il i Jesus chi rich k'atal k'oric cok Dios je' ricab nanye'eric rilok'il jeno' c'acharel nantz'ukunjic cok chi riche̱l jeno' k'atal k'oric .

Nok re' pe̱t aj tz'e' wa̱ch xupej pa̱m risu̱b , xkajic cho wach ac'al yohbal wach sak'wach ch'i̱l k'a̱k' xilacamaj chi quic' re' xibanic chi k'e̱' wo' chic q'uihal take che̱' c'aham ch'i̱l rex laj pi̱m xic'ahtic chi cu rehtal jenaj reh ro̱x seht reh chi'nchel che̱' c'aham ch'i̱l i rex laj pi̱m ayu' wach ac'al xic'ahtic .

chi je' wili i c'ahchi' quik'orom : “ K-Aja̱w Dios , xa re' wach i hat k'e̱' rinimal wach awajawric wilic . Nok ma' ja' tik'imaj ta wo' wach ac'al re' hat xa wilca̱t wo' nak chic cho , xa wilca̱t wo' yu'na eh xa na̱wih'ic wo' chi junelic k'i̱j sakom . Aweh aj i hat nkatioxej chi c'ahchi' ac'uhtam rinimal wach awajawric eh ru̱c' re're' c'ahchi' wo' ak'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ chi'nchel i tinamit wach ac'al .

Je' re' k'uru' re' Jesus je' wili ric'u'ljic xiban : « Til ta wo' nak aweht'alim chaj bih riyew i Dios chi si̱ eh aweht'alim ta wo' nak chi nim wach wajawric i hin re' c'ahchi' nipahkam cok so' niha̱' aweh , re' hat enak napahkaj aha̱' wi̱n eh enak niyew aweh i ha' re' riyew i c'acharic , nqui Jesus .

xa re' la' ru' na'ilmijok wo' chic wach ayu' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric re' til xye'bic wo' reh ac'acharic tak , narilmijic wo' wach i lok'il ye'o̱j aweh tak je' ricab narilmijic wach i rinimal wach i lok'il ye'o̱j reh Jesus .

Je' re' ajic re' nic' pa' nimal xnitz'ihmbaj chiri̱j i Jesus , xniban chi je' re' ru'um nok nwa̱j chi ru̱c' re're' enacoj tak wach chi re' Jesus , re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh je' wo' chi re're' i rAc'u̱n i Dios . Wi xacoj tak wach re're' , re' Jesus eriyew aweh tak chi etic'acharic tak chi junelic k'i̱j sakom .

Raj cok i hoj re' kojk'oric reh ribiral i Jesus , til hoj rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' kawi̱' , til nkarak chiri̱j chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal nc'uhtunic reh i ricorquilal eh wi re're' c'ahchi' riye'bic rik'orbal jeno' aj c'uhbalanel on wi re' aj Yahm c'ahchi' riye'bic rik'orbal . Je' wo' , je' wili nc'uluric cu̱c' take c'acharel quibirinic reh kac'uhtunic : Re' c'acharel ricojom wach i Dios re're' til ric'ul chi coric kac'uhtunic . Raj nchel i c'acharel ma' re' ta rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios , re're' ma' ric'ul ta kac'uhtunic .

Je' re' nok , chayohbalej awi̱b tak ru̱c' quino'jbal i take c'acharel re're' je' ricab nok re' take aj behsem nimak tak cano̱wa nquiyohbalej qui̱b chi ma' no̱j quituhyaj qui̱b chiwach take abaj wilque̱b pan ha' . Je' re' nik'or maj je' wili i quino'jbal nquic'uhtaj take aj tijinel re're' : Je' ricab , nanamol awi̱b tak chi ric'uxuric take pa' bih wi'c natik'a̱' tak , re' take re' xa ta nak nquic'uhtaj chi nquiyohbalej so' wach i Dios . Je' wo' , to̱b ta nak wilque̱b chaxilac nanamol awi̱b tak chi rilok'onjic i Dios on nanamol awi̱b tak chi ric'uhtjic achak'lamil chawach tak , re' take re' quiwih'ic awu̱c' tak xa reh chi riye'eric chi suk quipa̱m . Je' wo' chic , re' take aj tijinel re're' xa je' quicab take su̱tz' re' xa c'ul c'amoj take je ru'um i te̱w ma' re' ta jab nquic'am cho , on xa je' quicab wo' take che̱' ma' quiwachanic ta pa rik'ijil . Je' re' nik'or maj ma'xta bih jeno' holonquilal ric'am cho queh take aj niminel chi naquiq'uihic chipam quiniminic . Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi re' take aj tijinel re're' til ma'xta cu̱c' i c'acharic ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios eh ru'um chi ma' choplic ta wo' quic'ux chiri̱j rinimjic i Dios xa je' na quicab take che̱' chuku̱j take lok pa ra̱' .

eh je' wo' yohbal wach take lok' laj nawa̱l xbanaric cu'um take c'amol be̱h re're' . Ru'um aj re' , re' take tinamit aj Jerusalen xquiyew je wach tak ch'aht i quiyowa̱b eh xquic'am je chi chi̱' tak be̱h reh chi na ic'ok ponok ma' Luch to̱b ta xa re' rina̱ch encutbic chi quina̱ ,

Chiri̱j lok chi'nchel wili , nipahkaj aweh tak chi riman chic chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j i kAja̱w Jesus reh chi na̱co'lem awi̱b tak chiwach take xa pa' bih ricoj cho aj Yahm chi ajot'oric tak . Nok re' hat-tak nach'ica̱' ac'ux tak , je' na wa'ric jenaj acamanbal tak je' ricab i coten laj ch'ihch' ricoj i sol chi co'lbal ri̱b chiwach take tz'ob-bal koplic cho rik'ak'il ncuturic cho chiri̱j chi cansbal reh .

tiniminok la' tak chi coric ru'um nok re' nic' pa' nimal camanic nquipahkaj aweh tak curman chi na̱banam tak ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux tak chi lok'onbal wach i Dios , ma' ok xa reh rakbal alok'il tak chiwach jeno' c'acharel .

Je' wo' chic ma' nwih'ic jeno' aweh tak ericut ri̱b pan yibel wach no'jbal , on ma' ta jeno' aweh tak eriyew pa ro̱k i lok'il riyew reh Dios je' ricab xc'uluric cho najtir k'i̱j ru̱c' i Esawuh re' xa ru̱c' ti junwa̱' chi c'uxbal xijal wach ru̱c' richa̱k' i rilok'il wilic chi pe̱t nak ac'unbe̱s chiwach i raja̱w .

Naxquibiraj re're' , chi cunchelal take c'acharel re're' je' wili xquik'or chi cow : « Ma' nka̱j ta chi re' Jesus enawok'taj je , re' la' Warawas nka̱j , nqui take . Je' re' xquik'or to̱b ta queht'alim wo' nak chi re' Warawas jenaj aj lek' .

Ma' xa re' ta re' naca'nam take c'acharel re're' , naquik'ahsam la' wo' take cas quicha̱k' pan quik'ab take aj ixowonel . Naricowjic wo' quicapew-bal chi xa re' chic ribanaric i c'ahbilal naca'nam . Je' wo' , nariq'uic na̱ quik'itk'itil chiwach i Dios eh ma'xta chic quic'axam i Dios , re' la' chic ric'axaric wach i sic'oj sukquil quic'ux china̱ ac'al wili nacotowem ribanaric chiwach risiq'uiric i Dios .

Ru'um aj rino'jbal re're' , re' Dios xiyew reh jenaj lok'il re' k'e̱' wo' chic nimal wach eh ma' hab ta chic jeno' wach wilic reh . Re' aj wili i lok'il re're' : Nak'ormojok ribihnal , narik'ormojic wo' chi re're' Ajabe̱s maj re' i bihnal re're' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi xa re' wo' re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit , nqui rik'or i bi̱ch re're' .

Re' c'uhbal k'oro̱j wu'um ch'i̱l take wich raj k'orol i Dios chiri̱j rinimal wach riwa'ric i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric je' wo' chiri̱j wo' chic ric'ulic lok , ma' xa ta pan kac'ux xkatik'a̱' wach je' ricab nbanaric ru̱c' take xa pa' bih c'uhbal xa tik'imaj wach , re' la' c'uhbal nkak'or re're' coric wach ru'um nok re' hoj xkilow chi manlic chi re' Jesus til wilic rinimal rilok'il .

Ma' xa ta chiri̱j i re' nk'oric chipam take ju'jun i hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj , nk'oric la' wo' chiri̱j i Jesus , xa re' la' ru' nank'oric i ma' Lu̱' chiri̱j re're' , wilic take k'oric pa rihu̱j k'e̱' c'axic chi rakmajic chiri̱j eh re're' riwi̱' chi toco̱m chic riwi̱' take k'oric nanelic chi quiwach take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' nqueht'alij ta chi coric take tijinic re' c'uhtumaj keh hoj aj niminel . Re' take c'acharel re're' ma' cow ta ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus eh xa na̱ ru' toco̱m wo' nelic chi quiwach take k'oric nanquilow wach take toco̱m chic hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj cahnok chi pa̱m i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios . Ru'um aj chi je' re' nca'n take c'acharel re're' , re' Dios narisacham quiwach .

Xa re' la' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh naxquirak chiri̱j chi naquicansjic nak take wacax chi ye'bal quilok'il , xquik'ihtaj qui̱b chiwach i aj k'ahsem si̱ re're' chi ma'xta ribanam chi je' re' . Chiri̱j re' nok quiwekem chic quiso' rehtalil chi ma' xic'ul ta quiwach chi je' re' naribanaric nak queh , xquiminej cok qui̱b chi quixilac take tinamit chi xa q'ueric chic quichi̱'

Ma' xa ta re're' xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric je' la' wo' re're' naxwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al xinimej i camanic re' xye'jic ru'um i Dios chi quitobjic take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel . Ru̱c' i xiban re're' xc'uhtjic queh ricorquilal chi re' Dios c'ahchi' rimana̱b wach rik'orbal riyeb cho queh take kama̱m kati't .

Je' wo' chic , xa hab wach c'acharel re' ricapaj chi manlic aj niminel chiwach i Dios xa re' la' wi ma' riyohbalej ta ju' ra̱k' chi k'oric , xa rijot'oric wo' ri̱b riban . Wi je' re' riban i c'acharel re're' , xa ma'xta bih ritik reh i niminic c'ahchi' ribanam chiwach i Dios

« Chi rehreh aj chic wach ano'jbal tak cu̱c' take tinamit re're' , naquixowej awach tak . Nabanjok aweh tak chi je' re' , nwa̱j chi c'olok cho pan ac'ux tak take k'oric nk'ormojic chi je' wili : Re' aj camanom ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic riwa'ric chiwach i ajabe̱s , nqui nik'or aweh tak . « Ru̱c' aj take k'oric re're' cowjok ac'ux tak maj nik'or aweh tak chi je' ricab chi wilic take c'acharel enquic'ul ac'uhbal tak je' ricab nca'n ru̱c' niC'uhbal yu'na , wilic wo' take c'acharel naca̱t tak quiyeb chi ti'c'axic je' ricab xca'n wi̱n i hin .

Queh aj take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xicojbic i k'oric xik'or , je' wo' wili xik'or queh : « Wi re' hat-tak xatik tak ju' ric'amaric na̱ niC'uhbal ra̱j rik'orom chi til coric xatoquic tak chi waj tahkanel .

Chi je' aj re' ricamaj , pan jenaj k'i̱j xc'uluric cho chi re' take tinamit pa riyuk'ul i Eji̱pto ch'i̱l wo' take tinamit ayu' Canahan re' yuk'ul wilco̱j wi̱' yu'na , k'e̱' ti' xquilow wach ru'um reh jenaj rinimal wi'jalel re' xbanic chi re' take kama̱m kati't xa ta nak chic chi lok' xquirak quiwa' chipam i quiyuk'ul .

Re' hin ma' Wa̱n k'e̱' naxchalic risukquil nic'ux cu'um take jarub pa' chi aj niminel nquimol quib chipam acomonil tak maj nibiram chi re' take re' c'ahchi' quic'amam na̱ i coric laj niminic je' ricab ritak'a̱b cho i kAja̱w Dios .

Je' re' nik'or maj jeno' aj niminel ma' ric'ul ta chi reh chi enk'ormojic reh chi aj niminel wi ma' ricapaj riliric take pa' take cho reh eh xa ta wo' nak ricapaj take raj pan pa̱t re' c'axic wo' nca'n . Ru'um reh riban re're' , nariwih'ic k'ilo̱j china̱ maj re' rimahc k'e̱' wo' chic c'ahbil chiwach i pa' bih mahc riban jeno' ma' re' ta aj niminel .

Chi keht'alim aj chic i wili chiri̱j i Jesus nipahkaj aweh tak chi kojwih'ok tak chiwach i Dios chi coric wach kac'ux eh je' wo' chi ch'iclic ok kac'ux chi manlic chiri̱j i Dios . Je' wo' , je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' i aj k'ahsem si̱ nanoquic cok chiwach i Dios , pe̱t risakbej ri̱b nariban riti̱n ru̱c' sak wach ha' , on je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' c'acharel nchalic chiwach i Dios chi pahkbal cuybal rimahc , ric'raj ri̱b chi cuyu̱j chic rimahc nanquihrjic i riquiq'ue̱l take chicop cansamaj pa ribihnal , je' wo' re' c'ulurok ku̱c' i hoj ru̱c' kawih'ic chiwach i Dios chi ma'xta chic kamahc , kojwih'ok chiwach ru̱c' sakil wach i ka̱mna .

Haj ti cok wilic i queht'alim take kas kacha̱k' re're' , xa re' ti chi je' wili k'oric nquibiraj chiwi̱j : « Re' winak nbanic nak cho ti'c'axic queh take aj niminel reh Jesus , yu'na re' chic re' c'ahchi' rik'oric reh i holohic laj c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' rixowem nak cho wach naxiban cho , nqui k'oric nquibiraj .

Ru'um aj re' til nipahkaj aweh tak yu'na chi cha'n awa' aha̱' tak chi suk ru'um nok curman chi nariwih'ic awansil tak chi muhx chi elic lok cu chi chi̱' jeno' ye'a̱b . Nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi ma' tiyo'jic tak maj ma' hab ta wach keh nariquimic chipam i c'axic wilco̱j wi̱' wili , nqui queh .

Je' re' ajic , weht'alim wo' chi chiwach i ti'c'axic chalic chana̱ tak , re' hat-tak xa c'ahchi' wo' acuyum tak ransil ru'um chi quinanimej tak eh re' camanic na'n tak ma' c'ahchi' ta acana̱b tak ribanaric , riman la' chic c'ahchi' achopom ac'ux tak chiri̱j .

Je' re' nok , re' take rijeb tak winak chi quixilac take aj niminel pan ac'uhtunic chak'or tak queh chi ma' ok xa cha'n aweh no'jbal nca'n . Je' wo' , chi holohic ok quino'jbal reh chi yohbalamaj ok quiwach . Ch'i̱l i re' , chak'or wo' queh chi nquisic' ok ri̱j quino'jbal eh chi cow ok quic'ux chi rinimjic i coric laj c'uhbal . Je' wo' chic , chak'or wo' queh chi xa ye'lic ok quik'ab chi ric'axaric cas quicha̱k' eh chi xa cuyu̱l ok wo' take nanc'ulic lok ti'c'axic chi quina̱ .

« Ru'um aj chi ma' je' ta ricab take tiyo̱x , re' Dios chiwach i rik'ijil wilco̱j wi̱' wili , xiyew keh chi nakeht'alim chi xic'saj chic lok i najtir rik'ijil re' ma' xeht'aljic ta wi̱' chi chalic reh ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take quilok'onic tiyo̱x . Ru'um aj re' xa haj pa' ye'a̱b re' wilque̱b wi̱' take aj lok'onel tiyo̱x , riyew rik'ormojic queh chi naquicana̱b i lok'onic tiyo̱x nca'n

Nok wilic chic wach curu̱s i Jesus , ar wo' wilque̱b ponok take ixok wili : Re' ritu̱t i Jesus , re' richa̱k' ritu̱t i Jesus , re' Mari̱ya re' rehq'ue̱n i Quelyo̱pas eh ch'i̱l wo' i Mari̱ya aj Majta̱la .
Je' wo' xa quic' chic riban riso' eh re' wili cojo̱j chi ribihnal : “ Re' aj Sakomonel Wach No'jbal wilic chipam riC'uhbal i Dios ” , nank'oric .

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' tehlic nak ki̱j chi ric'uxuric take tiwic je' ru̱c' k'ahsamaj chiwach tiyo̱x , chayohbalej tak awi̱b chi ma̱jot' tak ricapew-bal jeno' aj niminel ja' cow ta ti ricapew-bal ru̱c' i Dios nok re' hat-tak nac'ux tak i tiwic re're' .

« Ma' xa re' ta re' xik'or , je' la' wo' xik'or chi je' wili : “ Re' lok' laj k'oric xnik'or cho reh Tawiy chi narich'ica̱b wi̱' ric'ux awu̱c' hat-tak narimanlajic wach , nqui xik'or . « Ru̱c' xik'or i Dios chi je' re' , xo̱j wo' manlajok wach i k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um wili chi ru̱c' rucsjic cho chi quixilac take camnak c'ahchi' ribanam chi re' riti'jolal i c'acharel xipahba̱' chi K'atal K'oric ma' jaruj ta narimikric ac'al .

Chipam i k'i̱j re're' nok na̱wilom wo' tak chic niwach , na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chi re' hin wilqui̱n pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' i wAja̱w eh re' hat-tak na̱wih'ic wo' tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis wu̱c' .

Re' hoj re' nkak'or chi keht'alim chic rino'jbal i Dios kac'am tak na̱ chi'nchel haj wilic rik'or riC'uhbal chi naka'nam maj re' til nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi re' hoj keht'alim chic rino'jbal i Dios , re' chi re' hoj nkac'am na̱ haj wilic i tak'anic riban keh ru̱c' riC'uhbal .

Ar aj pan taxa̱j nawojic wo' chic johtok xa re' la' naquinojok johtok cu re' nak chic naquinasiq'uim tak , re' cok ru' ma'xta chic qui̱narakam tak eh chi je' re' na̱quimic tak je chi ma' cuyu̱j ta amahc tak . Ru'um aj re' yu'na chi cu wilqui̱n chaxilac tak , curman chi na̱cojom tak wach chi re' nibiral nik'orom aweh tak chiri̱j hab wach i hin re' wo' re' niwi̱' . Je' re' nik'or maj wi ma' na'n tak re're' na̱quimic wo' tak je chi ma' cuyu̱j ta amahc tak , nqui Jesus .

Chiri̱j chic ru' xwilow chi re' ixok re're' k'e̱' po' nchel q'uihal take aj niminel ricansam take je ru'um reh rik'ormojic ribiral i Jesus . Re' ixok wili , ru̱c' i xiban re're' , xcahnic chi xa je' chic ricab ncahnic jeno' c'acharel ruq'uej yohbal wach q'uihal i c'ah laj ha' chi xa xohq'uel chic xcahnic . Re' hin yohbal wach xsahchic nic'ux naxwilow i re're' eh chi je' re' ,

Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chic chaj bih xic'ul i Esawuh naxiban chi je' re' , maje' ? Re're' xa̱j nak chi re' take cuse'sbal k'oro̱j cho ru'um i ajabe̱s chi naripahkaljic china̱ ru'um chi pe̱t ac'unbe̱s xa re' la' ru' re' raja̱w ma'xta chic bih xiban chi ripahkaljic reh Dios chi eriyew cho take cuse'sbal china̱ , to̱b ta re' Esawuh xa ok'ic nak chic riban chiwach chi pahkanic . Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' xiban i raja̱w i Esawuh re' chi ma'xta chic bih xa̱j chi enjahlic wo' chic wach i pahkanic bano̱j chic lok china̱ i jenaj chic ac'unbe̱s .

Ar wo' pan nink'i̱j re're' yohbal wach take k'oric nca'n chiri̱j i Jesus . Wilic wo' take nquik'or chi je' wili : « Re're' holohic rino'jbal , nqui take . Wilic wo' nquik'or chi je' wili : « Re're' ma' holohic ta rino'jbal maj nquik'or chi xa rijot'oric i tinamit riban ru̱c' take ric'uhtunic , nqui take .

Ru'um aj chi je' re' xca'n take aj niminel re're' , re' wilic cu̱c' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi quitobjic , q'uihal take c'acharel je' ru̱c' aj criye̱co xquicoj wach i c'uhbalanic xquibiraj eh naxquicana̱' ribanaric i quinajtir laj no'jbal , p'uht quinimem i kAja̱w Jesus .

Re' la' hoj xponic kak'or i c'uhbal re're' chi hoj ripahba̱b je i Dios re' nok rilom chic chi tare̱t kano'jbal , xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiki̱j chi nakak'orom i c'uhbal re're' . Ru'um aj re' , re' rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios nka'n , ma' c'ahchi' ta co̱j lok reh ta nak chi enkarak kalok'il chi enkarak kalok'il chi quiwach take c'acharel china̱ ac'al wili , nka'n la' reh chi nakarakam kalok'il chiwach i Dios re' nilbic cho reh chaj bih wilic pan ka̱mna .

To̱b ta wo' wilic nak chi kana̱ i quimic chi tojbal wach kamahc , til wo' chic k'e̱' rinimal nkatioxej reh kAja̱w Dios chi re're' xesaj chi kana̱ i quimic chi tojbal wach i kamahc xa ru'um reh ricamaj xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Je' aj re' ru' ra̱j banaric cu̱c' take ixok camnak chic quibahi̱l re' cok ru' , je' re' na̱banam xa cu̱c' take til coric chi xacutquelem chic qui̱b eh xicahnic pan niba'il . Je' wo' re' na̱banam cu̱c' take ixok camnak chic quibahi̱l nquichop quic'ux chi ti̱j chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab chi ripahkaljic quito'bal reh Dios .

Cu yu'na tipahkanic pan ti̱j chiwach i Dios chi ma' aweht'alim ta tak chi til wilic chic wajawric , xa re' la' chikawach johtok ma' je' ta chic reh riwi̱' pahkanic na̱banam tak . Je' wo' til nik'or aweh tak chi naric'u'ljic chic cho apahkanic tak ru'um i wAja̱w Dios maj re're' til ra̱j chi re' hat-tak narisukbic ac'ux tak chi manlic ru̱c' ric'u'ljic cho apahkanic tak , nqui Jesus .

Je' wo' chic , wi jeno' aweh hat-tak aj niminel chopo̱j cho ana̱ tak chi aj camanom naxanimej i kAja̱w Jesus , ma' ticapewenic chiri̱j re're' . Re' cok ru' wi xatesmejic ok nchel chipam i wih'ic chi chopo̱j ana̱ chi camanic , chaniq'uej wo' ak'i̱j chi na̱cahnic chi ma' choplic ta chic ana̱ ru'um aj ehcham camanic .

Je' re' ajic nic' pa' wach quik'orom cho take nahsil raj tahkanel i Jesus je' wo' re' nca'n take aj tijinel re're' ma'xta cu̱c' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios chi re're' enc'ambic quibe̱h . Ru'um aj re' xa nquitik'a̱' wach pan quicapew-bal re' xa pa' bih nca̱j ca'nam eh ru'um reh quino'jbal re're' wilic i ch'akoj i̱b chi niminic chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , re' hin k'e̱' wo' chic nsahchic nic'ux awu'um tak ru'um chi cu ja' naht ta wo' ti animem tak i Jesus eh yu'na xacana̱' wo' chic awi̱b tak chi rinimjic i Dios re' xyuk'unic aweh tak reh chi re' chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eriyew cho rito'bal chana̱ tak . Ma' xa re' ta re' xa'n tak , xacana̱' la' wo' tak rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus maj xatoquic tak chi ritahkaljic toco̱m chic c'uhbal re' nk'ormojic chi je' nchel til re' chic re' i holohic laj ribiral chiri̱j i Jesus ,

Chiri̱j i wili nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi chayew ac'ux tak chi cow chi na̱c'acharic tak pan sukquil c'uxlis cu̱c' take chi'nchel awich c'acharel tak . Re' hin nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi ma' nwih'ic jeno' mahc pan ac'acharic tak maj wi ma' je' re' ac'acharic tak , ma'xta wo' awih'ic tak chiwach i Dios chi na̱wilom tak wach .

Re' Jesus je' wo' chic wili xik'or keh : « Chacut tak jok aya'l pa risec'a̱j i cano̱wa eh yohbal wach car enarak tak ar , nqui keh . Je' re' ajic re' hoj raj tahkanel i Jesus xkacut wo' jok i kaya'l eh ar aj ru' nok ma' nka'n ta chic canar resmejic cho kaya'l ru'um reh riq'uihal i car xkachop ,

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak chi na̱banam tak maj re' til wilic rilok'il ma' re' ta nchel wi re' hat-tak k'ato̱j on ma' k'ato̱j ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ ac'achanbal tak , re' la' til wilic riwa'ric rilok'il re' chi re' hat-tak na̱biram tak k'oric chiwach i Dios ru̱c' chaj bih rik'or chi na̱banam tak .

Je' wo' , re' i aj niminel re' nye'eric reh ru'um i Dios chi nchol cojoj no'jbal tanlic wo' china̱ chi re' aj re' naribanam . Re' aj niminel re' nye'eric reh ru'um i Dios chi nchol ripuhcjic pa' bih wilic reh , tanlic wo' china̱ chi naric'uhtam richak'lamil cu̱c' take ras richa̱k' nariban re're' . Re' chic aj niminel cojo̱j chi c'amol quibe̱h take c'acharel ru'um i Dios , tanlic wo' china̱ chi re' aj re' naribanam ru̱c' coric c'uxlis . Je' wo' , re' aj niminel re' nye'eric reh ru'um i Dios chi nchol quilmijic take wilque̱b pan ti'c'axic tanlic wo' china̱ chi ru̱c' wo' sukquil c'uxlis naribanam re're' .

je' wili xik'or queh : « Naxanimej tak c'uhbal xik'or i Wa̱n , xtak'abjic na cho chana̱ tak i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi naroquic pan awa̱mna tak on ma'xta ? nqui queh . Re' take re' je' wili xquik'or : « Ma'xta ! Xa ta wo' nak kabiram chi wilic take c'acharel xtak'abjic chic cho i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi quina̱ , nqui take .

Chi k'oro̱j chic lok re're' , yu'na nik'or wo' chic aweh tak i wili : Wi wilic ok nchel jeno' hab wach ma' ra̱j ta rinimem take k'oric xkatak'a̱' rik'ormojic je aweh tak chipam i hu̱j wili , chak'or tak lok ribiral queh take toco̱m chic awich aj niminel tak reh chi naquina'bem wo' nic' wach rino'jbal aj niminel re're' . Ru̱c' rino'jbal aj niminel re're' , nkapahkaj wo' je' aweh tak chi ma̱tuna̱' chic awi̱b tak ru̱c' cu rehtal rijal wach rino'jbal , reh chi je' re' nachic'raj ri̱b chi ma' holohic ta c'ahchi' ribanam , enoquic cho riq'uix'ic chawach tak .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , til nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' hoj nok chi cu wilco̱j pe chi c'acharic ru̱c' i kati'jolal chi cu quimic pe ri̱j , ma' jaruj ta enka'n canar oquic chipam i lok' laj ye'a̱b wilic wi̱' i Dios chi K'atal K'oric . Je' re' nik'or aweh tak maj re' ti'jolal re' sahchel wach eh k'ahic ri̱j ma' eta riban chi ericuy c'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom ar ru̱c' i Dios .

Ru̱c' ano'jbal tak re're' , re' hin nik'or aweh tak je' ricab nok curman chi ticamanic tak chi risiq'uiric ritz'akil i holohic laj wi'c nye'bic awansil tak eh ma' re' ta nchel chi risiq'uiric ritz'akil i ma' holohic ta laj wi'c nayew ac'ux tak , je' wo' re' curman chi cow wo' enayew ac'ux tak chi nisiq'uiric i hin maj re' hin , hin i pahbamaj ru'um i Dios chi aj ye'ol reh junelic c'acharic eh ru'um re' , re' hin Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic wajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel re' hin naniye'bic aweh tak re're' , nqui Jesus queh .

Wilic wo' nak pech napahkaj tak johtok reh Dios chi nariyeb cho aweh i chaj bih nawa̱j tak , xa re' la' ma' riyew ta cho aweh tak maj re' hat-tak xa reh ye'bal chi suk ati'jolal abakil tak nawa̱j tak wi̱' i napahkaj tak reh .

Je' wo' chic xa eli̱c wo' chatioxej tak johtok Ajabe̱s Dios ru'um chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , xiyew chic awajawric tak chi ritioxjic take pa' bih nac'ul tak ru̱c' .

Yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel nwa̱j k'oric chiri̱j i kaj najtir k'i̱j re' ma' Awraham . Re're' xich'ica̱' ric'ux chiri̱j i k'oro̱j reh ru'um i Dios eh ru'um chi je' re' xiban , re' Dios xipahba̱' chi jenaj c'acharel coric wach ric'ux .

Je' wo' chic , re' tinamit Jerusalen xinwilow ma'xta chic ricamanic reh i risakomal i k'i̱j ma' wo' re' chic i risakomal poh maj re' tinamit wili narisakomjic ru'um rinimal i sakom nsutunic ri̱j i kAja̱w Dios eh je' wo' ru'um i sakom nsutunic ri̱j C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' .

Ra̱j awu̱c' hat-tak ma' je' ta re' nc'uluric ru'um nok re' hat-tak ma' tic'acharic ta tak chic chi chopo̱j ana̱ tak ru'um ritutil i mahc . Re' chic hat-tak tic'acharic la' tak chi chopo̱j ana̱ tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' til wilic awu̱c' tak . Ru'um chi re' Lok' laj Uxlabal re' riyeb aweh tak i Dios ch'i̱l i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric wilic awu̱c' tak , re're' nc'uhtunic lok wi̱' chi re' hat-tak , hat-tak aj niminel reh Jesus . Je' re' nik'or maj re' c'acharel re' ma' wilic ta ru̱c' i Lok' laj Uxlabal keht'al chi ma' re' ta raj tahkanel .

Re' c'ahchi' nik'orom aweh tak wili til wo' coric maj re' Dios til wilic rajawric chi naribanam chi je' re' . Ru'um aj chi re' Dios wilic rajawric , re're' xa cu riyew wo' cho queh take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' ma' nquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus chi naca'nam wo' chic chi ritinami̱t take . Je' re' nok wi xquicana̱' i quino'jbal chi ma' nquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus , re' take re' til naquic'ulmujic wo' chic chi ritinami̱t i Dios je' ricab nok re' take k'ab i tico̱j laj che̱' Oli̱wo re' esemaj lok chiwach riche'lal nk'oljic wo' chic cok .

Re' take c'acharel wili xa sak chic wach ca̱mna ma' janc'al ta xquik'or chucuj laj k'oric eh ru'um re' naxiwih'ic chiwach i Dios ar chiwach i ye'a̱b riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric , ma' jeno' chucuj k'oric xrakmajic chi ca'nam ta nak .

Haj ti cok wilic enquik'or aweh chi til coric , re' chi re' hin nilok'ej wach i kAja̱w Dios re' xquilok'ej wo' cho wach take kama̱m kati't , xa re' la' ru' re' lok'onic niban yu'na re' chic je' ricab ric'uhtaj wi̱n i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Jesus re' aj C'amol Be̱h je ru̱c' i Dios , to̱b ta nchel nquik'or take winak wili chi ma' coric ta wach i c'uhbal re're' . Je' re' niban maj re' hin xnich'ica̱' nic'ux chiri̱j take C'uhbal k'oro̱j cho chipam take hu̱j xitz'ihmbaj i Moyses ch'i̱l wo' take hu̱j xquitz'ihmbaj take cho aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios .

Re' chic i k'oric chiri̱j ac'a̱s tak , nwa̱j niyeb aweh tak i no'jbal wili : Ma̱ban tak chi eno̱j lok chi nahtil ritojoric ac'a̱s tak , chatoj la' tak lok chi nok reh chi ma' eta nwih'ic i ihk chana̱ tak chi quiwach take c'acharel . Haj cok wilic ac'a̱s tak re' til eriban chi enwih'ic chawach tak chi jenaj ihk chana̱ tak , re' quic'axaric take chi'nchel awas acha̱k' tak . Chaj wa'ric nanik'or chi je' re' ? Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um i wili : Ru̱c' rinimjic i ihk re're' , re' hat-tak c'ahchi' wo' animem tak take tak'anic wilic chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses .

Re' take re' naxic'ahtic ru'um ritz'a'quilal rik'ak'il i k'i̱j k'e̱' wo' chic naxchalic quic'a̱ chi xquitok'a̱' ritz'ujuric johtok i Dios ru'um nok re're' wilic rinimal rajawric chi xchalic chi quina̱ take ti'c'axic c'ahchi' quic'ulum . Re' take re' ma' xquijal ta wo' wach quino'jbal eh ma' xca̱j ta wo' quilok'em wach i Dios .

Je' wo' chic , re' tinamit Jerusalen sutumaj ri̱j chi nimak tak tz'ak abaj naht na̱ eh til wo' naht na̱ i tz'ak abaj k'etbal ri̱j i tinamit re're' . Wilic cablaj ritz'ahpil eh chi chi̱' ju'jun chi tz'ahp wilic jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios chi aj cha'janel reh . Chi wach ju'jun chi tz'ahp tz'ihmbimaj quibihnal take ju'jun queh take cablaj ch'uk chi tinamit ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel .

Ru̱c' re're' nkarak chiri̱j k'uru' chi re' c'acharel re' ma' ric'am ta na̱ i rik'or chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , ma' eta wo' nco'ljic chiwach i sihtbal nchalic china̱ ru'um reh rino'jbal chi ma' nbirinic ta k'oric . Xa re' la' chiwach i rinimal ti'c'axic re're' xa jenaj wo' nco'lonic keh chiwach . Re' jenaj re're' , re' wo' i Jesus . Re' aj re' xiyew ri̱b chi ric'uluric i sihtbal wilic nak chi kana̱ eh ru̱c' xic'ul chi je' re' xponic wach i tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios chi je' wili : “ Hab wach nt'uyu'njic wach che̱' chi cansbal reh , re're' jenaj rinimal ti'c'axic c'ahchi' ric'ulum , nqui tz'ihmbimaj cho .

Re' ricorquil i nik'or nc'uhtunic cho ru̱c' riwi̱' nic'acharic najtir . Re' hat-tak aweht'alim wo' tak nic' wach i no'jbal xniban cho nok cu wilqui̱n cho nak chipam i cow laj niminic nka'n i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , ma' je' ? Re' nino'jbal k'e̱' wo' chic c'ahbil chi re' take aj niminel reh Jesus re' nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic wach i kAja̱w Dios yohbal wo' chic wach i ti'c'axic xniban queh eh til wo' xnicowej wi̱b chi risacharic quiwach .

Re're' xichop i ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' re' q'uih wach ribihnal wilic , je' ricab nk'ormojic reh wili : “ Re' Najtir A̱k' ” , “ Re' Aj Yahm ” eh “ Re' Aj Subul Tinamit ” . Re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' ma' xa ta re're' xiban je' la' wo' xibac' i wacax a̱k' chi c'aham ch'ihch' reh chi naricahnic bac'lic chiwach ca'ik'ob lajc'ahl ( 1,000 ) ha̱b .

re' wilic wo' wi̱' jenaj winak Simon ribihnal re' najtir chic rip'utum cho ribanaric take ma' coric ta wach nawa̱l . Re' winak re're' xa riban chic ri̱b chi je' jenaj ajabe̱s nim wach riwa'ric ru'um take ma' coric ta wach nawa̱l riban eh chi je' re' q'uih take c'acharel chipam i tinamit re're' xijot' take

Je' re' ajic re' hin nich'ica̱' nic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus maj nwa̱j chi pa nic'acharic enwih'ic je' wo' chi enwih'ic pa nic'acharic i rinimal wach rajawric i Dios re' xucsunic reh Jesus chi quixilac take camnak . Chiri̱j lok re're' nwa̱j chi wi eta nak nc'ulic lok i ti'c'axic chi nina̱ ru'um ritahkaljic i Jesus niban , tikilqui̱n chi ric'uluric je' ricab xiban i Jesus naxc'ulic lok ti'c'axic china̱ . Je' wo' chic je' ricab xiban naxquimic wach curu̱s re're' til tiklic chi ric'uluric re're' , re' hin tikilqui̱n wo' chi naniquimic wi ru'um reh ritahkaljic i Jesus riwi̱' chi wi̱n chi je' re' enc'uluric wu̱c' .

Je' wo' chic , nachachih wach take aj camanom chi naquicamanic chipam quicomonil take aj niminel ma̱cojlom pe ti ak'ab china̱ i hab wach nacapaj ricojoric chi camanic maj chaj bih aweht'alim wi re' nacapaj ricojoric chi camanic wilic ok cho jeno' rimahc ? Nachacoj ak'ab china̱ jeno' c'acharel wilic cho rimahc , enanih awi̱b i hat ru̱c' rimahc ru' . Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh chi coric ok wach ano'jbal reh chi ma'xta nech' ok mahc pan ac'acharic .

Je' wo' , re' take rijeb tak ixok pan ac'uhtunic chak'or queh chi wilic ok rilok'il quic'acharic je' ricab ric'ul chi queh take ixok quik'ahsam quic'acharic pan k'ab i Dios chi naquicamanic chiwach . Je' wo' , chi ma' nca'n chi xa aj tz'akol wach c'uta̱j take . Chak'or wo' queh chi ma' ok aj xohc'rel take , re' la' ca'n chi til aj c'uhtunel ok reh ribanaric holohic laj no'jbal chiwach i Dios .

Je' aj re' xa hab wach aweh hat-tak ajabe̱s , xa haj pa' wilic i no'jbal tare̱t chaweh tak chi banaric ru̱c' awixk'u̱n tak re' wo' re' cha'n tak . Je' re' nok wi jeno' aweh tak ric'ux nk'oric cho chi nariyeb k'ab chi re' rixk'u̱n narisiq'uim ribahi̱l , tare̱t wo' chi je' re' eriban . Tz'a̱b ru' wi ric'ux wo' nk'oric cho chi ma'xta riyeb k'ab chi re' rixk'u̱n narisiq'uim ribahi̱l , k'e̱' wo' chic tare̱t eriban chi je' re' . Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' re' re're' c'ahchi' riyeb i rixk'u̱n chi suk i camanic eriban chiwach i kAja̱w .

Je' re' ajic cha'n tak i k'oro̱j ru'um i c'uhbal re're' eh ma' ok xa re' ribirmijic ena'n tak . Wi xa re' ribirmijic na'n tak eh ma' na'n ta tak ribanaric haj wili rik'or , xa rijot'oric awi̱b i na'n tak .

Chiri̱j chi ribanam chic take k'oric re're' , re' Jesus cu xcahnic ar Calile̱ya chi ritikiric ju' ribehsjic pa̱m take tinamit wilque̱b ar eh ma' xa̱j ta ojic ar Jure̱ya . Je' re' xiban ru'um nok re' take aj c'amol quibe̱h take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel c'ahchi' quisiq'uim ri̱j nic' nak wach ricansjic naca'nam .

Ru̱c' aj wili nwa̱j nik'orom aweh hat-tak aj Cori̱nto chi re' hat-tak xa'n tak chi xa jenaj chic awi̱' tak ch'i̱l i Jesus xa ru'um reh camanic xiban i Dios chawi̱j tak , ma' ru'um ta nchel chi re' hat-tak xa camanej ta nak tak wach i jenaj wach wih'ic ru̱c' i Jesus re' xc'uhtunic wi̱' rinimal wach rino'jbal i Dios chi kaco'ljic i hoj c'acharel . Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' xiban i Jesus chiki̱j , re' hoj yu'na xojcahnic chi coric chic wach kac'acharic je' wo' chi sak chic wach kano'jbal chiwach i Dios eh xojresaj cho chipam i nic' nimal i c'ahbilal nchopbic nak kana̱ .
Nok ribanam chic re're' , xicoj i ha' chipam jenaj tz'ajbal okis eh xoquic chi ritz'ajaric i ko̱k hoj raj tahkanel eh xichiksaj wo' chic ru̱c' i tz'ih xibac' chipam

eh ru'um aj re' , chi quiye'eric pan quimic take quicojbic wach ric'uhbal i winak rik'orom cahnok chi re're' aj C'amol Be̱h je ru̱c' i Dios , xino̱j chi quisiq'uiric xa haj pa' tinamit . Je' aj re' nanichop take cho chi winak chi ixok , re' hin nik'ahsaj take pan quik'ab take nimak quiwach reh katinami̱t chi naquicojoric pan che̱' .
Je' aj re' ru'um reh quicapew-bal chiri̱j i Jesus , wilic take c'acharel coric wach quik'oric chiri̱j i Jesus eh wilic wo' take ma' coric ta k'oric xca'n chiri̱j .

Re' take ritinami̱t i Dios re' wilic pan ak'ab tak quilmijic , coric ok wach quilmijic cha'n tak je' ricab nbanaric ru̱c' quilmijic juntuhm ok chi me̱' . Ru̱c' quilmijic c'ahchi'ca̱t tak , ma̱ban tak xa ru'um ta nak chi hat-tak mino̱j chipam , cha'n la' tak ru'um chi ru̱c' chi'nchel ac'ux awa̱mna tak nawa̱j tak ribanaric re're' . Je' wo' ma̱ban tak re're' xa ru'um ta nak risahq'uil tumi̱n nye'eric chi to'bal , cha'n la' tak ru'um chi je' re' rik'or ac'ux tak ribanaric .

Re' riwi̱' chi je' re' rik'or take k'oric re're' , re' chi naquiquimic je , take c'acharel riwi̱' chi queh chi quiye'eric pan ti'c'axic eh re' chic i riC'uhbal i Dios ye'o̱j cahnok ru'um i Moyses xc'uhtunic chi je' re' nc'uluric ru'um chi hoj chi'nchel kojmahcanic .

Je' re' k'uru' re' hat-tak bihomak ticapewenok wo' tak ru̱c' i wili : Re' hat-tak ma' xatoj ta tak ritz'akil quicamaj take awaj camanom tak re' xisic'bic wach atic pan awac'a̱l tak . Ru'um chi xawa̱j tak awelk'am take , re' Dios re' k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal rajawric xibiraj cho amahc tak c'ahchi' quicojom cok chiwach ru' .

Ru'um chi xye'eric chic aweh tak chi na̱c'acharic tak chi junelic , re' hin nipahkaj aweh tak chi chak'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak take chi'nchel ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal , chi'nchel jot'oj i̱b , take cakcatil ru'um ric'axaric wach xa chajaric wilic reh jeno' , take qui̱b wach c'uxlis eh ch'i̱l wo' take tz'uju̱j i̱b .

Yu'na nwa̱j k'oric chiqui̱j take ixok camnak chic je quibahi̱l . Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi jeno' ehq'uenbe̱s choplic na̱ ru'um ricaxarahil nok cu c'achlic ribahi̱l , xa re' la' nanquimic je ribahi̱l ncahnic chi tehlic wo' chic ri̱j ru̱c' ric'acharic wi ra̱j wo' chic ribanam caxa̱ra ru̱c' jeno' chic winak . Re' cok ru' wi je' re' naribanam , re' wili i tak'anic niyew reh chi naribanam : Aj niminel ok wo' reh kAja̱w Jesus i ribahi̱l chisic' .

Re' take qui̱b c'acharel re're' xquicana̱' ric'uhbaljic i coric c'uhtumaj keh hoj eh yu'na c'ahchi' chic quik'orom chi re' cuctic cho take camnak xc'uluric chic cho eh ru̱c' take k'oric nca'n re're' , wilic take c'acharel c'ahchi' riyojic quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus .

Je' re' k'uru' wi ch'iclic chic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus ma' k'orel ta chic wi k'ato̱j on ma' k'ato̱j lok ritz'uhmal na̱ c'achanbal enbanic chi re' Dios ekojric'ul ru̱c' chi coric chic wach kac'ux , re' la' i ch'iquinic c'uxlis chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric nbanic re're' chi c'ahchi' wo' kac'uhtam lok pan kac'acharic chi wilic i c'axoj i̱b chi kawach .

Ru'um nok re' Jesus xitijej birinic k'oric , xye'eric reh chi re' wo' re' enbanic chi re' take c'acharel aj birinel k'oric take , equico'ljic chiwach i junelic quimic eh je' wo' chi enye'eric quic'acharic chi junelic k'i̱j sakom .

Re' chic yu'na was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' tak chiri̱j i tumi̱n re' c'ahchi' amolom tak wach chi quito'bal take kich aj niminel wilque̱b ar Jerusalen re' c'ahchi' quiq'uic pan jenaj niba'il . Nic' pa' wach tak'amaj rik'ormojic queh take moloj wach aj niminel wilque̱b ar pan tinamit Cala̱sya re' wo' re' tak'anic niban aweh hat-tak .
Re' hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s ma' tiq'uic tak k'e̱' chiwach rajawric abahi̱l tak je' ricab na'n tak chi ma' tiq'uic ta tak k'e̱' chiwach rajawric i kAja̱w Jesus .

Chiri̱j chic re' naxk'oric wo' chic i Jesus cu̱c' tinamit je' wili xik'or queh : « Ru'um chi re' hin quinsakomonic reh pa̱m quicapew-bal take c'acharel , re' hin je' nicab i jenaj sakom . Je' re' k'uru' ru'um re're' nik'or aweh tak je' ricab jeno' c'acharel ric'am je risakom sakombal reh ribe̱h , ma' nsahchic ta pan k'ekom je' wo' re' i c'acharel noquic chi waj tahkanel ma' eta wo' nsahchic wach ric'acharic , na la' ric'acharic chi junelic , nqui xik'or .

Je' aj re' ru' nca'n take aj tijinel re' wilque̱b chaxilac tak re're' eh chi je' re' nquik'eb lok ri̱j quic'ux chaj bih k'oric quik'orom cho take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take raj tahkanel i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Ru'um aj re' ma̱ban aweh hat-tak je' re' , re' la' hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , c'olok pan ac'ux tak i k'oro̱j cho cu'um take nahsil c'amol be̱h re're' ,

Je' wo' chic , re're' ma' cu re' ta nchel pa' bih i si̱ nye'eric chiwach chi je' wilic ta nak jeno' ric'axquilal , cu re' ta nak re're' c'achlic wi̱' . Re' la' Dios , re're' nbanic chi chi'nchel take c'acharel wilque̱b pan suk laj c'acharic eh suk wo' quiwa' quiha̱' .

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab nok re' hoj nkacoj wach quik'orbal take kich c'acharel nanquik'or keh i coric , je' wo' re' ka'n tak ru̱c' k'oric rik'orom cho i Dios chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n eh je' re' ka'n maj re' take k'oric xik'or chiri̱j i Lok' laj Ac'unbe̱s til coric take eh ru'um i re' til raj cojoric wach maj til ch'iquenel c'uxlis take .

Re' la' cha'n tak je' ricab nanajal lok aso' tak eh toco̱m chic sak wach nacoj tak chawi̱j , je' ok wo' re' rijalaric wach ano'jbal cha'n tak chi re' chic i rino'jbal i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , re' chic re' enac'uhtaj tak reh chi ma' eta na'n aweh tak take c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n take suk queh ribanaric i mahc .

Je' wo' chic , re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel quich'ica̱' wo' chic quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios naxibehic chiri̱j i tinamit Jericoh ribihnal chiwach wuku̱b k'i̱j . Ru'um aj chi ch'iclic quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios , xc'uluric chi re' tz'ak nsutunic ri̱j i tinamit re're' xtublujic wach ac'al .
Chiwach aj quib ha̱b re' cu xcahnic wi̱' i ma' Lu̱' ar pan tinamit E̱peso , re' Dios yohbal wach lok' laj nawa̱l sachbal c'uxlis xic'uhtaj ru̱c' ro̱k k'ab ru' .

Re' Jesus k'uru' je' wili xik'or queh : « Chabiraj tak chi coric i ricorquil nanik'orom wili : Je' ricab chi wilic take c'acharel choplic quina̱ ru'um jeno' ajabe̱s , wilic wo' take c'acharel choplic quina̱ ru'um i mahc .

Ru'um aj re' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , ru'um chi re' Dios k'e̱' xojric'ax naxitak'a̱' cho rAc'u̱n chi quimic chiki̱j , je' wo' re' ric'axaric ki̱b ka'n i hoj chi kawach .

Je' re' k'uru' xa je' ta nak ricab chi re' hat c'ahchi' ac'uhtunic wi̱n haj wilic i be̱h nanichopom je , re' hin xa awu'um wo' i hat weht'alim chaj bih ra̱j banaric chi nanic'acharic wo' chic . Je' re' ajic ru'um chi xa quinawihch'ilej wo' , re' hin k'e̱' nsukbic nic'ux ru'um re're' , nqui xitz'ihmbaj cho ma' Tawiy .

Chiri̱j chic lok chi'nchel re're' , yu'na chi cu ja' quinponic ta pe awu̱c' nwa̱j wo' chi re' hat chachop ac'ux chi ribanaric take wili chipam take moloj i̱b reh lok'onbal wach i Dios : Pe̱t , chawilow pa̱m Lok' laj riC'uhbal i Dios chi quiwach take awich aj niminel . Je' wo' chic , chac'uhbalej take aj niminel ru̱c' pa' bih narak chiri̱j chipam Lok' laj C'uhbal eh chatijej take chi naquic'amam na̱ riC'uhbal i Dios .

Re' hin nik'or aweh tak i wili maj to̱b ta xa sutumaj chic ki̱j ru̱c' c'axquilal nchalic chi kana̱ , re' rajawric i Dios ma' janc'al ta hoj ricana̱b chi ma' ta nak chic enkarak kelbal chipam take c'axquilal re're' , on to̱b ta wo' wilic pech ma' nkarak ta nak chic chiri̱j chaj bih naka'nam chipam jeno' c'axquilal , re' rajawric i Dios xiban chi ma' xkak'eb ta kac'ux chi nakesmejic chipam i c'axquilal re're' .

Xa re' la' wilic wo' take toco̱m je' wili tohk' quik'orom chi xa quise'lbal : « Re' take wili hamo̱j take chi ha' je' ru̱c' nxohc'sonic , nqui take . Je' re' xquik'or ru'um ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j i k'oric xca'n take aj niminel re're' .

Re' tusuj abaj sutumaj wi̱' ri̱j i tinamit re're' je' ru̱c' i holohic laj rex abaj “ Ja̱spe ” ribihnal eh re' tik'imaj wi̱' take pa̱t chipam tinamit re're' je' ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' ma' xilacamaj ta wach ru̱c' toco̱m chic ch'ihch' , xa nlemuhunic la' chic .

eh ar chipam i ye'a̱b re're' xi'elic cho wuku̱b chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' ye'o̱j cajawric chi ritak'abjic cho take wukch'uk wach chi ti'c'axic naric'uluric chiwach ac'al . Re' take wuku̱b chi aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' xa nworwotic chic sakil quiso' wilic jenaj quipa̱s ch'ihch' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' jelic na̱ quiteleb k'e'lic jok chi' quic'ux cu nponic nah quitu̱k .

Re' chic take quibanic ti'c'axic aweh tak niyew aweh tak i no'jbal chi ma̱pahkaj tak reh Dios chi equisihtjic cho ru'um , chapahkaj la' tak pan ati̱j tak chi xa wilic ok wo' cho ricuse'sbal chi quina̱ . Til re're' pahkanic cha'n tak chiqui̱j .

Re' take ro̱k xa je' chic ricab take junch'uk chic k'an laj ch'ihch' ic'simaj pan k'a̱k' , xa nhec'hetic chic riban ru'um ritz'a'quilal k'a̱k' . Re' rik'orbal xa je' chic ricab nk'oric cho jenaj ma' laj ro̱k ha' chi xa nrojic chic cho .

xniteh wach queh chi coric hab wach i hat . Queh take re' k'uru' xa cu nanisakomem wo' wach chi manlic ano'jbal reh chi re' hin ch'i̱l take re' , ekojwih'ic pan jenaj sukquil c'uxlis chi kibil ki̱b . Chi je' re' c'acharic enca'n , re' c'axoj i̱b na'n wu̱c' i hat ch'i̱l wo' i c'axoj i̱b niban i hin cu̱c' , re' wo' re' i c'axoj i̱b enca'n chi quibil qui̱b , nqui xik'or Jesus pa riti̱j .

Chaj wa'ric nanik'or i re're' ? Nik'or ru'um reh i wili : Reh chi re' hoj xojco'ljic , re' Dios ma' xipoh'aj ta ric'ux chi riye'eric cho pan quimic i Jesus re' rAc'u̱n , re' la' xiban xik'ahsaj i rAc'u̱n pan quimic chiki̱j i hoj c'acharel . Ru'um chi je' re' xiban i Dios til nkeht'alij chi re're' nariyeb wo' cho keh chi'nchel i to'bonic .

re' je' wili quik'orom cho : “ Pan cohlsbal wach take k'i̱j nacuctic cho take winak xa se'lenel take pan nak' wach i Dios eh naca'nam xa pa' bih nca̱j ca'nam , re' nca̱j chiri̱j chi naquirakam risukquil quic'ux ru̱c' take c'ahbilal naca'nam , nqui quik'orom cho .

Chi coric aj chi'nchel i c'ulu̱j lok re're' , chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi ma' eta enwih'ic awu̱c' tak i no'jbal chi q'uihsinic i̱b chi quiwach take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' nquic'u'lej ta na̱ i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i Dios . Wi wilic ok nchel awu̱c' tak i no'jbal re're' , til c'olok pan ac'ux tak i wili : Je' ricab chi ma' ru'um ta take k'ab i che̱' pa'lic chi coric i riche'lal ru'um la' reh ra̱' i che̱' re're' cow pa'lic wach ac'al , je' wo' re' nc'uluric awu̱c' tak chi ma' awu'um ta hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wilco̱j i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi ritinami̱t i Dios , ku'um la' keh hoj xatcojoric tak chi hat-tak chic ritinami̱t i Dios .

Ru̱c' re're' ma' nwa̱j ta chi enacapaj tak chi re' hoj kojchopbic na̱ animinic tak maj re' hat-tak pa'lic chic chi coric acapew-bal tak chiri̱j i Jesus . Haj cok wilic nka̱j chi nawic'ram tak , re' chi re' hoj wilco̱j chi awaj to'o̱l tak chi rirakmajic risukquil ac'ux tak chipam rinimjic i Jesus .
Chipam chic jenaj tinamit Weta̱nya ribihnal , re' quitinamital i Mari̱ya ch'i̱l i Ma̱rta wilic jenaj yowa̱b La̱saro ribihnal quixuba̱l wo' i Mari̱ya ch'i̱l i Ma̱rta .

Til aj tic'acharok tak k'uru' je' ricab ra̱j i Dios eh ma̱k'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak i k'oro̱j chic aweh tak maj hab wach re' ma' ra̱j ta ric'amam na̱ i k'oro̱j , ma' xa ta chiwach i winak c'ahchi' rik'ehtam ri̱b til la' wo' c'ahchi' rik'ehtam ri̱b chiwach i Dios re' xye'bic cho reh Lok' laj rUxlabal chi naricholic c'acharic pan holonquilal .

Nic' wach nacharak tak chiri̱j chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nk'oric ru̱c' chi̱' jeno' aj c'uhbalanel ? Re' wili na̱rakam tak wi̱' chiri̱j : Wi re' aj c'uhbalanel ricoj wach eh rik'or chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xc'ulic c'acharok china̱ ac'al wili chi til je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj c'acharel , re're' rehtalil chi re' Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios nk'oric ru̱c' chi̱' aj c'uhbalanel re're' .

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab chi re' take tinamit re're' xquik'eb qui̱b pan mahc , re' take aj tijinel oconak take cho chaxilac tak xa cu c'ahchi' wo' quitikim ju' mahcanic , to̱b ta narichalic ti'c'axic chi quina̱ . Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' ru'um chi je' na pa risukquil quiwiric wilque̱b nquik'or chi re' Dios c'ahchi' riye'bic k'ab queh chi ribanaric i c'oyomal . Ma' xa re' ta re' nca'n , je' la' wo' ma' nquibiraj ta k'oric chi quiwach take wilic cajawric chi quina̱ , nquise'laj eh nquiyak'abej la' wo' pan co̱k cajawric take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios wilque̱b ar pan taxa̱j .

Je' wo' curman chi naresam lok pa ricapew-bal take ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal eh re' chic i holohic laj no'jbal chiban ribanaric . Je' wo' chic til chiyew ric'ux chi wih'ic pan sukquil laj c'uxlis cu̱c' chi'nchel c'acharel .

Re' cok ru' reh chi naribanam chi je' re' curman chi til nimjok wo' take c'uhtunic chiri̱j i Jesus . Ma' xa ta re're' , je' la' wo' curman chi re' take lok' laj c'uhtunic abiram tak re're' eh ach'ica̱b wo' tak ac'ux chiri̱j ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna tak , ma̱k'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak re' la' cha'n tak riman la' chic chayew ac'ux tak chiri̱j . Re' take k'oric chiri̱j take lok' laj c'uhtunic abiram tak re're' , re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' wo' re' c'ahchi' quibiram q'uihal take c'acharel chi junsut wach ac'al choplic quina̱ ru'um i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma . Je' wo' , nik'or aweh tak chi re' Lok' laj Ajabe̱s xpahbanic wi̱n chi aj c'uhbalanel reh riC'uhbal .

Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take nahsil re're' , xo̱j quimol abaj cansbal nak reh Jesus , xa re' la' ma' xca'n ta canar ricansjic maj re' Jesus xisach ri̱b chi quixilac take tinamit wilque̱b ar eh chi je' re' xelic je chi chi̱' i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios .

Je' re' k'uru' re' ano'jbal tak re' ac'samaj chic wach , je' ok ricab rino'jbal i Dios re' xtik'inic wach chi je' re' ano'jbal tak reh chi etiwih'ic tak pan jenaj coric laj c'acharic nt'oric wach eh je' wo' pan jenaj sak wach c'acharic .

Re' hin xnik'or take wili reh chi chiwach i ti'c'axic re're' , re' hat-tak ritinami̱t i Dios tiniminic tak reh riC'uhbal , enacuy tak ransil i ti'c'axic re're' eh je' wo' chi enatik tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus . Re' aj wo' re' riwi̱' chi xnitz'ihmbaj re' xc'uluric lok wili :
xa re' la' re' Dios xucsaj wo' cho chi quixilac camnak , nqui i c'uhbal re're' .

Chi je' re' nichak'lamil cu̱c' take c'acharel , re' hin je' nicab i c'acharel re' ncha'janic queh take me̱' chi coric maj re' aj cha'janel queh ru' , riyew pan quimic ric'acharic chi rico'ljic take rime̱' wi wilque̱b take pan yohbal chiwach jeno' josk' laj q'uiche̱' tz'i' aj c'uxul me̱' ,

Nanik'or i wili , re' hin weht'alim wo' chi re' hat-tak abiram tak chic chi re' Dios ru̱c' rinimal wach rato'bil xiripahba̱' chi nanibanam i camanic re' ric'am cho holonquilal chaweh hat-tak ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho i ma' Israhel .

Je' wo' re' cha'n ru̱c' xa hab wach jeno' c'acharel aj niminel chic re' ricoj cho ch'akoj i̱b chaxilac hat-tak aj niminel , chak'il eh chacoj wo' rino'jbal re' cok ru' chiri̱j chi ak'ilim chic junpech on ca'pech ok , wi ma' xatrinimej ma̱coj aj chic pa riman chi quixilac take aj niminel .
Xa re' wo' xquibiraj take k'oric re're' , re' take cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses xiban wo' chic rehreh wach quicapew-bal .
eh ru̱c' nca'n re're' , ma' c'ahchi' ta quic'uhtam lok chi re' Dios xa coric wo' nk'oric je' ricab ric'uhtaj lok i c'acharel nc'ulbic reh chaj bih rik'or i Jesus .

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , ru'um aj chi c'ahchi' awuy'em tak ric'uluric chi'nchel take k'oro̱j cahnok wili chayew ac'ux tak chi cow chi ribanaric re're' reh chi nac'olok lok i kAja̱w etirirak tak chi coric wach ac'ux tak , chi ma' ch'uwa' ta nech' ok na'n tak ru'um i mahc eh chi ma'xta wo' jeno' k'oric ra̱j banaric chana̱ tak . Re' la' wih'ok awu̱c' tak re' sukquil c'uxlis chi awibil awi̱b tak .

Chiri̱j chic ribanaric niti̱j re're' , yu'na hat-tak wich aj niminel nwa̱j nipahkam aweh tak chi nana'n ati̱j tak chiri̱j kacamaj chi aj k'orol reh rik'orbal i Dios , chapahkaj tak johtok reh Dios chi re' rik'orbal eno̱j lok rik'ormojic chi ma' hab ta wach enk'etbic wach . Chi je' re' , re' take c'acharel equibirinic reh eta nak nquic'ul chi lo̱k' eh ewo' nquinimej je' ricab xa'n hat-tak .

Je' aj ricab i tz'ihmbimaj cho re're' , re' hoj ma' nkacana̱' ta rik'ormojic ribiral i kAja̱w Jesus ru'um nok keht'alim chi re' kAja̱w Dios re' wo' re' xucsunic cho reh i Jesus eh je' ricab naxucsaj cho ru' je' wo' re' nakojrucsam wo' chic cho i hoj chi nakac'acharic chi junelic . Ma' xa re' ta re' , nacoj la' wo' ripahba̱b chiwach nakojric'am johtok ru̱c' .

Wi wilic jeno' yowa̱b chaxilac tak re' wili no'jbal niyew reh : Chiyuk'ej take quinahsil i comonil moloj wach aj niminel eh naquiponok ru̱c' , ca'n quiti̱j china̱ . Je' wo' quibuch' pan yolic laj ik'o̱m chi c'ahchi' quipahkam reh Lok' laj Ajabe̱s i to'bal reh yowa̱b re're' .
« Pan jenaj k'i̱j re' Moyses nok wilic chic reh ca'winak ( 40 ) ha̱b , xc'ulic pa ric'ux rilmijic nic' wach wilque̱b take ras richa̱k' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel .

i winak wili re' ritinami̱t wo' i Ro̱ma je' ricab xnibiraj chi xik'or . Re' aj wili k'oric nik'or je aweh : Re' hin xnichop cho winak wili naxinponic ch'i̱l take niso̱l ar chipam i ye'a̱b naricansjic nak wi̱' cu'um take juntuhm chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xichopbic je reh . Chi je' aj re' c'ahchi' ca'nam reh , xnimak' cho pan quik'ab take juntuhm re're'

Je' aj re' k'uru' re' quic'a̱ take winak re're' xinih ri̱b cu̱c' take toco̱m chic quich quitinami̱t eh ru'um re' xquichop take qui̱b rich'i̱l ma' Lu̱' aj Masero̱nya take , re' Ca̱yo ch'i̱l Arista̱rco quibihnal eh xquic'am je take chipam jenaj ma' laj pa̱t nquimol wi̱' qui̱b reh chi ar rich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ .
re' la' chic xapahkaj hat-tak chi re' winak aj cansanel xok'tjic je chi rijelow-bal i Jesus re' jenaj winak coric wach rino'jbal eh lo̱k' riwa'ric .

Je' aj re' ru' , re' Lok' laj Uxlabal ma' xilow ta ca̱mna take c'acharel re're' chi toco̱m ta nak chiwach i ka̱mna hoj , xisaksaj la' wach queh eh je' re' xiban ru'um chi re' take c'acharel re're' xquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus .

Ru'um aj re' nik'or je aweh tak chi xa hab wach ra̱j ric'uxum i caxlan wi'c eh ra̱j ruq'uem reh i ri̱s u̱wa pe̱t k'oric til wo' chic'raj ri̱b chi re' ricapew-bal chiri̱j ok riquimic i kAja̱w Jesus wilic je eh cu re' aj wo' ru' chic'ux reh i caxlan wi'c eh chuq'uej wo' reh i ri̱s u̱wa re're' .

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' wich aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , ru̱c' i chaj bih xnik'or lok aweh tak wili ma' riban chic ntuquic acapew-bal tak , chapahba̱' la' ac'ux tak eh ticowonok tak chipam rinimjic i kAja̱w . Je' wo' xa eli̱c ok wo' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak chi ribanaric haj wilic i camanic riyew tak chana̱ i kAja̱w xa re' la' c'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' pa' bih camanic na̱banam tak chiwach i kAja̱w ma' k'ehbel ta , til wilic la' ritz'akil ru̱c' .
Je' re' ajic chi wilqui̱n aj chi je' hin awaja̱w tak chipam rinimjic i Jesus , til nipahkaj aweh tak i ato'bil chi chac'am tak tz'eht reh nino'jbal niban chi rinimjic i Jesus

Chaj wa'ric nanik'or chi je' re' ? Nik'or chi je' re' maj re' Dios ru̱c' i rinimal wach rino'jbal wilic , xiban chi re' take c'acharel ma' re' ta aj niminel take ma' eta nquina'bej pa̱m ricapew-bal xa ru̱c' ta nak ti quino'jbal qui̱b . Tz'a̱b ru' re're' xponic chiwach eh xitik'a̱' wach pa ric'ux chi re' hoj re' kojniminic reh c'uhbal nk'ormojic chiri̱j i Jesus nakaco'ljic ru̱c' i c'uhbal re' nk'ormojic cu'um take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel take chi xa memil laj no'jbal wilic chipam .

Re' chic hat-tak ehq'uenbe̱s aj niminel reh Jesus , yu'na til nik'or aweh tak chi chanimej abahi̱l tak eh re' hat-tak re' wilic abahi̱l tak re' ru̱c' ma' re' ta aj niminel reh rik'orbal i Dios tiniminok wo' tak chi quiwach . Je' re' nik'or aweh tak chi cha'n tak maj wi je' re' na'n tak to̱b ta yu'na ma' nquinimej ta i rik'orbal i Dios nak'or tak queh , narich'ukic wo' quic'ux chi rinimjic ru'um i holohic laj no'jbal na'n tak .

Ru'um aj re' chi hoj ritak'anic cho i Dios , re' hoj c'ahchi' kak'oric awu̱c' tak chi ru̱c' kajawric xiyew i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh nakojk'oric awu̱c' tak xa je' na nchel re' wo' i Dios c'ahchi' rik'oric awu̱c' tak . Je' re' nok ru̱c' kajawric xiyew i Jesus , xa nch'uk chic kac'ux , cow nkapahkaj aweh tak chi tiwih'ok tak ru̱c' i Dios pan jenaj suk laj c'uxlis .
To̱b ta jenaj rinimal ti'c'axic xic'ul i Jesus naxquimic je , re' Dios xucsaj wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak maj ma' jaruj ta xiban chi xcahnic chi camnak chi junpech .
On ma' nacoj ta wo' na tak rehtal chi re' wo' ru̱c' queh take bihomak re're' xitz'ujbic reh lok' laj ribihnal i Ajabe̱s Jesus re' xk'ormojic ribiral chana̱ tak ?

Ru'um chi je' re' no'jbal ra̱j uyu'njic reh i c'acharel re' ra̱j ribanam chi aj ilol reh ritinami̱t i Dios , ma' riban ta wo' chi aj xohc'rel laj winak , ma' wo' aj cojol wolic , xa ta wo' nak chi aj c'axol wach tumi̱n . Je' re' k'uru' , re' c'acharel re' ra̱j ribanam chi aj ilo̱j queh ritinami̱t i Dios c'uhtunok lok chi wilic chak'lamil ru̱c' eh chi wilic wo' k'ochlic wach c'uxlis ru̱c' .

Tz'a̱b ru' i c'acharel naruq'uem reh ha' niyew i hin ma' jaruj ta chic nariwih'ic richikchi'i̱l . Je' aj re' naric'ulum maj je' ricab chi re' ha' nelic cho chipam jeno' rasbal ha' xa c'ahchi' wo' cho chi elic , je' wo' re' i ha' niyew i hin xa nariwih'ic wo' cho ru̱c' i c'acharel re're' reh chi naric'acharic chi junpech , nqui Jesus .

Je' wo' chic riban chi enk'ormojic chiri̱j chi re're' ma' ric'ax ta take rich c'acharel . Raj nchel hab wach ric'am na̱ haj wilic rik'or ritijbal i Jesus , til pan coric je' wili nc'uluric ru̱c' : Re' ric'axbal i Dios nq'uihic wach pa ra̱mna cu rehtal re' c'acharel re're' ric'ax take rich c'acharel ru̱c' chi'nchel ric'ux . Je' aj re' ru' ru̱c' ric'amaric na̱ ritijbal i Jesus , re' hoj kojchol quic'axaric take kich c'acharel eh chi je' re' nkeht'alij chi wilco̱j pan jenaj chic wach c'uxlis ch'i̱l i kAja̱w Jesus .

Ar aj ru' nok c'ahchi' wilom i re're' , xwilow quiwach xib chi ma' tob laj uxlabal je' take quiwi̱' ro̱ch' . Jenaj queh take ro̱ch' re're' ar xelic cho pan chi̱' i ma' laj wacax a̱k' . Re' ricab ar xelic cho pan chi̱' i ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal . Re' chic i ro̱x ar xelic cho pan chi̱' i c'acharel re' xa chucul aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios .

Je' re' nok re' hin nik'or aweh tak wi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' ayeb tak quilok'il take niba̱' , ra̱j rik'orom chi re' hat-tak ricorquil c'ahchi'ca̱t ru̱c' ric'amaric na̱ i tak'anic xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Re' tak'anic wili re' wo' re' tz'ihmbimaj cho chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios chi je' wili : « Chac'ax awas acha̱k' je' ricab ric'axaric awi̱b na'n i hat , nqui rik'or .
Je' re' k'uru' re' hoj wilco̱j chi aj camanom chawi̱j xa ru'um chi k'e̱' ti' nkic'raj i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Je' re' k'uru' ma̱cana̱' tak chi re' take quicapewenic chi je' re' enquijot' acapew-bal tak , chacoj aj tak rehtal i jenaj chic k'oric k'oro̱j cho ru'um jenaj winak aj no'jbal naxik'or cho chi je' wili : “ Xa hab wach jeno' c'acharel xa k'unk'un chic ch'i̱l jeno' chic c'acharel ma' holohic ta rino'jbal , eno̱j sahchok wach i holohic laj capew-bal nak wilic ru̱c' ru'um nok re' chic rino'jbal i c'ahbil rino'jbal winak eric'am tz'eht reh , nqui xik'or cho .

Re' chic nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' wili i ti̱j niban chawi̱j tak : « K-Aja̱w Dios , re' hat , hat tiye'bic reh sukquil kac'ux . Re' wo' hat xatbanic chi re' kAja̱w Jesus re' je' na ricab jeno' aj cha'jem me̱' nok wilic , xuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak . Ru̱c' re're' xa'n wo' chi ru'um reh riquiq'ue̱l xichihcaj i Jesus naxquimic , re' ac' laj tik'inic xa'n chiki̱j i hoj xcahnic chi pa'lic wach chi junelic k'i̱j sakom , nqui i ti̱j niban . Je' wo' chic naniban i ti̱j re're' , nipahkaj wo' reh Dios chawi̱j tak

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel , chalok pe chi nina̱ pa' bih narichalic , xa ma'xta bih nwa̱j reh , re' la' curman chi re' hat-tak na̱c'acharic tak pa ricorquilal je' ricab ric'ul chi queh take aj niminel reh lok' laj holohic laj c'uhbal nk'oric chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Wi je' re' na'n tak to̱b ta equino̱j on ma' equino̱j c'olok chi awiliric tak , re' hin xa nanibiram wo' abiral tak chi re' hat-tak xa c'ahchi' wo' ayeb ac'ux tak chi wih'ic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chi rik'ormojic i holohic laj tijinic hoj tijimaj wi̱' . Je' wo' , xa nanibiram ok wo' chi re' hat-tak c'ahchi' wo' ato'bem awi̱b tak chipam i cow laj camanic wilco̱j wi̱' je' ricab nca'n take sol chi nquito'bej qui̱b naqui'oquic chi k'ak'anic .

Je' re' k'uru' wi re' kAja̱w Dios nehchenic reh kac'acharic re' wo' re' naribanic chi chiri̱j chi hoj chic camnak je , nariyeb wo' chic kac'acharic je' ricab nok xiyew wo' chic ric'acharic i Jesus naxcansjic je . Je' aj re' naribanam i Dios ku̱c' ru'um reh rinimal wach rajawric wilic .

Re' k'oro̱j chiri̱j acapew-bal re're' , re' ok re' camanok aweh chi naric'ulic cho pan ac'ux i wili : Naxatnipahba̱' cho chi na̱banam chi hat raj camanom i Dios ru̱c' ricojoric take nik'ab chana̱ , re' Dios xiyew aweh awajawric re' ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal chi je' ricab jeno' si̱ . Yu'na k'uru' chi ye'o̱j chic aweh i ajawric re're' , chacana̱' chi nimsjok wach i camanic riban awu̱c' je' ricab riban i k'a̱k' chi xa ntenic chic i xak riban nanwahljic cok .

Ru'um aj wo' chi chi'nchel narich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ , wilic riwi̱' chi re' tijbal nye'bic reh sukquil c'uxlis queh c'acharel xk'ormojic wo' ru'um i Jesus queh take camnak chic take je . Je' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' chi'nchel c'acharel ayu' wach ac'al , re' take re' xiquimic reh chi narich'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ xa re' la' ru̱c' rik'ormojic i tijbal re're' , xye'eric wo' queh take xic'ulbic reh tijbal re're' chi xquic'ul i junelic c'acharic ye'o̱j ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal ar re' wilic wo' wi̱' i Dios .

Chaj wa'ric nanik'or aweh tak chi re' chic i Dios nehchenic aweh tak ? Re' hin nik'or re're' ru'um nok naxitak'a̱' cho Jesus chi nariquimic chawi̱j tak , re're' xa je' na nchel xitoj chic awach tak chi xiban chi awaj ehchenel tak chic . Ru'um aj re' ma̱min chic awi̱b tak chi ri'sil cajawric take aj c'amol be̱h re' nquik'or aweh tak chi cu wilic take toco̱m chic no'jbal raj banaric reh chi re' ano'jbal hat-tak enponic chiwach i Dios .

Ru̱c' wili nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak c'uta̱j chiri̱j take chaj bih riban i kAja̱w Dios je' ricab nok wilic take cho kama̱m kati't je' re' xca'n eh ru'um re' xsacharic quiwach ru'um jenaj raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios tak'amaj cho chi quicansjic .

Niban aweh tak i pahkanic re're' maj til q'uihal ru' take toco̱m chic nca'n quitz'a̱k ru̱c' rijalaric ribehil riC'uhbal i Dios . Je' re' ru' nca'n take re' raj i hoj xa coric wo' wach rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios c'ahchi'co̱j eh re're' c'ahchi'co̱j rilom cho chi xa re' wo' pa' wilic ritak'a̱b rik'ormojic keh xa re' wo' re' c'ahchi' kak'orom ru̱c' i rajawric riyeb wo' keh i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Re' hoj re' cow chic kac'ux chipam i rinimjic i kAja̱w Jesus , curman chi nakato'bem take kich aj niminel je' ru̱c' ma' ja' cow ta ti ric'ux chiri̱j pa riniminic . Ru'um aj re' niyew tak chawach i no'jbal wili chi kacuy tak ransil i chaj bih nkic'raj pa̱m ka̱mna chi naka'nam re' enbanic chi re' kich aj niminel eric'raj chi enmahcanic . Kic'raj tak ki̱b k'uru' chi quiwach take kas kacha̱k' maj chi enka'n re' haj wilic nka̱j ribanaric , ma' k'e̱' ta wo' chic curman chi keh .
Wi xponic wo' k'i̱j chi naqui̱nquesam je til nawojic ca̱t tak wilom cho maj re' hin ma' nik'eb ta nicapew-bal ru̱c' i kAja̱w Dios chi re're' nariyeb k'ab wi̱n chi xa nic' yu' nanibanam chi je' re' .

Chiri̱j chic wili , xwilow wo' wach i quejeb chi raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios re' pa'alque̱b china̱ i ju'jun reh ricaj tz'u'c i wach ac'al . Re' take re' c'ahchi' quipitim chi re' take quejeb chi te̱w qui'oquic cho pan cajtz'u'c reh wach ac'al ma' eta chic nquiyew cho quitewil je china̱ i ha' eh je' china̱ take che̱' c'aham .

Re' rik'ijil re' xa'n tak wi̱' i no'jbal bano̱j cho cu'um take ma' quilok'onic ta wach i kAja̱w Dios xiq'uic chic lok . Chipam take k'i̱j re're' , re' hat-tak xaniq'uej wo' tak cho ribanaric i c'ahbilal je' ricab take c'oyomal , take xohc'sonic i̱b xa'n tak ar pan tak ma' holohic ta laj nink'i̱j xamol wi̱' awi̱b tak chi ric'uxuric xa pa' bih jaric . Chipam wo' take cho k'i̱j re're' , xa'n wo' tak cho i c'ahbilal re' rilok'onjic take tik'imaj tiyo̱x ,

Ru'um chi re' take quib chi c'acharel re're' xye'eric cajawric chi narelic cho k'a̱k' pan quichi̱' cansbal queh take c'acharel re' nca̱j quiyeb chi ti' take quib re're' , re' take re' naquisacham wo' wach take caj ixowonel ru̱c' cajawric ye'o̱j .

Chalic ma' Lu̱' je' wo' chic wili xic'u'lej take wi̱' : « Chacuy tak nimahc was tak nicha̱k' . Pan coric , re' hin ma' weht'alim ta chi re' po' nchel i winak re're' i nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios . Wi ta nak xk'ormojic wi̱n chi je' re' , re' hin ma' xnik'or ta nak i k'oric re're' maj re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' wili rik'or : “ Ma' ayak'abej pan awo̱k rilok'il i nahsil chipam atinami̱t , nqui rik'or , nqui xic'u'lej take wi̱' .

Tz'a̱b ru' re' take c'acharel re' take yibel wach quic'acharic , ch'i̱l take aj war , ch'i̱l take quibanic c'oyomal , ch'i̱l take aj cansanel , ch'i̱l wo' take quilok'onic tiyo̱x , re' chi'nchel re're' ch'i̱l wo' take quic'axbic wach i chucuj k'oric eh ma' nquicana̱' ta ribanaric ma'xta quic'uluric cho chipam tinamit re're' , naquicahnic la' lok chiri̱j .

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' je' re' na'n tak , wilic take quib xib no'jbal ma' npon ta chi niwach na'n tak , je' ricab take wili : Pe̱t , re' hat-tak c'ahchi' ayeb tak k'ab chi c'ahchi' quiwih'ic take c'acharel chaxilac tak re' ma' nca̱j ta quicana̱b take no'jbal xitijej cho Walac ru̱c' i Walaham najtir k'i̱j . Re' no'jbal re're' xiban chi re' take wich aj najtir k'i̱j ra̱' ri'sil take cho ma' Israhel , xik'ehbic pan mahc naxye'eric queh chi xquic'ux tiwic k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach tiyo̱x eh chi ri̱j re' xca'n i c'oyomal .

Hat-tak wich aj niminel , chi wi̱n hin ch'i̱l take wich'i̱l xa tanlic wo' chi keh chi xa nakatioxonic wo' johtok chiwach i Dios pan kati̱j . Ru'um aj re' kojtioxonic chawi̱j tak maj xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi' ricowjic ac'ux tak chipam i lok' laj niminic eh xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi' ac'axam awi̱b hat-tak aj niminel je' ricab wo' na'n tak cu̱c' take toco̱m chic .

Re' hat-tak aweht'alim tak chi coric chi nok ja' re' ta nak hat-tak aj niminel reh kAja̱w Jesus , timahcanic nak tak ru̱c' lok'onic tak tz'akoj tiyo̱x re' ma'xta bih jeno' c'uhbal nchalic ru̱c' i Dios nquik'or maj ma' quichol ta wo' k'oric .

Yu'na re' chic hat-tak bahilbe̱s , til nik'or aweh tak chi chac'ax wo' tak awehq'ue̱n chi coric je' ricab riwi̱' riban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric ku̱c' i hoj aj niminel reh . Je' re' nik'or maj re're' k'e̱' xojric'ax chi xik'ahsaj ri̱b pan quimic chiki̱j i hoj nok ja' nkanimej ta nak .

Cu̱c' chic take quibanic ti'c'axic aweh tak , re' wili jenaj chic no'jbal niyew aweh tak : Ma̱ban tak chic jelow-bal haj wilic i ti'c'axic nbanaric aweh tak re' la' hat-tak chatik tak ju' ribanaric i bano̱j re' nacoj tak rehtal chi holohic nquilow take c'acharel .

Je' aj re' k'uru' chanimej awi̱b tak chiwach i Dios re' xiq'uic na̱ rinimal wach rajawric eh cha'n tak re're' chi xa ch'ublic wach ac'ux tak reh chi re' Dios narijohsam wach awa'ric tak naponok i rik'ijil chi je' re' naric'uluric .

xa re' la' ru' to̱b ta je' re' xiban cu̱c' , ma' xicana̱' ta wo' ric'uhtjic i rajawric chi re're' i Dios chi quina̱ . Je' wo' ma' xicana̱' ta riye'eric cho rato'bil chi kana̱ i hoj chi'nchel c'acharel . Ru'um aj cho ric'axbal wilic chi kana̱ , re' Dios riyew cho jab narirak cho rik'ijil chiwach , je' wo' ricoj cho rik'ijil chi re' take tic naquiwachanic eh xa ma' nech' ta ti wach take katic nkamol , til q'uih la' wo' chic riyew cho keh chi suksbal cho kac'ux , nqui ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh queh .

Je' wo' chic , chipam i camanic re're' curman wo' chi re' quehq'ue̱n take aj to'o̱l coric ok wo' wach quino'jbal , ma' ok xa aj molol c'uta̱j take , ma' ok xa mahnic' take chi mahcanic quichol la' ok ribehsjic quicapew-bal eh chi xa naquiniminic chi manlic ru̱c' pa' bih ra̱j banjic .
Re' ixok re're' xwuy'ej chi narijalam nak wach rino'jbal xa re' la' ma' jaruj ra̱j ricana̱b ribanaric i mahc wilic wi̱' chi banoj c'oyomal .

Nok ar aj chic wilic ponok i Hero̱res , pa' bih riwi̱' naxchalic ric'a̱ cu̱c' take aj Ti̱ro ch'i̱l take aj Siron . Ru'um chi re' chi'nchel pa' bih queh nquic'ux , ar nelic je pa riyuk'ul Hero̱res , re' take c'acharel chipam i quib chi tinamit re're' xquituna̱' qui̱b eh xca'n jenaj wach quic'ux chi nacojic quik'o'rem i Hero̱res . Xa re' cok ru' reh chi xca'n canar oquic ru̱c' , pe̱t quik'unej wach chi tumi̱n i jenaj queh ajabe̱s qui'ilbic reh pa̱m ripa̱t Hero̱res Wala̱sto ribihnal , reh chi re're' naric'ambic cok queh ar . Naxc'amaric cok quibe̱h ru'um i Wala̱sto , re' take c'acharel reh quib chi tinamit re're' xquipahkaj reh Hero̱res chi naquicahnic pan sukquil c'uxlis

Chalic Jesus je' wili xic'u'lej take wi̱' : « Re' hin ma' re' ta jeno' ma' tob laj uxlabal nye'bic nik'orbal , re' la' wAja̱w Dios nye'bic nik'orbal eh ru'um re' , niyew johtok rilok'il ru̱c' c'uhbalanic niban xa re' la' to̱b ta je' re' niban , nitz'ujuric chic c'ahchi' abanam tak .
Nok wilco̱j chic nah ha' xuctic aj cho jenaj rinimal te̱w eh ru'um re're' xa naht chic nponic ribohl i ha' .

Ru'um aj re' chiwach take ti'c'axic nkac'ul ru'um reh kaniminic , re' wili nicapew-bal i hin chiri̱j re're' : Re' hoj aj niminel ma'xta bih ericamanej keh chi enkacoj rehtal take ti'c'axic nkac'ul , re' la' til k'e̱' wo' chic encamanic keh re' ricojoric rehtal i kalok'il nariye'eric naponok rik'ijil ric'uluric re' narilmijic wo' cu'um toco̱m chic c'acharel .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach , c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i wili reh chi na̱tikim tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus . Re're' wilic rajawric chi narik'oric chiki̱j chiwach Ajabe̱s Dios eh ru'um re're' na nk'oric chawi̱j tak , re' hat-tak cuyu̱j chic amahc tak .

Wih'ok wo' pan ac'ux chi ru̱c' i rajawric wilic xojrico'lej reh chi ma' eta nkac'ul i ti'c'axic ru'um reh kamahc eh re' kayuk'unjic xiban i Dios reh chi nakac'acharic chi saksamaj wach kano'jbal , re' wo' re' nc'uhtunic reh rinimal rajawric wilic . Je' aj re' , re' kaco'ljic ch'i̱l i kayuk'unjic xbanjic , re' wo' Dios xbanic , re' cok ru' ma' ru'um ta nchel chi holohic ta nak kojbanic xiban chi je' re' ru'um la' chi pa ra̱mna i Dios xasjic cho ribanaric xa ru'um reh ric'axbal wilic chi kana̱ . Je' re' nik'or maj nok cu ja' nch'ihquic ta nak cho i c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al , re' c'axbal re're' wilic chic cho pa ra̱mna i Dios chi naric'uhtam lok ru̱c' ric'ulic lok i kaK'atal K'oric Jesus .

Re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ ch'i̱l wo' take aj cha'janel c'amoj take je cu'um take c'amol be̱h re're' naxquilow chi re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to ra̱j nak rok'tam je i Jesus , xquiq'uer quichi̱' chi je' wili : « Re' Jesus re're' chacansaj eh til chacansaj wach curu̱s ! nqui take . Re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili quic'u'ljic xiban : « Re' hin ma'xta nirak jeno' mahc quimic ri̱j chiri̱j c'acharel wili . Re' cok ru' , wi ricansjic nawa̱j tak hat-tak , chac'am tak je eh re' ok hat-tak tiye'bok tak reh wach curu̱s , nqui queh .

Re' k'oro̱j wili chiri̱j i co'lbal riyew i Dios ru'um reh richak'lamil , xa nok wo' k'oro̱j cho ribiral cu'um take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios . Re' take re' naxik'oric cho chiri̱j i co'lbal re're' pe̱t xquiyew quic'ux chi ritijiljic ri̱j chi coric

Ayu' wach ac'al c'ahchi' ric'uluric chi yohbal wach take aj c'uhbalanel c'ahchi' quijot'om quicapew-bal take tinamit . Re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' aj niminel nak take cho , xa re' la' yu'na c'ahchi' quik'orom chi ma' coric ta chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xc'ulic china̱ ac'al wili chi je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj c'acharel . Ru̱c' aj k'oric nca'n take re' , re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi xa hab wach je' re' k'oric riban , re' c'acharel re're' xa aj k'etol wach rik'orbal i Jesus nok wilic .

Re' winak wili re' nc'ambic quibe̱h junch'uk chi aj niminel reh Jesus re' ribihnej chi aj Nasaret , re're' jenaj aj yojol c'uxlis chi keh hoj , xa je' na nchel ricab jeno' ya'bilal nok wilic maj xa haj pa' yu̱k' c'ahchi' rijohsam quic'a̱ take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel .

Chipam aj i c'uhbal re're' , nkarak jenaj tijbal c'axic nak cho rirakmajic chiri̱j cu rehtal xsakomsjic wach ru'um i Dios . Re' tijbal re're' , til pan coric nik'or aweh chi k'e̱' wo' chic curman chi birmajic maj re're' je' wili rik'or : « Naxilmijic chi xc'acharic ayu' wach ac'al je' ricab nc'acharic jenaj c'acharel , re' i Lok' laj Uxlabal xc'uhtunic lok reh chi nt'oric wach rino'jbal . Re' take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xquilow naxuctic wo' chic cho chi quixilac take camnak . Ru̱c' re're' xk'ormojic wo' ribiral queh take tinamit ma' re' ta ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel eh chi je' re' xa haj tinamit wilque̱b wi̱' take re' , wilic queh xiniminic reh ribiral re're' . Chiri̱j chic riwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al , xc'ulmujic wo' chic johtok ar pan taxa̱j , nqui tijbal re're' .

Je' wo' chic naxc'uluric re're' , ar pan taxa̱j xik'ehbic take cho nimak tak sak'wach chi quina̱ tinamit , ju'jun na quental rahlil ju'jun . Ru'um re're' , re' take tinamit xquitz'ujlom johtok i Dios ru'um riti'quil xbanaric queh maj re' sak'wach re're' jenaj rinimal ti'c'axic xiban queh .

Til je' re' naric'uluric maj re' Dios xik'or wo' cahnok chi re' hoj aj niminel nariyeb keh chi ekojc'acharic ar pan jenaj chic ye'a̱b re' nariwih'ic wi̱' jenaj ac' ac'al ch'i̱l jenaj ac' laj taxa̱j eh ru'um chi til je' re' xik'or , re' hoj c'ahchi' kuy'em chi naric'uluric i k'oro̱j cahnok ru'um .

Je' wo' chic , re' taxa̱j xic'ul reh je' ricab ric'ul jeno' hu̱j nanbotjic wach eh ayu' wach ac'al chi'nchel wach xc'uluric , je' ricab ru' chi re' take yu̱k' q'uixca̱b ch'i̱l take ye'a̱b pan tak yejal ha' , xsahchic quiwach ru'um chi xit'e'lejic .

Je' re' k'uru' ru̱c' i xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi xic'am na̱ haj wilic xa̱j i Dios , re're' xa junpech wo' xiyew ri̱b chi quimic eh xojricoj cok chiwach i Dios chi ritinami̱t lo̱k' chiwach .
Hat-tak wich aj niminel nwa̱j nik'orom je aweh tak chi re' hoj nanka'n kati̱j chiwach i Dios , xa eli̱c wo' kojtioxonic johtok chiwach chawi̱j hat-tak re' xa wilca̱t wo' tak pan kac'ux .

Ar ajic xwilow chi wilic jenaj tz'uklic nah jenaj cak ri̱j cawa̱y xye'eric reh pan k'ab jenaj ma' laj c'ul k'as re̱ ch'ihch' rehtalil i rajawric ye'o̱j reh chi ribanaric chi re' take c'acharel ma' eta chic quiwih'ic pan sukquil c'uxlis , re' la' chic i cansanic i̱b chi quibil qui̱b nariwih'ic . Nok ribiram chic i tak'anic xbanaric reh , re' tz'uklic china̱ i cawa̱y re're' xo̱j wo' .

Chi'nchel take aj niminel wilque̱b ri'sil ro̱k k'ab jeno' aj ehcham camanic eh nca'n quicamaj chi ma' tojo̱j ta take til ric'ul chi queh chi naquiyeb riwa'ric i ajabe̱s nchopbic quina̱ eh naquibirinic wo' k'oric chiwach reh chi ma' hab ta wach erik'or c'ahbilal chiri̱j i Dios on chiri̱j i c'uhtunic nka'n .

Je' wo' , ma̱ban tak chic chucuj k'oric chawach tak maj je' ricab nok re' hat-tak nawesaj tak lok i tz'akic laj tz'ih chawi̱j tak nok abanam tak chic i kahsanic ha' , je' wo' re' hat-tak xawesaj tak chic lok rij ac'ux tak i no'jbal na'n nak tak cho najtir k'i̱j re' xbanic nak cho chi xa'n tak cho i ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j .

xa re' la' to̱b ta wo' xa holohic chic take na'n tak , re' wili i mahc ma' ric'ul ta niwach chi na'n tak : Je' ricab xc'uluric cho najtir ru̱c' ixok Jesawel ribihnal , re' xicoj ri̱b chi chucul raj k'oro̱l i Dios , wilic wo' chaxilac tak jenaj ixok je' re' c'ahchi' ribanam eh re' hat-tak xa c'ahchi' wo' ayeb tak k'ab chi c'ahchi' ribanam i c'uhtunic re' riyew wi̱' k'ab chi enbanaric i c'oyomal eh chi ewo' nc'uxuric i tiwic k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach tiyo̱x , to̱b ta nchel re' c'uhtunic re're' xa rijot'oric quino'jbal take aj niminel c'ahchi' ribanam .

Chiqui̱j aj take c'acharel je' re' nca'n , re' Dios xa najtir wo' cho k'i̱j ritik'a̱b cho wach chi nariye'eric wo' quiwa'ric chi re' take re' naquiwih'ic chi coric wach quic'ux chiwach . Ru'um aj re' xa nok wo' sakomomaj cho wach chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios re' ribiral re're' eh je' wo' i ribiral nok junpech re' Dios je' wili xik'or reh ma' Awraham : “ Ru̱c' acuse'sjic i hat , chi'nchel take tinamit wach ac'al naquehtric wo' nicuse'sbal i hin , nqui cho reh .

Chi wilca̱t tak chipam i ti'c'axic re're' nipahkaj wo' aweh tak chi ma' niq'uic pan ac'ux tak i xik'or cho queh rac'u̱n najtir k'i̱j i k'atal k'oric ma' Salomon . Re' k'oric re're' , re' tz'ihmbimaj cahnok pan Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios re' wo' re' nk'ormojic aweh tak yu'na ru'um i Dios ru'um nok wilca̱t tak chic chi rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n . Je' aj wili rik'or i tz'ihmbimaj cahnok re're' : “ Hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n , ma' riban ta chi ma' enayew tak rilok'il i k'ilo̱j riyew aweh tak i Ajabe̱s Dios . Ma' riban wo' quib ac'ux wi tirik'il chi cow ,

Chiri̱j chic lok i k'oric re're' , re' wili jenaj chic tak'anic nwa̱j wo' nibanam aweh tak : Tibirinok tak k'oric chi quiwach take aj c'amol be̱h chipam animinic tak eh tiniminok wo' tak chi quiwach . Je' re' cha'n tak maj pan jenaj k'i̱j re' take re' naquiwih'ic chiwach i Dios re' narilmijic wi̱' wi xquinimej on ma' xquinimej ta i camanic ye'o̱j queh . Ru'um aj re' til chac'am tak na̱ i tak'anic niban je aweh tak reh chi je' re' naquicamanic wo' chi suk quic'ux eh ma' re' ta nchel ru̱c' i riti'quil quic'ux naquicamanic chaxilac tak ru'um nok re' no'jbal chi xa ch'i'c awi̱j tak xa ma'xta bih ericamanej aweh tak .
« Re' aj wo' Dios re're' xisach quiwach i wuku̱b queh q'uih ch'uk wach tinamit wilque̱b pa riyuk'ul i Canahan eh re' take ye'a̱b re're' xik'ahsaj queh take kama̱m kati't reh chi naquehcham .

Timote̱yo , wi xa hab wach c'ahchi' rik'orom jeno' toco̱m chic c'uhtunic je' ru̱c' ma' jenaj ta wach ru̱c' i nik'orom cho aweh eh chi re're' ma' riban ta wo' jenaj wach ru̱c' i coric laj tijinic nchalic ru̱c' i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , on ru̱c' take c'uhtunic je' ru̱c' rik'or keh nic' wach nakac'acharic chi holohic chiwach i Dios ,

Jenaj chic i pahkanic nanibanam , re' i wili : Wi xponic jeno' jot'o̱l laj aj tijinel awu̱c' tak chi rik'ormojic aweh tak jeno' toco̱m chic tijinic re' ma' rik'or ta chi re' Jesus xc'ulic wach ac'al chi til je' ricab kawi̱' i hoj c'acharel , ma̱k'or tak reh chi je' wili : « Hat c'ulu̱j chi suk ayu' chi na̱k'orom i tijbal nac'am cho keh , ma' tiqui tak reh . Je' re' ajic re' hat-tak ma̱c'ul tak i jot'o̱l laj aj tijinel re're' chipam i pa̱t namol wi̱' awi̱b tak chi niminic

Ru'um aj re' to̱b ta re' hoj c'ahchi' kac'ulum kac'axquilal ru'um reh chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , ma'xta bih nka̱j reh eh je' re' nik'or maj nic' pa' wach nok nkac'ul ti'c'axic je' wo' chic re' nkac'ul rinimal wach rito'bal i Dios nchalic chi kana̱ ru'um chi xa jenaj chic kawi̱' ru̱c' i Jesus .

Je' re' ajic k'e̱' ti' queh take aj tijinel re're' maj c'ahchi' quitahkem i rokbal i Cayin re' k'e̱' xixowej wach i richa̱k' eh c'ahchi' wo' ca'nam queh je' ricab xiban i Walaham re' xiban ric'uhtjic i ma' coric ta laj c'uhtunic xa reh chi naribihomric . K'e̱' ti' queh aj tijinel re're' k'uru' eh nica'pechej je rik'ormojic ru' maj c'ahchi' wo' quitahkem i rokbal i Coreh re' xik'ihtaj ri̱b chiwach i Dios . Ru'um chi je' re' no'jbal nca'n , re' take aj tijinel re're' narisahchic quiwach ru'um i Dios .

Je' re' nok re' take aj tijinel re're' ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j i k'oro̱j chiqui̱j take raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios . Chi je' re' quino'jbal nca'n queh je' ricab nca'n take chicop chi ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih nca'n . Je' wo' re' nik'or maj re' pa' bih npok' cho pan quic'ux ribanaric to̱b ta ma' nquirak ta chiri̱j , xa re' wo' re' nca'n ribanaric eh ru'um re're' nquik'ahsaj qui̱b chi ribanaric i mahc .

Re' ma' Noheh til xich'ica̱' wo' cho ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi re're' riban chi nmanlajic wach i pa' bih k'oro̱j cho ru'um . Je' re' nok naxk'ormojic reh ru'um i Dios chi wilic take ti'c'axic naric'ulmujic , re're' to̱b ta ma' ja' nponic ta nak rik'ijil chi narilmijic wach i ti'c'axic xinimej re' xk'ormojic reh eh xiyew ric'ux chi ritik'injic jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa pa̱t re' xcamanic chi co'lbal wi̱' ri̱b ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t . Re' rich'iquinjic ric'ux i ma' Noheh chiri̱j i Dios re' aj re' xbanic chi re' Dios xicana̱' chi xiquimic take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ma' xquich'ica̱' ta quic'ux chiri̱j . Ma' xa re' ta re' , ru'um la' chi je' re' xiban i ma' Noheh xye'eric reh chi co̱ch chi re' Dios rik'or chi re're' til coric cho wach ric'ux chiwach .

Je' re' nok re' pe̱t Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios wilic take cho tasbal pa̱m . Ar aj chipam i pe̱t tasbal re're' qui'oquic cok take aj k'ahsem si̱ chi'nchel k'i̱j chi ribanaric quicamaj chi k'ahsanic si̱ chiwach i Dios .

Chiri̱j aj chic re' , je' wili xik'or i Te̱wan queh : « Was tak nicha̱k' , re' hat-tak je' wo' acab tak take cho kama̱m kati't chi rik'ehtjic awi̱b tak chiwach rik'orbal i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios maj re' take re' , chi je' na nchel ma' ja' k'atoj ta lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal rehtalil chi naquilok'em wach i Dios , je' re' xca'n cho naxquicowsaj quic'ux eh ma' xquik'ochsaj ta qui̱b chiwach i Dios . Je' wo' chic , xquic'saj wo' lok rij quixiquin chaj bih xquik'or cho take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios .

Reh chi je' re' enbanjic , curman chi nareht'aljic i wili : Re' C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' xcanabjic ta cahnok cu'um ta nak queh i coric wach quibanic , xcanabjic la' cahnok chi ch'ukbal k'oric chi quina̱ take nquik'ihtaj qui̱b ch'i̱l take ma' nquibiraj ta k'oric chiwach i c'uhbal re're' . Je' wo' chic chi quixilac take re' wilque̱b wo' take je' wili quino'jbal : Re' take re' ma' coric ta quiwach ru'um i mahc nca'n , re' take ma' nquiyohlej ta wach i Dios ru'um chi ncahnic chi se'lbal pan nak'quiwach , re' take cansanel quitu̱t caja̱w eh ch'i̱l wo' take cansem cas quicha̱k' .

Najtir chic cho so' , re' hin xnitz'ihmbaj je aweh tak jenaj chic hu̱j re' xnik'or je wi̱' aweh tak chi re' hat-tak ma' eta riban chi enatuna̱' awi̱b tak cu̱c' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' suk queh ribanaric i c'oyomal .

Xa re' la' to̱b ta nchel je' re' riwi̱' cho nic'acharic najtir , re' kAja̱w Dios til wo' k'e̱' wo' chic riquetelbal cho chi nina̱ maj re're' xirichih cho nok cu ja' ta wo' quiriyew wach sakom i nitu̱t eh re' wo' re' xbanic chi re' hin xinoquic chi rinimjic i Jesus . Ru̱c' re're' naxponic wo' chiwach i Dios ,

Nok je' re' niban , re' aj wili nc'uluric wu̱c' : Re' hin ma' nirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih riwi̱' naniban i mahc eh je' re' nik'or maj ma' nirak ta chiri̱j chaj wa'ric chi re' hin nok nwa̱j nak nibanam i haj wilic i tare̱t , ma' re' ta wo' chic re' niban , re' la' chic i mahc re' ma' nwa̱j ta nak ribanaric re' chic re' niban .

Je' re' k'uru' chayohbalej awi̱b tak chi ma' eta na'n tak chi je' re' , re' la' wili cha'n tak : Chatik tak ju' ac'acharic tak chi c'ahchi' ac'ulum tak riman rato'bil i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh c'ahchi' ok wo' rimanlajic wach awu̱c' tak i reht'aljic pa̱m rino'jbal . Re' Jesus , re're' aj Co'lonel eh je' wo' Ajabe̱s nok wilic . Ru'um aj re' ye'erok rilok'il chipam take k'i̱j wili eh je' wo' chiwach rik'ijil i junelic c'acharic . Je' ta nak re' banarok .

Je' re' ajic , til je' re' kawi̱' chawach tak maj q'uihal aweh tak quik'oric chi re' hoj ma'xta so' kano'jbal ru'um nok re' ricamaj i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric c'ahchi' ka'nam . Tz'a̱b ru' chawi̱j tak ma' je' ta re' nak'or tak nok nak'or chi nanimej tak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , til la' napahba̱' awi̱b tak chi wilic ano'jbal tak ru'um . Je' wo' chic , wilic wo' aweh tak quik'oric chi re' hoj ma'xta so' kajawric chi ribanaric ricamaj i Jesus eh tz'a̱b ru' chawi̱j hat-tak ma' je' ta re' nak'or tak , til naq'uihsaj la' awi̱b tak chi til wilic awu̱c' tak i rajawric i Dios . Je' wo' chic , til nacapaj chi k'e̱' alok'il tak , xa re' la' chic nok wilic take je' re' nquicapaj chiki̱j , chaweh hat-tak tare̱t chi ma' eta nquiyew kalok'il .

Je' re' k'uru' chi'nchel i pajaric ricoj pan abe̱h tak aj Yahm , chacuy tak ransil ru̱c' i ricowil acapew-bal tak wilic ru'um rich'iquinjic ac'ux na'n tak chiri̱j i Dios eh cha'n tak chi je' re' chi c'ahchi' ric'ulic pan ac'ux tak chi je' wo' re' ricuyuric ti'c'axic nca'n take toco̱m awich aj niminel tak re' c'acharic nca'n pan tak toco̱m chic ye'a̱b chi junsut wach ac'al .

Re' hat-tak c'acharel , re' hat-tak ehchemaj chi camanic chanimej wo' tak take qui'ehchenic aweh tak chi camanic ayu' wach ac'al ru̱c' chi'nchel pa' bih tiquitak'a̱' tak wi̱' , ma' ok xa re' tiniminic tak nok nawilow tak quiwach chi wilque̱b cok awu̱c' tak je' ricab nca'n take xa nca'n chic quiwach chiwach i aj ehcham camanic xa re' la' nok ma' hab ta chic wilic cu̱c' ma'xta chic bih nca'n . Re' hat-tak k'uru' ticamanok tak chi coric ru̱c' ac'ux tak ru'um reh riyohbaljic i Dios wilic awu̱c' tak eh ma̱ban tak chi xa hat-tak k'itk'it ,
