« Re' chic take lajeb chi ruc'a' i ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop xawilow wach , rijalwachej take lajeb chi k'atal k'oric ma' ja' nquic'ul ta cajawric chi k'atal k'oric , xa re' la' naquic'ul cajawric xa junc'am wo' ti nariwih'ic cajawric chi k'atoj k'oric quich'i̱l i ma' laj cak ri̱j chicop .

Ru'um aj re're' , re' Dios xiban chi ma' re' ta quino'jbal take ma' quiniminic reh Jesus wilic ku̱c' , wilic la' ku̱c' i Lok' laj rUxlabal eh je' re' xiban reh chi nakeht'alim wo' haj wilic take cuse'sbal xiyew keh ru'um reh ric'axbal .

Yu'na chawi̱j chic hat-tak bihomak re' ma' re' ta hat-tak aj niminel nwa̱j k'oric . Je' nok chabiraj tak i wili : Ti'bok ac'ux tak eh chayot' wo' ac'ux tak chi ok'ic maj jenaj ti'c'axic chalic reh chana̱ tak .

Je' re' k'uru' ru'um chi weht'alim chi'nchel re're' , til nik'or je aweh tak chi ma' tiyo'jic tak nachalok chana̱ tak i ti'c'axic re' naricojom i aj Yahm chana̱ tak . Je' re' nik'or maj re're' naca̱t tak ripajam pan animinic tak eh ru'um chi na̱cuyum tak ransil apajaric tak , re' aj Yahm naribanam chi wilic ju'jun aweh tak naritz'aparic pan che̱' . Ru'um aj re' , lajeb aj k'i̱j na̱wih'ic tak pan ti'c'axic , xa re' la' hat-tak , chacowej ac'ux tak chi rinimjic i kAja̱w eh je' re' cha'n tak cu rehtal je aquimic tak . Wi je' re' xa'n tak re' hin naniyeb aweh tak chi aco̱ch chi etic'acharic tak chi junelic , nqui xik'or wi̱n .

Je' re' ajic Timote̱yo raj camanom i Dios , re' hat reh chi ma' eta nac'ul aweh chi je' re' , til nipahkaj aweh chi ma̱ban aweh i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal re're' , re' la' cha'n chak'eb lok rij ac'ux . Je' wo' chic chachop ac'ux chi c'acharic ru̱c' coric wach c'uxlis eh c'ahchi' ok ac'amam na̱ take c'uhbal reh kaniminic . Je' wo' chic chatik ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux chiri̱j i Dios ch'i̱l ric'axaric take awas acha̱k' . Ma' xa re' ta re're' , je' la' wo' wilic ok wo' awuyu'nbal ru̱c' i Dios chi ricuyuric take ti'c'axic nc'ulic lok ru'um reh kaniminic eh xa hat ok wo' chak'lam ru̱c' ano'jbal cu̱c' chi'nchel take c'acharel .

Ma' xa ru'um ta re're' narichalic rinimal i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak , je' la' wo' ru'um take wili : Ayu' wach ac'al re' hat-tak xatc'acharic tak chi suk , xa'n wo' tak i ra̱j ma' raj ta banaric . Ru'um aj reh suk laj c'acharic wilca̱t tak wi̱' , narichalic chana̱ tak i ti'c'axic chi ma' re' ta so' wilic pan ac'ux tak je' ricab nc'uluric cu̱c' take wacax nok xa k'ena' chic take , xa nic' yu' ti quic'amaric je pan cansbal chicop .

Je' wo' chic , re' tz'uka̱b re're' sutumaj ri̱j chi quejeb rica'winak ( 24 ) chi tz'uka̱b re' tz'ukulque̱b wi̱' quejeb rica'winak ( 24 ) chi c'acharel . Re' quiwa'ric take c'acharel re're' je' ricab i quiwa'ric take c'acharel rijeb chic take eh re' quiso' wilic chiqui̱j til xa sakp'onic chic eh wilic ju'jun coten k'an woric laj ch'ihch' wach quina̱ .

Re' take c'acharel wilque̱b chipam i tinamit re're' k'e̱' wo' chic xquinimsaj qui̱b eh k'e̱' sukquilal i xic'acharic wi̱' . Je' ricab rinimal wach no'jbal xca'n re're' , je' ok wo' re' rinimal wach ok'ic ch'i̱l rinimal wach ti'c'axic chacoj chi quina̱ . Je' wo' chic , re' take re' je' wili nquik'or pan quic'ux : ‘ Re' katinamital wilic rajawric chi quina̱ chi'nchel tinamit eh je' ricab chi ma'xta bih jeno' ti' rilow wach jeno' ma' re' ta cahnel ixok , ma'xta wo' kilom wach jeno' ti'c'axic , nqui xquik'or .

Je' wo' re' hat-tak bahilbe̱s , til nik'or aweh tak chi chasic' ri̱j ano'jbal tak chi rirakmajic chiri̱j ricorquilal i c'acharic ra̱j banaric ru̱c' awehq'ue̱n tak . Coric ru' , to̱b ta nchel re' ricowil quiti'jolal quibakil ma' jenaj ta wach ru̱c' ricowil ati'jolal abakil hat-tak , curman chi chayew tak quilok'il maj re' take re' awich'i̱l hat-tak awehcham wo' tak i xiban i Dios wili ru'um chi kojric'ax : Chi ekojc'acharic chi junelic . Je' re' ajic tic'acharok tak chi coric cu̱c' reh chi ma' eta npitiric re' xa pa' jaric napahkaj tak johtok pan ati̱j tak .

Je' ok re' ca'n maj re' hin ma' niyew ta k'ab chi re' take ixok equi'oquic chi c'uhtunic china̱ i winak on chi enwih'ic rajawric china̱ chi ribanjic jeno' c'uhtunic . Junpech wo' chic nik'or aweh tak i wili : Tare̱t chi re' take ixok quiwih'ok chi quixilac take winak chi tijinic xa re' la' xa birinel ok take .

Je' re' k'uru' chatik ju' richoporic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Dios re' xyuk'unic cho aweh tak reh chi na̱wih'ic tak pan jenaj wach c'acharic ch'i̱l i rAc'u̱n , re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh manlic Ajabe̱s chi kana̱ . Je' re' cha'n tak k'uru' maj re're' til riban chi nmanlajic wach i nic' nimal rik'or chi naribanam .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' hat-tak , hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios yu'na maj re' Dios xatriyuk'ej wo' tak cho reh chi na̱c'acharic tak chi ma' re' ta chic i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses wilic rajawric chana̱ tak . Re' cok ru' , ru̱c' i xik'or re're' ma̱capaj tak chi yu'na chi xa ye'o̱j chic k'ab aweh tak chi ribanaric i pa' bih ma' holohic ta rotowej cho ati'jolal tak . Ma'xta , re' la' cha'n tak tic'acharok tak ru̱c' jenaj c'axoj i̱b chi awibil awi̱b tak .

Chi'nchel i pa' bih k'oro̱j chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios , re're' nbanic chi re' take c'acharel equic'acharic chi tehlic qui̱j chi ma' eta nch'ukuric k'oric chi quina̱ eh re' wo' re' naricamanic reh Dios chi narik'orom wi re' hoj , hoj aj mahc on ma'xta . Ru'um aj re' nipahkaj aweh tak chi coric ok wach ak'orbal eh holohic ok wo' wach abano̱j tak cu̱c' chi'nchel take c'acharel .
Je' wo' , wilic wo' rehreh wach camanic chi naka'nam pan kaniminic xa re' la' xa chiwach wo' i jenaj chi Lok' laj Ajabe̱s c'ahchi' kacamanic .

Re' chi'nchel xye'eric re're' queh take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wo' Dios xbanic eh ma' xa ta re're' , re' la' Dios xchihbic wo' cho queh take kama̱m kati't reh chi re' take re' naquiwih'ic chi kara'il i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel . Chiri̱j wili xiban wo' chi xye'eric keh i nim kalok'il wili : Chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric naxchalic asjok ayu' wach ac'al ku̱c' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xchalic rira'il . Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' je' re' asjic xiban i Jesus , til re're' i Dios re' wilic rajawric china̱ chi'nchel eh ru'um re' , re' hin nik'or chi tare̱t chi enye'eric rilok'il chi junelic k'i̱j sakom .

Ma' xa ta re're' , je' la' wo' nok re' hoj nkac'ul take ti'c'axic ru'um reh rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i kAja̱w Jesus , re' Dios riyew k'ab keh chi je' re' nkac'ul reh chi ru̱c' i kacamaj re' hat-tak enarak tak ricowil ac'ux tak eh enco'ljic wo' ri̱j i ch'iquinic c'uxlis na'n tak chiri̱j i Jesus . Je' re' nok reh chi enarak tak ricowil ac'ux tak nanchal i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak , re're' ncamanic aweh tak chi cowsbal ac'ux hat-tak eh ncamanic wo' chi co'lbal ri̱j animinic tak chiri̱j i Jesus .

Je' aj re' ru' re' kak'orbal nkak'or aweh tak i hoj til coric wach maj re' ncojbic keh hoj ch'i̱l hat-tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh re' xpahbanic wo' keh chi hoj aj k'orol ric'uhbal , re' wo' i Dios .

Chiri̱j re' , xibiraj wo' chic rica'pech k'oric chi je' wili : « Luch , eriban chi enac'ux take chicop re're' ru'um nok re' rik'or i Dios yu'na chi ta chic re̱t chi c'uxuric , ma' ric'ul ta chic chi enak'or i hat chi ma' tare̱t ta chi c'uxuric , nqui wo' chic xibiraj .

« Chi je' re' k'uru' , re' aj wili naric'uluric ru̱c' i tinamit Wawilo̱nya re're' : Re' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al re' xca'n jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' aj Wawilo̱nya chi xca'n i c'ahbilal eh je' wo' chi xca'n i c'oyomal , re' take re' nacok'ic ru'um riti'quilal quic'ux chiri̱j i tinamit re're' naquilow i risibil c'ahchi' rijohtic ru'um reh i c'ahtic c'ahchi' ric'ulum .

Chalic Jesus je' wili xik'or : « Re' hin nanic'uhtam wi̱b aweh tak ru'um nok re' hat-tak ti' quinawic'raj tak eh hab wach ti' quiric'raj eh riban haj wilic rik'or i niC'uhbal , re're' ti' enic'rijic ru'um i wAja̱w . Ru'um aj re' , re' hin ch'i̱l i wAja̱w nakachalic chi patanic pa ra̱mna .

Je' re' ajic re' ric'axbal i Dios re're' , re' wili nc'utunic wi̱' : Chi re're' xitak'a̱' cho rAc'u̱n chi xquimic chiki̱j chi tojbal wach i kamahc eh je' re' xiban ru'um chi k'e̱' rinimal cho ric'axbal chi kana̱ , ma' ru'um ta nchel chi re' hoj c'ahchi' kac'axam i Dios .

Tz'a̱b ru' , wi xa kojc'acharic wo' pan coric je' ricab riwi̱' ric'acharic i Dios chi xa re' wo' i coric riban ribanaric ra̱j rik'orom chi til wilco̱j wo' pan jenaj wach c'uxlis quich'i̱l take kas kacha̱k' je' wo' ru̱c' i Dios eh ru'um re' , wi xojmahcanic chi quiwach i kas kacha̱k' on chiwach i Dios , re're' ericuy kamahc wi xkapahkaj reh chi naricuyum kamahc . Ru'um aj wo' re' , re' kAja̱w Jesus re' rAc'u̱n i Dios re' Pahbamaj wo' chi K'atal K'oric , xquimic reh chi re' hoj ekojcahnic chi ma'xta chic kamahc chiwach i Dios .

Je' aj re' k'uru' hat-tak aj Cala̱sya , ru'um chi'nchel ribanam i Dios reh chi xiban chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n , nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' riban ta chi cu ti c'acharic tak chi rehquen rajawric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses je' ricab nok jeno' aj camanom choplic na̱ ric'acharic ru'um ajabe̱s aj ehcham camanic . Je' re' nipahkaj aweh tak maj re' hat-tak yu'na hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chi manlic eh ru'um re' , nic' pa' nimal rik'orbal riyeb cho Dios queh take rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n na̱wehtric wo' tak ru̱c' re're' .

Ra̱j la' naxk'oric cho ru̱c' rAc'u̱n , je' wili tz'ihmbimaj chi xik'or reh : “ Re' hat re' wilca̱t wo' chi hat Dios chi junelic k'i̱j sakom , wilic awajawric chi k'atoj k'oric eh ma' haj ta ticalajic nech' ok ru̱c' i k'atoj k'oric na'n .

Re' take nahsil chi kaxilac i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' wili xquik'or reh : « Re' hoj naca̱t kayeb chi abaj ma' ru'um ta take holohic laj bano̱j i na'n , naca̱t la' kayeb chi abaj ru'um chi re' hat napahba̱' awi̱b chi hat Dios eh xa hab wach winak riban je' ricab na'n i hat riyak'abej pa ro̱k i Dios , nqui take reh .

« Je' re' k'uru' , re' take c'acharel nquilok'ej wach i chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal eh riban wo' chi re' take c'acharel nquilok'ej wach i tiyo̱x re' tik'imaj ru̱c' rilbal i ma' laj chicop re're' , on re' take nquic'ul rehtalil i ribihnal i chicop re're' , nic' pa' q'uihal take c'acharel re're' ma' jaruj ta enquicana̱' ric'ulmujic i ti'c'axic . Je' ricab nok njohtic i risibil i k'a̱k' je' wo' re' naca'nam take c'acharel ru'um reh ric'uluric i ti'c'axic chi junelic i k'i̱j sakom , chi k'i̱j chi ak'ab narijohtic tok pan taxa̱j i riq'ueric quichi̱' naca'nam , nqui xik'or .
Re' chic yu'na nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi re' Dios xiquetelej cho kawach i hoj eh xojripahba̱' chi hoj aj k'orol riC'uhbal . Ru'um aj re' , re' hoj ma' nkapoh'aj ta kac'ux

Ru̱c' re're' ewo' riban chi ch'iclic kac'ux enkak'or je' ricab i k'oro̱j cho ru'um i k'atal k'oric ma' Tawiy naxik'or cho chi je' wili : “ Re' Ajabe̱s Dios re're' aj to'bonel wi̱n eh ru'um aj wo' re' xa ma'xta so' bih quinyo'jic wi̱' ru'um nok ma' eta riban chi jeno' c'acharel npitbic wi̱n chi enic'ul ricuse'sbal i Dios , nqui xik'or cho .

Je' re' k'uru' ma' riban ta chi xa hab wach erinimsaj ri̱b xa ru'um chi riban on ma' riban ta ric'uxuric re're' . Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab i c'acharel re' ric'ux i tiwic ru'um ric'raj chi tare̱t chi c'uxuric , ma' riban ta chi rich'uk k'oric china̱ i rich aj niminel chi ma' riwi̱' ta c'ahchi' ribanam nok ma' ric'ux ta i tiwic . Je' wo' re' i c'acharel re' ma' ric'ux ta tiwic ma' riban ta wo' chi rik'or chi mahc i c'uxuj tiwic maj re' Dios xa ric'ul wo' i c'acharel to̱b ta ric'ux on ma' ric'ux i tiwic .

Re' ok Dios ye'bok ricowil kac'ux chi ma' eta kojch'i'tjic . Re' ok re' ye'bok ano'jbal tak chi atobjic tak chi wih'ic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis chawibil awi̱b tak chipam rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Je' re' ajic re' Jesus ma' je' ta ricab take toco̱m chic nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ . Nik'or wo' chic chi je' re' maj re' take re' curman chi kalakal xquicansaj cho take chicop chi pahkbal cuybal quimahc chiwach i Dios eh cu re' aj chic ru' chiri̱j chic quimahc i tinamit quicansaj cho take chicop chi si̱ chiwach i Dios . Raj chic yu'na chi jelow-bal take chicop quicansjic eli̱c ha̱b , re' Jesus xiyew ri̱b pan quimic wach curu̱s eh yu'na johtok chi junelic , ru̱c' i riquimic re' xa junpech wo' xic'ul , re' wo' re' ncamanic chi cuybal quimahc take tinamit chiwach i Dios .

Je' ricab wi hab wach jeno' wilic chi'nchel reh ayu' wach ac'al eh wi rilow i ras richa̱k' chi pan niba'il wilic chito'bej ru' . Raj la' wi re' wilic chi'nchel reh ayu' wach ac'al xa ta nak nc'uyu'jic so' i ra̱mna chi ritobjic , nic' wach nachik'or chi re' Dios ncamanic pa ra̱mna chi ric'axaric take ras richa̱k' ?
Je' re' k'uru' til wo' chic ch'iclic kac'ux ru̱c' i Dios eh re' hoj xa nka̱j nak chic kacana̱b i kati'jolal wili reh chi ar nak chic ekoj-o̱j c'acharok ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus .

Was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak , re' hat-tak ar wilca̱t tak ponok pan tak toco̱m chic tinamit re' ma' re' ta atinamital tak . Re' wilca̱t tak ponok ar k'uru' , nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱yew tak k'ab chi wilic awu̱c' tak re' c'ahbilal nbanic chi nawotowej tak ribanaric i mahc eh re' npitbic aweh tak reh chi ma' eta na'n tak i coric laj bano̱j .
Je' wo' chayew alok'il chawibil awi̱b tak , chac'ax tak take awich aj niminel , chayohbalej tak wach i Dios eh chayew wo' tak rilok'il i c'acharel nk'atbic k'oric chana̱ tak .

Naxilow chi je' re' i Moyses , je' wili xik'or pa ric'ux : ‹ Ru̱c' xniban wili , naquirakam chiri̱j take was nicha̱k' chi ru̱c' wo̱k nik'ab i hin re' Dios naresam take pan ti'c'axic , nqui xik'or pa ric'ux . « Re' take ras richa̱k' ma' xquirak ta chiri̱j chi je' re' .

Re' aj take k'oric wili oxpech rik'ormojic nanibanam je aweh tak : Chaco'lej awi̱b tak ! Til chaco'lej awi̱b tak ! Eh til wo' chic chaco'lej awi̱b tak chi quiwach take c'ahbil laj c'uhbalanel re' nquicapaj chi re' take quiniminic reh Dios riwi̱' chi queh chi narik'ataric lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal . Re' take c'uhbalanel re're' , xa je' quicab take josk' laj tz'i' chi xa ti'c'axic nquicoj wi̱' take c'acharel nquitiw .

Je' wo' , re' take aj c'uhbalanel re're' to̱b ta nquik'or chi nquinimej i Dios , xa aj chucul k'oric quicahnic take wi̱' . Je' re' nik'or maj ru̱c' quibano̱j nc'uhtunic lok chi ma' nquinimej ta i Dios . Je' wo' , xa pok'bal xa'aw wach i no'jbal nca'n chiwach i Dios eh xa na ru' ma' nquibiraj ta chic k'oric chiwach , ma' wo' nca'n jeno' ato̱b laj bano̱j cu̱c' cas quicha̱k' .

Je' re' nik'or maj re' wili nina'bej chiqui̱j take c'acharel re're' : Chi re' take re' til nca̱j quinimem i Dios xa re' la' to̱b ta chiwach i Dios riwi̱' nak chi queh chi naquiniminic chiwach , ma' nquirak ta wo' chiri̱j re're' .

Je' wo' chic nok re're' xa c'ahchi' wo' riyeb cho ricowil kac'ux chipam chi'nchel kac'axquilal kati'quilal koj-iq'uic wi̱' , re' hoj ewo' nkayew ricowil quic'ux take kas kacha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus wilque̱b pan ti'c'axic on pan ti'quil c'uxlis , je' ricab c'ahchi' nic'ulum i hin chipam rinimjic i Dios chi ru̱c' i ricowil nic'ux riyew cho ru' , re' wo' chic re' nye'bic nicowil i hin chi riye'eric ricowil quic'ux take wilque̱b pan c'axquilal pan ti'quilal .

Tz'a̱b ru' re' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or keh i ricorquilal eh ru'um re' curman chi cha'n ric'uhtjic chi coric . Ma' xa re' ta re' ra̱j banaric ra̱j la' wo' chi ru̱c' chi'nchel awa̱mna cha'n acamaj reh chi re' Dios erik'or chipam i k'i̱j re' natiwih'ok wi̱' chiwach chi re' hat k'e̱' tare̱t i camanic xa'n eh je' wo' reh chi etiwih'ic chiwach i Dios je' ricab i jenaj aj camanom re' naxwih'ic chiwach rajabe̱s ma' xq'uix'ic ta chi rik'ormojic reh nic' wach i camanic xiban .

maj re' c'acharel re're' naructic chi rik'ormojic chi k'e̱' wo' rinimal rilok'il chiwach rilok'il i Dios , on chiwach rilok'il take tz'akoj tiyo̱x lok'omaj wach cu'um toco̱m chic c'acharel . Ma' xa re' ta re' riwi̱' chi naric'ulum ti'c'axic , je' la' wo' ru'um chi nok tz'uklic chic chipam i ye'a̱b wilic chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios , re' c'acharel re're' ma' xa re' ta naricojom ri̱b chi quijelow-bal take pa reh chic tiyo̱x nquilok'ej wach take c'acharel je' la' wo' naritz'akam wo' ri̱b chi re're' til Dios . Ar aj ru' , re're' ma' xa ta naritak'a̱b rik'ormojic chi ma'xta chic riye'eric quilok'il take tiyo̱x lok'omaj cu'um take c'acharel , je' la' wo' naritak'a̱b wo' rik'ormojic chi ma'xta chic riye'eric rilok'il Dios .

Je' wo' re' hat-tak tutbe̱s ajabe̱s , ma̱johsaj tak quic'a̱ awac'u̱n awixk'u̱n tak , re' la' cha'n tak chac'am tak quibe̱h ru̱c' i c'acharic nponic chiwach i kAja̱w eh chak'il wo' tak take pa ricorquil ru̱c' i no'jbal riyew aweh tak i Jesus .

Je' re' k'uru' to̱b ta coric chi wilic take ti'c'axic chi kana̱ , re' hoj xa nkacuy wo' ransil eh ma' nkapoh'aj ta wo' kac'ux chiri̱j kaniminic maj re' Jesus re' xa kojric'ax wo' , re' wo' re' ento'bonic keh .

xojk'ehbic wach ac'al eh ar xnibiraj chi jenaj xk'oric cho chi je' wili pan k'oric hewre̱yo re' kak'orbal hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel : ‹ Chabiraj i nanik'orom aweh wili hat Sa̱wlo : Chacana̱' ribanaric i ti'c'axic na'n wi̱n ru̱c' ribanaric ti'c'axic queh waj tahkanel maj xa awi̱b c'ahchi' ayeb chi ti' ru̱c' i c'ahchi' abanam re're' , xa je' na nchel nac'ul aweh je' ricab ric'ul jeno' bo̱yex chi xa ri̱b riyew chi ti' nariyak' je i k'as ju' ch'ihch' tok'bal reh , nqui xnibiraj .

Re' hin weht'alim nic' nimal ti'c'axic c'ahchi' ac'ulum tak . Weht'alim wo' chi to̱b ta xatniba'ric tak ma' xatcahnic ta tak chi je' re' ru'um nok re' hat-tak , hat-tak biho̱m chi niwach ru̱c' take q'uihal cuse'sbal ye'o̱j aweh tak . Je' wo' chic , weht'alim wo' chi ma' ricorquilal ta c'ahchi' rik'ormojic chawi̱j tak cu'um take c'acharel nquitz'ak qui̱b chi ritinami̱t i Dios take xa re' la' ma' re' ta wo' ritinami̱t i Dios take , ritinami̱t la' i aj Yahm take ru'um chi nanquimol wo' qui̱b pan ye'a̱b re' ntijiljic wi̱' ri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , re' wo' rino'jbal aj Yahm no̱j quitijej ri̱j .
Je' wo' , re're' ma' wo' nsukbic ta ric'ux nok jeno' ras richa̱k' riban i c'ahbilal , re' la' ribanaric i coric wach no'jbal nsukbic wi̱' ric'ux .

Je' aj re' k'uru' chak'eb lok chiri̱j ac'ux tak chi'nchel i c'ahbilal ch'i̱l i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal nca'n ribanaric q'uihal take c'acharel eh ru̱c' ok wo' ch'ublic laj no'jbal cha'n tak ribanaric haj wilic k'oro̱j chipam riC'uhbal i Dios re' k'orel nic' pa' wach xicoj pan awa̱mna tak maj re' ricojoric wach i c'uhbal re're' enbanic chi etico'ljic tak .

Chi je' aj re' xa̱j , pan pe̱t cho re' hin re' xinp'utbic cho reh c'uhbalanic chaxilac tak , xniban je' na ricab riban jeno' aj tico̱l naritic jok i rabi̱x . Chiri̱j chic ru' , re' chic Apo̱los ru̱c' ricamaj xiban chaxilac tak chi ritikmijic ju' rik'ormojic riC'uhbal i Dios , re're' xiban je' na ricab jenaj winak xa chic re' ritikmijic ju' riq'uihsjic i tic riban ru̱c' rit'aksjic . Je' aj re' ru' camanic xka'n i hoj xa re' la' re' riye'eric ricowil ac'ux tak ma' re' ta hoj xojbanic , til la' re' i Dios c'ahchi' ribanic je' ricab wo' nc'uluric ru̱c' i tic chi re' wo' re' nbanic chi re' take re' quic'acharic .

Chiri̱j wili re' pe̱t aj tz'e' wa̱ch xo̱j , jenaj wo' chic raj tz'e' wa̱ch i Dios xchalic . Re're' xk'oric cho chi je' wili : « Xsahchic chic wach rinimal tinamit re' jalwachamaj ru̱c' i tinamit Wawilo̱nya ribihnal . Re' take c'acharel chipam i tinamit wili xic'ambic quibe̱h take chi'nchel nimak tak tinamit chi xquicana̱' rilok'onjic wach i Dios xa je' na ricab xixohc'saj take tinamit chi quic'amaric je take pan c'oyomal , nqui xik'or .

« Je' re' k'uru' ti' chawic'raj awi̱b chawach tak eh wi re' hat-tak enac'ax awi̱b tak je' ricab nik'orom chic lok , re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi re' hat-tak , hat-tak wich k'orom chi ric'uhtjic i c'axoj i̱b

Je' re' ajic was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach , ru'um chi re' hat-tak narak tak chic chiri̱j chi re' Jesus re're' i manlic wo' Dios chi kana̱ i hoj , chayohbalej awi̱b tak reh no'jbal chi lok'onic wach tz'akoj tiyo̱x nca'n take tinamit wach ac'al . Re' wili coric laj k'oric nik'or je aweh tak was tak nicha̱k' .

Je' re' cha'n maj ma' xa re' ta re' c'ahbil laj no'jbal nca'n , je' la' wo' nca'n ribanaric take wili : Naqui'oquic chi c'uhtunic xa suk chic wach k'oric nca'n reh chi naca'nam canar oquic pan quipa̱t take aj niminel . Ru'um chi chipam take pa̱t re're' wilic pech wilic take ixok ma'xta so' quino'jbal chi rirakmajic chiri̱j i c'ahbil laj c'uhtunic nca'n take c'acharel re're' , re' take ixok je' ricab re're' quikajic chipam i quic'uhtunic take c'acharel re're' . Re' wili nc'uluric pan tak pa̱t re' wilque̱b wi̱' take ixok re' behsemaj quicapew-bal chi ribanaric i mahc eh xa quimahcanic wo' , to̱b ta quicahnic chi ma' suk ta pa̱m i ca̱mna .

Chi je' aj re' ma' nkacana̱' tak ki̱b chi nakajot'oric , re' la' ka'n tak til kojk'orok tak ru̱c' i ricorquilal nchalic ru̱c' i Dios . Je' re' ka'n tak chi c'ahchi' wo' kac'uhtam i chak'lamil chi kibil ki̱b reh chi re' kano'jbal re' nc'utunic lok wi̱' nic' wach riwi̱' kac'acharic , enq'uihic wach eh eriban jenaj wach ru̱c' rino'jbal kanahsil i hoj aj niminel re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Je' wo' chic , chatik tak ju' richoporic ac'ux tak chi wih'ic pan jenaj wach sukquil c'uxlis re' rituna̱' wi̱' wach ac'ux tak i Lok' laj Uxlabal . Re're' enarak tak wi re' hat-tak na̱c'acharic tak pan sukquilal laj c'uxlis chaxilac tak .

Re' Sa̱wlo chi xa sahchanak chic ric'ux je' wili xik'or reh : « Ajabe̱s , hab wach i hat ? nqui reh . Re' nk'o'ronic cho reh je' wili xik'or cho reh : « Re' hin , hin i Jesus , nqui cho reh . Chiri̱j re' xik'or wo' chic cho reh chi je' wili : « Sa̱wlo , je' ricab jeno' bo̱yex chi xa ri̱b riyew chi ti' nariyak' je i k'as ju' ch'ihch' je' wo' re' nc'uluric awu̱c' hat , xa awi̱b c'ahchi' ayeb chi ti' ru̱c' i ti'c'axic c'ahchi' abanam wi̱n , nqui reh .

re' la' cha'n tak chayew tak rilok'il i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' wo' chic , xa eli̱c ok tikilca̱t tak chi k'oric cu̱c' take c'acharel nquipahkaj quino'jbal aweh tak chiri̱j i niminic re' c'ahchi'ca̱t tak eh nacha'n tak quic'u'ljic tik'orok tak cu̱c' pan chak'lamil eh je' wo' pa ricorquilal .

Ar ajic xk'o'rjic wo' chic cho ru'um i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Dios chi je' wili : ‹ Moyses , re' ye'a̱b pa'alca̱t wi̱' ayu' , re're' jenaj ye'a̱b lo̱k' reh lok'onbal wi̱n . Chawesaj lok aper-xijab k'uru' rehtalil chi c'ahchi' ayeb nilok'il , nqui xik'or cho reh .

Ru'um aj re' , re' hin nik'or je aweh tak chi chac'am tak na̱ chi coric i tijbal ap'utum tak cho ribirmijic pan p'utbal cho reh animinic tak . Wi xac'am tak na̱ i tijbal re're' chi coric , re' hat-tak na̱wih'ic tak pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' Ac'unbe̱s Dios ch'i̱l wo' ru̱c' Ajabe̱s Dios .

Je' aj re' ru'um chi ru̱c' i wAja̱w nibiraj take k'oric nik'or aweh tak , chabiraj tak chi coric i nanik'orom wili : Re' c'acharel nariniminic reh niC'uhbal ma' xa ta quimic naribanam je chi junpech naquimok je , nqui Jesus .

Chiri̱j chi wilom chic chaj bih xquic'ul take xib re're' , re' hin xwilow jenaj nim laj tz'uka̱b re' riban wi̱' k'atoj k'oric i Dios xa sakrepic chic eh xwilow wo' wach i jenaj tz'uklic chipam . Chiwach ru' ma'xta chic bih xcahnic xa ta nak re' taxa̱j ch'i̱l wach ac'al maj re' take re' xsahchic quiwach eh ma'xta chic nilmijic quiwach .

Je' wo' chic , wilic wo' aweh tak c'ahchi' quik'oric chi je' wili : « Je' ricab nok re' kawa' kaha̱' wilic reh chi nakayeb chi suk i kati'jolal eh re' kati'jolal tiklic wo' reh chi naric'ulum cho chaj bih nkayew jok reh , je' wo' re' i hoj ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil wi raj chi naribanam lok c'oyomal , ewo' riban chi enka'n lok ru'um chi re' wo' Dios xtik'inic reh kati'jolal , nqui k'oric na'n tak . Re' k'oric nak'or tak chi re' Dios xtik'inic reh kati'jolal eh chi re' wo' xtik'inic reh kawa' kaha̱' nkac'ux , coric aweh tak xa re' la' nwa̱j nik'orom aweh tak chi pan jenaj k'i̱j nok jalo̱j chic wach i kati'jolal kabakil , ma'xta chic riwih'ic kawa' kaha̱' ru'um nok ma' curman ta chic chi reh kati'jolal chi'nchel re're' . Je' re' ru' naric'uluric ru̱c' kawa' kaha̱' xa re' la' re' hin nik'orom chic aweh tak chi ma' je' ta re' ru̱c' kati'jolal kabakil chi ribanaric lok i c'oyomal maj re' Dios ma' xojritik'a̱' ta chi enka'n lok re're' ru̱c' xa hab wach u̱c' nka̱j , re' hoj nakac'acharic la' chi coric ru̱c' hab wach i ric'u'lil ko̱k kak'ab ye'o̱j keh ru'um i Dios eh je' wo' nakac'acharic je' ricab ra̱j i kAja̱w ru'um chi re' wo' re' nehchenic reh kac'acharic .

je' wo' re' hat-tak chayew pan acapew-bal tak chi re' riwi̱' i ritahkaljic i kAja̱w Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric na'n tak til je' ricab riwi̱' i c'acharel re' ricana̱' wih'ic chi junpech china̱ ac'al wili nanquimic je , je' wo' re' hat-tak chacana̱' tak chi junpech mahcanic na'n pan ac'acharic tak eh yu'na tic'acharok tak chi re' chic i Dios na̱lok'em tak wach .

Chiri̱j chic wili to̱b ta wo' ja' biram ta nak chic ribiral i Ti̱to , xponic wo' ribiral wu̱c' . Ru̱c' re're' til k'e̱' wo' chic tioxonic raj ye'eric reh Dios ru̱c' take pa' bih riban . Re' Dios wili re' wo' re' nbanic chi koj-elic chi coric chipam kacamaj ru'um chi hoj aj niminel reh Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Re' riban i Dios wili je' ricab riban jeno' c'amol quibe̱h take juntuhm ok chi sol re' nchol ribanaric chi re' take riso̱l nca'n cho canar i k'ak'anic . Re' wo' re' nbanic chi re' kac'uhbal i hoj raj camanom re' c'ahchi' kak'orom chiri̱j rinabjic i Jesus c'ahchi' rojic lok chi junsut tinamit je' ricab riquihej je ri̱b jeno' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m .

Nok re' Jesus xwih'ic ayu' wach ac'al , xkabiraj cho ru̱c' chi̱' jenaj tijbal re' kap'utum chic cho rik'ormojic aweh tak wich'i̱l take wich nahsil aj tahkanel eh yu'na nakak'orom wo' chic aweh tak . Je' aj wili rik'or i tijbal re're' : « Re' Dios , xa je' na ricab jeno' sakom nok wilic cho chi kana̱ eh je' ricab nok re' sakom ma' nwih'ic ta so' k'ekom ru̱c' je' wo' re' i Dios ma' nmahcanic ta so' xa re' la' i coric riban ribanaric , nqui rik'or .

Wi ma' nacoj tak niwach , xa ta wo' re̱t maj ma' chi'nchel ta take c'acharel quic'ulic lok wu̱c' naca'nam chi waj tahkanel take . Wu̱c' la' hin naquichalic chi'nchel take xiyew i Dios chi naca'nam chi waj tahkanel take . Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak chi xa hab wach nc'ulic lok wu̱c' chi naribanam chi waj tahkanel , re' hin ma' jaruj ta enit'erej lok i c'acharel re're' ,
Chatik tak ju' ric'uhtjic i c'axoj i̱b queh take toco̱m awich aj niminel tak .

Ru'um chi junelic k'i̱j sakom c'ahchi' chi camanic chiwach i Dios chi aj pahkanel quito'bal take c'acharel , re're' rinimej chi manlic i ricamaj chi aj ye'ol quico'lbal take tinamit yu'na eh je' wo' re' johtok chi junelic k'i̱j sakom cu̱c' take nic' pa' q'uihal quichalic chiwach i Jesus chi c'ahchi' quich'ica̱b quic'ux chiri̱j ru' .

Re' aj take c'acharel re're' je' wili xquik'or reh Po̱nsyo Pila̱to chi xa cow chic c'ahchi' quiq'uerem quichi̱' : « Re' winak wili chacansaj eh til wo' chacansaj ar wach curu̱s ! Chayew k'ab k'uru' chi encansjic ! nqui take reh . Re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to xik'or queh chi je' wili : « Re' hat-tak ma' nawa̱j ta tak chi enitak'a̱' ricansjic ak'atal k'oric tak wili wach curu̱s , maje' ? nqui queh . Re' take c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios je' wili ric'u'ljic xca'n : « Re' hoj ma'xta chic jeno' toco̱m k'atal k'oric chi kana̱ , xa re' la' wach i k'atal k'oric aj Ro̱ma , nqui take .

Je' re' k'uru' je' ricab xc'uluric pa rik'ijil cho Eli̱yas cu̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' ma' xquixuc'a̱' ta qui̱b chiwach i tiyo̱x Wahal , yu'na chi kaxilac i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , re' Dios xiban wo' chi xcahnic juntuhm chic keh hoj c'acharel je' ru̱c' nkac'ul i k'oro̱j ru'um . Je' re' xiban ru'um reh ric'axbal re' xic'uhtaj wo' cho chi kana̱ naxojrichih cho chi hoj ritinami̱t .

re're' wilic china̱ i tojbal wach i mahc re're' ru'um chi re're' xc'ambic quibe̱h take chi'nchel nimak tak tinamit chi xquicana̱' rilok'onjic wach i Dios , xa je' na ricab xixohc'saj take reh chi xic'am je take pan c'oyomal . Je' re' ajic , re' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al xca'n i c'ahbilal je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ca'nam i c'oyomal , nqui wi̱n .

Je' re' ajic nanac'ax awi̱b tak cha'n tak je' ricab nquic'ax qui̱b chi quibil qui̱b take xa cas quicha̱k' qui̱b chiwach quitu̱t caja̱w . Re' chic k'oric chiri̱j alok'il tak , re' wili no'jbal niyew chawach tak : Ma̱sic' tak riye'jic alok'il hat-tak re' la' chasic' tak riye'eric quilok'il take awas acha̱k' aj niminel .

ru'um nok re' hat-tak til hat-tak chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios . Je' re' nik'or maj re' take c'acharel nanquiyew k'ab reh Lok' laj Uxlabal chi enbehsenic reh quic'acharic , nquic'uhtaj lok chi re' take re' til rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios chic take .

Cu re' chic wi̱n ru' , jenaj wo' chic ilo̱j xniban re' k'e̱' xsahchic wi̱' nic'ux . Je' wili ilo̱j xniban ar pan taxa̱j : Ar wilic cho jenaj ma' laj cak ri̱j wacax a̱k' wilic wuku̱b na̱ ch'i̱l lajeb chi ruc'a' eh chi xoybal wach i ju'jun china̱ wilic wo' ju'jun chi coten laj ch'ihch' .

Ru'um chi re' hoj , hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios , wilic take cuse'sbal nariye'eric keh . Re' hin nik'or chi je' re' ru'um i wili : Re' Dios re' xbanic chi enkac'ul take ricuse'sbal xitik'a̱' chic wach chi nankac'ul take ti'c'axic ru'um reh kaniminic je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus chi xic'ul wo' i ti'c'axic , re' hoj wo' enkac'ul take kacuse'sbal je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric chi xic'ul wo' take ricuse'sbal . Je' re' xitik'a̱' wach i Dios reh chi re' hoj enkac'ul i kalok'il je' ricab xc'uluric ru̱c' i Jesus chi xic'ul wo' rilok'il .

Yu'na nwa̱j k'oric awu̱c' chiqui̱j take quinahsil aj niminel chipam i comonil wilca̱t wi̱' . Wi nca'n chi coric quicamaj chi aj c'amol be̱h take eh til pa ricorquil , til wo' nquiyew quic'ux chi rik'ormojic je' wo' chi ric'uhtjic riC'uhbal i Dios , curman chi lo̱k' ok quiwa'ric chawach tak eh til ric'ul wo' chi queh chi enayew tak jeno' quitojbal

Coric ru' chi wilic take ju'jun kich aj niminel ma' til ta nquicoj wach chi re' take tiyo̱x ma'xta cajawric chi quina̱ take c'acharel eh ru'um re're' c'axic chi queh chi enquicana̱' take no'jbal wilic cu̱c' chiri̱j take tiyo̱x . Je' ricab wi re' take re' nquic'ux tiwic k'ahsamaj cho chiwach tiyo̱x , pan quicapew-bal nquik'or chi re' take re' c'ahchi' wo' chic ca'nam juneht take ru̱c' i lok'onic tiyo̱x nbanjic . Ru'um aj re' nanquic'ux take tiwic je' ru̱c' k'ahsamaj chiwach take tiyo̱x , re' quicapew-bal ncahnic chi ma' suk tak chic ru'um nok nquicapaj chi quimahcanic xa ru'um chi xquic'ux tiwic je' ru̱c' k'ahsamaj chiwach jeno' tiyo̱x , to̱b ta wo' nak re're' ma' re' ta mahc .

re' wAjaw riban wo' je' ricab riban aj tico̱l narilow chi ma' quiwachanic ta chic take k'ab riche'lal i u̱wa , riyoc' lok chi junpech take k'ab re're' . Ra̱j wi xa eli̱c wo' quiwachanic take k'ab , xa rip'ix take lok re' rilow chi chiki̱j chic take reh chi je' re' k'e̱' chic naquiwachanic take k'ab re're' . Re' camanic nbanaric queh take k'ab riche'lal i u̱wa , rijalwachej je' ricab nc'uluric awu̱c' hat-tak chi'nchel c'acharel je' ru̱c' wilca̱t tak chi waj tahkanel .

Ma' riban wo' nchel chi ru'um ta nak chi wilic awajawric tak chi quina̱ take ye'o̱j pan ak'ab tak quilmijic eno̱j riban chi xa re' chic tak'anic nawa̱j abanam tak chi quina̱ . Re' la' cha'n tak , c'uhtunok awu̱c' tak i holohic laj no'jbal reh chi je' re' je' wo' re' equibanic ru' .

Chi k'oro̱j chic lok aweh tak take no'jbal re're' , yu'na k'uru' wich aj niminel nanik'oric je awu̱c' tak chiri̱j risoljic wo' chic cho i kAja̱w Jesus . Je' re' nanibanam ru'um nok til nwa̱j chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j chaj bih naric'uluric cu̱c' take kich aj niminel camnak chic take . Re' nwa̱j chawi̱j tak ru̱c' take k'oric re're' , re' chi ma̱cansaj awi̱b tak ru'um ti'quil c'uxlis chiri̱j jeno' queh aj niminel nquimic je je' ricab nca'n take ma'xta jeno' cuyu'nbal chi narucsjic wo' chic cho i hab wach queh nquimic je .

Je' wo' , re' take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel xquich'ica̱' cho quic'ux chiri̱j i Dios naxi'iq'uic chipam rinimal ha' re' “ Ma' laj Cak Wach Ha' ” ribihnal . Ru'um re're' , xa ma' c'axic ta iq'uic xca'n je chipam , xa je' na nchel pan chiki̱j laj be̱h xi'iq'uic je wi̱' . Raj take aj Eji̱pto re' xi'o̱j chi quichoporic take kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , ma' xi'iq'uic ta je chi juntar , jihk'ic la' chic xquic'ul naxok'taj wo' chic cho ri̱b ma' laj ha' re're' .

« Je' aj re' chipam cho ric'axquilal take k'i̱j re're' xasjic jenaj t'uch ac'un k'e̱' c'axbal wach chiwach i Dios , Moyses ribihnal . Re're' nok q'uihsimaj chic xib poh ru'um ritu̱t raja̱w ar pan pa̱t ,

Ru'um chi re' Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ xa tiwic xa ba̱k wo' ti je' ricab wo' take rich c'acharel chi xa ma' cow ta wo' ti quicapew-bal chiwach ransil i mahc , riquetelej wo' quiwach take c'acharel re' quimahcanic chi ma' c'ahchi' ta quirakam chiri̱j chi mahc c'ahchi'que̱b .

Je' re' ajic ru'um chi nkana'bej chi re' ric'ulic lok i kAja̱w Jesus xa ma' naht ta chic wilic chi kawach je' ricab nc'uluric nok iq'uinak chic lok i chak'ab xa nic' yu' chic enelic cho i k'i̱j , kajal wo' tak wach i nic' pa' nimal i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal nka'n reh chi nakatik'a̱b ki̱b je' ricab riban i sol naritik'a̱' ri̱b ru̱c' ripuhmbal ch'i̱l i ch'ihch' laj tz'ih ricoj chiri̱j chi co'lbal ri̱b , re' ok wo' rino'jbal i Jesus c'uhtunok lok ku̱c' i hoj .

Je' wo' chic , re' hat-tak aj ehcham camanic holohic ok no'jbal chac'uhtaj tak cu̱c' awaj camanom tak . Ma̱yo'slom wo' tak take chi rik'ormojic queh chi na̱yeb tak ti'c'axic chi quina̱ . C'olok pan ac'ux tak chi re' hat-tak aj ehcham camanic ch'i̱l wo' take awaj camanom tak , xa jenaj wo' chi Ajabe̱s wilic chana̱ tak ar pan taxa̱j eh re're' xa jenaj awach tak chiwach .

Je' wo' nicoj wo' ano'jbal tak chi sukbok ac'ux tak cu̱c' take c'acharel nsukbic quic'ux ru'um chi wilic jeno' riwi̱' chi quiwach . Ra̱j nchel wi wilic jeno' riwi̱' chi wilic ti' c'uxlis pan ca̱mna , ti'bok wo' ac'ux tak cu̱c' .

Xa re' la' ru'um ricowil ac'ux tak , re' hat-tak ma' nacapaj ta tak re're' eh chi je' re' ma' ja' najal ta wo' wach ac'ahbil laj no'jbal tak . Ru'um chi je' re' na'n tak , yu'na c'ahchi' abanam tak chi re' Dios k'e̱' enjosk'bic cho awu̱c' tak chiwach take k'i̱j wili eh je' wo' re' chipam i k'i̱j nok re' Dios chi josk'onak chic cu̱c' chi'nchel take aj mahc , naribanam chi nariye'eric rinimal ti'c'axic chi quina̱ . Chipam wo' i k'i̱j re're' , chi'nchel take c'acharel naquilom wach chi manlic nic' wach i ch'ukuj k'oric naribanam i Dios chi quina̱ .

Ar ajic nok je' re' xca'n i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh , juntuhm chi ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' xichalic ar pan tinamit Antiyoqui̱ya ch'i̱l wo' ar Ico̱nyo xi'oquic chi k'oric cu̱c' take tinamit re're' chi naquicansam i ma' Lu̱' eh ma' c'axic ta wo' ti naxch'uk quic'ux chi ric'amaric na̱ xquik'or take ru' . Nok ch'ukunak chic quic'ux take aj Li̱stra , xquik'ojobej i ma' Lu̱' chi abaj eh naxquicapaj chi camnak chic , xquijuquej lok chiri̱j i tinamit

Chiri̱j chic take rik'ormojic re're' , re' Jesus xchalic jenaj riyot'quil ra̱mna ru'um ritz'irquilal ric'ux eh je' wili xik'or keh : « Til coric nik'or , jenaj aweh hat-tak naquirik'ahsam pan quik'ab take naquicansanic wi̱n , nqui xik'or keh .

xa re' la' ma' je' ta re' riban keh maj chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j wilic wi̱' i riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or wo' chi hoj chi'nchel c'acharel choplic na̱ kac'acharic ru'um i mahc . Ru'um aj re' nik'or chi xa ru̱c' wo' rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , enkarak i junelic c'acharic je' ricab wo' rik'orom cho i Dios chi xa ru̱c' wo' ch'iquinic c'uxlis chiri̱j ru' wilic kac'acharic chi junelic i hoj c'acharel .

Chiri̱j ru' nok quicohlam chic wach quic'uhbalanic take quib chi raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios re're' , xwilow chi ar chipam i rinimal jul cahk xelic cho jenaj ma' laj chicop xa c'ahbil chic rilbal . Re're' xwilow chi xo̱j chi quina̱ i quib re're' chi quicojoric pan ti' c'axic cu rehtal xicansaj take .

Ru'um aj re' ma̱cana̱' tak rik'ormojic take k'oric re' quito'bonic chi ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal . Je' re' nik'or maj wi cu rehtal ricux'ic wach kac'acharic xa eli̱c wo' c'ahchi' kach'ica̱b kac'ux chiri̱j take k'oric kacojom cho wach cu pan p'utbal cho reh kaniminic , re' Jesus naco̱j ricojom chi hoj rich aj c'ulul reh nic' pa' nimal ric'ulum chi Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric .

Raj i hat-tak til wilic awu̱c' tak i Lok' laj Uxlabal eh chi je' re' , re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , til xa wilic wo' awu̱c' tak . Ru'um aj re' xa cu re' wo' nok xiban i Dios chi coric chic wach ac'ux tak , re' Lok' laj Uxlabal xiban wo' chi junelic chic i c'acharic xac'ul tak ru̱c' , to̱b ta wo' til pa ricorquilal hoj chi'nchel nakaquimic je .

Ru'um chi je' re' xca'n , ma' hab ta chic wach queh take aj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios xquicol na̱ chi ma' ta nak xca'n ti'c'axic reh , xquicansaj la' take je jarub queh xik'oric cho ribiral najtir k'i̱j chi naric'ulic lok i lok' laj Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' aj re' ru' , re' hat-tak je' wo' acab tak take cho kama̱m kati't je' ru̱c' xquicansaj take cho aj k'orol c'uhbal re're' maj chipam take k'i̱j wili re' hat-tak xacansaj tak i lok' laj Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' re' xa'n tak naxak'ahsaj tak pan quik'ab take sol aj Ro̱ma eh xapahkaj tak ricansjic reh Po̱nsyo Pila̱to .

Je' aj re' take no'jbal nc'uhtunic lok chi cu chopo̱j kana̱ ru'um i mahc eh je' wo' take pa reh chic no'jbal wili : Re' ti'quil c'uxlis chiri̱j pa' bih wilic reh jenaj chic c'acharel , re' cansanic tak i̱b , re' xohc'sonic tak i̱b , re' banoj tak nink'ijinic re' nquiham wi̱' qui̱b chi ha' nxohc'sonic cu rehtal quikajic pan tak c'ahbilal laj no'jbal . Chiri̱j aj take chi'nchel no'jbal re're' ch'i̱l wo' take toco̱m no'jbal ma' xnik'or ta je aweh tak ayu' , tinik'il tak chi ma̱ban chic aweh tak re're' . Je' ricab wo' nik'orom chic cho aweh tak pan pe̱t yu' na̱ nik'or wo' chic aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak chic take no'jbal re're' maj hab wach take je' re' quibanic ma'xta quehtric wih'ic chi rehquen rajawric i Dios chi k'atal k'oric .

Chi ma' naht ta chic wilqui̱n chaxilac tak , chach'ica̱' ac'ux tak chiri̱j nitijinic nok cu wilqui̱n ayu' chaxilac tak maj wi je' re' na'n tak , na̱banam tak chi hat-tak aj niminel wi̱n , nqui xik'or . Chiri̱j chi rik'orom chic take k'oric re're' , re' Jesus xelic je chi quixilac take tinamit re're' eh ma' xrakmajic ta chic ar .

Je' re' ru' rilok'il ricamaj i Jesus ru'um chi re're' riyew ric'ux chi rinimjic i Dios je' ricab naxiban cho Moyses naxcamanic chi manlic chiqui̱j take tinamit re' xic'am quibe̱h . Je' wo' , re' Jesus xinimej wo' chi manlic i camanic ye'o̱j reh ru'um i Dios chi c'amol be̱h .

xitak'a̱' cho chi kana̱ ru'um chi xkach'ica̱' kac'ux chiri̱j i kajco'lonel Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Re' riwi̱' chi re' Dios xitak'a̱' cho chi kana̱ i Lok' laj Uxlabal reh chi re' hoj nakap'utum johtok i jenaj ac' laj c'acharic k'e̱' wo' chic holonquilal .

Junpech aj cho naxchalic jenaj c'axquil chi quina̱ take aj niminel , wilic take aj niminel xquic'ayej je pa' bih queh je' ricab xiban aj niminel aj Chi̱pire je' ru̱c' ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Lewih re' Chep ribihnal eh Wernaweh wo' ribihnej cu'um take cablaj chi nahsil . Re' Wernaweh wili re' “ aj ye'ol sukquil c'uxlis ” nelic wi̱' ribihnal ,

Ru'um aj chi je' re' , re' hoj ma' riban ta chi ekojch'i'tjic chi ribanaric i holohic laj bano̱j maj wi ma' xkamay ribanaric i holohic , til nakilom wo' wach jeno' kaco̱ch ru̱c' i Dios naponok rik'ijil .

Nok wilqui̱n nak cho chipam rich'iquinjic nic'ux chiri̱j i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , re' hin xnicana̱' rinimjic take c'uhbal re're' nok re' chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric xninimej . Yu'na chi ma' c'ahchi' ta chic nich'ica̱b nic'ux chiri̱j i c'uhbal re're' xa je' na hin chic camnak chiwach nok wilqui̱n reh chi re' chic Dios k'orel china̱ nic'acharic .

Chiri̱j chic ru' xye'jic pa nik'ab jenaj che̱' je' ricab caxlan a̱j ncamanic chi pajbal ye'a̱b eh re' Dios je' wili xik'or wi̱n : « Hiy , chapaj cho rinimal i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' niwach ch'i̱l wo' rinimal i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ wilic chipam . Je' wo' , chawajlaj jarub take chi c'acharel nquimol qui̱b chi rilok'onjic niwach .

Re' take c'acharel wili til sak wach ca̱mna maj ma' xquijop ta wach quino'jbal ru̱c' lok'onic tiyo̱x . Re' take wili aj tahkanel wo' take reh C'acharel re' rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' eh ru'um i re' xa pa' no̱j i c'acharel re're' ar wo' qui'o̱j chiri̱j . Re' take c'acharel wili je' ricab nok quik'ahsjic take pe̱t wach i tic k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach i Dios , chi quixilac take toco̱m c'acharel aj ayu' wach ac'al xicojoric chi pe̱t aj niminel take je' ru̱c' re' chic i Dios ch'i̱l i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' wilic chi ac' aj ehchenel queh .

Je' aj wili quiwi̱' take nimak tak chili'l xwilow quiwach : Re' take re' xa tikilque̱b chic chi ojic , xa je' chic quicab take cawa̱y chi xa tikilque̱b chic chi ojic pan k'ak'anic . Je' wo' , re' take re' poylic wo' wach quina̱ chi je' ricab jenaj coten k'anworic laj ch'ihch' reh wach nahis eh re' quilbal xa je' chic ricab rilbal jeno' winak xa tiklic chic chi k'ak'anic .

Je' re' k'uru' tic'acharok tak pan jenaj holohic laj c'acharic ru'um chi tehlic chic awi̱j tak , xa re' la' ma' nchel nacapaj tak chi ru'um chi tehlic chic awi̱j tak ra̱j rik'orom chi ye'o̱j k'ab aweh tak chi ribanaric i ma' holohic ta laj bano̱j . Ma'xta ! Ma̱capaj tak chi je' re' , re' la' cha'n tak tic'acharok tak chi hat-tak raj camanom i Dios .

Ru'um aj re' , re' hat ch'i̱l i hin c'ahchi' kacamanic chi cow chiwach i Dios chi rik'ormojic i k'oro̱j cahnok re're' to̱b ta nkac'ul take ti' ru'um reh kacamaj . Re' kacamaj re're' c'ahchi' ka'nam chi ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j i c'achlic Dios re' kajCo'lonel i hoj nic' nimal kojniminic chic reh . Re' Dios ra̱j wo' rico'lem take chi'nchel c'acharel .

Je' re' k'uru' wi jeno' c'acharel naricansjic je , chacapaj wo' tak chiri̱j i naric'uluric wili : K'e̱' wo' chic rinimal i ti'c'axic naric'ulum i c'acharel wi re're' riyak'abej pa ro̱k i tijinic chiri̱j rAc'u̱n i Dios ch'i̱l i Lok' laj Uxlabal ye'o̱j cho xa ru'um reh ric'axbal i Dios . Je' wo' re' enbanjic ru̱c' wi re're' ma' riyew ta chic rilok'il re' chaj bih xiban i Jesus chi xojricoj jenaj chi hoj chic ritinami̱t i Dios eh je' wo' re' wi ma' riyew chic rilok'il riquiq'ue̱l i Jesus re' chopbal na̱ riwa'ric i ac' laj tik'inic xiban i Dios ku̱c' i hoj c'acharel .

Chiri̱j chic re' , re' Jesus chi ch'akbal je ri̱b chi kaxilac je' wo' chic wili xik'or keh hoj raj tahkanel : « Re' hin tinipahba̱' tak chi na̱wojic tak chi waj camanom je' ricab xiban cho wu̱c' i wAja̱w Dios , nqui keh .

Je' re' k'uru' tiklic chic cho wach i ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take aj tijinel re're' ru'um reh quino'jbal chi xa ma'xta bih nponic chi quiwach , je' wo' chi xa aj cakwachanel take eh xa cha'n wo' aweh c'acharic nca'n re' k'orel pa' bih rik'or quicapew-bal chi naca'nam . Je' wo' chic , re' take re' quik'oric xa reh chi nimsbal quiwach chiwach take tinamit eh nquik'unej wach jeno' c'acharel ru̱c' holohic laj c'uta̱j xa reh chi naquehcham i xa pa' bih wilic reh c'acharel re're' .

Chiri̱j chic re' , xc'uluric wo' chi re' take c'acharel ma' nquinimej ta i Dios , je' chi k'atal k'oric take , je' chi nimak quiwach , je' chi cajawil sol , ch'i̱l take bihomak , je' chi winak tehlic qui̱j on chopo̱j quina̱ pan cow laj camanic , chi'nchel re're' xquic'ol qui̱b xilac tak nim laj abaj eh chipam take nim laj ho̱p xicahnic naxit'e'lejic take cho yu̱k' q'uixca̱b .

Tz'a̱b ru' take xa quiyo'jic chic chi riye'eric quic'ux chiwi̱j ch'i̱l take quibanic chi'nchel yibel wach no'jbal , ch'i̱l take aj cansanel , ch'i̱l take c'oyo̱m , ch'i̱l take aj war , ch'i̱l take quilok'onic wach take tik'imaj tiyo̱x eh ch'i̱l wo' take chi'nchel aj chucul k'oric , naquicuturic jok chipam i ye'a̱b re' xa ntenic chic cho rik'ak'il eh xa sute̱n chic pa̱m chi asu̱pra re' xa nquihic chic richuhil . Re' ti'c'axic naric'ulmujic ar ribihnej wo' chi “ Ricab Quimic ” , nqui xik'or .

Je' re' nok ma' chi bih chic awuy'ej , chatik'a̱' la' awi̱b chi rikahsjic aha̱' reh chi re' Jesus ericuy amahc nachak'or reh chi re're' i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s china̱ ac'acharic , nqui wi̱n ma' Anani̱yas .
Re' wach quina̱ xa je' chic ricab richamil rismal na̱ jeno' ixok eh re' take ritz'i̱' que̱ xa k'as chic take xa je' chic ricab take ritz'i̱' re̱ jeno' cakcoj .

maj aweht'alim wo' i hat chi re' hoj raj camanom i Dios ma' ric'ul ta chi keh i sic'oj wolic re' la' curman chi keh chi nakac'uhtam i kachak'lamil cu̱c' chi'nchel take c'acharel . Ru'um chi wilic i ihk chi kana̱ i hoj chi aj c'uhtunel reh riC'uhbal i Dios , curman wo' chi tikilco̱j ok chi ric'uhtjic chi coric . Wi ru'um reh kac'uhtunic re're' xchalic i ti'c'axic chi kana̱ , ma' nka'n jelow-bal i ti'c'axic nbanjic keh .

Ru'um aj re' chacoj tak rehtal i nik'or je aweh tak maj re' hin nik'or je re're' ru'um reh capewenic niban chawi̱j tak . Coric , re' hin ma' wilqui̱n ta chaxilac tak xa re' la' xa c'ahchi' wo' qui̱n chi capewenic chawi̱j tak chi suk nic'ux ru'um wilic pa nicapew-bal nic' wach naxatwilow tak cho chi xa jenaj chic wach acapew-bal tak chi richoporic ac'ux tak chiri̱j rinimjic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Je' wo' re' yu'na chi xa cu choplic wo' ac'ux tak chipam i niminic to̱b ta nchel ma' wilqui̱n ta ponok awu̱c' tak .

Til je' re' chiban maj re' nak' wach i kAja̱w wilic cho chi quina̱ take re' xa coric wo' wach quic'ux . Je' wo' , re' kAja̱w xa tehlic wo' cho xiquin chi ribirmijic quiti̱j nca'n johtok . Haj cok wilic ma' nponic ta chiwach i kAja̱w re' i quino'jbal take c'acharel re' ma' coric ta wach quibanic eh re' take re' , ch'i'c rilow take , nqui rik'or .

Je' re' k'uru' hat-tak wich tak aj niminel re' k'e̱' ti' tiric'raj tak i kAja̱w Jesus , re' hin ch'i̱l take wich aj niminel re' quinquihch'ilej xa eli̱c wo' kojtioxonic johtok ru̱c' i Dios nanka'n kati̱j chawi̱j tak maj nok ja' np'uhtic ta cho c'acharic ayu' wach ac'al , re' Dios xatrichih tak chic cho chi na̱co'ljic tak chiwach i ti'c'axic nariye'eric chi quina̱ take aj mahc . Re' aj re' riwi̱' chi re're' xiban wo' chi pe̱t xisakbej wach awa̱mna tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal nok ach'ica̱b chic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus re' aj k'orol reh coric laj c'uhbal .

Je' wo' chic , ru'um chi re' rik'ijil re're' ponic chic reh , nik'or aweh chi xa hab wach c'acharel re' ma' ra̱j ta ricana̱b ribanaric i c'ahbilal laj no'jbal , re' chic k'orel ru' wi cu eritik ju' ribanaric i no'jbal re're' . Je' wo' , re' ma' ra̱j ta ricana̱b ribanaric i mahc re' wo' k'orel ru' wi cu ewo' ritik ju' ribanaric i mahc . Raj nchel i c'acharel re' riban i holohic laj no'jbal chitik wo' ju' ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal eh re' riyew ric'ux chi rinimjic i Dios chitik wo' ju' riye'eric ric'ux chi ribanjic re're' , nqui xik'or .

Re' ma' Luch je' wo' chic wili xik'or queh : « Was tak nicha̱k' , reh chi encuyuric amahc tak chajal wach ano'jbal tak eh re' hoj enkakahsaj aha̱' chi aju'junal tak reh chi etoquic tak chi hat-tak raj tahkanel i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Chi je' re' enye'eric wo' aweh tak i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak riye'eric jeno' asi̱ tak

Je' wo' , chacoj tak rehtal ribanaric i capew-bal wili : Wi hab wach jeno' aweh tak xbanjic ti'c'axic reh ru'um jeno' chic c'acharel , ma' riban chic jelow-bal i ti'c'axic xbanaric reh . Ma' xa re' ta re' cha'n tak , je' la' wo' cow chayew ac'ux tak chi ritobjic awi̱b tak je' ricab wo' ena'n tak cu̱c' take ma' re' ta aj niminel .

Je' wo' re' nca'n take winak , wilic take ma' nca̱j ta chic tuhnic ru̱c' ixok chi c'acharic je' ricab tik'imaj cho wach chi jenaj winak eh jenaj ixok narituna̱b ri̱b chi c'acharic . Je' re' ajic re' take re' xa cu̱c' chic i quich winak k'e̱' nquitowej wih'ic eh chi je' re' nca'n i c'ahbil laj mahc re' q'uixbilal ric'am cho chi quina̱ . Re' cok ru' nanca'n chi je' re' , re' quiti'jolal quibakil take c'acharel re're' rijot' wo' ri̱b eh ru̱c' re're' enquic'ul i ti'c'axic re' ric'ul chi queh chi naquic'ulum ru'um reh c'ahbilal nca'n .
Je' ricab hin chi k'e̱' sukquil nic'ux til je' ok wo' re' i hat-tak sukbok wo' ac'ux tak .

« Yu'na aj ru' nik'or aweh tak chi chajal wach ano'jbal tak eh chachop ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus reh chi re' Dios ericuy amahc tak eh chi je' re' ewo' nponic rik'ijil chiwach ru' chi eriyew cho risukquil ac'ux tak
Je' wo' , chipam i tinamit ma'xta chic roquic k'ekom eh chi je' re' ma' jaruj ta chic naritz'apjic ritz'ahpil i ocbal maj ma'xta wo' chic riwih'ic jeno' yohbal .

Tz'a̱b ru' , wi je' re' na'n tak enye'eric aweh tak chi etic'acharic tak chi junelic eh ma' xa re' ta re' , je' la' wo' pan cohlsbal wach take k'i̱j nariye'eric wo' aweh tak chi na̱wucsjic wo' tak chic cho wu'um i hin chi quixilac take camnak

Re' Jesus je' wili k'oric xiban : « Re' hat wilic awajawric chi nina̱ ru'um nok re' Dios xye'bic aweh awajawric re're' . Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh wili : Re' rimahc i c'acharel xk'ahsanic wi̱n chi xinc'ulic tiklijok pan ak'ab , k'e̱' wo' chic xiq'uic na̱ c'ahbilal wach mahc xiban chiwach i mahc ena'n i hat , nqui reh .

Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab chi jeno' c'acharel nok camnak chic je ma'xta chic bih riban , je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' jeno' c'acharel re' ma' jeno' holohic laj bano̱j riban . Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta nak ricoj wach chi re're' aj niminel reh Jesus , re're' ma' ric'uhtaj ta wo' lok ru̱c' ribano̱j chi til coric chi aj niminel wo' .

Re' xiban i Jesus re're' ma' jaruj ta xc'uluric nok cu wilco̱j chi chopo̱j kana̱ ru'um i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses . Je' re' nik'or maj to̱b ta re' c'uhbal re're' ritak'a̱' keh ribanaric i coric , re' hoj ma'xta ransil i kano'jbal chi ribanaric . Ru'um chi je' nak re' kawi̱' , re' wili xiban i Dios chi to'bal keh : Re're' xitak'a̱' cho ayu' wach ac'al i Jesus re' rAc'u̱n reh chi re' chic re' xc'ulbic reh i ti'c'axic nariye'eric nak keh hoj chi'nchel c'acharel ru'um kamahc . Je' wo' , re' Dios xiban wo' chi re' Jesus xasjic chi wilic riti'jolal ribakil je' ricab kati'jolal kabakil i hoj c'acharel aj mahc . Chi je' re' riwi̱' i Jesus , re' Dios xiban wo' chic i wili : Re're' xiyew reh chi re' ritutil i mahc re' wilic nak chi kana̱ , xesmejic lok ru'um .

raj la' wi pa' bih jeno' ti'c'axic nac'ul tak ru'um i coric wach c'uxlis , k'e̱' je ato̱b aweh tak . Ru'um aj re' ma̱yohbalej wo' tak quiwach take aj cojol ti'c'axic chana̱ tak . Je' wo' ma' nchel riban chi xa nt'ort'otic chic awa̱mna tak cu'um ,
Je' wo' hat-tak tutbe̱s ajabe̱s , ma̱johsaj quic'ux take awac'u̱n awixk'u̱n tak reh chi ma' eta riban qui̱b quic'ux awu̱c' tak .

Re're' xa cow chic quiq'uer quichi̱' chi je' wili : « Narisahchic chic wach i ma' laj tinamit Wawilo̱nya ! Yu'na naricahnic chi quipatbal chic take raj to'o̱l aj Yahm eh je' wo' quiye'a̱b chic take ma' tob laj uxlabal . Ar chipam i tinamit re're' naca'nam wo' quike̱s take tz'iquin je' ru̱c' chaweh hat-tak ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel yibel quiwach eh ma' k'oro̱j ta wo' quibihnal chi tare̱t chipam C'uhbal Ye'o̱j cho reh Moyses .

Nic' wach nakeht'alij nok c'ahchi' kabiram jeno' aj chucul k'oric ? Re' hoj nkeht'alij ru' nok jeno' c'acharel rik'or chi ma' coric ta chi re' Jesus re' i Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh ru̱c' re're' ma' ricoj ta ru̱c' ra̱mna i tijbal rik'or chi re' Dios , re're' rAja̱w i Jesus eh chi re' Jesus xa re' wach re' i rAc'u̱n i Ajabe̱s Dios . Je' aj re' , re' c'acharel re're' no̱j riban chi aj k'etol wach rik'orbal i Jesus .

Je' re' ajic xa hab wach nc'uxbic reh caxlan wi'c on ruq'uej reh i ri̱s u̱wa chi ma' c'ahchi' ta ricapewenic chiri̱j chi coric chaj bih nelic wi̱' ric'uxuric re're' ch'i̱l ruc'jic re're' , c'ahchi' rimahcanic chiwach i kAja̱w Jesus ru'um nok ma' c'ahchi' ta riyeb rilok'il riti'jolal ch'i̱l i riquiq'ue̱l xichihcaj chiki̱j re' rijalwachej i caxlan wi'c ch'i̱l i ri̱s u̱wa re're' .

Hat c'acharel re' hamlic i memil laj no'jbal awu̱c' , junpech chic nanic'uhtam aweh ricorquilal i k'oro̱j wili chi je' ricab nok re' c'acharel nok camnak chic je ma'xta chic bih riban , je' wo' re' nc'uluric ru̱c' i aj niminel reh Jesus nok ma' riban jeno' holohic laj bano̱j re' nc'utunic lok wi̱' chi til coric chi aj niminel .

naxelic cho cu̱c' take nahsil c'amol quibe̱h take aj k'ahsem si̱ chiwach i Dios ch'i̱l wo' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' cow laj aj niminel reh C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses , xic'am je quibe̱h take sol aj Ro̱ma ch'i̱l take aj cha'janel reh Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios , re' tak'amaj take je cu'um take nahsil richoporic i Jesus . Re' take riq'uihal winak tak'amaj take je re're' xquic'am je quichaj chi quisakombal eh xquic'am wo' je quimache̱t je' wo' quiche̱' chi chopbal reh Jesus .

Re' cok ru' , chiwach i yibel wach no'jbal nchalic cu̱c' take c'acharel re're' , ma' tiyo'jic tak maj re' rik'orom cho Dios chi naca̱t tak rico'lem chiwach i no'jbal re're' eh je' wo' chi nariyeb awansil tak reh chi encowjic ac'ux tak chipam i niminic , re're' til naribanam wo' chi narimanlajic wach .

xponic wo' cahnok cho pan jenaj ye'a̱b re' nariquimic nak wi̱' chi rutquel xa re' la' tz'eht xponic rakmajok ru'um rixk'u̱n i k'atal k'oric aj Eji̱pto , re' xc'ambic je reh chi nariq'uihsam chi je' riwi̱' jenaj rac'u̱n chiwach .

Chiri̱j aj chic re' , re' aj tz'e' wa̱ch re're' xichop johtok i c'atbal se̱nsa , xinuksaj chiwach k'a̱k' je' ru̱c' wilic china̱ i lok' laj ye'a̱b je' ricab nilbic i lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal si̱ chiwach i Dios eh xiquilej cho chi quina̱ tinamit ayu' wach ac'al . Naxc'ulic wach ac'al , xa nok wo' xic'uyu'jic take cho cohok , xbirmijic take cow laj k'oric eh xirehpaj wo' take risakomil . Je' wo' , xiban wo' jenaj cow laj hihc .

Je' re' naric'ulum i tinamit re're' ru'um chi re're' xc'ambic quibe̱h take chi'nchel nimak tak tinamit chi xquicana̱' rilok'onjic wach i Dios xa je' na ricab xixohc'saj take tinamit chi quic'amaric je take pan c'oyomal . Je' re' ajic re' take k'atal k'oric ayu' wach ac'al xca'n i c'ahbilal je' ricab chi c'ahchi' ta nak ca'nam i c'oyomal . Je' wo' , re' take aj yaco̱l chi junsut wach ac'al xca'n wo' i c'ahbilal ru̱c' ribihomsjic qui̱b xca'n . Je' re' nik'or maj re' take re' xquic'o'nej quibihomal ru̱c' rilok'oric take xa pa' bih jaric ma' curman ta wo' nak chi queh , nqui xik'or .
Ru'um aj take k'oric niban re're' , re' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel wili xinquichop nok wilqui̱n ar chipam i Lok' laj Pa̱t re' nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios eh xca̱j nak quinquicansam
Ru̱c' re're' ajic ma'xta chic cajwam ribirmijic i coric laj c'uhbal , re' chic take xa tz'akoj wach ribiral suk naquibiram .

Je' re' xik'or i Jesus chiri̱j i c'uhbalanic riban xa re' la' wilic take c'acharel ma' xicojbic ta wach chi je' re' . Je' aj re' xik'or i Jesus maj cu pan p'uhtbal cho reh ricamaj reht'alim nak chic cho hab wach take ma'xta quicojbic wach eh hab wo' wach i narik'ahsanic reh pan quimic .

Re' Jesus k'uru' je' wili xik'or : « Hab wach eh eniyew i muhu̱j laj caxlan wi'c , chacoj tak rehtal chi re're' awich tahkanel tak narik'ahsanic wi̱n pan quik'ab take waj cansanel , nqui keh . Chi je' re' ximuh cho jenaj caxlan wi'c eh xiyew reh i Ju̱ras aj Caryot re' rac'u̱n jenaj winak Simon ribihnal .

Timote̱yo , re' ye'o̱j aweh ru'um i Dios chi na̱co'lem ri̱j , chaco'lej wo' ri̱j chi coric . Nipahkaj wo' aweh chi re' take k'oric ma' ye'bal ta rilok'il i Dios eh ma' to'bonel ta wo' queh take quibirinic reh , chawic'saj lok ri̱j axiquin take k'oric re're' . Je' wo' re' cha'n ru̱c' quik'orbal take xa nquik'ihtaj wo' qui̱b ru̱c' take xa tik'imaj wach k'oric . Re' take c'acharel re' , to̱b ta wo' ma' coric ta take k'oric nquik'or , xa c'ahchi' wo' quik'orom chi ru̱c' take k'oric re're' nquirak quino'jbal .

Raj nchel take ju'jun chic ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel ma'xta nquicoj wach i c'uhbal xik'or ma' Lu̱' re're' . Re' take re' , ru'um chi k'e̱' quic'a̱ xchalic cu'um queh take xiniminic reh c'uhbal xk'ormojic re're' , xquimol wach juntuhm chi siqui̱l laj winak ma' holohic ta quino'jbal eh xquituhbej cho qui̱b pa ripa̱t jenaj aj niminel Jason ribihnal re' patanic nca'n wi̱' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las . Naxiponic chipam i pa̱t re're' , re' take juntuhm re're' xca̱j nak quic'amam je ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chi riye'eric chi quiwach take toco̱m wo' tinamit johsomaj quic'a̱ cu'um juntuhm re're'

Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak wi wilic jeno' aj niminel xcalajic ru̱c' jeno' mahc je' ru̱c' ma' nk'etbic ta pa̱m ribe̱h chi erik'eb chi junpech i junelic c'acharic eh wilic ok jeno' aweh tak xilow naxmahcanic , cha'n ati̱j tak chiri̱j awich aj niminel tak re're' maj re' Dios ewo' chic riyew reh i junelic c'acharic wi la' re' aj niminel re' xik'eb nak i junelic c'acharic ru'um reh i mahc xiban , ricana̱' wo' ribanaric i mahc re're' . Re' cok ru' re' take aj niminel re' quicalajic ru̱c' jeno' mahc re' nk'etbic pa̱m quibe̱h chi enye'eric queh i junelic c'acharic , re' hin nik'or aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak chic johtok pahkanic chiqui̱j ru' ,

je' ricab wo' chi til coric take k'oric nanik'orom aweh tak wili , re' curman chi na̱biram tak chi coric : Xa hab wach naric'ulbic reh pan sukquil c'uxlis i nanitak'a̱b je , re' wo' hin quiric'ul pan sukquil c'uxlis eh wi re' hin c'ahchi'qui̱n ric'ulum ra̱j wo' rik'orom chi re' wAja̱w Dios re' xtak'anic cho wi̱n c'ahchi' ric'ulum , nqui xik'or i Jesus .

Ru'um aj re' katioxej johtok reh kAja̱w Dios chi re're' xiban chi wilic chi kak'atal k'oric i jenaj re' ma' jaruj ta c'uhlel wach ricamaj . Je' wo' ka'n tak ribanaric take bano̱j re' nponic chiwach i Dios , kalok'ej tak wach eh kayohbalej wo' tak wach .

Raj nchel take ju'jun ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' aj t'erem take ma' tob laj uxlabal qui'o̱j xa pa' tinamit , naxquitijej nak ti queh je' ricab riban i ma' Lu̱' chi quit'ermejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal , ma' xibirinic ta k'oric . Je' re' ajic , chi quesmejic lok take ma' tob laj uxlabal cu̱c' take c'acharel p'uht quik'orom ribiral rajawric i Jesus chi je' wili : « Ma' tob laj uxlabal , ru̱c' rajawric i Lok' laj Ajabe̱s Jesus re' rik'or ribiral i ma' Lu̱' , nkak'or aweh chi telen lok ru̱c' c'acharel wilca̱t wi̱' , nqui nquik'or .

Re' chic ma' Lu̱' nok okxa'namaj chic pan k'ab i kAja̱w Dios cu'um take aj niminel ar Antiyoqui̱ya reh chi re're' narito'bonic reh , xelic je ar eh xo̱j ch'i̱l i Si̱las re' xichih wach chi narihch'ilem .

Ru'um re're' , re' hin nik'or wo' aweh tak chi chayohbalej awi̱b tak chiwach aj jot'o̱l re're' . Je' wo' chic nik'or wo' aweh tak i wili : Ma̱cana̱' tak ritahkaljic i tijinic chiri̱j i Jesus je' ricab xkac'uhtaj cho aweh tak . Je' re' nipahkaj chi cha'n tak reh chi re' c'axoj i̱b xasjic pan awa̱mna tak ru'um reh camanic xka'n chaxilac tak i hoj raj k'orol riC'uhbal i Dios ma' eta no̱j sahchok wach , re' ta la' re're' q'uihok wach chaxilac tak eh chi je' re' enac'ul tak chi'nchel ricuse'sbal i Dios chi jenaj asi̱ tak .

Je' wo' chic , re' take quib chi aj k'oro̱l re're' xye'eric cajawric chi naquipahba̱b rikajic cho jab chiwach xib ha̱b ru̱c' waki̱b poh re' naca'nam wi̱' rik'ormojic i c'uhbal ye'o̱j queh ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal . Ma' xa re' ta re' , xye'jic la' wo' cajawric chi naquimiksam i ha' chi quic' , je' wo' chi riye'eric ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel wach ac'al xa jarpech pa' nca̱j ribanaric .
Re' hat Simon , ru'um chi ma' coric ta wach acapew-bal chiwach i Dios ma'eta riban chi enawehchaj i ajawric ye'o̱j keh hoj .

eh ru'um chi pan ak'ab wilque̱b take , wilque̱b wo' take pa nik'ab i hin je' ricab nok re' take wilque̱b pa nik'ab i hin , wilque̱b wo' take pan ak'ab i hat . Je' wo' chic , re' take c'acharel je' ru̱c' ayeb take wi̱n chi naqui̱nquihch'ilem , quic'acharic chic chi riye'eric nilok'il .
Chi'nchel i hoj c'acharel xkamay rinimjic i Dios . Chi'nchel hoj junojic chipam i ma' holohic ta laj no'jbal . Ma' wo' jeno' keh hoj ato̱b ta nak . Til xa ta nak je jeno' keh wilic .

Je' wo' chic nipahkaj chi naticapewenok tak chiri̱j ano'jbal tak , ma̱nimsaj awi̱b tak eh ma̱k'or wo' pan ac'ux tak chi re' hat-tak k'e̱' wo' chic awa'ric tak chi quiwach take toco̱m c'acharel . Re' la' hat-tak naticapewenok chiri̱j ano'jbal tak , chach'ubsaj wach ac'ux tak . Re' wili ra̱j rik'orom chi chiban chawach tak chi re' lok'il nquic'ul take toco̱m chic c'acharel nim ok wo' chic wach chiwach take lok'il nac'ul i hat-tak .

Chiwach i ma' laj pa'a̱b cante̱la re're' , til manlic pa riyejal queh wuku̱b chi tz'ukunbal cante̱la re're' xwilow chi jenaj c'acharel pa'lic ar je' ricab nilbic i Ac'unbe̱s re' wilic rajawric chi quina̱ c'acharel . Re' riso' wilic chiri̱j xa junpa'lic jok cu nponic chi ro̱k . Je' wo' wilic jenaj rich'ihch' laj pa̱s tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' , cu nah teleb nelic cho eh k'e'lic jok chi' ric'ux cu nponic nah ritu̱k .

Je' wo' chic , chipam i “ Ac' Jerusalen ” xwilow wo' chi ar ma'xta chic riwih'ic sihtbal i̱b . Ar wo' wilic i tz'uka̱b re' nk'atbic wi̱' k'oric i Dios ch'i̱l i C'acharel rijalwachem ri̱b chi je' jenaj Q'uijol Me̱' . Ar wo' wilic i Dios eh re' take aj niminel reh ar wo' nquilok'ej wach .

Re' aj i cohlsbal wach chi'nchel c'ulic chic lok reh . Je' aj re' k'uru' hat ok tak t'ulic ru̱c' ano'jbal tak eh ma̱cana̱' tak ribanaric johtok ati̱j tak chiwach i Dios reh chi je' re' naponok i k'ijil re're' ic'lic ok ana̱ tak chi uyunic reh .

Ar ajic chipam i tinamit Ata̱lya , re' ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l Wernaweh xi'oquic je pan jenaj ma' laj cano̱wa eh xi'o̱j wo' chic ar Antiyoqui̱ya , re' tinamit elenak cho take wi̱' naxitak'abjic take cho cu'um take quich aj niminel re' xipahkanic reh rato'bil i Dios chi quina̱ naxo̱j ca'n i camanic cu re' xquicohlaj cho ribanaric .

Raj nchel wi jeno' q'uijol ma' raj ta ric'amam na̱ re' xnik'or chi ma'xta risiq'uim rehq'ue̱n xa ma' mahc ta wo' chi reh eh je' wo' , wi re' jeno' k'ahxok ra̱j risiq'uim ribahi̱l xa ma' mahc ta wo' chi reh . Haj cok wilic nwa̱j nik'orom chi nok : Wi jeno' k'ahxok on q'uijol naribanam caxarahil , chi kawach johtok wilic queh yohbalil ru'um take ti'c'axic narichalic . Ru'um aj re' chi pitbal nak reh chi re' take re' ma' eta nquic'ul re're' , re' hin xnik'or chi jeno' c'acharel xa cu rutquel pe ri̱b , k'e̱' nak tare̱t chi encahnic chi ma' eta risic' ric'u'lil ro̱k k'ab .

Je' re' nik'or aweh tak ru'um chi re' hoj ma' re' ta cu̱c' kich ti'jolal c'ahchi'co̱j wi̱' chi peletenic , cu̱c' la' take q'uih tuhm wach chi ma' tob laj uxlabal wilque̱b pan te̱w c'uxic . Re' take re' wilic rehreh wach cajawric , nahsil take eh aj banol wo' take reh balc'uxquilal . Chi'nchel take ma' tob laj uxlabal wili , re' take re' quichopbic quina̱ take tinamit wilque̱b pa rik'ekomil i mahc .

Je' re' cha'n tak nanchalic i ti'c'axic chana̱ tak ra̱j la' wi wilic jeno' aweh tak re' ma' rirak ta chiri̱j chaj bih elic naribanam chipam jeno' c'axquilal , chipahkaj la' rino'jbal reh i Dios maj re're' til wo' nariyeb cho ru̱c' chi'nchel ric'ux eh ma' eta ripit cho chaj bih pahkanic c'ahchi' ribanjic chiwach .

Re' chic yu'na nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱ban tak ru̱c' i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios je' ricab na'n ru̱c' i k'a̱k' nanachup tak . Je' re' nik'or maj wi re' hat-tak xa eli̱c wo' nak'ihtaj awi̱b tak chiwach , ta chic riwih'ic awajawric tak re' ye'o̱j aweh tak ru'um .

Re' pa̱t wili re' poyo̱j ri̱j ru̱c' nimak tak tz'ih , xcojoric take cho tasbal pa̱m . Re' pe̱t tasbal wilic i ye'a̱b re' “ Lo̱k' Riwi̱' ” ribihnal . Ar wilic ye'a̱b pah'ab-bal take cante̱la , rich'i̱l i me̱xa re' ncojmojic wi̱' caxlan wi'c je' ru̱c' k'ahsamaj chi si̱ chiwach i Dios .

Ru'um aj re' chabiraj take no'jbal naniyeb aweh tak wili : Je' ricab nok jeno' c'acharel nponic ru̱c' aj c'a̱y chi rilok'oric i k'an woric laj ch'ihch' ch'ubsamaj wach pan k'a̱k' reh chi naribihomric , je' wo' re' nisiq'uiric cha'n tak i hin reh chi q'uihal wach cuse'sbal enac'ul tak wu̱c' . Je' wo' chic , je' ricab nato̱j tak ru̱c' aj c'a̱y tz'ih chi rilok'oric take sak laj tz'ih nacoj chawi̱j tak reh chi ma' eta nac'uhtaj tak aq'uixbilal chi t'i'lica̱t tak , je' wo' re' nisiq'uiric cha'n tak i hin reh chi enpoyoric wach aq'uixbilal tak wilic ru'um amahc tak . Je' wo' , je' ricab nato̱j tak ru̱c' aj c'a̱y ik'o̱m chi rilok'oric rik'omil nak' awach suksbal reh chi narilbic chi coric , je' wo' re' nisiq'uiric cha'n tak i hin reh chi re' acapew-bal tak erirak chiri̱j chi coric chaj bih k'oro̱j ru'um i Dios .

Je' re' k'uru' re' hin c'ahchi' nitz'ihmbam je aweh tak i k'oric xik'or i Dios chiri̱j i rAc'u̱n reh chi re' hat-tak re' ticojbic tak wach i k'oro̱j chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' rAc'u̱n i Dios na̱weht'alim tak chi re' junelic c'acharic ye'o̱j chic aweh tak eh chi je' re' na̱tikim tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i k'oric k'oro̱j chiri̱j i Jesus chi re're' i rAc'u̱n i Dios .

« Chi je aj re' c'uhtunic niban , re' hin ma' je' ta nicab i c'acharel xa nchalic pa ric'ux i c'uhtunic riban . Re' c'acharel re're' xa c'ulbal rilok'il risi̱c ru̱c' take k'oric rik'or . Ra̱j la' hin niban je' ricab i c'acharel re' nsic'bic reh chi enye'eric rilok'il re' hab wach xtak'anic cho reh . Chi je' re' niban , re' nino'jbal i hin je' wo' ricab rino'jbal i c'acharel coric wach ric'ux eh ma' riban ta i c'ahbilal .

Re' aj chic risakomsjic pa̱m kacapew-bal xiban i Dios i hoj re' xa je' ti ricab jeno' tz'ak ac'al xun , re're' xbanjic reh chi re' rinimal wach ajawric chi ribanaric i camanic xiyew keh i Dios , enc'utunic lok chi ar ru̱c' nchalic eh chi ma' re' ta nchel ku̱c' i hoj .

Je' re' ajic wich aj niminel reh Jesus re' k'e̱' ti' tiwic'raj tak xa pa' bih ti'c'axic nbanjic aweh tak , ma̱ban tak jelow-bal queh c'acharel quibanic aweh tak , chacana̱' la' tak chi re' Dios eric'uhtaj rijosk'il chi quina̱ maj re're' rik'orom chi je' re' naribanam . Chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios rik'or chi je' wili : “ Je' wili rik'orom i Dios : ‘ Xa re' wo' hin wilic wajawric chi riye'eric rijelow-bal i pa' bih ti'c'axic nbanjic . Ru'um aj re' , re' hin quinye'bic reh ti'c'axic chi quina̱ take c'acharel chi tojbal wach i quimahc , nqui rik'orom i Dios , nqui rik'or riC'uhbal .

Re' Jesus je' wili xik'or queh : « Chaj bih eritik wi̱n chi re' hin enik'or aweh tak chi k'e̱' wo' chic wajawric chiwach kama̱m ma' Awraham , xa ru'um chi nwa̱j nisiq'uim nilok'il ? Re' nk'oric chi enye'eric nilok'il , xa re' wo' wAja̱w Dios re' nak'or wo' hat-tak chi awaja̱w tak

Chi nik'orom chic re're' , re' chic yu'na nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma̱jot' tak i holohic laj no'jbal wilic ru̱c' awich aj niminel tak . Nik'or chi je' re' ru'um chi re' wo' Dios c'ahchi' ribanic i camanic pa ric'acharic . Til coric ru' , re' Dios riyeb k'ab keh chi nakac'uxum chi'nchel wach c'uxbal xa re' la' wi nkac'ux jeno' c'uxbal re' pa ricapew-bal cho jeno' kich aj niminel ma' ye'o̱j ta k'ab chi c'uxuric ru'um nok ru̱c' re're' ric'raj chi enmahcanic , re' aj re' nbanic chi ma' riwi̱' ta chi c'uxuric i c'uxbal re're' xa ru'um reh ricapew-bal i kich aj niminel re're' .

Nok tik'imaj ok chic riti'jolal i Jesus , re' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' wilque̱b ponok chi muk'unic , xquicoj nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m chiwach take tz'ih naquibotem wi̱' riti'jolal i Jesus eh chiri̱j chic ru' xquibotej riti'jolal chipam i tz'ih cojo̱j wi̱' re' nc'ohnic laj ik'o̱m . Je' aj re' riwi̱' xca'n reh riti'jolal i Jesus ru'um nok je' re' hoj ocronak wi̱' i hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel nankamuk'a̱' je jeno' camnak .

Nik'or chi je' re' maj nok re' take toco̱m chic awich'i̱l tak xiponic tz'ahpok cho pan che̱' , wilic aweh tak xatponic tak cho chi quitobjic ru'um chi xaquetelej tak quiwach . Ma' xa ta re're' no'jbal xac'uhtaj tak , je' la' wo' naxmak'aric pa' bih wilic aweh tak , re' xbanaric aweh tak re're' xacuy ransil chi suk ac'ux tak . Je' re' xa'n tak ru'um nok aweht'alim tak chi ar pan taxa̱j nariye'eric aweh tak jenaj bihomal re' yohbal wach rilok'il chiwach take xmak'aric aweh tak ayu' eh re're' ma' jaruj ta c'uhlel wach .

« Ru'um aj re' , re' Dios xik'or wo' cho reh ma' Tawiy chi re' i c'acharel re' narico'lonic queh take rich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , ar chi quixilac take ra̱' ri'sil ru' narelic cho . « Je' ricab aj rik'orom cho Dios reh ma' Tawiy , re' Jesus xpahbabjic chi kajco'lonel .

Je' re' k'uru' chiri̱j i tik'inic xiban i Dios re're' , xa nok wo' ye'o̱j cho rehtalil chipam i Lok' laj Hu̱j tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' riC'uhbal i Dios . Ar je' wili rik'or : “ Ma' jeno' c'acharel je' ru̱c' aj no'jbal rilom ta nak wach on ribiram ta nak on iq'uinak ta nak pa ricapew-bal i holonquilal re' xitik'a̱' wach i Dios chi nariyeb queh take c'acharel ti' nquic'raj i Dios , nqui rik'or .

Re' cok ru' to̱b ta wo' nariponic i k'i̱j chi re' kati'jolal re' quimic ri̱j yu'na narisahchic wach nakojquimok je , re' hoj xa ma'xta wo' kaquimic je chi junpech ru'um chi wilic ku̱c' i Lok' laj Uxlabal re' xucsunic cho reh chi quixilac take camnak i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric . Ma' xa re' ta re' , je' la' wo' ru'um chi wilic ku̱c' ru' naribanam wo' chi re' kati'jolal naric'acharic wo' chic cho .
eh je' re' nik'or maj ru'um k'oric riban i Lok' laj Uxlabal pan ka̱mna , re' hoj nkeht'alij chi hoj chic rac'u̱n rixk'u̱n i Dios .

Je' wo' , ma̱jot' awi̱b tak chi ena'n tak i jot'o̱j maj re' Dios ma' xa ta ricana̱' chi je' re' i hab wach nse'lenic pan nak' wach . Ru'um aj re' nik'or aweh tak je' ricab chi jeno' winak pa' bih ja'quil ritic jok pa rac'a̱l re' wo' re' wach i ritic narilom , je' wo' re' hat-tak re' pa' bih holonquil na̱banam ru̱c' awas acha̱k' tak , re' wo' holonquilal na̱banam tak risukquil pan jenaj k'i̱j .

Je' re' ajic reh aj chi ma' eta nac'ul aweh tak re're' , nipahkaj aweh tak chi ma' niq'uic pan ac'ux tak i nik'orom lok wili : Coric ru' chi re' Dios k'e̱' wo' chic chak'lam cho chi kana̱ xa re' la' nok re're' riyew wo' cho jeno' ti'c'axic china̱ jeno' c'acharel til wo' cow wach nariyew cho . Je' re' nc'uhtunic lok ru̱c' ricorquilal wili : Cu̱c' take wich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel je' ru̱c' quik'ehbic pan mahc , re' Dios ribanam chi k'e̱' cow i ti'c'axic nchalic chi quina̱ , raj la' awu̱c' hat-tak xiban chi k'e̱' wo' chic rinimal richak'lamil xiyew cho . Re' richak'lamil i Dios re're' , nik'or aweh tak chi xa ewo' nwih'ic chana̱ tak xa re' la' wi re' hat-tak enatik tak ju' rich'iquinjic ac'ux tak chiri̱j i Jesus . Eta nak nc'uluric chi ma' eta chic nach'ica̱' ac'ux tak , re' Dios eriban chi ma' re' ta chic hat-tak ritinami̱t , je' ricab nc'uluric ru̱c' take k'ab che̱' naquiyoc'oric lok chiwach riche'lal .

Hat-tak was nicha̱k' aj niminel , wih'ok awuyu'nbal tak cu rehtal cho ric'ulic lok i kAja̱w Jesus . Chacoj tak rehtal chi je' ricab nok jeno' winak aj banol abi̱x nwih'ic wo' ruyu'nbal chi nchalic i k'elej laj jab eh je' wo' nwih'ic ruyu'nbal cu rehtal nponic rik'ijil chi narisiq'uim i wach i lok' laj ritic , je' wo' re' cha'n hat-tak ,

Re' ti cok i ma' Onesi̱poro ma' xiricana̱' ta chi wutquel . Ru'um aj re' niban niti̱j chiri̱j chi re' kAja̱w Jesus chic'uhtaj ta nak cho ric'axbal china̱ ch'i̱l take raj pan pa̱t maj xa re' wo' naxincojoric ayu' pan che̱' , re're' q'uih pech xiyew risukquil nic'ux eh ma' xq'uix'ic ta nech' ok wu'um .

Je' re' k'uru' was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel re' wilca̱t tak chi je' hat-tak wac'u̱n wixk'u̱n chi niwach , nik'or wo' chic je aweh tak chi tic'acharok tak chi ri'sil ro̱k k'ab i Jesus . Wi xa je' wo' re' c'acharic naka'nam chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel nac'olok lok i Jesus , ma'xta bih nakayo'jic wi̱' eh ma' xa ta re're' , je' la' wo' wi ma' xoj-jot'oric chipam kaniminic , re're' ma'xta kojriyeb pan q'uixbilal nakojwih'ok cok chiwach .

Yu'na chic , nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak i tak'anic niban chana̱ tak wili : Til tic'acharok tak pan jenaj holonquilal wach c'uxlis chi behsemaj ac'acharic tak ru'um i Lok' laj Uxlabal . Je' wo' , nik'or wo' aweh tak chi ma̱yew tak chic k'ab chi ena'n tak ribanaric i xa pa' jaric c'ahbil laj no'jbal ric'ax wach ati'jolal .

Je' re' k'uru' , ru'um chi re' Dios xiricoj chi hin raj tz'e' wa̱ch chi rik'ormojic rik'orbal , nik'or aweh i coric laj k'oric wili re' nk'oric chiri̱j chaj bih xiban i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric eh til k'e̱' wo' tare̱t chi enquic'ul ru̱c' i ca̱mna take chi'nchel c'acharel . Re' aj wili i k'oric re're' : Re' riwi̱' chi re' kAja̱w Jesus xc'ulic ayu' wach ac'al , reh chi quico'ljic take aj mahc je' ricab xiban wu̱c' i hin re' k'e̱' wo' chic xi̱c' na̱ rinimal nimahc chi quiwach take aj mahc .

Chi cohlsbal wach nik'orbal awu̱c' tak nik'or aweh tak wili : Chi wilca̱t tak chic pan jenaj wach c'uxlis ru̱c' i kAja̱w Jesus , ma̱cana̱' tak risiq'uiric chi re're' nariyeb cho ricowil ac'ux tak ru̱c' rinimal wach i rajawric

Ru'um aj wo' re' nik'or aweh tak wi hab wach jeno' aj niminel ricapaj eh rik'or chi cow ch'iclic ric'ux chiri̱j i Dios , chic'raj wo' ri̱b eh chiban chi k'u̱n ru'um nok ma' chi bih nchel ncalajic wi̱' pa̱m jeno' mahc .
Je' re' ajic re' Jesus xa junpech wo' xiyew ri̱b pan quimic eh ru̱c' re're' xye'eric keh chi junpech chi re' hoj re' wilco̱j chic chiwach i Dios chi ritinami̱t xcuyuric chi'nchel kamahc chi manlic .
Naxquibiraj chi je' re' take nahsil chi kaxilac hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel , xo̱j wo' chic quimolom take abaj chi naquicansam nak i Jesus je' ricab xca'n nak cho reh pan pe̱t ,

Yu'na wilic jenaj chic capew-bal nwa̱j chi na̱rakam tak chiri̱j eh re' capew-bal re're' , re' chi re' Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , re're' nchopbic quina̱ chi'nchel take winak eh re' take winak quichopbic na̱ take ehq'uenbe̱s eh re' Jesus re' wo' i Dios nchopbic cho na̱ ru' .
Je' wo' chic quich'i̱l take c'acharel xicansjic re're' , wilic wo' take xquic'ul nimak tak tz'ujuric , xitz'uhumjic wo' . Wilic wo' take xitz'aparic pan che̱' eh ar xibac'aric chi c'aham ch'ihch' .

Re' aj rich'iquinjic kac'ux wili , xa je' na ricab cowil pixlic jeno' ma' laj cano̱wa . Je' re' nik'or maj je' ricab nok re' cano̱wa ma' eta chic nc'uyu'jic je pa riye'a̱b ru'um nok chi cu pa richamil jok i ha' cutu̱j jok i ahl laj ch'ihch' npahbanic reh , je' wo' re' i rich'iquinjic kac'ux i hoj ma'xta bih enc'uyu'sunic keh ru'um chi cow ch'iclic chiri̱j i Jesus . Re're' xk'ahxic wo' chic johtok ar pan taxa̱j chipam ye'a̱b re' til nlok'onjic wi̱' wach i Dios je' ricab nok wilic ju'jun queh Nahsil aj K'ahsem Si̱ jenaj pech pa riha̱b qui'oquic cok chipam i ye'a̱b k'oro̱j chi “ K'e̱' wo' chic Nim riLok'il ” re' poyo̱j wach ru̱c' nim laj tz'ih .

Tz'a̱b ru' i quibano̱j take c'acharel re' ma' ja' queht'alim ta nic' wach rino'jbal i Dios , xa ma'xta camaj . Je' re' nok ma' riban juneht wach abano̱j tak cu̱c' , re' la' cha'n tak chasakomej tak wach queh chi re' quibano̱j c'ahchi' que̱b ma' holohic ta .

Hat-tak was tak nicha̱k' aj niminel reh Jesus , ma̱tz'uj tak jeno' awich c'acharel tak maj re' ritz'uj i ras richa̱k' on rich'uk k'oric china̱ jeno' ras richa̱k' , re' aj niminel re're' c'ahchi' rik'ebem riwa'ric i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses eh c'ahchi' wo' riq'uic k'e̱' china̱ i c'uhbal re're' . Ma̱ban tak je' re' , re' la' cha'n tak chac'am tak na̱ i c'uhbal re're' chi coric .

Re' chic take i cablaj chi tz'ahp wilic reh i tinamit re're' xa je' chic take holohic laj abaj “ Pe̱rla ” ribihnal eh je' re' quitik'injic bano̱j chi quiju'junal . Re' rinimal wach i be̱h chipam tinamit re're' tik'imaj ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' ma' xilacamaj ta ru̱c' toco̱m chic ch'ihch' , xa nlemuhunic la' chic .

Je' aj wo' re' xiban i Jesus re' chiho̱j wach chi K'atal K'oric , til manlic laj aj camanom wo' nok wilic . Re' cok ru' ma' xa je' ta ricab jeno' aj camanom pan jeno' pa̱t nok wilic , til wilic la' rajawric chi quina̱ ritinami̱t i Dios ru'um nok re're' til rAc'u̱n i Dios nok wilic . Je' re' k'uru' wih'ok ta nak rajawric i Jesus chi kana̱ chi'nchel i hoj aj niminel eh je' re' nik'or maj re' hoj , hoj ritinami̱t i Dios nok wilco̱j . Re' naric'utunic wi̱' chi hoj ritinami̱t i Dios , re' chi cu yu'na chi k'i̱j wilco̱j chi cow kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus eh nakatikim ju' chi je' re' cu rehtal cohlsbal wach kac'acharic ayu' wach ac'al . Je' wo' chic , c'ahchi' ok kuy'em richalic i Jesus chi ch'iclic kac'ux chiri̱j ric'ulic lok eh chi ma'xta kayo'jic chi riye'eric kachi̱' chiri̱j .

Wilic wo' junch'uk chic take no'jbal nwa̱j niyeb tak chawach wili : Coric ok aweh tak i c'axoj i̱b na'n tak . Chi je' re' ma' riban chi c'ahbil ano'jbal tak re' la' chayew ac'ux tak chi ribanaric i holohic laj no'jbal .

Chipam wo' ti junc'am re're' jenaj rinimal hihc xiban eh ru'um i hihc re're' xt'e'lejic take cho pa̱t chipam i tinamit re're' cu rehtal xmoljic jenaj rila̱j seht reh riq'uihal pa̱t wilic ar . Ru̱c' re're' xiquimic wuklajik'ob lajc'ahl ( 7,000 ) chi c'acharel eh nic' pa' chic q'uihal take xicahnic chi c'achalque̱b yohbal wo' chic wach quiyo'jic xchalic cu̱c' , re' xbanic chi xquilok'ej johtok wach i Dios re' wilic cho pan taxa̱j .
Re' cok ru' re' Dios naxiyew rik'orbal reh ma' Awraham , ma' hab ta wach xitz'e'wachej chi jalol rik'orbal , til la' re' Dios chi rutquel ri̱b xiyew rik'orbal reh ma' Awraham .

Ru'um aj re' , re' Po̱nsyo Pila̱to je' wili xik'or reh Jesus : « Ma' ticahnic chi me̱m quinac'u'lej cho . Re' hat aweht'alim chi coric chi wilic wajawric chi enitak'a̱' acansjic wach curu̱s eh wilic wo' wajawric chi etiwok'taj je , nqui xik'or reh .

Je' re' xik'or maj je' wili rik'or chiwach i Lok' laj hu̱j re' c'ahchi' rilom wach : “ Je' ricab jeno' t'uch me̱' ma' nchalic ta rijosk'il nanc'amaric je pan cansbal , on nank'ataric lok i rismal ri̱j cu'um take winak , ma' riq'uer ta wo' chi̱' , je' re' naribanam ru' , xa naribuya̱b wo' ti ri̱b

Cu ru̱c' aj i Samwel xponic quicojoric take ch'ukul k'oric chi quina̱ take kama̱m kati't maj re' take re' p'uht quipahkam chi naroquic jeno' k'atal k'oric chi quina̱ . Ru'um aj chi je' re' xquipahkaj , re' Dios xipahba̱' jenaj quik'atal k'oric , Sawul ribihnal rac'u̱n cho ma' Si̱s re' ra̱' ri'sil cho i Wenjamin . Re' Sawul re're' ca'winak ( 40 ) ha̱b xk'atbic k'oric chi quina̱ take kama̱m kati't

Je' re' nik'or maj ar pan tinamit Cre̱ta yohbal wach take aj chucul laj c'uhbalanel je' ru̱c' ma' nca̱j ta chic quinimem i coric laj c'uhbal , xi'uctubic cho chaxilac tak chi jot'o̱j eh xa chabanlom aweh c'uta̱j nca'n chi xa ma'xta ricorquil . Til je' re' nca'n take aj c'uhbalanel je' ru̱c' take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel re' nquik'or queh take caj tahkanel chi wi nacoquic chipam rinimjic i Jesus , curman chi queh chi naquik'atam lok ritz'uhmal na̱ quic'achanbal .
re' wilque̱b wi̱' q'uih ch'uk wach chicop quic'acharic wach ac'al . Ar wilic take je' ru̱c' wilic quejeb cok , ch'i̱l take xa nquijuquej qui̱b wach ac'al , ch'i̱l wo' take quirupunic wa taxa̱j .

« W-Aja̱w Dios , reh aj chi wilque̱b ok pan jenaj sukquil c'uxlis chi quibil qui̱b je' ricab nok wilco̱j i hoj pan jenaj sukquil c'uxlis chi kibil ki̱b , re' riholonquil ano'jbal xayew wi̱n chi nabjic , xniyew wo' chi nabjic queh take c'acharel xayew take wi̱n chi naqui̱nquihch'ilem .

Chi'nchel i hoj re' xkanimej chic i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric npahkaljic keh chi kach'ica̱' tak kac'ux chiri̱j i Dios chi manlic eh kac'ax wo' tak ru' eh je' wo' take kas kacha̱k' . Ru̱c' i pahkanic re're' , wilic wo' jenaj chic pahkanic nwa̱j nibanam je aweh chi je' wili : Re' c'uhtunic na'n i hat cha'n je' ok wo' ricab i coric laj tijinic xawilow chi xnic'uhtaj aweh .

Re' aj ehcham reh nink'i̱j re're' ru'um chi rinimej take tak'anic bano̱j cho najtir k'i̱j ru'um i Moyses queh take ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chiri̱j ritz'ajaric wach take xa pa' bih jaric ra̱j tz'ajaric wach , re're' xa wilic wo' pa ripa̱t waki̱b chi nimak tak icom abaj ye'bal ha' . Chipam ju'jun chi icom re're' ric'ul je' na junik'ob ( 400 ) culc chi ha' .

Je' re' nok ma̱cana̱' tak chi jeno' ma' holohic laj capewenic chiri̱j i cuctic cho take camnak eriban chi etimahcanic tak , re' la' hat-tak na'lajok aweh tak ru̱c' ricorquilal riC'uhbal i Dios . Je' re' nik'or maj chaxilac tak wilic take ma' ja' cu nquirak ta chiri̱j chi manlic haj wilic rik'or i c'uhbal chiri̱j i Dios re're' . Je' re' nik'or reh chi enoquic cho aq'uixbilal tak .

Chi je' aj re' xa̱j i Dios , tic'acharok tak k'uru' chi xa ch'ublic ok wach ac'ux tak , xa hat ok wo' tak chak'lam , wilic ok awuyu'nbal tak eh xa wilic ok wo' cuybal amahc chawach tak ru'um chi nac'ax awi̱b tak .

Chaco'lej wo' take chiwach i yohbal wilque̱b wi̱' chi equikajic pan quik'ab take aj jot'o̱l laj aj tijinel . Je' re' k'uru' xa je' na ricab nok jeno' c'acharel richohpaj jeno' rich ti'jolal chi narik'ehbic nak chic cok pan k'a̱k' , re' hat-tak enawesaj tak take c'acharel re're' chipam i yohbal wilque̱b wi̱' .
