Tz'a̱b ru' wi re' take c'acharel re're' til ch'iclic quicapew-bal chiri̱j quino'jbal take aj jot'o̱l laj aj tijinel , re' wili raj banaric cu̱c' : Chac'uhtaj ac'axbal tak cu̱c' re' cok ru' chawixowej tak wach quino'jbal eh ma' xa ta re're' , chayohbalej la' tak awi̱b chi quiwach je' ricab nca'n i kich ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel chi nquiyohbalej qui̱b chi ritz'a'jic riso' jeno' aj mahc .

Je' wo' chic , re' hoj keht'alim wo' i wili chiri̱j i Lok' laj rUxlabal i Dios : Chi nok wilco̱j pan ti'c'axic re' wo' re' nto'bonic keh hoj re' ti' nkic'raj i Dios . Ru'um reh to'bonic nkac'ul re're' , chi'nchel nc'uluric ku̱c' ncamanic keh chi ye'bal sukquil c'uxlis pan kac'acharic . Re' aj i wih'ic pan sukquil laj c'uxlis nc'uluric ku̱c' i hoj ru'um chi re' Dios xojriyuk'ej chi enkac'ul i tik'inic xiban .

Was tak nicha̱k' , to̱b ta coric ru' chi til k'e̱' sukquil pan wa̱mna awu'um aweh tak maj xa haj ta chic ma' xo̱j lok ribiral chi re' hat-tak nanimej tak i Jesus chi manlic , re' hin xa cu nwa̱j wo' niyeb aweh tak jenaj chic no'jbal chi je' wili : Wilic ok ano'jbal tak chi reht'aljic haj wilic take holohic laj bano̱j ra̱j banaric eh ma' ok c'ahbil ena'n tak .

Chipam ye'a̱b re're' , wilic jenaj lok' laj ye'a̱b c'atbal se̱nsa ca'loc'omaj i pa̱m ru̱c' k'an woric laj ch'ihch' je' ru̱c' q'uih tz'a̱k . Je' wo' chic , ar wilic jenaj ca̱xa ca'loc'omaj ru̱c' i k'an woric laj ch'ihch' re' rehtalil i tik'inic ribanam cho i Dios najtir k'i̱j . Chipam i ca̱xa re' ca'loc'omaj pa̱m re're' wilic wo' jenaj chic t'uch xa̱ra ca'loc'omaj wo' pa̱m chi k'an woric laj ch'ihch' re' nc'olmojic wi̱' i wi'c “ Manah ” ribihnal re' xye'eric cho queh kama̱m kati't najtir k'i̱j naxiwih'ic cho pan chik yu̱k' . Je' wo' wilic wo' ar i ch'imim che̱' xicoj cho ma' A̱ron chi ribehbal najtir k'i̱j eh rehtalil chi ye'o̱j rajawric ru'um i Dios xtoxlonic wo' chic cho i rich'imim re're' . Ma' xa ta re're' , ar la' wo' wilic i tz'ilom abaj re' tz'ihmbimaj wi̱' take lajeb chi tak'anic xiyew i Dios reh Moyses .

Wi re' aj Dios nbanic chi re' take c'acharel re' nquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus wilque̱b chi coric chic wach quic'ux , re' take k'oric nbanjic k'uru' chi re' hoj ra̱' ri'sil cho ma' Israhel k'e̱' wo' chic coric wach kac'ux ru'um chi nkanimej take k'oric wilic chipam i C'uhbal Ye'o̱j reh Moyses ma' riban ta chic chi nkatik ju' rik'ormojic . Je' re' nik'or maj ma' ru'um ta reh kabano̱j riban i Dios chi wilco̱j chi coric chic wach kac'ux , ela' riban chi je' re' ru'um rich'iquinjic kac'ux chiri̱j i Jesus .

Re' pahkanic xa'n re're' , ma' tare̱t ta maj re' hat acojom chic wach chi re' hin xa jenaj niwi̱' ch'i̱l i wAja̱w , maje' ? Ru'um aj chi xa jenaj kawi̱' , re' take k'oric niban i hin ma' xa pa nic'ux ta nchalic re' la' wAja̱w xk'oric cho wi̱n eh re' wo' re' xbanic take nic' nimal i camanic xniban i hin .

chi quiwach i tinamit re' xa junchalic chic take china̱ ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las chi quich'eyeric . Naxquibiraj chi je' re' , re' quinahsil take nimak quiwach xitak'a̱' chi naresmejic lok quiso' i ma' Lu̱' ch'i̱l i Si̱las reh chi naquitz'uhumjic .

Ru'um aj chi naric'uluric je' ricab xnik'or aweh tak , nwa̱j wo' nik'orom aweh tak i jenaj c'uhbal ru̱c' i ac' laj k'oric re' rik'or chi je' wili : Chac'ax awi̱b chi aju'junal tak . Nic' pa' wach ac'axaric tak xniban i hin je' wo' re' cha'n hat-tak cu̱c' awas acha̱k' tak

Wi re' kati'jolal re' nc'olbic reh ka̱mna ensahchic wach , keht'alim chi re' Dios nariyeb jenaj chic kati'jolal re' ma' re' ta jeno' winak xtik'inic reh . Re' cok re' ma' sahchel ta wach eh ar pan taxa̱j wilic cho .

Chipam ye'a̱b re're' , re' Jesus je' wili xik'or ru̱c' cow laj k'oric queh take c'acharel re're' : « Je' ricab chi re' c'acharel re' quirinimej , re're' ma' xa chiwi̱j ta hin c'ahchi' rich'ica̱b ric'ux , rich'ica̱' la' wo' ric'ux chiri̱j i kAja̱w Dios re' xtak'anic cho wi̱n ,
Chalic i Anani̱yas je' wili xik'or reh : « K-Aja̱w Jesus , q'uih take c'acharel biram chi nquik'or chi re' winak re're' k'e̱' ti'c'axic riban queh take quiniminic aweh ar Jerusalen .

Je' re' nik'or aweh maj chiwach take k'i̱j k'oro̱j re're' , wilic take c'acharel xa re' chic i queh naquiyeb qui̱b chi suk ru̱c' pa' bih nquic'ax wach . Wilic wo' take xa nacotowem chic chi nariwih'ic quitz'a̱k reh chi naquibihomric . Je' wo' , wilic take naquinimsam qui̱b eh naca'nam qui̱b chi xa nim chic quiwa'ric . Ma' xa re' ta re' no'jbal naribanjic , wilic la' wo' take c'acharel til re' chic ritz'ujuric i cas quicha̱k' naca'nam . Wilic wo' take ma'xta chic quibirinic k'oric chiwach quitu̱t caja̱w . Wilic wo' take ma'xta chic riwi̱' quitioxbal eh wilic wo' take ma'xta chic quiyohlem wach i Dios .

Chi je' aj re' ric'uhtjic ric'axbal i Dios xiban cho chi kana̱ , ma' c'axic ta chi keh rirakmajic chiri̱j chi re' Jesus naxichihcaj riquiq'ue̱l naxquimic je , xiban chi re' hoj echic kojc'acharic chi cuyu̱j chic kamahc eh ma' xa ta re're' , ma' c'axic ta la' wo' chi keh rirakmajic chiri̱j chi naponok i k'i̱j narich'ukum wi̱' k'oric i Dios china̱ quimahc chi'nchel c'acharel , re' hoj ekojco'ljic chiwach rijosk'il naric'uhtam i Dios chi quina̱ take aj mahc .

Coric wo' , yu'na chi hin chic raj tahkanel i Jesus re' hin weht'alim chi ma'xta jeno' c'uxbal equirik'eb pan mahc chiwach i kAja̱w Dios , xa re' la' wilic take wich aj niminel nquicapaj chi til wilic take c'uxbal re' riban chi nanquic'ux quicahnic chi aj mahc chic take chiwach i Dios .

Hat Timote̱yo , reh chi na̱banam chi hat manlic raj camanom i Jesus re' Pahbamaj chi K'atal K'oric , curman chi re' nic' pa' nimal c'ahchi' nik'orom je aweh na̱k'orom wo' pan ac'uhtunic cu̱c' take aj niminel ar . Je' wo' chic je' ricab nok jeno' t'uch ac'un riban riwa' riha̱' chi manlic reh chi nariq'uihic johtok chi suk , je' wo' re' i hat curman wo' chi xa wilic ok wo' pan awa̱mna take k'oric k'oro̱j reh chi re' take c'acharel enquich'ica̱' quic'ux chiri̱j i Jesus . Je' wo' re' cha'n chiri̱j take tijinic c'ahchi' atahkem ri̱j re' quic'uhtunic reh coric chiri̱j i Dios .
